1b1(rgyud):
1b2(rgyud):
1b3(rgyud): / mangs
2a1(rgyud): / tog gi gzus zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdo// 
2a2(rgyud): de bzhin ga she gas pa 'od zhi spos snang dang / la la phyag 'tsha'o// 
2a3(rgyud): tshangs pa chen po dbyangs can la phyag 'tshe la lo// de dag
2a4(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal te/ bdud kyi 'khor gyis mi tshugs pa zhes bya ba
2b1(rgyud): gzungs 'di sbyor bar bgyis/ bdag gi rig sngags 'di grub par gyur cig/ oM 'di lta
2b2(rgyud): ste/ A bA me/ A ba me/ A bA re/ AM bA re/ pa ri kuny+dzA/ nA da nA da/ puskA ra bA hA/ 
2b3(rgyud): dz+wa lu khA/ ma khA ya/ oM li/ mi li/ ki li mi li/  kIn+ti bar mu dwe mu dre mu
2b4(rgyud): khe swA hA// oM/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal
2b5(rgyud): ngo'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan dka gnas pa na/ dge slong stong du tshang ba'i dge slong
3a1(rgyud): / gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pazang ga/ nyon mongs meng ga nga dang / 
3a2(rgyud): ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa glang po chen po/ 
3a3(rgyud): bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rab tu thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba/ yongasu
3a4(rgyud): zad pa yang dag pa'i shes pa sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi bang thams cad kyi dam pa'i
3a5(rgyud): pha rol tu son pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhug so// byang chub sems dpa' khri'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen
3a6(rgyud): po 'di lta ste/ lhun po'i rtse 'dzin blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang / chu lha'i blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang / bzang po'i blo gros
3b1(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pa dang / rgyal ba'i blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang / 'od kyi blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang / namakha'i blo gros gzhon nur gyur
3b2(rgyud): ba dang / glog gi blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / thub dka' gzhon nur gyur pa dang / chu lha gzhon
3b3(rgyud): nur gyur pa dang / dri ma med pa gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / de dag la sogs
3b4(rgyud): pa byang chub sems dpa' khri thams ca/ da kyang bzod pa dang / gzungs dang / ting nge' dzin thob pa/ chos thaMng la sgrib pa med
3b5(rgyud): pa'i ye shes can/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa/ bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ ngo
3b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/ thabs shre/ 
3b7(rgyud): ba la mkhas pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhug so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na/ kun tu mkhas pa/ gsal ba/ yid
4a1(rgyud): / gzhus pa/ rig pa'i gnas bco brgyad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ g.yog lnga brgya pa gcig gi ming ni nye rgyal/ gcig gi ma
4a2(rgyud): pang nas skyes shes bya ba gnyis shig 'khod de/ tshogs kyi gtso bo/ g.yog gi tshogs can de gnyis phan tshun 'di ltar bdag cag las
4a3(rgyud): gang gis thog mar bdud rtsi thob pa des gcig la gcig sbran to// zhes dam tshig byas so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul snga de'i dus kyi tshe/ 
4a4(rgyud): sham thabs dang / chos gos bgro/ lhung bzed thogs nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong / khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir
4a5(rgyud): zhugs pa dang / kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul spyod yul du zhugs nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod
4a6(rgyud): snyoms kyi phyir song ba mthong ngo // mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar dge slong 'di'i spyod lam mdzes pa de lta bu ni bdag gis sngan chad
4a7(rgyud): dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ mir gyur pa gzhan su la yang gang yang sngon ma mthong na/ bdag de'i gan du song ste/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi ston/ 
4b1(rgyud): pagang yin/ gang las rab tu byung / gang gi chos la dga' zhes dri'o snyam nas/ de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul ga la ba der song ste/ tshe dang ldan pa
4b2(rgyud): thul drang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar bya ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar bya bya'i gtam sna tshogs byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ kun
4b3(rgyud): tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul lnga 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan khyod kyi ston pa gang gang los rab tu byung / gang gi chos
4b4(rgyud): la dga' / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyi des/ kun tu rgyu nye rgyal la 'di skad ces smra das so// shAkya'o sras po brtul zhugs
4b5(rgyud): dka' thub chen po kun gyi dam pa dbang ldan pa// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho pha rol phyin cing / grol la de bzhin 'gro ba 'grol mdzad pa// sangs
4b6(rgyud): rgyas shes bya srang mdzad mi mnyam sdug bsngal mtsho skems da ltar 'di na yod// dri ma med pa de yi skyabs su nga song nga ni ngo yi chos la dga'// 
4b7(rgyud): nye rgyal gyi smos pa khyod kyi ston pa ji skad smra/ ji skad ston/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis smras so// de'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa legs
4b8(rgyud): bar rab tu nyan la yid la zung shig dang ngas pa shad do// ji ltar 'jig rten las dang nyon mongs rgyur bcas byed rgyur ldan 'byung dang / 
5a1(rgyud): / las dang nyon mongs pa dag ldog rgyu de yang 'dren pas rab tu gsungs// gang na skye dang rga dang rgud pa'i sdug bsngal nges par mi gnas pa// thar pa'i
5a2(rgyud): mchog de smra ba'i khyu mchog de yi rang gis mkhyen te gsungs// de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang
5a3(rgyud): bral la nyon mongs pa med pa skyes te/ des rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so// sangs rgyas kyis ni shin tu rnyed dka' thob
5a4(rgyud): gter bdud rtsi'i chos bshod pa// 'di ni rtag tu skye ba 'i 'bab chu skems par bden par khong du chud// de ni 'gro ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba
5a5(rgyud): ste/ lam 'di dam pa shes rab chos rnams sgom pa mi mnyam byed pa yin// de nas kun tu rgyu nyi rgyal gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la 'di skad ces smras so// 
5a6(rgyud): tshe dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de da lta ga la bzhugs/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan
5a7(rgyud): 'das ni rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na/ 'di lta ste/ ral pa can stong rab tu byung ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// 
5a8(rgyud): nye rgyal gyis smras pa/ bdag gis grogs pa'i mchog dang / slob ma'i 'khor la bltas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thad du rab tu 'byung ngo // de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal/ 
5b1(rgyud): dang ldan pa rta rdul gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te slar song nas/ kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes ga la ba der song ba dang / kun tu rgyu bang nas skyes/ 
5b2(rgyud): kyi kun tu rgyu nye rgyal rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ste/ mthong nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal lo 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi dbang po rnams ni dngas/ bzhin gyi mdog ni yongs
5b3(rgyud): su dag/ lpags pa'i mdog ni kun tu dkar ba las na/ tshe dang ldan po khyod kyis bdud rtsi rnyed do// nye rgyal gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa de de bzhin te/ kho bos bdud rtsi rnyed kyis/ 
5b4(rgyud): tshe dang ldan pa de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / kho bos ji snyed pa khyod la bshad dro// de nas kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes stan las langs nas
5b5(rgyud): blagos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i/ ljong sa la btsugs nas/ kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gA/ la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud de 'di skad ces
5b6(rgyud): smras so// gang gis srid gsum rgya mtsho myur rgal zhing // phung po dgra chen rnam par gzhig bya ba// mya ngan med zhi lam de shod cig dang // yang 'byung med pa'i lam du 'jug par
5b7(rgyud): bya// de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis 'di skad ces smras so// ji ltar 'jig rten las dang nyon mongs rgyur bcas byed rgyur ldan 'byung dang // las dang nyon mongs pa dag lag rgyu de
5b8(rgyud): yang 'dren paso rab tu gsungs// gang na skye dang rga dang rgud pa'i sdug bsngal nges par mi gnas pi// pha ro ba mchog de sla ba'i khyu mchog de yis rang gis mkhyen te gsungs
6a1(rgyud): pang nas skyes kyis smras pa/ sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya phyir dri ma med pa zhi ba'i chos// nyon mongs lta ngan nyes pa thams cad zhi byed mi shes gcod pa dang / 
6a2(rgyud): 'di ni 'dus pas gsog gso bo de phyir stong pa slu bar thub pas gsungs// de thos zhi ba reg 'gyur dri ma med pa'i tshig de zlos te gsungs// nye rgyal gyis smras pa/ ji ltar 'jig
6a3(rgyud): rten las dang nyon mongs rgyur bcas byed rgyar ldan 'byung dang // las dang nyon mongs pa dag ldog rgya de yang 'dren pas rab tu gsungs// gang na skye dang rga dang rgud pa'i sdug bsngal
6a4(rgyud): nges par mi gnas pa// thar pa'i mchog de smra ba'i khyu mchog de yis rang gi mkhyen te gsungs// de nas kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes kyis de nyid du chos rnams la chos
6a5(rgyud): kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral la/ nyon mongs pa/ med pa rnam par sbyangs te/ des rgyun tu zhugs pa/  'bras bu thob nas 'di skad ces smras so// yang
6a6(rgyud): dag spyod pa 'di ni chu bo sgrol bzhi pa mgyogs pa'i gzings// ye shes mchog 'di sdug bsngal gsum pi zhe byed 'khor ba'i pha rol 'gro// 'di ni yongs su shes na nyon mongs
6a7(rgyud): phung po 'joms shing bdud 'dul 'gyur// thar pa 'di ni dgra dang thab mo bsal cing sdug bsngal rgya mtsho skems// pang nas skyes kyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
6a8(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de lta ga la bzhugs/ nye rgyal gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa bdag gis bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi
6b1(rgyud): grong khyer chen po 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lun dka gnas pa na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dnga'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs zhes thos na/ 
6b2(rgyud): bdag cag gnyis bcom ldan 'das de'i thad du rab tu 'byung ngam/ pang nas skyes kyis smras/ tshe dang ldan pa de bzhin te bdag bdag gi 'khor la bltas la rab tu 'byung ngo // de
6b3(rgyud): nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes rang gi 'khor ga la ba der dong ngo // de nas skad cig yud tsam de la/ bdud sdig can gyis yul ang gA maM g+ha d+ha na mkhas shing snyan pa
6b4(rgyud): dang / brjed pa dang / grags par ldon pa/ skyes bu dam pa/ nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes g.yog dang brtsadas te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar
6b5(rgyud): 'dod do zhes thos nas/ de 'dri snyam du sems te// kyi hud de gnyis gal te dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i slob mar gyur na// bdag gi bdud kyis yul stong par byed kyi bdag
6b6(rgyud): der song ste// skyes bu dam pa de gnyis rab tu byung ba las bzlog la/ sdig pa can gyi lta bo 'dzin du gzhug go snyam ste/ de nas skad cig thang gcig yud tsam la bdud sdig can
6b7(rgyud): myur du bdag gi khong pa nas mi snang bar byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyi cha byad dang / rtags dang / spyod lam du bsgyur nas/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyi mdun na lam kar 'dug ste/ 'di
6b8(rgyud): snyid ces smras so// kho bos sngar smras rgyu dang byed rgyu lta bu de ni log pa ste/ khyed gnyis yid kyi spyod pa ci la nges pa bgam par bya ba'i phyir/ smras pa de dag thams cad don
7a1(rgyud): yod ma yin 'di la rgyu yang med// dge dang mi dge'i las de'i 'bras bu thob pa 'di na ga la yod// myur du khyed gnyis 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams la rab spyod rtsed
7a2(rgyud): me byos// skye rga na 'chi med cing sdug bsngal med de 'jig rten pha rol med// bsod nams bsod nams ma yin las bskyed 'bras med rgyu dang byed pa med// rnyed phyir 'dir ni shAkya'i
7a3(rgyud): bu yis smras kyis dngal ma 'gro shig/ de nas nye rgyal dang / bang nas skyes 'di snyam du sems te/ kye mu bdud sdig can po dag cig rab tu 'byung ba las bzlog pa'i phyir 'ongs snyam
7a4(rgyud): nas// de nas nye rgyal rgyab kyis phyogs te 'dug nas/ rang gi 'khor la bos te 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u khyod nyon cig 'khor ba'i skyon// dran par gyis
7a5(rgyud): la 'jig rten rga ba yis// gzir cing 'tshe bdag gis ni rab bskor ba// de gnyis spang phyir rang byung la gas par zung // de nas pang nas skyes kyis bdud la
7a6(rgyud): slar smras pa// mkhas pa'i blo 'chang sdug bsngal gsum mthar 'byin mchog chos rnams kun shes kyis// rnam pa kun tu bdag cag blo gros 'di las bskyed nus su yang meng / 
7a7(rgyud): srid pa rab zhi bya phyir bdag cag brtan pa'i yid kyis rtag tu 'bang // sreng+ge'i gzugs wa yi tshig gis nged kyi blo gros ma bsgyur cig/ bden pa mthong ba'i lho gang dag na mkha' la
7a8(rgyud): 'dug pa de dag gos skyes bu dam pa de gnyis la legs so zhes bya ba byin te// skyes bu dam pa khyed lagase legs so// 'di lta ste/ rab tu 'byung ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba 'di ni
7b1(rgyud): 'jig rten thams cad las khyad par 'phags pa'i lam yin te/ lam 'di ni sdug bsngal thams cad zhi ba'o// lam 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul la 'jug
7b2(rgyud): pa'o// 'di lta ste/ rab tu 'byung ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis rab tu bsngags shing bstod pa'i lam mo// de nas yang bdud
7b3(rgyud): sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/ yid la bcags nas de nyid du mi snang bar song ngo // de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes gnyis kyis rang gi 'khor la bltas te 'di
7b4(rgyud): skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u dag dedang ni rga ba dang 'chi raba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu 'gro ba'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa las rab tu 'byung bar yang dag par chas
7b5(rgyud): kyis khyed kyis shes par gyis shig/ khyed rnams las gang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung / mi 'dod pa de ni 'di nas phyir log shig/ de nas
7b6(rgyud): bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag thams cad kyis 'di skad ces smras so// bdag cag cung zad shes pa de kun kyang khyed kyi mthun/ khyed rgya chen po'i gnas su rab tu 'byung na
7b7(rgyud): khyed gang las rab tu byung ba de las bdag cag kyang rab tu 'byung ngo // de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang / bong nas skyes g.yog lnga brgya dang bcas pa/ bcom
7b8(rgyud): ldan 'das las rab tu 'byung bar chas par bdud sdig can gyis rig nas/ ci nas de gnyis dge sbyong ge'u ta mo'o gan du 'gro mi nus par bya ba'i phyir/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer
8a1(rgyud): chen po'i byi logs su g.yangs chen po zabs su dpag tshad brgya zhig sprul to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba
8a2(rgyud): mngon par 'du mdzud de/ ci nas kun tu rgyunye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes gnyis g.yang sa chen po de mi mthong zhing lam drang por 'gro bar mdzad do// yang bdud sdig can gyis de gnyis
8a3(rgyud): kyi mdun dur chen po brtan pa/ sra bi/ mi rnyil ba // sul med pa/ gcig tu stug por gyur pa/ 'khregs pa/ 'phang du dpag tshad stong yod pa zhig mngon par sprul te/ sang+ge
8a4(rgyud): khro zhing gdug la/ gtum pa/ sgra chen po 'byin pa stong yang mngon par sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das dkyi gzi brjid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus skyes bu dam
8a5(rgyud): pa de gnyis kyis ri de yang ma mthong / seng+ge yang ma mthong / seng+ge'i skad kyang ma thos te/ lam drang / ra bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su song ngo // 
8a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ni 'khor mang po brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas/ chos ston te de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnamal bka' stsal pa
8a7(rgyud): dge slong dag khyed skyes bu dam pa tshogs kyi gtso bo g.yog gi tshogs can di gnyis la bltos/ de dag gis gsal ba/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das
8a8(rgyud): kyis bka' stsol baM/ skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis gsog dang bcas te'i yang dub tu byung nas/ gcig ni pa'i nyan thos rnams kyi nang na shes rab can gyi mchog tu 'gyur ro// 
8b1(rgyud): kun rdzu 'phrul na kyi mchog tu 'gyu ro// denas dge slong shigags de tshigs su snang bu 'di ga smras so// skyes bu mkhas pa g.yog rdzam dri gnyis ni// rdzu 'phrul dang / 
8b2(rgyud): ldan shes 'jig da par/  mchog pan pa mdzangad ngas du bas ste// bdag gis de gnyis kyi snang bskyed nas pas// de nas dgi slong du spyan las la mnas/ 
8b3(rgyud): spring mang po khyim na gnas pa dang / rab tu byung ba mang po dang lhan cig tu skyes bu ngam pa de gnyis bsunas bsnyen bkur byas so// de nas skyes bu dam pa de gnyis bcom ldan 'das pa/ 
8b4(rgyud): laM ba der song sa phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'dis kyi zhabs del mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ la ni gsum bskor 'i dbyas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ 
8b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs podage slong gi dngos po bdag cag gnyis la stsal du
8b6(rgyud): gsol// bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du tshangs par spyod par spyad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyed gnyis kyi ming ci/ nye rgyal gyis gsol
8b7(rgyud): pabadag ni bram ze nye rgyal gyi bu lags te/ nye rgyal zhes bgyi/ bdag gi ma'i ming ni shA ri'i ka ste/ bdag de las skyes pas na/ de'i slad du bdag gi ming nI shA ri'i bu
8b8(rgyud): zhes btags so// bdag rab tu 'byung bar yang pha mas gnang lags so// pang nas skyes kyis gsol ba// bdag gi pa'i ming ni ke'u di n+ya zhes bgyi// bdag gi mi'i ming ni
9a1(rgyud): mo'u dag la zhes bgyi ste/ bdag de las skyes pas na/ de'i slad du bdag gi ming ni mo'u dgal gyi bu zhes btag so// bdag rab tu 'byung bar yang pha mas
9a2(rgyud): gnang lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis shA ri'i bu dang / me'u dgol gyi bu nga'i thad du g.yog dang bcas te/ tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces bka' stsal pa dang / de nyid kyis de gnyis
9a3(rgyud): rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos por gyur te/ shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu g.yog dang bcas pa rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon par bdud sdig can dbang
9a4(rgyud): byug chen po'i gzugs su bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad ces smras so// gang dag bstan bcos don spyod mkhas pa rig pa'i pha rol seng // de kun pa
9a5(rgyud): yi rkang la phyag 'tshal de dag 'dren pa nga // go'u ta ma slob ma 'khor bcas nga la deng myur skyabs tshel gyi/ ga/ mya ngan 'das 'gro rgyas pa gsal ba'i lam 'di khyed
9a6(rgyud): la bshad// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod lam 'gro ba 'di dag ngan 'gror 'dren cing sdug bsngal rgya mtsho rnyed par byed// nga yi lam ni rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'gro ba'i sdug
9a7(rgyud): bsngal rgya mtsho skams byed pa// 'chal pa mdzem pa med cing mu cor smra ba wa skad yang ci zhig zer// khyed ni btsem zin bdud kyis ngo la da yang 'dir ni gnod gang byed mi nus// de nas
9a8(rgyud): bdud sdig can gyis dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs mi snang bar byas nas/ tshangs pa'i cha byad du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ 'di skad ces smras so// khyod kyi shes rab
9b1(rgyud): kyis ni las dang nyon mongs srid pa'i myu gu rab tu gsal// de yi slan chad thub pa ci skad sems can don 'dir 'di ltar sdug bsngal spro// gtso bo 'gro ba 'di na khyod kyi steng gyur skye de gang
9b2(rgyud): na'ang ma mchis te// dus 'di lags ni sbyin dang bral khyod ci yi slad du mya ngan myur mi 'da'// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ngas 'dul gang khyed sems can mtshungs med
9b3(rgyud): gang+gA'i bye ma snyed// ngas mthong de dag nga yis snying rjes thar par bya ba yin// 'gro ba rab 'bring ngan par gyur pa thar te mthar thug na// de nas mya ngan 'da' yis blo gres ngan pa g.yos
9b4(rgyud): ci bskul// de nas yang bdud sdig can sdug bsngal ni dong yid mi bde nas yid la bcags ste/ de nyid/ du mi snang bar gyur nas rang gi gnas su song ste/ mya ngan
9b5(rgyud): gyi khang par zhugs nas 'dug pa dang / de'i med la bdud kyi gnas na 'khod pa'i sems can kun pa na tshun 'di skad du ci'i rgyud bdag cag gi rgyal po chen po
9b6(rgyud): 'di mya ngan gyi khang par zhugs ste 'dug pa su'ang mi shes so zhes 'dra'o// de nas bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya tsam rab tu dga' bar byed pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 
9b7(rgyud): phreng ba dang / byug pa thigs te/ rab tu yid du 'ong ba'i gos dang / lhab lhub kyis bdag cag rgyan dang / rab tu yid du 'ong zhing mos par byed pa'i lha'i sil snyan byas te/ 
9b8(rgyud): rab tu yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyis glu len gar byed cing yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i lha'i sil snyan dag byas nas/ dga' ba'i rtsed mo dang ldan par bdud sdig can gyi mdun du 'khod pa
10a1(rgyud): dang / bdud sdig can des lag pa gnyis sgreng nas bos so// sgra ma byed sgra ma byed ces de skad ces smras pa dang / yud tsam zhig lha'i bu mo dag cang mi zer bar 'khod
10a2(rgyud): do// yang klu rab tu blangs shing sil snyan byas pa dang / bdud sdig can gyis lag pa gnyis g.yebs te bos so// lha'i bu mo de dag gis dga' ba dang ldan pa'i glu dang gar dang / sil snyan
10a3(rgyud): lan bdun gyi bar du byas pa dang / yang de bzhin du bdud sdig can de lag pa gnyis sgreng nas 'bod cing / sgra ma byed sgra ma byed ces zer ro// de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i bu mo de dag cang
10a4(rgyud): mi zer bar 'khod de/ de nas lha'i bu mo dbyangs snyan glog ces bya bas/ bdud sdig can ga la de legs su thal te mo sbyar bas btud nas 'di skad ces smras so// gtso bo khyod
10a5(rgyud): kyis deng 'dir shi 'phos ltas shig gzigs sam ci// 'on tam ci zhig de ring 'gro ba shugs kyis 'khrugs kyu/ ra tam// 'on te 'di na khyod dag stobs chen 'ga' zhig mchi
10a6(rgyud): las ga/ ci yi slad du khyod ni dgyes par mi bzhugs thugs ngan mdzad// bdud kyi smras pa/ nga la dgra yod pa ni stabs ldan sems thul ba// sa steng shAkya'i bu pho'i sgyu ma bslabs pa'i blo// de/ 
10a7(rgyud): ni ci nas gal te brlag par ma gyur na/ de yis nga'i 'dod khams 'di ni stongs par byed// lha'i bu mo des smras pa/ gtso bo srid gsum bcings srang rgya mtsho mtha' rings la// zad
10a8(rgyud): bgyid nus pa'i stobs dang ldan pa su zhig mchis/ bdag po thabs stobs brtson 'grus rtsal rnams gang gis kyang // de la de ring ma lus bgyid par nus ma mchis// bdud kyis
10b1(rgyud): smras pa/ sbyin dang brtul zhugs bsam pa smon lam snying rje'i zhags pa can// stong pa mtshan ma med pa'i mtshon cha mchog dang gzhu thogs te/ 'khor ba las byung rab tu zhi ba'i
10b2(rgyud): lam dang 'thun gyur nas// srid pa ma lus bzlog pa nye bar bstan pabyed pa'o// de'i slob ma bsam gtan la ni mngon par brtson yid kyis// dben par rgyu zhing nyes bzang par bya phyir
10b3(rgyud): khor zug tu// cho ga bzhin du zhugs nas grong dang grong khyer stong pa dang // nags kyi nang dag dang ni ri'i sman ljongs rnams na gnas// rdzu 'phrul dang ni stobs dang snying rje'i grogs dang
10b4(rgyud): ldan pa yi// dam pa nye rgyal bang nas skyes gnyis su dab pas brtul bar gyur// rab dul chos can 'jig rten gsum kun cho ga bzhin du brtul// des ni nga'i
10b5(rgyud): 'dod khams 'di dag stongs par byed par 'gyur// de nas bdud kyi bu me lnga brgya po de dag gis bdud sdigacan las// bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan gyi
10b6(rgyud): bsngags pa thos nas thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam pa dang bral ba'i glog ces bya ba thob bo// de nas bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis// bcom
10b7(rgyud): ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir// lce'i sil snyan dang / lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / lhab lhub dang / spung pa dang / 
10b8(rgyud): rkyen de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su gtor ba dang / lha'i me tog dang / sil snyan nas rgyan gyi bar du de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus 'ang
11a1(rgyud): ma'i tshal du bab par gyur to// bdud kyi bu mo de dag kyang g.yog dang bcas pas so so nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo // de dag gis mthong nas kyang rab tu/ 
11a2(rgyud): dga' ba dang / rangs par skyes par gyur to// gang gi phyir 'od ma'i chel du 'di lta bu'i me tog gi char rab tu bab ces/ dge slong de dag the tshom skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
11a3(rgyud): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu g.yog dang bcas pa 'di gnyis la ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba chen po sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i me tog gi char
11a4(rgyud): chen po rab tu bab lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das 'a di'i rgyu ci lags rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'ad das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyi
11a5(rgyud): mthu ma yin te/ bdud sdig can gyi g.yog mo lnga brgya tsam gyis/ bdud kyi khang pa de nas nga la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'di lta bu'i me tog gi char chen po nas
11a6(rgyud): rgyan gyi bar gyi char bab bo// de dag ring po mi thogs par 'dir 'ongs ste/ nga las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'thob bo// de nas bdud kyi
11a7(rgyud): bu mo lnga brgya tsam po de dag so so nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung dang / brjod pa'i dbyangs thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la dre bas kyang rab tu dga' ba skyes s+ho/ 
11a8(rgyud): de dga' ba dang rangs pa des byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob po// de nas yang bdud kyi bu mo de dag bdud kyi khang pa der gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te
11b1(rgyud): dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs gang na bzhugs pa'i phyogs der bltas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// steng chu ma lus
11b2(rgyud): skems pa 'gro ba'i mig gcig pa// mig ma mchis pa'i 'jig rten kun la gzigs nas ni// khyod kyis lha dang mir bcas pa yi 'gro ba sbrel// thub pa bdag cag ji ltar myur du sa
11b3(rgyud): rgyas 'gyur// lha dang mis mchod don gsung ba bcom ldan 'das// bdag cag 'thun par bud med snang ba nyid spangs nas// blo mchog khyed kyi 'phrul gyi drung du myur bar ni/ 
11b4(rgyud): mchis nas 'di bzhin thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung nyan to// / bdag med gsung ba don dam gzigs pa bcom ldan 'das// byang chub yan lag rin che ni dri med nor gsung
11b5(rgyud): sgron// mtshungs med bdud kyi stobs brtul khyod kyis bad/ gcag la// da ltar myur du lhan cig byang chub lung bstan gsol// de nas bdud kyi bu mo de dag stan las
11b6(rgyud): lengs te mgrin gcig tu bdud sdig can lo 'di skad ces smras so// nyes byas blo gros can khyod snying po mi g.yo ba'o// dpal rnyed ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la snang bar sems// 
11b7(rgyud): dregs pas gos nas skye ba la sogs sdug bsngal gyis// lus kun gtses te mi bzad gnas su nye bar song // de ltar khro ba spangs te rgyal la dad par gyis// 'khor ba'i nyes pa
11b8(rgyud): dregs pa'i 'dam las thar pa'i bdag/ 'di ni nyid kyis 'gro ba kun gyi ngo bo mkhyen// thugs rje can gyi skyabs su 'dong gis myur du bzhud// de nas bdud sdig can shin tu gdug pa'i
12a1(rgyud): yid dang ldan pa 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis 'di 'dra'i bdud kyi stobs kyi yul drag po dran par byas la/ gang g.yog mo lnga brgya tsam 'di dag bdag nyid
12a2(rgyud): bcing ba lngas bcings par mthong bar byas te/ 'di nas bzlog la 'gro mi nus par bya'o snyam pa dang / bdud des de dag bcing ma nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar g.yog me lnga brgya
12a3(rgyud): tsam po de dag de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro// de nas g.yog mo lnga brgya tsam de dag bdud sdig can gyi drung nas dong ba dang / de nas bdud sdig can rab tu khros te/ 
12a4(rgyud): 'di snyan du sems so// bdag gis yong 'di 'dra ba'i ba dud kyi stobs kyi yul drag po dran par byas te/ ci nas bdag cag gi g.yog mo de dag phyogs dang phyogs mtshams
12a5(rgyud): thams cad 'khrul nas/ dge sbyong gau ta ma mi mthong zhi nga sbyar yang bdag gi gnas su 'ong bar na mkha' 'dri/ dag thams cad du rnam par 'thor rlung dang // rlung nag pos
12a6(rgyud): kun khyab par bya'o snyam na'ang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs kyi rlung cung zad kyang langs par byed ma nus so// tha na skra'i rtse mo gcig tsam yang bskyod ma nus na mang du lta ci
12a7(rgyud): skyes/ de nas yang bdud sdig can rab tu khros shing sdug bsngal te/ yid mi bde zhing yod la gcags nas/ dro zhing skad chen pos rang gi bu dang / tshogs kyi 'khor lo bos te/ bdud kyi gan
12a8(rgyud): thams cad sgras gang bar byas so// sdug pa'i bu dang tshogs kyi 'khor rnams tshur sheg shig/ nga ni bdag yul rang gi rdzu 'phrul stobs las nyams// shAkya'i bu 'di sgyu ldan g.yon
12b1(rgyud): dag 'jam la// khong nas rang bzhin dug sdong 'dra ba 'dir skyes so// de nas sgra des bdud kyi g.yog mo dang / bdud kyi bu mo de dag thams cad dang / bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa/ 
12b2(rgyud): de dag thams cad rings pa'i gzugs kyis myur du lhags nas/ bdud sdig can gyi mdun du 'khod pa dang / 'khor de'i nang nas bdud kyi bu rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba des thal mo sbyar te
12b3(rgyud): 'di skad ces smras so// ci slang thugs khros rab tu 'khrugs shing thugs mi dgyes// sreg skal deng 'dir ma byung 'di nas khyod ma 'phos// 'di na khyod lhag dgra ni su yong ma mchis na/ khyod ni
12b4(rgyud): rmongs par gyur tam ci slad gzhan du dgengs// bdud kyis smras/ shAkya'i bu bo mangs phal shing gi grib ma 'dug pa mu mthong ngam// ci'i phyir 'di na khyod kyi mdun na stobs dang
12b5(rgyud): ldan pa'i dgra med smras// stobs cig ldan pa g.yon can de ni/ sa thams cad rnam pa du mar bslus// bdag cag pu dang / sngar bcas ma lce 'bor dang bcas pa pa'i me yis bsregs// 
12b6(rgyud): 'jig rten 'di ni skyes bu gtso bo dpal dang brjod pa rnam grag pa// mkhas pa bstan bcos snyan dang gis mang po byed brtson 'thun pa myur bar yang // chos kyi kyo ba btang gis drangs te shAkya'i bu
12b7(rgyud): 'di'i skyabs der song // lus mdzes g.yon can blo gros ldan 'di nga yi dgrar ni rab tu gnad// rab tu gdug pa'i g.yog me de dag snying rje med pas nga bor te// nga la dbang btsugs nas na de ring
12b8(rgyud): dge sbyong de yis skyabs su dong // gal te bdag cag myur bsgrims stobs chen 'di dang thal b.ras byas na// g.yo dang rgyu yis srid pa gsum po de dag ma lus stongs par byed// de nas bdud
13a1(rgyud): kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so// de ltar bgyi'o// bdag cag gi rdzu 'phrul dang / stobs kyi yul gyi mthu/ 
13a2(rgyud): dang rnaM bar sprul pa de dag thams cad bstan te/ shAkya'i bu 'di gal te thal bar bgyid nus pa lta na ni legs/ de ltar ma nus na ni de'i skyabs su mchi'o// yab nyid kyi mngon sum du gyur pa
13a3(rgyud): lags te/ gang bdag cag sde chen pos yongs su bskor ba/ sngar shAkya'i bu gcig pu gnyis su med pa 'dis rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis rab tu pham par bgyis na/ da g.yogs mang por gyur pa lta
13a4(rgyud): ci smres// bdud sdig can gyis smras pa/ bzhin bzang dag deng3/ gal te dge sbyong ge'u ta ma 'di dag bsod nu na slar shig/ shig/ ci ste ma nus na yang bdag cag gi gnas kyang bsrung
13a5(rgyud): kyis slar shag shig/ bdud kyi 'khor dkrigs phrag bcu gnyi sa po de dag de nas 'phags te/ 'di nas steng du dpag/ tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du bkang nas/ de 'dra ba'i
13a6(rgyud): bdud kyi stobs kyi yul gyi rdzu 'phrul drag po bstan te/ gang gling bzhi pa'i na mkha' thams cad sprin nag po chen po dang / rlung nag po chen po dang / skar mangs bkang nas/ ri'i rgyal po rab
13a7(rgyud): la yang lag gis brdabs te/ gleng bzhi pa thams cad rab tu g.yo bar byas nas/ shin tu 'jigs pa'i sgra rnams kyang 'byin to// de dag gis klu dang / klu chen po dang / gnod sbyin dang / gnod
13a8(rgyud): chen po dag gis sa chen po brag dang rir bcas pa thams cad dang ldan pa/ ri'i rgyal por rab kyang g.yos par rig/ mtsho dang mtsha chen po dang / 'bab chu dang / chu bran dang 'bab chu chen po dang / 
13b1(rgyud): rgya mtsho chen po rnams kyang 'khrugs par rig nas/ nam kha'i dkyil na 'khod do// bdud kyi 'khor de dag ni ri rab kyi zom la 'khod nas/ dpag tshad tsam gyi rje'i char mngon par sprul te/ nam
13b2(rgyud): las kun tu 'beb so// ral gr-i dang / gtun shing dang / rdo ba dang / mtshon rtse gnyis pa dang / lte'u kha ma dang / lcags mda' dang / spu gri dang / s+phu gI lta bu dang / dgra sta dang / ste'u so dang / 
13b3(rgyud): rang red can dang / khwa shin tu rang rod can srab/ drag pa/ rtsub pa rno ba'i char rab tu sprul te/ kun tu phab bo// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das bdud kyi 'khor rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge dzin
13b4(rgyud): la snyems par zhugs te/ gang rdo dang mtshan cha de dag thams da lA'i me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma da/ bro dang man+dAr ba dang / man+dar pa chen po'i me tog gi char chen por
13b5(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs/ yul aM g+ha maM g+ha d+har skar mda' ltung ba ni spos kyi char chen por byin gyis brlabs/ sgra de dag ni rol mo'i sgra sna tshegasu byin gyis brlabs te/ 'di ltar
13b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra dang / mngon par shes pa'i sgra dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sgra dang / dbang bskur ba'i sgra dang / bdud bzhi pham par
13b7(rgyud): bya ba'i sgra dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'i sgra dang / len pa dang bcas pa dang / len pa med pa'i bar gyi sgrar byin gyis brlab so// rdul dang mun nag dang / rlung thams cad kyang rab tu zhil
13b8(rgyud): gling bzhi pa 'di na rtswa dang / shing gal ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang / sa dang / brag dang / ri ci yod pa de dag thams cad rin po che sna bdun du byin gyis brlabaso// bcom ldan 'das
14a1(rgyud): gtsug tor ltar mi mthong ba dang ldan pa ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du skud dbang mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan re re las kyang 'di 'dra ba'i 'od byung ste/ 'od des
14a2(rgyud): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// steng gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / 
14a3(rgyud): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding na/ mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud
14a4(rgyud): 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das mthong nas lha dang klud dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha
14a5(rgyud): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa sa dang na mkha' la 'khod pa brgya stong ma nga pos ni me tog gtor cing bstod nas bskor ba byas// 
14a6(rgyud): sems can dmyal ba pa dang / dus 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa mi 'khrugs pa phrag bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po ni dran pa rnyed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon bskyed pa
14a7(rgyud): dran nas/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes byos te/ ngan song de dag nas shi 'phos nas lhar skye so// bdud kyi snga de'i nang nas/ bdud kyi bu nyi khri'i tshegs kyi 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan
14a8(rgyud): 'das kyi cho 'phrul chen po 'di lta bu mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das la rab tu dga' bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der deng nas byon pa dang / bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya dang lhan gcig tu/ 
14b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mge bos phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rnam dag sku mnga' mchog tu gzugs bzang ba// ye shes rgya mtsho gser gyi lhun
14b2(rgyud): po 'dra// grags pa 'jig rten gsum no lam me ba// mgon po khyed nyid la ni skyabs su mchi// rab tu lam stor rnam par mi zums la// khyod ni 'jig rten sgron mo'i nyi ma 'dra// gzhan
14b3(rgyud): gyis mi thub srog chags rtsa lag gcig/ ded dpon khyed la skyabs su rab tu mchi// shin tu tshogs bsags ye shes 'byor pa'i mdzod// nam mkha'i rang bzhin bzod nas rnam grol thugs// thug
14b4(rgyud): / rje'i bsam pa yid 'ong 'jam pa'i gsung // don kun grub pa khyod la skyabs su mchi// 'khor ba dgon pa la sa kyang khyod thar mdzad// tshogs pa las kyang rgyu dang 'bras
14b5(rgyud): bu ston// byams la gnas shing mchog gi cho ga mkhyen// thu gos rje'i gnas pa'i skyabasu rab tu 'chi// sgyum smig rgyu chu zla 'dra ba yis// srid pa la ni yul gyi gnas kyi
14b6(rgyud): chags// mo shes nad sel 'jig rten rnam kyi mgon// sman pa'i rgyal po khyod la skyabasu mchi// chu bo bzhi dbu' par gyur pa khyod// nir bdun 'phags pa'i tshul gyis rab sgrol ba/ 
14b7(rgyud): yang dag lam ston 'jig rten rtsa lag po// thugs rje ldan pa khyod la 'dir mchod do// blo mchog khyod la bdag cag bzod par gsol// khyed la bdag cag yid kyi gnod bsams
14b8(rgyud): pa/ mgon pa dpa' bos nongs pa bzod par gsol// khyed ni 'gro ba'i rtsa lag gcig pu gtso// bdag cag bdud kyi phyogs rnams rab spangs te// byang chub mchog gi
15a1(rgyud): sems ni bskyed par bgyi// sems can ma lus thams cad 'gron du gnyer// bdag cag gis ni byang chub mchog thob bgyi// ci nas bdag cag pha rol phyin spyod
15a2(rgyud): par/ bdag cag rnams la spyod pa rgya cher ston// gzhan ma yin gsung chos ni du rnams dang // ldan na byang chub rab tu 'thob par 'gyur// me tog gang gis khyod la mngon gtor
15a3(rgyud): / phyogs kun tu yang de dag gdugs gyur te// dus kun bde ba'i 'byung gnas zhing du ni// rkang gnyis mchog gi spyi bor 'dug gyur cig/ de nas bdud kyi bu mo de dag dang // bdud kyi bu
15a4(rgyud): tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyis// babacom ldan 'das la me tog sil ma gtor ba dang // me tog sil ma de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi
15a5(rgyud): mthus gang ga'i klung bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bye ma las/ 'das pa'i me tog gi gdugs kun tu 'dug paragyur te/ me tog gi gdugs de dag kyang // phyogs
15a6(rgyud): bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tshal bzhis pa thams cad kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang zad kyi steng gi bar sdong la 'dug go// bdud kyi bu mo de dag dang / bdud kyi bu
15a7(rgyud): tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa 'di dag gis kyang se so nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gras med dpag tu med pa thams car seMngs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'chol bzhes te/ chos
15a8(rgyud): kyang 'chad pa 'khor gyis yongs su bkor te lham me ldan no// lhang der bzhugs pa'i dbu'i gtsug gi drang zad kyi steng gi bar snang le me tog gi gdugs de dag 'dug par gyur pa mthong zhing sangs rgyas
15b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang kha dog mtshungs pa/ rtag mtshungs pa/ gzugs 'dra ba mtshungs par snang ba sha stag la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag seng+ge'i khri tha dad cing / 'khor tha
15b2(rgyud): da la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa nyi tshe tha dad par mthong ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gsung brjod pa ni ma thos so// bdud kyi 'khor de dag
15b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus 'di lta bu'i cho 'phrul mthong nas/ mchog tu dga' ba dang / mos paskyes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir
15b4(rgyud): spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bces pa de dag las dkrigs phrag bcu phyir log na bdud kyi gnasu da lta bu'i ngo mtshar bdud sdig can la rgya cher
15b5(rgyud): bzlas te dge sbyong gau ta ma de'i spu'i khung bu gcig kyang bdag ga gis gzhig ma nus na/ bsad par lta ci smos// hUM steng du nyi khri de'i skyabasu dong ste/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun
15b6(rgyud): na 'khod do// de nas bdud sdig can rab tu khros te/ sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas yid la bcags te des 'di skad ces smras so// shAkya'i bu 'di ji srid brlag par ma byas pa// de
15b7(rgyud): srid par du nga yi dpal song slar mi 'ong // shAkya'i bu 'di ji ltar de ring bsad snyam ste// bdag cag gzhan la yid mi rtog cing mi smra 'dug/ de nas bdud sdig can yid mi bde zhing
15b8(rgyud): mya ngan gyi khang pa na 'dug go/ 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las// bdud dpa' stong pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// 
16a1(rgyud): de nas bdud kyi bu mo dang / bdud kyi bu po tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni 'di lta
16a2(rgyud): bu'i theg pa dang / ye shes dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / snying rje dang / thabs dang spobs pa 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thabs dang ye shes kyi bar du ldan pa ngo mtshar to// 
16a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das chos du dang ldan no// skyes bu gang zag sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi mchi zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'ching rgya/ bcom ldan
16a4(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag chos bzhi dang / da ldan na/ 'di la skyes bu gang zag la la sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro zhing myur du bla na med pa yang
16a5(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ bzhin bzung dag 'di la rigs kyi bu chos thams cad la mchog tu mi 'dzin
16a6(rgyud): cing/ chos gang yang mi 'dzin/ mi gtong / khas mi len/ mi gnas// nye bar mi len/ mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ sbyin pa'i 'bras
16a7(rgyud): bu yang mi gteng mi 'dzin/ khas mi len/ nye bar mi len/ mi gnas/ mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du spyod pa ni/ mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa'i bar du'o// 
16a8(rgyud): bzhin bzang dag gzhan yang rigs kyi bu de sems can du smra ba ma yin/ sreg tu smra ba ma yin/ gso bar smra ba ma yin// gang zag tu smra ba ma yin/ sems can gyi khams la yid
16b1(rgyud): kyis mchog tu mi 'dzin pa nas/ mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa'i bar du'o// bzhin bzang dag gzhan yang rigs kyi bu de gzugs dang / sgra dang dri dang ro dang / reg bya la mchog tu mi 'dzin pa/ 
16b2(rgyud): nas/ mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa'i bar du'o// bzhin bzang dag gzhan yang rigs kyi bu de khams gsum dang / dus gsum dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi
16b3(rgyud): rgyu dang rkyen dang / dmigs pa dang / 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'byung ba dang / gnas dang / skye ba thams cad la mchog tu mi 'dzin pa nas// mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa'i bar du'o// 
16b4(rgyud): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni spyod pa'i gnas kyi lus thams cad la rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba ste/ mi dmigs pa'i
16b5(rgyud): tshul gyis spyad par bya'o// bzhin bzang dag chos thams cad dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dngos po med pa yin te/ sgra medra pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ yi ge med pa/ 
16b6(rgyud): smon pa med pa/ skye bo med pa/ 'gag pa med pa/ mtshan nyid med pa/ chags pa med pa/ dmigs pa med pa/ bstan du med pa/ dben pa/ bdag med pa/ mtshan nyid dang bral ba/ skad
16b7(rgyud): cig pa/ nye bar zhi ba/ mun pa med pa/ snang ba med pa/ gnas med pa/ yul med pa/ dbang po med pa/ phyogs med pa// gnyen po med pa/ bsam du med pa/ mi 'phrogs pa/ sir sna med pa/ 
16b8(rgyud): spros pa med pa/ rdul med pa/ rdul dang bral ba/ cha shas med pa/ ci'ang med pa/ byed pa po med pa/ tshe ba po med pa/ rten med pa/ gzung ba med pa/ rnam par rig pa med pa/ so sor
17a1(rgyud): snang ba med pa/ skad cig pa ma yin pa'i bar du'o// bzhin bzang dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni na mkha' dang mtshungs te stong pa nyid pas dmigs su med pa'i tshul dang / 
17a2(rgyud): mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa'i tshul dang / mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa'i tshul gyis spyad par bya'o// bzhin bzang dag ches bzhi po de dang ldan na/ skyes bu gang zag sdig
17a3(rgyud): pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro zhing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// bzhin bzang dgra gang la la yul thams cad la chags
17a4(rgyud): pa'i lus kyi mtshan nyid kyi gnas la rnam par spyod pas tha dmas cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshol na/ de gnyis la cha/ dgas pa yin te/ de gnyis la chags pa'i yid kyi brnag pa
17a5(rgyud): ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid slu bar byed do// de la gnyis gang zhe na/ gang phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rna mas la mtshan nyid du rnam par spyod pas gnas pa dang / 
17a6(rgyud): mchog tu 'dzin pa de ni gnyis te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid slu ba'o// spyod pa'i gnas dang / 'bras bu la rtog pa 'di ni gnyis so// skye ba dang srid pa dang / len pa dang // sems can gyi gnas
17a7(rgyud): la rtog pa 'di ni gnyis// bshad pa dang / rab tu bstan pa dang gdams pa dang / tshig gi lam dang / sgra dang skad kyi gnas la rtog pa 'di ni gnyis// rtag pa dang / chad pa la rnam par lta ba'i shes
17a8(rgyud): pa dang / shes bya'i gnas la rtog pa 'di ni gnyiso// sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / byed pa po dang / byed du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes kyi gnas la rtog pa
17a9(rgyud): dang / sel ba la gnas shing rtog pa 'di ni gnyis so// 
17b1(rgyud): dron gnyis so// gang pa rol dang / tshu rol dang / rtog pa dang / sel ba la gnas shing rtog pa 'di ni gnyis so// bzhin bzang dag skyes du gang zag sul thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tsho
17b2(rgyud): bde dus gsum du ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog par rnam par dpyod pa la gnas shing kun tu rtog ste/ mchog tu 'dzin na 'don thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye/ 
17b3(rgyud): shes la 'di ni gnyiso// 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig me 'dod pa la sa'i ngos la nyug pa dang / skom 'dod pa la me dang / zas 'dod pa la rdo dang / me tog 'dod pa la gos dang / spos
17b4(rgyud): 'dod pa la mi ro bam pa dang / gos 'dod pa la dur khrod dang / byug pa 'dod pa lan mkha' la nyug pa de bzhin du/ bzhin bzang dag gang spyod pa'i gnas la chags shing rnam
17b5(rgyud): par spyod pa'i lus gnyis kyi gnas kyis thams cad mkhye na pa'i ye shes tshol na/ de'i 'bad pa 'bras bu med med pa yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
17b6(rgyud): chen po gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba 'khor der 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa des/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang
17b7(rgyud): brjod du ma mchis pa de mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar nus lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang brjod du med par shes pa de nyid mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// / 
17b8(rgyud): de'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod nyid la 'dris khyod kyis ji ltar bzed pa de bzhin du lan thob shig/ gang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ming thob par 'gyur ba'i rdzas kyi mtshan nyid kyi dngos po gang yang
18a1(rgyud): yod dam/ gsol pa/ gal te mchis shes bgyin ni rtag par 'gyur/ ci ste ma mchis shes bgyin ni chad par 'gyur ro// dbu ma'i lam ni dmigs su ma mchis te/ de ni
18a2(rgyud): mchis pa yang ma lags/ ma mchis pa yang ma lags so// gang ma chags mi skye mi 'gog/ tshad ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ dpe ma mchis/ snang ba ma mchis pa de la 'tshal ba 'di
18a3(rgyud): ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// byang chub sems dpa' glog gi blo gros kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang la'ang 'gro ba'ang ma mchis/ 'ong ba'ang ma mchis pa de lta bu shes pa la
18a4(rgyud): 'jug par mkhas pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par/ 'tshang rgya ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang byed kyis gso// la pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang na thob pa'i
18a5(rgyud): mtshan nyid kyang ma mchis// mthob ba'i mtshan nyid kyang ma mgos rko la 'ang ma ma/ mngon du bgyi ba yang ma mchis zhi ba yang ma mchi sa/ rab tu zhi ba yang ma mchis/ dus gsum
18a6(rgyud): yang ma mchis/ theg pa gsum yang ma mchis/ smon lam dang / mnyam pa'i rlom sems kyang ma mchis pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi blo
18a7(rgyud): gros kyi gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang khams gsum yang ma mchis/ kun tu sbyor ba gsum yang ma mchis/ rig pa gsum yang ma mchis/ theg pa gsum yang ma mchis/ phung po
18a8(rgyud): dang / khams dang skye med ga pa ma layin pa stog pa rang ma mchis/ bri ba yang ma mchis/ 'phel ba yang ma mchis la/ mnyam par yang mi bgyid pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o// 
18b1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' dre blo gros kyis gsol pa/ gang so so'i skye bo'i chos dang / 'phags pa'i chos dang / slob nga'i chos dang / mi slob pa'i chos dang / nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas/ 
18b2(rgyud): kyi chos rnams la mi rtog rna par mi rtog ste/ mnyam par mi bgyid pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' sra ba'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ gang bden pa'i tshul gyis
18b3(rgyud): de bzhin nyid la rnam par dpyod cing mngon par ma zhen pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po ches gsol pa/ gang chos thams cad kyi mi skye
18b4(rgyud): ba'i mtshan nyid thob par bgyi ba dang / mngon par/ rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshan nyid thob par bgyi ba dang / mngon/ par rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du mi rtog pa 'di
18b5(rgyud): ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bsam gyis mi khyab pas gsol pa/ gang khams gsum la rnam par dpyod cing sems
18b6(rgyud): nyid sems la 'jug par bgyid do// sems gnyi ga la sems kyis rnam par dpyad nas mi dmigs pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' dgra las rnam
18b7(rgyud): par rgyal gyis gsol pa/ gang chos thams cad la mi chags/ rjes su mi chags btang snyomasu mi bgyid/ khong khro bar mi bgyid/ 'dod par mi bgyid/ mi smod mi 'dzin/ mi gtong ba 'di ni
18b8(rgyud): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i snying pos gsol pa/ gang bsod nams dang sdig pa la mi chags shing / zab mo la bzod pa'i tshul la 'jug pas/ 
19a1(rgyud): ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la mi rtog pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o// zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa/ gang chos thams cad chu zla dang mtshungs
19a2(rgyud): par rab tu 'tshal cing / chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid sogs pa dang / dbri bar yang mi mthong ba 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i blo gros gzhon nur gyur
19a3(rgyud): pas gsol pa/ gang gi sems dang sems las byung ba la mun pa dang / snang ba dang / skye ba dang / 'jig pa dang / 'phel ba dang / 'bri ba thams cad mi 'byung ba 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par
19a4(rgyud): 'tshang rgya ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' byams pas gso// la pa/ gang gnas pa la gnas pa na/ khams gsu/ ma pa la gnas pa'i tshangs pa la mi dmigs/ mnyam
19a5(rgyud): par mi bgyid pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pas gsol pa// gang 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas pha rol tu phyin pa
19a6(rgyud): rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu goms par bgyid cing mi chags mi skyo ba 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan
19a7(rgyud): 'das gang chos thams cad la mi chags mi skyo zhing chos zab mo'i tshul yang rab tu 'tshal te/ gang rab tu 'tshal ba yang mi len mi mdor sdud par mi bgyid/ bral bar mi bgyid cing chos gang
19a8(rgyud): la yang sogs pa'am/ 'bri ba 'am/ rig pa dong rnam par grol ba 'am/ 'jig pa 'am/ 'bri ba 'am/ 'phel ba yang mi skyed la/ dngos po dag la rnam par mi rtog pas/ kun nas nyon mongs par
19b1(rgyud): mi 'gyur ba 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ste/ tshul gcig pa 'dis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can gyis
19b2(rgyud): smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa'i tshul 'di ltar zab mo stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshul 'di gcig gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya na/ kun tu
19b3(rgyud): sbyor ba dang / rab tu sbyor ba cir dgos/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lta ba mi zad pa dang bral zhing yang dag pa'i lta bar sgro 'dogs pa yang med pa dang / g.yo med pa dang / drang por sgro
19b4(rgyud): 'dogs pa yang med pa dang / sdig pa dang bral zhing bla ma la ri mo bya bar sgro 'dogs pa yang med pa dang / bka' blo ba de bar sgro 'dogs pa yang med pa dang / yang dag pa'i 'tshe/ 
19b5(rgyud): bar sgro 'dogs pa yang med pa dang / kun tu sbyor ba thams/ cad dang bral bar sgro 'dogs pa yang med pa dang / sems can thams cad la khro ba dang / snying rje bar sgro 'dog
19b6(rgyud): pa yang med pa dang / sdom pa gsum du sgro 'dogs pa yang med pa dang / mi slu ba dge ba'i chos su sgro 'dogs pa yang med pa dang / rnam par ma zhi bar sgro 'dogs pa yang med pa dang / dam pa'i
19b7(rgyud): chos srung bar sgro 'dogs pa yang med pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar sgro 'dogs pa yang med pa dang / dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba sgro 'dogs pa yang med pa
19b8(rgyud): dang / sems nyam chung ba stobs la rab tu dgod par sgro 'dogs pa yang med pa dang / 'jigs pa'i skyabs mi 'jigs par sgro 'dogs pa yang med pa dang / lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams nan
20a1(rgyud): tan la gzud par sgro 'dogs pa yang med pa dang / bzod pa dang nges par sgro 'dogs pa yang med pa dang / 'dzin pa thams cad la chags pa'i mtshan nyid du sgro 'dogs pa/ 
20a2(rgyud): yang med pa dang / rdul dang mun pa'i phung po thams cad spong bar sgro 'dogs pa yang med pa dang / bsngo ba'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa thams cad spong bar sgro 'dogs pa yang med pa 'di dag ni
20a3(rgyud): rigs kyi bu thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi spyob nyi shu ste/ yi ge dang / skad dang / sgra dang smra ba dang / brjod pa'i tshig rab tu dbye ba thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa la 'jug pas thams
20a4(rgyud): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sbyor ba'o// gzhan mu stegs ca na gyi tshig gi de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa dang / spyod pa tham sa cad kyi de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa dang / bsod nams
20a5(rgyud): thams cad dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba'i de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa dang / len pa dang / skye ba dang / 'jig pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa dang / 
20a6(rgyud): rnam par thar pa gsum dang / gnas dang / rgyu dang / las dang / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la 'jug pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' thams cad shes nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye
20a7(rgyud): shas kyi sbyor ba khong du chud par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' ldad mo can gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal de de bzhin te/ nam chos zab mo'i tshul 'di rtogs pa de'i tshe/ chos gang ston
20a8(rgyud): pa dang gang la ston pa dang / don dang tshig dang / yi ge gang dag gis ston pa dang / rab tu ston pa'i chos de gang yang mi mthong ste/ gang rab tu spong ba dang / gang sgom pa dang / gang kun shes
20b1(rgyud): par 'gyur ba'i chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i tshul gyi de bzhin nyid 'jug ste/ des thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khong du chud par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
20b2(rgyud): legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu tshul gcig gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa de khyod kyi legs par smras so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad la chags pa med pa'i dngos po
20b3(rgyud): yin pas chos thams cad ni sgro btags pa med pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / mi 'jigs pa'i mtha' can dang / ma rig pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i mi skye ba'i yang dag pa'i mtha' can dang / 
20b4(rgyud): nam mkha' dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i yang dag pa'i mtha' tsadan dang / chos thams cad ni brjod du med pa'i mtha' ca na dang / sems can thams cad kyang de lta bu yin pa dang / 
20b5(rgyud): chos thams cad ni rdzas med pa'i mtha' can dang / dus ga/ sum dang / khams gsum dang phung po thams cad ni/ ci yang med pa'i mtha' can dang / 'du byed gsum ni
20b6(rgyud): stong pa nyid kyi mtha' can dang / chos kyi phung po dang / rnam par smin pa'i phung po dang / sogs pa dang / bri ba'i phung po ni rdzas med pa'i mtha' can du yongasu brjod do// stong pa nyid dang / yang
20b7(rgyud): dag pa'i mtha' dang / brjod du med pa'i don dang / chos thams cad kyi don gyi chos thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye
20b8(rgyud): shes la 'jug go// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'thob pa lung bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ bdud kyi bu mo dang / bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor nyi khris mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob
21a1(rgyud): ste/ lus rags pa spangs nas/ yid kyi lus rnyed do// gzhan yang nyi khri brgyad stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// lha dang mi dkrigs phrag dgu bcu rtsa
21a2(rgyud): gnyis kyis ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs sna tshogs thob par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob
21a3(rgyud): pa nyi khri po de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog gis gtor/ rab tu gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
21a4(rgyud): 'das 'di ltar mi dge ba'i grogs po dang 'grogs pa'i dang rang gis/ sems can rnams bsod namatham cad sogs pa nga'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yid la mi bgyid pa la gzigs su gsol/ 
21a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni las kyi rkyen yin par blta'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ngo mtsha/ ra du gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyi the tsom bcad pa'i
21a6(rgyud): phyir sngon byung ba 'di gsungs so// rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa chen po dpag tu med pa 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du snang ba
21a7(rgyud): 'char ba zhes bya ba'i bskal pa chen po la/ skye dgu'i tshe lo drug khri brgyad stong thub ste/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ 
21a8(rgyud): bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen po/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha le sbyar ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byung ste/ nyon mongs pa can
21b1(rgyud): snyigs ma lnga'i dus su gyur pa na/ 'khor bzhi la theg pa gsum dang ldan pa'i chos ston to// yang de'i tshe gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po ut+pala'i gdong zhes bya ba zhig byung
21b2(rgyud): ste/ de nas dus gzhan zhig gi tshe/ rgyal po ut+pa la'i gdong btsun mo'i 'khor dang / g.yog dang / dpung gi tshogs dang bcas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal ga la ba der song / 
21b3(rgyud): nas byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'ad kyi zhabs la mgo bo phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor cing / sil snyan sna tshogs dang / bdug pa sna tshogs dang / spos sna
21b4(rgyud): tshigs kyis mchod pa byas nas lan gsum bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i zhabs/ la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
21b5(rgyud): gis mngon par stod do// lha dang klu la sogs pa'i yon tan gyis// mngon par rab bstod nyes pa mang sel ba// nor bdun gyis ni 'gro la phan mdzad pa// gang gi blo gros zhi ba dang
21b6(rgyud): ldan par gsungs// 'gro ba'i mun sel zhi ba'i sgron ma mdzad// shi 'pho na 'chi skye ba mya ngan 'joms// 'gro ba ngan 'gro lam las rab bzlog pa// gang gis bdud kyi lam las thar pa gsungs/ 
21b7(rgyud): rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal des/ rgyal po ut+pa l-i'i gdong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa/ chos gsum dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
21b8(rgyud): dpa' blo gros zhib pa yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lhag pa'i bsam pas sems can thams cad la snying rje ba dang / ma lta bur sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar
22a1(rgyud): bya ba la brtson pa dang / chos thams cad la srog med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / tha dad du dbyer med cing yongasu rtog pa ste/ skyes bu dam pa chos gsum po/ 
22a2(rgyud): de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros zhib pa yin no// rgyal po chen po gzhan yang chos gsum dang ldan na/ skyes bu dam pa bdud kyi zhags pas mi zin cing bdud kyi lam las thar pa yin
22a3(rgyud): no// gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la mi khro zhing glan ka mi tshol pa yin/ sems can tham cad la mtshungs par sbyin gnas su 'du shes pa yin/ chos thams cad la tshul
22a4(rgyud): gcig tu yongs su rtog ste/ 'di ltar chos thams cad nam/ kha' dang mtshungs shing bcos su med pa tha dad pa ma yi/ ngan pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma byung ba/ ma 'gags pa ste/ chos
22a5(rgyud): thams cad na mkha' lta bur rdzas kyi mtshan nyid dang bral bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog pa'o// rgyal po/ chen po chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na/ skyes bu dam pa
22a6(rgyud): bdud kyi zhags pas mi zin cing bdud kyi lam las thar pa yin no// de nas de'i tshe rgyal po chen po ut+pa la'i gdong gi btsun mo dam pa lha mdzes zhes bya ba bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong gis yod
22a7(rgyud): su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal de la me tog
22a8(rgyud): sna tshogs kyi gter te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// mi mnyi ma yon tan 'dzin par rab rib med mdzad pa// ji ltar bud med las ni ngan song spangs pa yin// skyes pa 'dir 'gyur
22b1(rgyud): 'chi 'bosel ba bka' stsol cig/ rab mchog pan pa mdzad pa rab tu yid kyang thul// dam pa'i 'gros bzhud bder gshegs rab zhi dga' mdzad pa// bcom ldan ji lta bur na bud med skyes par 'gyur/ 
22b2(rgyud): 'dul mchog gzhan la phan mdzad myur du bshad par gsol// bdag gi blo gros thibs po 'dir ni bsal du gsol// 'jig rten dag na mi mnyam mnyam pa dge sbyong mchog/ rab grags yon tan
22b3(rgyud): mang po dran dang 'dul ba 'dzin// ci nas de nyid du ni skyes par bdag 'gyur bar// rab rib mi mnga' bde 'gro 'chi med lam myu gsungs// rigs kyi bu de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
22b4(rgyud): 'od zhi spos snang dpal des/ btsun mo dam pa lha mdzes la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// che zho rnam grangs gang gis bu du med dag bud med kyi dngos po myur du rjes te/ sngon 'phangs
22b5(rgyud): pa'i bud med kyi dngos po myur du ma lus par zad par 'gyur/ zhing bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar du/ rang gi smon lam ma gtogs par bud med du skye ba 'dzin par
22b6(rgyud): mi 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod do// che zhe de la rnam grangs gang gis bud med myur du skyes par 'gyur zhing / sngon 'phangs pa'i bud med kyi dngos po myur du ma lus par zad par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs gang
22b7(rgyud): zhe na rnga che zhe de la rin po che tog ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzu 'phrul chen mo// phan yon chen mo// mthu chen mo 'di lta ste/ bud med kyi dngos po thams cad zad par byed cing / lus dang ngag dang / sems
22b8(rgyud): kyis gnas ngan len gyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin par ma lus par zad par byed do// rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu bud med rnams kyi bud med kyi dngos po ma lus par 'gyur te/ bud
23a1(rgyud): med kyi dbang po mi snang zhing skyes pa'i dbang po skye bar 'gyur/ skyes pa gzugs bzang po yan lag thams cad tshang bar 'gyur/ drang zhing zhib la mkhas par 'gyur/ lus/ 
23a2(rgyud): dang ngag dang / yid kyi legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' dang ldan zhing legs par spyad pa spyod pa dang / dgra thams cad thul bar 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe 'di dang tshe rabs phyi ma la/ 
23a3(rgyud): lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba'i nyes par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa de yongs su zad par 'gyur te/ mtshams med pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i
23a4(rgyud): chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dag ma gtogs par de dag gi bud med kyi dngos po'i lhag ma lus pa de nyid la yongasu zad par 'gyur ro// lus dang / 
23a5(rgyud): ngag dang / yid kyi gnas ngan len gyi rnam par smin pa tshe gzhan la bud med kyi dngos po grub par byed pa'i sa bon sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib
23a6(rgyud): pa'i sa bon gyi rgyu 'thun pa ri rab tsam yang ma lus par yongasasu zad par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rnam kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i las yongasu zad par bya ba dang // 
23a7(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spel ba'i phyir 'das pa'i de bzhin gsheg pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di bshad pa'i byin gyis
23a8(rgyud): brlabs so// gcig la gcig rjes su dgyes so// mngon par bstod do// bsngags so// rab tu bsngags so// da ltar phyogs bcu na/ da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
23b1(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na/ sems can rnams kyi nyes par byas
23b2(rgyud): pa'i las yongs su zad par bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spel ba'i phyir rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di 'chang de/ rab tu bsngags pa'i bar du mdzad do// gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ phyogs
23b3(rgyud): bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing so sor 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i las yong su
23b4(rgyud): zad par bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spel ba'i phyir rin dpo che tog gi gzungs 'di 'chad par 'gyur te/ rab tu ba sngags pa'i bar du mdzad par 'gyur ro// da ltar rin po che tog
23b5(rgyud): gi gzungs 'di 'chad de/ phyogs bcu na da ltar byung ba'i de ba zhin gshegs pa rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di 'chad/ pa rnams la yang rjesu yi rang ngo // bsngags so// rab tu
23b6(rgyud): bsngags so// cha zhe rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba skye bo'i nang na mthu dang dbang thob pa gang la las rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di glegs bam la bris te 'chang na/ rgyal po
23b7(rgyud): rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de'i snyan pa dang sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa phyogs bcur rgya cher grags par 'gyur te/ gzugs kyi khams thams cad kyi bar du sgra dang snyan pa chen pos
23b8(rgyud): gang bar 'gyur ro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de srung ba dang / 
24a1(rgyud): bskyab pa dang / snga ba'i phyi bzhin 'drang zhing gnas so// de'i yul thams cad du 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ge dang / nang dang / pha rol gyi dmags tshogs dang / dus ma yin pa'i/ 
24a2(rgyud): rlung dang / char dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba'i nyes pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / seng ge dang / ma he dang / glang po che dang / spyang ki ma rungs pa thams cad kyang gnod par
24a3(rgyud): mi 'gyur/ dug dang / kha ba dang / tsha ba dang / snum med pa dang / ro med pa dang / rtsub pa'i sdug bsngal ba reg na mi bde bar 'gyur ba'i nyes pa thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// nor
24a4(rgyud): dang 'bru dang / sman dang / 'bras bu dang / 'dab ma dang / me/ tog thams cad kyang rab tu skyes zhing rnam par 'pho/ la te/ snum pa dang / ro zhim par 'gyur ro// gal te rgyas go/ 
24a5(rgyud): rgyal ri/ spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba g.yul du nye bar gnas pa'i tsha/ rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di'i glegs bam rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la thogs nas/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo
24a6(rgyud): nas dbang bskur ba des pha rol gyi dmigs tshogs thub par 'gyur ro// de ste rgyal po rgya li/ spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba g.yul du zhugs pa gnyi ga rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di'i glags ngam rgyal
24a7(rgyud): mtshan gyi rtse mo la thogs na/ de gnyis gcig la gcig dga' zhing 'thun par byed par 'gyur ro// de ltar rin po che rtog gi gzungs 'di yon tan dang phan yon mang po// gong ngam/ grong khyer/ 
24a8(rgyud): ram/ grong rdal la lar mi'am/ rkang bzhi pa dag na 'am/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba 'am/ gnod pa zhig byung na/ rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di'i glegs pam mchod pa'i yo byad rgya cher sbyar
24b1(rgyud): te zhagal shin tu khrus ng+yas shAng yus rab tu byugs te/ gos sa rapa bgos nas tshangs par spyad de/ seng ge'i khri me tog sa tshogs kyi gtor ba/ dri sna tshogs kyi 'dugs pa/ ro bra bsna tshogs kyi
24b2(rgyud): bskor ba la 'dug pa/ der rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di'i glegs bam bklags na/ der nang dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// der 'jigs shing spu zing zhes byed
24b3(rgyud): bu dang / lhas ngan pa thams cad med par 'gyur ro// bud med gang la la bu 'dod pa des khrus byas te gos sar pa dgos la tshangs par spyad de/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pas
24b4(rgyud): glegs pam de la mchod la/ bdag nyid kyang stan me tog sna tsho gras kyi gtor ba/ dri sna tshogs kyis bdug pa/ ro bro ba sna tshe gros kyis bskor ba la 'dug nas/ rin po che tog gi gzungs
24b5(rgyud): 'di bklags na/ des bu rnyed par 'gyur ro// de bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du sems canayongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ rang gi smon lam ma gtogs
24b6(rgyud): par de'i bud med du gyur pa'i tha ma yin no// che zhe rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di las tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam gang la la'i rna lam du grags na/ tha na ri dgas dang bya yang rung ste/ 
24b7(rgyud): de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dag de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal gyi zhabs g.yas pa'i
24b8(rgyud): mthe bong sa la reg par mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pos kyang de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos par byin gyis brlabs nas/ phyogs bcu dag gi
25a1(rgyud): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / mi dang mi ma
25a2(rgyud): yin pa grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams shin tu skrag pa skyes par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di thams cad kyang snang bas rgya cher khyab par gyur te/ lag mthil lta bur mnyam
25a3(rgyud): par 'dug cing / de'i tshe na ri dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang 'i dpa 'o su dang khor yug chen po yang mi snang bar gyur to// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin de dag kyang sa g.yos pa dang / snang ba des skrag
25a4(rgyud): pa skyes par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus phyogs bzhir bltas pa dang / de dag thams cad kyis mnga' rgyang tsam na/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa mthong nas/ de
25a5(rgyud): dag ngo mcher du gyur te/ thal mo sbyar nas/ de bzhin ga/ shegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta'o// de nas btso/ ma ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa
25a6(rgyud): des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal gyi zhabs g.yas pa'i mthe bong sa la reg pa na'ang 'di bzhin du de'i tshes
25a7(rgyud): g.yos par gyur te/ de'i tshe 'di bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di yang lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par 'dug/ 'di bzhin du snang ba dang / sa g.yo bas skrag pa skyes te/ lnga
25a8(rgyud): dang mi dang / lha ma yin thams cad phyogs bzhir blta zhing mda' rgyang gang tsam na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhe spos snang dngal de mthong nas thal mo sbyar to// rigs kyi bu dag de
25b1(rgyud): tshe de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dang la des rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di gsungaso// oM 'di lta ste/ dza lo ke/ dza lo ka/ ma ke Sha li/ Sha.a/ dza li ni/ dza la pra de/ dza hi li/ bar pu ru Sha lak+Sha NA/ sa
25b2(rgyud): mA ru h+ya/ a ma me/ a ma me/ wa ma me/ wa ma me/ a ha me/ a ha me/ dza ha me/ dze ha me kha/  wa ra me/ wa ra maM/ ba bad+h+we/ ba ba d+he/ be ga d+he/ bag d+he/ bany+dza d+h+we/ ba ra ta waR+Sha/ dza la me kha/ wa ra khi/ a
25b3(rgyud): la dza hi li/ dzan+d+ha le/ dzan+tu mu khaM/ ba ha ra ba ha ra/ sid+d+ha pa b+he/ dan+ti lA/ dan+ti la/ sur+ya bi ha ga/ tsan+d+ra bi ha ga/ tsak+Shur dz+yo ti sha bi ha ga/ tsA bak+Sha ya/ s+t+ri tA su ra bi ha ga/ dza kha ga dza khe ga/ su ra kha ga/ bi ha ma/ a
25b4(rgyud): mri kha/ a mri khaM/ a mr-i kha/ a mri kha/ a mri kha/ a mI kha/ a mri kha/ am+bi kha/ mr-i kha/ mri kha/ mr-i la/ byA bats+tshed// r+Ya/ du ni du ne/ ud+bA da bya wa ts+tshed dz+nyA na kri ta/ a nut+ka pA da/ khag
25b5(rgyud): nin+na ka/ ang+gu le/ b+hang+gu le/ bi wa ku le/ ku la ha/ in+d+ra pa re/ bI ba ha/ bya bats+tshe da gar b+ha/ ba pra ti/ ba pra ti/ a mo/ ha/ daR+sha ne/ pa ri kIr+No b+ha Sh+ya/ khA sa ma kr-i ta dz+yo ti/ kha grar+N+Na hi/ 
25b6(rgyud): dzaha/ dz+ye ti/ niSh+Tha b+hi ra sa/ b+hI ra sa/ b+hA ra sa/ b+hI ra dza/ mA tri grA mo/ b+hU ba krig/ ma hA kri ba/ hi le/ hi hi laM/ A u na pra te/ sa ma ya na/ da ma dA na/ d+hA na/ e pa rA mr-i She/ pa la kuN+Da la tsa khe na ba
25b7(rgyud): iSh+Ta b+hA ba karma ShA yaM/ pra dur b+hA ba/ pu ru Sha tAM/ ma sa ma sa ma ya/ b+hi d+hi dz+nyA ta thA ga ta swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di ba shang thag tu yang sa chen po g.yos
25b8(rgyud): so// bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya tsam de dag kyang rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di thos mthag tu mo mtshan mi snang bar gyur te/ de po mtshan skyes so// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi
26a1(rgyud): bam Ti dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grul bum dag gi bu mo grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams kyang rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di thos thag tu mo
26a2(rgyud): mtshan mi snang bar gyur te/ po mtshan skyes nas de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/ thams cad kyang ma 'ongs pa na bud med
26a3(rgyud): kyi dngos po thob par 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa ma lus par byang nas/ bud med de dag thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la phyag 'tshal zhing skad chen por 'di
26a4(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa do/ mtshar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo phyag 'tshal lo// thugs
26a5(rgyud): rje chen po gang gis bdag cag da ltar bud med kyi dngos po ma gda' bar gyur cing / rnam pa thams cad rdzogs pa'i skyes bu'i dngos por gyur po'i sngon byung ba 'od rgya cher bshad du gsol/ 
26a6(rgyud): de lta bu'i ngo mtshar dang / cho 'phral dang / slob pas bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das sngon byung ba 'di lha dang mi dpag tu ma
26a7(rgyud): mchis pa rnams dbang du 'gyur bar bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas sngon byung ba 'di bshad na/ bzhin bzang dag gang gi tshe de bzhin
26a8(rgyud): gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal de'i tha na rgyalalo ut+pa la'i gdong gi btsun mo dam pa lha mdzes bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong dang bcas pas/ rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di thos te thos ma thag tu
26b1(rgyud): btsun mo dam pa lha mdzes dang bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag mo mtshan mi snang bar gyur te/ pho mtshan skyes pa de'i tshe/ de bzhin du lha'i bu mo nas mi'i bu mo'i bar du grangs med dpag tu med pa dag
26b2(rgyud): rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di tho ma thag tu bud med kyi dbang po mi snang bar gyur nas/ skyes pa'i dbang po skyes te/ bud med de dag thams cad ma 'ongs pa na bud med kyi dngos po thob par 'gyur ba'i
26b3(rgyud): las kyi sgrib pa ma lus par byung ngo // gang gi tshe rgyal po ut+pa li'i gdong gi btsun mo dam pa lnga mdzes btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa por gyur pa de'i tshe/ rgyal po ut+pa la'i gdong nges bu thu
26b4(rgyud): gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dang bsgyur bas dbang bsgyur te/ bu stong du gcig gis mtshang ba dang / skyes bu chen po lha mdzes dang bcas/ lha mdzes kyi
26b5(rgyud): skyes bu chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang bcas/ gzhan yang srog chags dgu khri nyis stong dang bcas te khyim nas byung nas/ de bzhin gsheg pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal de'i
26b6(rgyud): thod du skra dang kha spu bregs gos ngur smrig bgos te/ yang dag par dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo // rab tu byung nas kha ton la dga' zhing tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la brtson par
26b7(rgyud): gyur to// de nas de ni sreg chags bye ba mang po 'di snyam du sems te/ de ci'i phyir 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rab tu byung snyam nas// de dag phan tshun 'di skad smra'o// dge sbyong 'di ni bdud kyi las
26b8(rgyud): la brtson pa ste/ g.yon can sgyum bdud kyi las dang ldan pas chos 'di sten tsong la la ni ba mtshan med par byas/ la la ni mo mtshan med par byas/ la la ni swa dang kha spu bregs/ la la ni gos tsho/ 
27a1(rgyud): can bskon/ la la ni gos dkar po bskon/ la la ni lhar skye bar chos ston/ la la ni mir skye bar/ la la ni dung 'gre'i skyes gnas su skye bar/ la la ni yi dgas su skye bar/ la la ni
27a2(rgyud): sems can dmyal bar skye bar/ la la ni shi 'pho dang / skye ba med par bya bar chos ston te/ bdud kyi las kyi lam la brtson zhing bud med bsgyur ba'i sgra dang ldan pa/ dge sbyong 'od zhe spos snang dpal de
27a3(rgyud): dge sbyong gi gzugs kyis rab tu slu ba yin gyis bdag cog 'di nas dong ste/ de'i gzugs dang rtags 'dzin pa yang mi mthong ba dang / de'i tshig kyang cung zad kyang mi zos par 'dong ngo // de nas de nyid na
27a4(rgyud): shor ba gzhon nu'i tshul zhes bya ba zhes bya ba zhig yod pa des tshig 'di skad ces smras so// kho bo'i chung ma dang / g.yog mo drang / bu mo gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang / dge sbyong ma
27a5(rgyud): rungs pa 'dis mo mtshan med par byas te/ skyes pa'i dbang / por sprul nas/ thams cad kyi mgo bregs te/ gos tshe/ na can bskon nas/ kho bo gcig pu mya ngan gyis non te/ tha
27a6(rgyud): na bdag cag thams cad 'dus la gang du dge sbyong ma rungs pa/ dge sbyong sgyu ma bdud kyi zhags pa la brtson pa 'di'i sgra dang / skad kyang ma thos na mthong ba lta smos kyang ci dgos po'i ri khrod nyam nga bar
27a7(rgyud): 'dong gis/ tshur sheg ces byas pa dang / de dag thams cad dga' ste de bzhin no// zhes zer ro// de nas shor ba gzhon nu'i tshul dang the tshom du gyur pa'i srog chags bye ba khrag khrig du rgya stong ma
27a8(rgyud): po lhan cig tu de nas dong ste/ yul mtha' 'khob ri khrod nyam nga bar drang srong gi cha byad kyis spyad pa spyod cing / sems can de dag la 'di skad ces ches ston to// 'khor ba las thar pa yang med/ 
27b1(rgyud): legs par byas pa dang / nyes par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang med na/ der chad par smra da'i dge sbyong bdud kyi las la brtson pa zhig byung gis/ gang dag de la lta ba'i phyir 'gro
27b2(rgyud): ba dang / gang dag gus par smra ba dang / gang dag de'i chos nyan pa de dag sems g.yengs pa yin/ de dag mgo bregs khyim nas byung / gos tshen can bskon/ dur khrod du spyad pa spyod du btsug/ 
27b3(rgyud): slongs mo pa'i spyod pa la bcud/ zan za gcig par byed/ lta ba mi bzad pa'i yid dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu yid 'byung bar byed/ dben par gnas pa la dga' ba dang / gnas khang du gtsug/ 
27b4(rgyud): 'dod pa'i dag ro ba klu gur dang / phreng ba dang / dri dang / drug pa dang / rgyun dang / lcub lte ba dang / 'khrig pa'i chos dang / dang dang / ru ro bar 'gyur ba'i btung ba snyung shrIng sna bathung bar
27b5(rgyud): byed/ de lta bur dge sbyong gi gzugs kyi chad par smra ba bdu/ dkyi los la brtson pa/ de sems can rnams kyi dgar/ gyur pa zhig byung ste/ dge sbyong go'u tra me de'i byed pa ni sngon ma
27b6(rgyud): thos ma mthong ba yin pa kho bos rtog so zhes de srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po de lta bu'i sdig pa can gyi lta ba 'dzin du bcug go/ de nas dus gzhan zhig na dge sbyong chen po ut+pa la'i gdong
27b7(rgyud): gis thos pa/ gshed kyi ri khrod na/ kha gcig bdag nyid kyang lam ngan par zhugs shing gzhan yang lta ba mi bzad pa 'dzin du bcug ste/ dkon mchog gsum la mi snyan pa sgrogs so zhes thos nas/ 
27b8(rgyud): de 'di snyam du sems so// bdag gi sems can 'di dag sdig pa'i lta bar song ba las yongasu thar bar ma byas shing yang dag pa'i lta ba la ma bkod na/ bdag dge sbyong du gyur pa don med do// ma 'ongs pa'i
28a1(rgyud): dus na ldongs par gyur pa'i 'jig rten du bdag ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/ ji ltar rab tu nyam thag par gyur pa bdud
28a2(rgyud): bzhi'i zhags pa'i bcings pas bcings pa'i sems can rnams yongs su dgrol bar nus snyam ste/ de nas dge sbyong chen po ut+pa la'i gdong brtul pa che zhing bstan pa/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pas/ 
28a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal la zhus te/ srog chags brgya stong du mas bskor cing / mdun du bdar nas/ mtha' 'khob kyi grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ri dang / ri brag
28a4(rgyud): nyam nga ba'i gnas de dang de dag na spyad pa spyod cing / de dang de ga sems ca dag na de dag sdig pa'i lta bar song ba las pa bzlog ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba la btsud nas bla na med pa yang
28a5(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod/ gzhan la la ni rang / sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la smon/ la la ni nyan thos kyi theg pa la/ la la ni 'bras bu la bkod/ la la ni rab tu phyung / la
28a6(rgyud): la ni dge bsnyen gyi sngon pa la/ la la ni za gcig pa la/ la la ni skyabs gsum du 'gro ba la bkod pa de lta bur chos ston to// bud med dag ni rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di bshad de/ bud med kyi dngos
28a7(rgyud): bo las bsgyur nas/ skyes pa la bkod do// srog chags mang po gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la the tshom du gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang sdig pa'i lta bar seng ba de las bzlog ste/ nyes pa 'chags su/ 
28a8(rgyud): bcug nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod do// de bzhin gshegs pa 'ong 'i spos snang dpal de nyid la phul nas rab tu phyung ngo // shor ba gzhon nu'i tshul ni ma gtogs te/ 
28b1(rgyud): des 'di lta ut+pa la'i gdong 'dis bdag gis 'khor rnams smras te khrid kyis bdag gis kyang 'di blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas
28b2(rgyud): zhing der bdud byas te/ 'di ltar mngal na 'dug pa tshun chad 'di la rnam par gtse'o// de nas phyis bcas nas kyang gzhon nu rtsed mo byed pa dang // bze las kyi mtha' dang / klog cing 'dug pa dang / dga'
28b3(rgyud): ba'i rtsed mo'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du song ba nas/ byang chub kyi shing drung du byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du skrag par bya'o// bgegs bya'o// byang chub thob nas kyang bstan pa gzhig par
28b4(rgyud): bya'o zhes smon lam btab bo// de nas dge sbyong chen po uHla'i gdong gis/ shor ba gzhon nu'i tshul gyis smon la mdo ltar brtul te btob pa la/ mthu chen po dang 'bang pa grag pos
28b5(rgyud): dad par byas te/ sdig pa'i lta ba'i thibs po de las bzlogs nas nyes pa 'chagasu bcug ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcu'o// de nas shor
28b6(rgyud): ba gzhon nu'i tshul rab tu dul zhing dad pa skyes nas/ 'di skad du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod gang gi tshe/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/ 
28b7(rgyud): byang chub thob nas bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol zhes smon lam btab bo// bzhin bzang dag de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang
28b8(rgyud): dpal de 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro rnam pa du ma byas nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang bcas te mngon par byung nas rab tu byung zhing srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya snying
