29a1(rgyud): du ma ni sdig pa'i lta bar song ba las bzlog ste/ theg pa gsum la bkod/ sems can dpag tu med pa ni 'bras bu la bkod/ bud mye bye ba khrig khrig brgya stong tshad med pa ni skyes
29a2(rgyud): pa thob par byas pa'i rgyal po ut+pa la'i gdong zhes bya bar gyur pa de/ gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyed the tsom 'am/ yid gnyis sam/ som nyi za bar gyur na de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga/ 
29a3(rgyud): dede'i tshe rade'i dus na/ gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po ut+pa la'i gdong zhes bya bar gyur te/ ngas de lta bu'i skyes bu'i mthu bya'o// bzhin bzang dag de'i tshe de'i dus na/ btsun mo dam
29a4(rgyud): pa lha mdzes zhes bya ba gang gis dge sbyong thob par gyur pa/ de gzhan yin pa snyam du khyed the tshom 'am/ yid gnyis dasam/ som nyi za bar gyur na de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe
29a5(rgyud): nang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bya ma/ sa pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ btsun mo dam pa lha mdzes zhes bya bar gyur to// bzhin bzang dag de'i tshe de'i dus na/ the tshom du
29a6(rgyud): gyur pa'i srog chags bye ba mang po dang bcas/ sangs rgyas la mo snyan pa'i bar du zer ba shor ba gzhon nu'i tshul zhes bya ba de gzhan yin snyam du khyed the tshom 'am/ yid gnyis sam/ som nyi za bar
29a7(rgyud): gyur na de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdud sdig can 'di nyid de'i dus na/ shor ba gzhon nu'i tshul zhes bya bar gyur te/ gang de'i tshangs de'i 'khor rab tu byung bas de'i phyir nga la sems can
29a8(rgyud): rab tu khro ba bskyed nas/ phyis smon lam btab ste/ khyed nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe khyod kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
29b1(rgyud): pa'i byang chub tu lung ston cig ces byas so// rigs kyi bu dag khyod kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od ni spos snang dpal de la ma dadang cing ma bsdams pa'i tshig smras te/ sdig pa'i lta bar
29b2(rgyud): song ba bzung nas/ ngas khyed sdig pa'i lta bar song ba de las kun thar bar byas ste rab tu byung bas de tshun chad khyed kyis sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas te/ de dag la mchod pa dang / rim
29b3(rgyud): gro byas/ de dag las chos mnyan te/ smon lam btab nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod do// khyed lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi nyes par spyad pa'i las de sngon bskal pa du mar ngan song gsum du
29b4(rgyud): sdug bsngal myong ngo // las kyi sgrib pa de nyid kyis nga lta dar bdud sdig can gyi gnas skyes so// rin po che tog gi gzung sa sngon byung ba'i le'u 'di bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
29b5(rgyud): pa shAkya thub pas bshad pa na/ bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya ma de dag bud med kyi dngos po ma snang bar gyur nas/ skyesapa'i dngos por gyur te/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// 
29b6(rgyud): lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i skye dgu'i sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag gis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ 
29b7(rgyud): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// de bzhin du sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs
29b8(rgyud): rgyas kyi theg pa las phyir mi ldog par gyur te// lha dang mi'i bu mo grangs med dpag tu med pa dag ni/ bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dbang po rnyed do// 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi
30a1(rgyud): gzungs las sngon byung ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bshad pa de'i tshe/ thams
30a2(rgyud): cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di rgya cher snang bas khyab par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya gang yod pa de dag na 'dod pa'i dbang phyug bdud bye ba phrag
30a3(rgyud): brgya gang dag bdud byed pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi mthus ngogs pa skyes te/ snang ba chen po 'di gang nas byung zhes gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di la lta zhing bdud sdig can zhes bya ba gang gling
30a4(rgyud): bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na gnas pa de dag cag pas stob sa che zhing dbang che la mthu chen po 'di de'i mthu 'am snyam nas/ de nas bdud de dag gis bltas na/ bdud sdig can de mya ngan
30a5(rgyud): gyi khang pa na 'dug cing yi rab tu mi dag bde mthong ngo // de nas/ bdud bye ba phrag brgya po de dag gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi kha mas 'di dag ga la ba dang / bdud sdig can gyi khang pa ga la
30a6(rgyud): ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// kyo 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ci'i phyir thams cad dang ldan pa'i gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bar byas nas/ khyod mya ngan gyi khang
30a7(rgyud): par zhugs te 'dug/ de nas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gi bdud bye ba phrag brgya po de dag la rgyas par smras pa/ kye grogs po dag shes par gyis shig/ shAkya rigs las shin tu g.yo dang sbyar ldan pa'i dge sbyong
30a8(rgyud): di skyes te/ dbye pa ga mams cid dang ldan pa'i mig rten gyi lams spang bar byes/ ra tu g.yos par byas/ 'jug pa byas te/ spangs par byas so//  ga ga
30b1(rgyud): lus pa 'di na/ mkhas pa gang su tshangs pa'i dbang po 'am/ klu'i dbang po 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po 'am/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'am/ lto 'phye chen po da sa na mkha' lding gi dbang po 'am/ mi 'am/ 
30b2(rgyud): ci'i dbang po nas gzhan yang mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar du mkhas pa su yang rung / de dag thams cad de la mchod pa'i phyir dong ngo // lo drug gi bar du gcig pu gnyis su med par 'dug ste/ mtshan nyid
30b3(rgyud): med pa'i sgyu ma bsgrubs pas kho bos kyang rang gi stobs kun bstan par 'dod na/ sde dang g.yog bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug dang / de'i drung du dong ste/ kun tu bskor nas bdud kyi stobs dang / rnam par 'phrul pa
30b4(rgyud): dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon dpa thams cad bstan kyang de'i spu'i khung bu gcig kyang sngangs shing 'jig par bya ma nus na/ stan de las bskyod pa lta ci smos/ dgegs
30b5(rgyud): gzhan bya bar ga la nus te/ mdangs gsum des de lta bu'i sgyu shin tu bstan cing / sa g.yo bar byas pas/ kho bos/ dang bcas te/ pham nas shing bcad pa bzhin du sa'i steng
30b6(rgyud): du lhung ngo // de der 'dug ste de 'dra ba'i mtshan nyid med pa'i sgyu ma bsgrubs nas/ 'di ltar bdud kyi yul thams cad zil gyis mnan te rig pa bsgrubs nas stan de las langs te/ sems can
30b7(rgyud): rnams la rab tu bstan nas gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can su mkhas shing shes pa de dag kyang de lta bu'i sgyu mas 'dun par byas te/ de dag gis sems dang 'gro ba drug tu skye ba
30b8(rgyud): dang / 'gro ba yang kho bos ma shes so// gang dag de la skyabasu dong ba de dag gis spu'i khung bu gcig tsam yang spangs pa dang 'khrug par kho bos byed mi nus na/ de las slu ba 'am/ bskyod par lta ga
31a1(rgyud): la nus/ deng kho bo'i g.yogs mo lnga brgya dang / bu nyi khri'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas te dge sbyong go'u ta ma dang de la skyabasu dong nas/ chos nyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun na 'khod do// kho
31a2(rgyud): bos de dag dang dpral ma nus so// de'i phyir stobs dang ldan pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa/ dbang phyug dang ldan pa khyed kho bo'i grogs gyis shig shAkya'i bu mdangs de srog dang bral lo// de la sems
31a3(rgyud): can gang dag skyabs su dong ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam par gzhig par bya'o// dge sbyong g.yo sgyu can nag po'i phyogs pham par byas te/ bdud kyi phyogs dkar po snang bar byas la/ de phyin
31a4(rgyud): chad bde ba la gnas par bya'o// de nas bdud me 'od ces bya dpas 'dzam bu'i gling 'di gang na de bzhin gshegs pa ba zhugs shing chos 'chad pa la bltas pa dang / de nas bdud
31a5(rgyud): me 'od kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku mthong / sgra dbyangs pa ldan pa'i chos bstan pa thos so// thos nas de spu zing zhes byed cing sngangs par gyur te/ de nas nges bdud sdig can
31a6(rgyud): de la 'di skad ces smras so// ma lus zhing na 'od ni gzugs bzang mchog/ bsod nams shes pas ring nas gnas gtsang ste// nyon mongs rnam grol lam ldan yun ring lon// srid pa kun zad
31a7(rgyud): mya ngan rnams las thar// khyod yang mi rigs khro ba'i dbang ma 'gro// gtso mchog 'di ni srid pa gsum na skyabs// 'di la zhe sdang cung zad su bskyed pa// de ni rmongs shing bde ba nyams par
31a8(rgyud): 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang bdud mu khyud bzang po zhes bya bas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// de ni 'phrul chan bsod nams rab kyi mtshan// mi gnas 'gro ba kun las rab tu thar// 
31b1(rgyud): sdug bsngal ma lu 'a pa'i lam ston pa// bdud brgya kun gyis gtse bar bya mi nus// sdig can gyis smras pa/ nga yi skye bo dag la dbang byas te// khyod kyi skye bo 'di yang de dbang 'gro// de yis ring por ma thogs/ 
31b2(rgyud): yul stongs byed// yu bu cag kyang gang du 'gro bar 'gyur// de nas bdud nags kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// khyod ni rab tu 'byor par gyur pa'i tshe// de nas khyod kyis rang gi dpa' ba
31b3(rgyud): bstan 'din rab tu dpung nyams re chad na// de ring ci'i phyir thams cad mkhyen la sngo// bdud ral gri zla ba zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// de ni su la'ang yid kyis khro ba med// mi gnas de ni
31b4(rgyud): bsam pa nyid kyis gtsang // khams gsum dag las thar cing 'gro bar rgyu// de la gzhan gyis bsad par mi nus so//  sdig can gyis smras pa/ 'dod khams 'di na sems can gang
31b5(rgyud): 'khod pa// 'dod la chags shing nga rgyal dregs pas myos// de dag gang phyir rtag 'brang phyag bstan te// de dag tsheg sa pas ci phyir de ma song // de nas bdud sa chu zhes bya ba des 'di
31b6(rgyud): skad ces smras so// snying po med cing sgyu ma smig rgyu 'drar// dngos po kun shes sred pa rnam par brtul// srid par ma chags na mkha'i ngo bo nyid// de la bgegs byed nus par ga la 'gyur// sdig can
31b7(rgyud): gyis smras pa/ mi yi 'jig rten 'di na de yang yod// bza' btu bzhim po sman dang gos bsnyen cing // tshor ba gsum yang de yi sems la yod// ci'i phyir de la brlag par bya mi nus// bdud sred
31b8(rgyud): slong zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// sdig can lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis ni// rdzu 'phrul bdag cag yul ni ci yod pa// don 'grub 'phrul la cho shas mi reg na// ngo la ji ltar brlag par
32a1(rgyud): bya bar nus// sdig can gyis smras pa/ ngas ni de la zan bcang byas// de la rdo ba dag kyang 'phangs// de bzhin mi snyan tshig smras nas// gnas dag nas kyang rab tu bskyod// bdud shes
32a2(rgyud): mig bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// khyod kyi gang tshe de la bgegs byas te// de ni khros pas cung zad 'tshig pa'am// khyod la khro gnyer bzhin yang bstan byas sam// de las khyod kyi tshig ngan mngon
32a3(rgyud): thogs sam// sdig can gyis smras pa/ de ni so sor brtags pas rtag tu bzod// 'dod chags spangs shing zhe sdang gti mug bral// de ni sems can kun la byams sems ldan 'dre bar
32a4(rgyud): spyod pa la yang de rtog go// bdud thub bka' zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// kun sbyor gsum gyi zhags dpas gang bcings pa// de la bdag cag nan tan shegs
32a5(rgyud): mod// des ni skyon dang gti mug zhags pa spangs// de la ji ltar brlag par byas nus// sdig can gyis smras pa/ stobs thob khyed cag nga yi grogs yin te// khyed rnams
32a6(rgyud): bag yod byos lo be'u re chos// thams cad phyogs su ri yi 'phreng ba dang // sa 'di ma lus byin gyis chur brlab po// mkha' los mi bzang rtug pa'i brag char dang // lcags kyi phyi ma'i phung po
32a7(rgyud): rab tu dbab// lcags mda' mdung thung spu gri mda' bo che// de lus phye mar brlag cing dbab par bya// kun nas rab tu rno ba'i rdo rje dang // mdung thung ral gri tho ba rnams phab la// 'bar ba mngon 'badra
32a8(rgyud): sbyor ba de dag gis// shAkya'i bu de thal bar brlag par bya// de bzhin du bdud bye ba'i bar du thams cad kyis tshig su bcad pa smras so// de nas bdud de dag thams cad kyis// mgrin gcig tu 'di
32b1(rgyud): skad ces smras so// de bzhin 'dong bar bgyi'o// rang rang gi gnas nas go dgos la// ste dang g.yog tu bcas te 'dong ngo // bdag cag gi rdzu 'drul dang // stobs kyi yul de dag thams cad bstan par/ 
32b2(rgyud): ni bya na// dge sbyong go'u ta ma de rtsal ci 'dra ba de'i mod la rab tu ston te/ khyod rang gis rig par 'gyur ro// de nas bdud bye ba rang gi gnas su dong nas/ go bgos te bdud bye ba re re zhing yang g.yog
32b3(rgyud): stong stong ya lang rnam pa mang po gyon pa lag cha sna tshogs pa/ go rnam pa sna tshogs bgos pa dag dang chas te/ ngo'i nub mo 'das nas/ 'dzam bu gling 'dir phyin te/ yul e b+ha dzaHng+ga'i drang zad kyi rnam
32b4(rgyud): mkha' la 'khod nas/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams di na/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / dam yin dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / yi dgas
32b5(rgyud): dang sha za dang / grul bum gang dag bcom ldan 'das la/ sems ma dad cing gus par bya bar yid la byed pa med/ par 'gyur la/ chos dang dge 'dun la'ang sems ma dad pa yod
32b6(rgyud): pa de dag thams cad bdud sdig can gyis bcom ldan 'das dgrongs su bcug nas de dag kyang lag cha dang / go cha sna tshogs dang chas te/ de nyid na 'khod do// bdud sdig can ni dbang phyug chen po'i gzugasu
32b7(rgyud): bsgyur nas/ drang srong skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba dbang phyug chen po la dad pa/ rig pa'i gnas bco brgyad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu son pa g.yog lnga brgya yod pa/ gangs kyi ri'i
32b8(rgyud): ngos la gnas pa de'i mdun du 'dug ste/ 'di skad ces smras so// go'u ta ma'i rigs las skyes pa'i drang srong mchog/ mkhas shing mngon par shes pa dag la gnas// oM g+ha maM g+ha dA na de 'dug de
33a1(rgyud): / ring ni rgyal po'i gtu nges par bsod snyoms spyod// brtan por sna tshogs gsal ba'i gtam rnams kyis// de nyid khong du lhan cig smra bar byos// der khyod mngon shes dbang po lnga po/ 
33a2(rgyud): yang 'gadon mi za bar rab tu thob par 'gyur// de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras te/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur nas/ rang gi gnas su dong ste/ rang gi 'kho bong bdud rnams la
33a3(rgyud): bsgo ba/ ngas deng mi mtshungs blo bsams ci 'dra nga las khyod nyin gcig/ bdud yul bdud kyi dregs tshon 'joms pa'i rgyu de mi ston par// rdzu 'dul mthu dang ldan de sh+tsakya'i rdul rang dgar smra// de
33a4(rgyud): rtag tshig 'jam slob ma dag la bu la ma byams bzhin// de yi/ slob ma rgyags spangs gdon mi za bar snga dro ni// grong khyer dag tu g.yeng ba med par mthar gyis rgyu ba na// de dag glu ger snyan
33a5(rgyud): mchog tshul gyis rang dgar myur du bzung // des thos shAkya/ 'i khyu mchog ci nas yid spro med par bya// bdud gzhan zhi gis smras pa/ glang chen rnga mo seng ge ma he stag gtum sgra drag
33a6(rgyud): dbyar dus kyi// 'brug sgra 'byin pa lta bu du ma grong de'i phyi rol myur sprul te// bdag cag lag cha mtshan thog sa gdug pa ngo mtshar mngon sum des mthong na// bslad cing mi dran rdzu 'phrul stor te de nas tha
33a7(rgyud): dang phyogs su 'gro// bdud gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ lam srang bzhi mdo rta babs dag na mi sdug gdong mangs 'khod// sna tshogs mtshon rnon mda' chen mda' zhags brla dgas ral gri thogs// na mkha'
33a8(rgyud): las kyang mtshon cha'i sgra ga sprin las lce yang 'bebs// de nasas g.yos 'jigs pas dbang mid myur du ma rungs 'gyur// bdud de dag gis bdud kyi yul gyi stobs dang / rnam par sprul pa ji lta ba bzhi/ 
33b1(rgyud): du thams cad rgya cher byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas/ bdud kyi sgra yang mi 'byin phyogs
33b2(rgyud): bzhin me dang ri'ang med/ sprin nag po yang med/ dus ma yin pa'i rlung yang med de/ sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang byin gyis klu gang yang tha na char theg pa gcig tsam yang mi 'beb so// yang de'i tshe nyan
33b3(rgyud): thos chen po bzhi snga dro chos gos dang sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed thegs nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs te/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu grong khyer gyi lho phyogs
33b4(rgyud): kyi sgo nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi daphyir zhugs pa dang / grong khyer gyi sgo de na bdud gzhon nu shi dan tu ngar la dab pa/ byang bzhin bzang ba/ btsun pa'i cha byad 'dra
33b5(rgyud): ba lnga bcu glu len gar byed cing shin tu rgyug ste/ de dag gi lag ba gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bzung nas/ srang du rgyug cing glu len gar byed de/ shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras
33b6(rgyud): so// dge sbyong glu long shig/ dge sbyong gar byos shig/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ grogs po dag khyed kyi sngon mthos pa'i glu thos par byas nyon cig/ bdud gzhon nu de dag thams cad kyis bcom
33b7(rgyud): bskyungs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rgyug cing glu'i dbyangs kyis 'di skad ces smras so// skye mched dag gis shin tu chog/ skye mched dag gis bdag cag bslus// skye mched dag ni
33b8(rgyud): gsod pa ste// skye mched bdag gis mthar dbyung ngo // phung po byas pas shin tu cho ga/ phung po byas pa bdag cag bslus// phung po byas pas gsod pa ste// phung po byas pas ngas mthar dbyung / 
34a1(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ ba ha ra/ ba ha ra/ b+ha ra bA ha/ ma ri tsA ba ha/ sa d+ya ba ha/ A ma ba ha swA hA// gnas brtan shA ri'i bu rgyug cing glu dbyangs kyi tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag dang / 
34a2(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras pa dang / de nas bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag shin tu dga' ste/ yid rab tu dang nas 'di skad ces smras so// mgon po bdag cag de ring bzod par gsol// 'gro ba
34a3(rgyud): gnyen gcig ston pa'i mchog khyod de// phung po khyod kyi ji ltar 'jigs bcas bshad// bdag cag de ltar rtag tu de mngon sum// bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag thams cad kyis// srang gi dbus de
34a4(rgyud): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ su mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug go// de nas mo'u dgadagyi bu grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgo nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi
34a5(rgyud): grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang / de nas yang bdud gzhin nu lnga bcu nas glu dbyangs kyi bar du ste/ 'di skad ces smras so// khams nyid dag gis shin tu chog/ 
34a6(rgyud): khams nyid dgu gis bdag cag bsdus// khams nyid dag ni gsod pa ste// khams nyid bdag gis mthor dbyung ngo // tshor bdag gis shin tu chog/ tshor bdag gis bdag cag bsdus// tsher bdag ni
34a7(rgyud): gsod pa ste// tshes bdag gis mthar byung ngo // sems pa dag gis shin tu chog/ sems pa dag gis bdag cag bsdus// sems bdag ni gsod pa ste// sems pa bdag gis mthar byung ngo // 'du
34a8(rgyud): byas pas shin tu cho ga/ 'du shes byas pas shin tu chag/ 'du shes byas pas bdag cag bslus// 'du shes byas pas gsod pa ste// 'du shes byas pas mthar dbyung ngo // 'khor ba dag gis shin tu
34b1(rgyud): 'khor bdag gis bdag cag bcus// 'a dag gis gsod pa ste// 'khor ba bdag gis mapar dbyung ngo //  la skye/ snyam bsnyam pa/ A rad+ha/ rAn dzaH/ shan+ta nA/ shAm+b+ha thA/ ga gun pa swA hA/ 
34b2(rgyud): tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po rgyug cing glu dbyangs kyi tshig su bcad pa 'di dag dang / gsang sdigs kyi tshig 'di dag smras pa dang / de nas bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu pa de dag shin tu dga' ste/ yid ra
34b3(rgyud): tu dad nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phrul ldan sbas pa 'angags lam thub dbang sras// 'khor ba'i nyes la mnyam lta chos kyi sgron// sdig spangs bdag cag ri me gus pa skyes// sangs rgyas chos mchog dge
34b4(rgyud): 'dun deng skyabs song // bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag thams cad kyis srang gi dbus der// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu/ chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// chos mnyan
34b5(rgyud): pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po grong khyer gyi byang phyogs kyi sgo nas// rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang / de
34b6(rgyud): de nas bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu nas glu dbyangs kyi bar du ste/ 'di skad ces smras so// reg pa byas pas shin tu chog/ reg pa byas pas bdag cag bslus// reg pa byas pas gsod pa ste/ reg bya bdag gi mthar
34b7(rgyud): dbyung ngo // bdag po dag gis shin tu cho ga/ bdag po dag gis bdag cag bslus// bdag po dag ni gsod pa ste// bdag po bdag gis mthar dbyung ngo // 'khor ba dag gis shin tu cho ga/ 'khor ba dag
34b8(rgyud): gis bdag cag bslus// 'khor ba bdag ni gsod pa ste// 'khor ba bdag gis mthar dbyung ngo // srid pa kun gyis shin tu cho ga/ srid pa kun gyis bdag cag bslus// srid pa kun ni gsod pa ste/ 
35a1(rgyud): srid pa kun ni ngas mthar dbyung // 'dod pa'i dga' bas shin tu chog/ 'dod pa'i dga' bas bdag cag bslus// 'dod pa'i dga' ba'i gsod pa ste// 'dod pa'i dga' ba ngas mthar dbyung / 
35a2(rgyud): grogs ngag tshe 'di myur 'gro ste// ri gzar chu drag 'gyogs 'dra na// byis pa'i skye bos mi shes te// mi mkhas gzugs kyi dregs pas myos// de bzhin du sbyar te/ mi mkhas sgra li dregs pas myos// mi mkhas dri yi lA rgyas
35a3(rgyud): mi mkhas ro yi dregs pas myos// mi mkhas reg gi dregs pas myos// grogs dag tshe 'di myur 'gro ste// ri gzar chu drag mgyogs 'dra na// byis pa'i skye bos mi shes te// mi mkhas chos kyi dregs
35a4(rgyud): pas myos// mi mkhas phung po'i dregs pas myos// mi mkha sa khams kyi dregs pas myos// mi mkhas longs spyod dregs pa su myos// mi mkhas bde ba'i dregs pas myos// mi mkhas
35a5(rgyud): rigs kyis dregs pas myos// mi mkhas 'dod pa'i dregs pas myos// grogs dag tshe 'di myur du 'gro ste// rig za/ ro chu drag mgyogs 'dra na// byis pa'i skye bos mi shes
35a6(rgyud): te// mi mkhas kun gyi dregs pas myos// 'di lta ste/ kharga ba/ kharga ba/ kharga ba/ mud dzI na/ a brta/ bi brta/ kha brte/ pra mAr+ha/ dz+ya ti ra brta swA hA// de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po/ 
35a7(rgyud): rgyug cing glu dbyangs kyis bdud kyi bu rnams la tshig su bcad pa 'di dag dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras pa dang / de nas bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag shin tu dga' ste/ yid rab tu dad nas 'di
35a8(rgyud): skad ces smras so// khams rnams sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra ba dang // tsher ba'i 'jig rten rtog pas bskyed pa dang // zhi ba'i lam yang khyod kyis legs par bstan// mchog sbyin dkon mchog gsum
35b1(rgyud): la spa su mchi// bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag thams cad kyis srung gi dbus der/ tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug go// 
35b2(rgyud): yang de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nub phyogs kyi sgo nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang / grong khyer gyi sgo de na bdud gzhon nu shin tu drar la bab pa/ byang bzhin
35b3(rgyud): bzang ba/ btsun pa'i bu'i cha byad 'chang ba lnga bcu glu len gar byed cing kun tu rgyu ba de dag gis lag pa gnyis kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bzung nas srang du rgyug cing glu len gar byed de/ rab
35b4(rgyud): 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// dge sbyong glu long shig dge sbyong gar byos shig/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ grogs po 'dug khyod kyis sngon ma thos pa'i glu thos par byas nyon cig de
35b5(rgyud): ngag gis bcom bskyungs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byorargyug cing glu'i dbyangs kyis 'di skad ces smras so// dngos po thams cad mi rtag sgyu ma chu bur bzhin 'dus byas g.yo
35b6(rgyud): ba'i rang bzhin gang la'ang rtag pa med// sdig rgyu mthong nas zhog bzhini de la ther zug med// chos kun myur du 'jig par blo dang ldan pas shes// sdug bsngal chos gzir byams pa thams cad gar chags
35b7(rgyud): pa// reg kun sdug bsngal khur yin tsher ba dag kyang med// ji ltar dad pa byang chub lam sgom bsten byed pa// de ltar sdug bsngal kun thar byed grogs gang yang med// chos kun mtshan nyid gcog ste 'du
35b8(rgyud): shes spangs pa dge// bdag med ldan pas spyod kun rdzas kyi mtshan nyid bdag/ sreg dang gso ba gang zag dang ni byed pa med// bdud kyi g.yo dag thong la sems ni byang chub bsngos// na mkha' glog bzhin dbang
36a1(rgyud): bo dag la rnam shes byung // reg dang tsher dang sems pa thams cad bdag med de// tshul bzhin brtags na rdzas ni ci yang yod ma yin// byis pa'i sde rnams bslus pas 'khrul 'khor/ 
36a2(rgyud): bzhin du 'jug/ phung po thams cad tshul bzhin brtags na byed pa med// yang dag mtha' ni stong zhing mtha' rnams kun dang bral// byang chub lam spyod des ni 'dren pas byang chub brnyas// rmongs byed chos
36a3(rgyud): 'di nyid ni chos su skyob pas gsungs// 'di lta ste/ su mun+de/ bi mun+de/ suny+dzin/ si li mi yol li/ a ba ha si li/ ta tha tA si li/ b+hU ta ke Ti/ sa~M li swA hA// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rgyug cing / glu'i dbyangs
36a4(rgyud): kyis tshig su bcad pa 'di dag dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig 'a 'di dag smras pa dang / de nas bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag da shin tu dga' ste/ yid rab tu dad nas 'di skad ces smras so// 
36a5(rgyud): sdig pa'i grog kyi dbang song 'di 'dri'i chos ma thos// gti mu ga mi shes rmongs pas sdig las ci bgyis pa// rgyal ba'i sras la bdag cag mngon sum deng bshags nas// 'gro
36a6(rgyud): la phan phyir sangs rgyas nyid du smon dge 'debs// bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag thams cad kyis srang gi dbus der// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan
36a7(rgyud): pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug go// yang de'i tshe na sangs rgyas kyi mthus srang de dpag tshad brgya tsam du go skabs yangs par snang ste/ srang de'i dbus na gnas brtan shA ri'i bu ni byang phyogasu bltas te
36a8(rgyud): 'dug/ mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po ni nub phyogs su bltas te 'dug/ gang po ni lho phyogasu bltas te 'dug/ rab 'byor ni shar phyog su bltas te 'dug nas gcig nas gcig tu dpag tshad phyed phyed tsam
36b1(rgyud): na 'khod do// nyan thos chen po bzhi po de dag gi dbus kyis phyogs na/ khru lnga bcus 'khor ba'i pad+ma chub ni 'dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser// mdab ma ni bai DUR+Ya sngon po za ba ni dpal gyi snying po// snying po ni mu trig/ dI/ 
36b2(rgyud): ni lha'i spo bas lhag pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las skye ba zhig byung ste/ pad+ma de las snang ba byung ngo // snang ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar gyur te/ srang / 
36b3(rgyud): de na pad+ma de 'phang du mi gsum gyi khrun tsam du snang ngo // rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bar du ni pad+ma de 'phangs du lha'i dpag tshad lnga par snang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang du ning dA de'i 'phang dpag tshad
36b4(rgyud): brgya bar snang // 'og min gyi lha'i bar du ni pad+ma de'i 'phang dab dag tshad byed par snang ngo // pad+ma de'i 'dab ma dag las/ tshigadang / don dang / tshigs su bcad pa sna tshogs byung ste/ sem
36b5(rgyud): can gang dag sa 'di la gnas pa de dag gis tshigasu bcad pa/ 'di dag thos so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gang zag sdig ba med pa cig skyes pa// gcig pus bdud kyi sde ni dpung dang
36b6(rgyud): zhon par bcas pa bcom// sangs rgyas dpa' bo gcig gis chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// nyag gcig 'gro ba dag la phan phyir byon par the tsom med// mkhas pa bstan bcos tshul mang rig pa chos
36b7(rgyud): don thar 'dod pa// tshul shes pang nas skyes dang nye rgyal mchog 'dir ston pas brtul// 'gro ba kun la phan don rig mkhas dam chos gsung ba chen// thub pa smra mchog 'jig rten kun gyis mchod/ 
36b8(rgyud): pa de ring gshegs// dus su gshegs pa ston pa dge sbyong rgyal po bslab gsum 'chad// tshad memad chos don rig pa lha dang mir bcas 'gro bskyob// 'jig rten don dang phan spyad mkhas pa ye
37a1(rgyud): sa/  pags rgyas gdus sa sa da s+ho/ klu 'angs 'gro ba ba sa dang tshul pa/  na du ma
37a2(rgyud): thos rapa bas sbyang// ma rig pa yis bsgrings pa'i mig can ga la yang // dam dro'i chos kyi mapa ni ji bzhin bang+gA sbyin// thams cad ldan pa'i 'dol dri 'di ni tshigs gyur gyis// don gyings
37a3(rgyud): gzigs pa gzugs bzang mchog mnga' la// stongs dang ldan zhing mchog dang mchog ma yin mkhyen pa// s+thA ba~M'i sid+d+ha ring por mi thogs 'di ga shugs so// 'gro ba'i sdug brtul d+hA mar
37a4(rgyud): gnas pa gzigs na ni// dbang po drug gi sdom pa'i mchog la rab gnas shing // mngon par shes pa drug mkhyen drug gi/ rjes 'brang ba// de ni chos kyi rnga chen brdung du yeng dag gshegs/ 
37a5(rgyud): dbang po drug gi grong khyer gnas rnams rab 'joms pa// don ma chog dran pa drug gi kha lo bsgyur dbang po// pha rol chos drug mchog rnams rab tu bshad pa'i phyir// drug gis
37a6(rgyud): bon smra ba'i seng+ge 'dir gshegs so// 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug gi bar du pad+ma de las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo // khyod cag tshegs te de ring dga' ba spyod// bag med sems pa sred
37a7(rgyud): dang rgyags pas bsgribs// rtag tu rmongs shing dga' ba'i skom gyis myos// bag med gyur pas bde gshegs mchod mi byed// 'dod pa mi rtag chu yi zla ba bzhin// skye dgu'i 'khor ba'i zhags pa
37a8(rgyud): shin tu sra// dga' ba dag la bag med mthar pa// nam kyang mya ngan 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro// rtag tu bag med zhi ba'i phyir mi 'gyur// dge dang mi dge sngon byas ma mthong ngam// na dang na 'chi 'jigs
37b1(rgyud): pas kun zin cing // khyed cag ngan songs la rab tu zhugs// sbyin dang dul dang kun sdom bag yod la// rten cig sngon gyi legs byas rnams kyang bsrungs// 'dod pa mi gtsang mtha' med kun spongs
37b2(rgyud): la bde par gshegs pa'i skyabs nye bar deng // song ste de yi bka' la rab tu nyon// legs bshad de ni khyod kyi don chen te// shes rab rnam grol rab tu zhi ba'i rgyu// dam pa'i chos ldan mnyam
37b3(rgyud): pabadon chen no// gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i ris bcu drug gi bar du pad+ma'i mdab ma la tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag phyung ngo // mnyam gzhag bsam gtan dga' ba nyon mongs med// rab tu
37b4(rgyud): bsgrims te chos la rnam par bsgoms// ma 'khrul sems dang / rnam par thar 'dod pas// zhe sdang rab tu spangs pa'i blo gyis shig/ rnam pa bcu gsum mtshan ma bstan pa yi// bzod
37b5(rgyud): pa mchog la rnam par sgom pagyis// des ni na dang rga las/ thar pa yi// shin tu rnam thar myur du thob par 'gyur// gang rnams gzugs kyi rnam rtog sogs la chags// ther
37b6(rgyud): zug rtag pa bdag brtan dngos por blta// de dag gi ni skye ba'i rgyud mi 'chad// de rnams ngan sengs la shin tu 'bab// rtag tu khams gsum bdag med rdzas med cing // byed med rang dbang med par
37b7(rgyud): rnam bltas nas// rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa gang sgom pa// de dag 'gro ba kun las thar par 'gyur// skye dang 'jig 'grol chos 'di thams cad la// nam mkha' 'dra bar gang rnams sgom byed pa// de
37b8(rgyud): dag 'chi med rga med na ba'ang med// ngan 'gro med cing mi sdug phrad pa'ang med// gang rnams dbang po dag la yid mi chags// lam de mchog ste shin tu dag pa yin// da ltar shAkya seng+ge 'di bzhin du/ 
38a1(rgyud): bdud rnams bzhi po rnam par bcom par 'gyur// gang dag g.yo ba btul nas gnyis spangs phyir// ci yang med cing mtshan ma kun spangs pa// tshul gcig rnam par sgom par byed pa/ 
38a2(rgyud): rnams// de dag la ni lam mchog 'di bshad do// bdag po med cing byed pa med gyur pa// chos 'di thams cad stong par bsgoms nas su// smin pa spangs na bla na med pa yi// byang chub na mkha'i
38a3(rgyud): rang bzhin reg par 'gyur// de lta bu'i don gyi tshig chos kyi sgra de dag byung bas 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mi dang / mi ma yin pa de dag tshegs te/ 'bad cing 'khod do// la la ni tshangs pa'i cha byad
38a4(rgyud): du/ \u0f7fla la ni dbang byed kyi cha byad du/ la la ni dbang phyug chen de'i cha byad du/ la la ni sred med kyi bu'i cha byad du/ la la ni dga' ldan pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni 'thab bral ba'i cha
38a5(rgyud): byang du// la la ni brgya byin gyi cha byang du/ la la ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni gzhon nu'i byang du/ la la ni rnam thos kyi bu'i'o cha byad du/ la la ni 'phags skyes
38a6(rgyud): de'i cha byad du/ la la ni mig mi bzang gi cha byad du/ la la ni yul 'khor srung gi cha byad du/ la la ni rgyal chen bzhi pa'i phal pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni nyi ma'i cha byad du/ la la ni zla ba'i cha byad
38a7(rgyud): du la la ni skar ma'i cha byad du/ la la ni lha ma yin gyi cha byad du/ la la ni na mkha' lding gi cha byad du/ la la ni mi 'am ci'i cha byad du/ la la ni lto 'phye chen po'i byang du/ la la ni rin po che'i cha
38a8(rgyud): byang du/ la la ni gser gyi rgyan gyi cha byad du/ la la ni rin po che sna tshogs kyi cha byad du/ la la ni rin po che'i shing ljon par cha byad du/ la la ni rgyal rigs kyi cha byad du/ la la ni gzhan mu stags can
38b1(rgyud): gyi cha byang du/ la la ni 'khor lo rin po che'i cha byad du/ la la ni nor bu rin po che'i chu byang du/ la la ni glang po ches srung gi bu'i cha byad du/ la la ni rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs ldan gyi cha byang du/ la
38b2(rgyud): la ni bud med rin po che'i cha byad du/ la la ni tshong dpon btsun pa'i cha byad du/ la l-i ni blon po rin po che'i byad du/ bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'khod
38b3(rgyud): do/ la la ni sngo zhing kha dog sde la/ byang drul dang rgyan dkar pos rgyan par bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan
38b4(rgyud): dmar po dang / mu tig gi phreng ba thogs shing 'phang du ta la srid tsam gyi na mkha'i dkyil na 'khod do// la la ni da kar zhing kho dog dkar la/ byang 'phrul dang / spud pa kha/ 
38b5(rgyud): dog leb rgan te/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sa ra po dang / mu tig gi phreng ba thogs shing 'khod// la la ni leb rgan kha dog leb rgan la gser gyi gos dang phyung phrul dang / 
38b6(rgyud): lhab lhub ste/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mthing ka thogs shing 'khod do// la la ni dmar shing kha dog dmar la/ mu tig dkar po'i char 'beb so// la la ni dkar zhing kha
38b7(rgyud): dog dkar la mu tig dmar po'i char 'bebs so// la la ni lha'i drang srong gi kha dog du bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ nam mkha' las me tog gi char mngon par 'bebs so// la la ni bcom
38b8(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi gzugs su mngon par sprul nas/ na mkha' las lha'i spos sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs so// la la ni dri za'i kha dog gis lha'i sil snyan sna tshogs brdung ngo // la la ni lha'i
39a1(rgyud): bu mo'i kha dog gi rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod du spos chu thogs te/ sa la chag chag 'deb so// la la ni 'ching bu nag po lta bu'i kha dog ste/ spos sna tshogs kyis rab tu bdug par byed/ 
39a2(rgyud): do la la ni lha'i bu'i cha byad kyis gar byed cing glu'i dbyangs 'byin no// la la ni kha dog sna tshogs bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la bstod do// bdud dang bdud
39a3(rgyud): kyi 'khor la la ni/ bcom ldan 'daphyogag la bzhugs pa de logs su mngon par phyogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rin po che sna tshogs thog so// la la ni srang dang / khang pa
39a4(rgyud): dang / khyim dang / skar khung dang / rta babs dang / bsrel khang / dang / la mo gyi bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / khang pa brtse dgas pa dang / sgo gang dang / shing khang dang / gzhal med khang
39a5(rgyud): rnams na 'dug cing thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la ma chod pa bya ba'i phyir 'khod do// de nas bdud sdig can gyi sa gang gi tshe/ bdud de dag thams cad g.yog dang bcas
39a6(rgyud): te dge sbyong go'u ta ma la skyabasu dong bar mthong ba de'i tshe rab tu 'khrugs te/ skrag cing srang gi dbus na pad+ma de 'khor 'dug go/ 'og min gyi lha grangs med pa'i bar du 'og min nas babs
39a7(rgyud): nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir pad+ma de'i khor yug du 'khod do// bdud sdug can gyis tshigasu bcad pa de dag thos nas kun tu bltas na/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i srang gi dbus na
39a8(rgyud): pad+ma de las 'di lta bu'i tshigs su bcad pa dag byung ste/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir mi bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa dag gis pad+ma de 'khor bar 'khod par mthong ngo // de nas bdud sdig
39b1(rgyud): can gyis steng du bltas na/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha drug gnas thams cad na yang chos mnyan pa'i phyir lha bye ba phrag brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med bdag gis pad+ma de dag 'khor bar 'khod par mdzod de nas
39b2(rgyud): bdud sdig can rab tu sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas yi la bcags te/ spu zing zhes byed par gyur cing lus rdul te/ lus 'dar nas na mkha' la rgyug cing skad che ni pos bos te/ bdud gzhan la 'di
39b3(rgyud): skad ces smras so// mi 'gyur yid kyis nga yi tshig la nyon// nga la stobs med bdag yul 'dir dbang med// thub stobs yon tan shin tu dri med de// skye bo bstan phyir 'jig rten 'dir 'jug go/ lha mi
39b4(rgyud): dga' ba'i pad+ma 'dir byung ste// 'gro mchog ma lus nges par nye bar dong // bde gshegs tshig la skom zhing rab tu dga'// yon tan rab mchog zhi ba'i lam du 'gro// 'di ni 'jig
39b5(rgyud): rten gsum po slu ba dge sbyong sgra yin te// lha mi mang po tham/ sa cad yid gcig pad+ma 'khor ba 'dug/ da ni 'jigs pa/ 'i skad byung myur du ri yi char bab ste// ci nas bdud kyi sde
39b6(rgyud): bcan mtshon gyis deng bcom 'dir brlag gyis// de nas bdud gzhan zhig gis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// bdag gi phan byed tshig 'di nyon cig khyod kyis chos rig na// bdag sde
39b7(rgyud): brlag pa mthong yang zhi bar ci yi phyir mi 'gro// bde gshegs gzi brjid sku dang dpal gzugs mthong bar bdag cag myos// sangs rgyas 'dren pa ma gtogs 'di na skyabs rab mchog gzhan
39b8(rgyud): med/ de nas bdud gzhan zhig rab tu ngu zhing gdong mchog tu khros pas non pas/ bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// log pa'i lam du zhugs shing lam dman pa// bdag gi stobs mthu
40a1(rgyud): med pa'ang mi shes sam// 'dren pa la yang gang phyir khyod sngo ba// ngo mi tsha 'am 'dzem par mi bya 'am// bdag cag stobs ni shin tu brlag par 'gyur// sangs rgyas mthu yi 'gro ba
40a2(rgyud): ma lus pa// pad+ma'i drung du nye bar der dong ste// chos thos tshim pas lus kyang shin tu dag/ bdag cag rnam par 'jigs shing skrag gyur te// lus ni dri nga stobs dang brtson 'grus stor// ji tsam
40a3(rgyud): skad cig brlag par ma gyur pa// de yi bar du thub dbang skyabs su 'dong // de nas bdud gzhan zhig gis thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so// sdig can khyed ni chos kyi spyod pa spangs shing sdig byed
40a4(rgyud): dga'/ sangs rgyas mgon 'di 'gro ba'i phan don mkhas shing dge ba'i mchog/ grong khyer 'dir byon bdag cag myur du dga' zhing dang bas blta// 'jig rten gsum mchod
40a5(rgyud): srog chags kun gyi sman la skyabasu 'dong // de nas na mkha 'di nyid nas bdud dbyangs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba des sgra chen por 'di skad ces smras so// khyed kun tshegs pas gus
40a6(rgyud): shing dga' ldan nga yi tshig nyon cig/ sdig pa'i lta ba kun bzlog lus btud ngag yid mthun spyod de// khro spangs rab dga' thub pa'i gsung mchog la yang dga' dang skyed// sangs rgyas mngon
40a7(rgyud): sum rnyed dka' skyabs de de ring gus par mchod// de nas skad cig de nyid la bdud thams cad nam mkha' las babs nas/ rgyal po'i la kyi grong khyer gyi sgo rin po che sna bdun las byas ste/ bdud la/ 
40a8(rgyud): la ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i cha byad du bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir 'bad cing 'khod do// la la ni tshangs pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni dbang byed kyi
40b1(rgyud): cha byad du/ ya la ni dbang phyug chen po'i cha byad du/ la la ni sred med kyi bu'i cha byad du/ la la ni dga' ldan pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni 'thab bral ba'i cha byang du/ la la ni brgya byin gyi cha byang du/ la la ni
40b2(rgyud): sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni gzhon nu'i cha byad du/ la la ni rnam thos kyi bu'i cha byad du/ la la ni 'phags skyes po'i cha byad du/ la la ni mig mi bzang gi cha byad du/ la la ni yul 'khor
40b3(rgyud): srung gi cha byad du/ la la ni rgyal chen bzhi pa pal pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni nyi mi che byad du/ la la ni zla ba'i cha byad du/ la la ni skar ma'i cha byad du/ la la ni lha ma yin gyi cha byad du/ la la ni nam
40b4(rgyud): mkha' lding gi cha byad du/ la la ni mi'am ci'i cha byad du/ ngal la ni lto 'phye chen po'i cha byad du/ la la ni rin po che'i cha byad du/ la la ni gser gyi rgyan gyi cha byad du/ la la ni rin po che
40b5(rgyud): sna tshogs kyi cha byad du/ la la ni rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i/ cha byad du/ lo la ni rgyal rig kyi cha byad du/ la la ni gzhan mu stegs can gyi cha byad du/ la la ni 'khor lo rin po che
40b6(rgyud): cha byad du/ la la ni nor bu rin po che'i cha byad du/ la la ni glang po chos srung gi bu'i cha byad du/ la la ni rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gyi cha byad du/ la la ni bud med rin po che'i cha byad du/ la la ni tshong
40b7(rgyud): dpon btsun pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni blon po rin po che'i cha byad du/ bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das la mched pa bya ba'i phyir 'khod do// la la ni sngo zhing kha dog sngo la phyang 'phrul dang / rgyan
40b8(rgyud): dkar pos rgyan par bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dmar po dang / mu tig gi phreng ba thogs shing / 'bang du
41a1(rgyud): / la'i srid tsam gyi namakha'i dkyil na 'khod do// la la ni dkar zhing kha dog dkar la/ byang 'phrul dang / spud pa kha dog leb rgan te/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ser/ 
41a2(rgyud): po dang / mu tig gi phreng ba thogs shing 'khod do// la la ni leb rgan kha dog leb rgan la gser gyi gos dang / phyang 'phrul dang / lhab lhung ste/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan thing ka
41a3(rgyud): thogs shing 'khod do// la la ni dmar zhing kha dog dmar la/ mu tig dkar po'i char 'beb so// la la ni dkar zhing kha dog dkar la/ mu tig dmar po'i char 'bebs so// la la ni lha'i drang srong gi kha
41a4(rgyud): dog tu bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ nam mkha' las me tog gi char mngon par 'bebs so// la la ni bcom ldan 'a dus kyi nyan thos kyi gzugs su mngon par sprul nas/ nam mkha'
41a5(rgyud): las lha'i spos sna tshogs kyi tshar 'bebs so// la la ni dri za'i/ kha dog gi lha'i sil snyan sna tshogs rdung ngo // la la ni lha'i bu'i kha dog gis/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod du/ spos
41a6(rgyud): chu thogs te sa la chag chag 'debs so// la la ni 'ching bu nag po lta bu'i kha dog ste/ spos sna tshogs kyis rab tu bdug par byed do// la la ni lha'i bu'i cha byad kyis gar byed cing / glu'i dbyangs
41a7(rgyud): 'byin to// la la ni kha dog sna tshogs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la bstod do// bdud dang bdud kyi 'khor la la ni/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs ga la/ 
41a8(rgyud): bzhugs pa de logs su mngon par phyogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs thogs so// la la ni srang dang / khang pa dang / skar khung dang / rta babs dang / bsil
41b1(rgyud): khang dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / sgo khang dang gzha' med khang sna tshogs su 'dug cing / thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'khod do// de na/ 
41b2(rgyud): bdud sdig can gyis gang gi tshe/ bdud de dag thams cad g.yog dang bcad te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma la skyabs su dong bar mthong ba de'i tshe/ rab tu 'khrugs te skrag cing myos nas rab tu ngu zhing 'di skad ces smras
41b3(rgyud): so// bdag la phyin chad grogs med de// bdag gi dpal deng thams cad stor// bdag ni bdud kyi yul nas 'khyams// brtson 'grus tha ma brtsam par bya// bdag gis pad+ma rtsa ba bcad// pad+ma bcad dang kun
41b4(rgyud): 'khrugs te// de nas sems can phyogs phyogs 'gro// de na tha ma'i stobs yin no// bdud sdig can gyis de ltar bsams nganas// rlung lta bur na mkha' las babs te// srang gi pad+ma ga la ba
41b5(rgyud): der phyin nas/ pad+ma de'i sdong po yan chad dbyung bar 'dod na/ reg par yang ma nus/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma bcas par 'dod/ na/ de dag kyang ma mthong / pad+ma'i snying po la lag pas brdab
41b6(rgyud): par 'dod na de yang ma dmigs te/ dper na glog snang yang mi dmigs pa bzhin no// 'di lta ste/ dper na/ grib ma snang yang mi dmigs pa de bzhin du pad+ma de yang snang mod kyi mi dmigs so// gang
41b7(rgyud): gi tshe bdud sdig can gyis pad+ma de mthong yang mi dmigs shing reg par mi rung ba de'i tshe/ 'khor thams cad rab tu bsngangs par bya ba'i phyir skad drag cing che la 'jigs pa'i sgra byung bar 'dod na de yang ma nus
41b8(rgyud): so// yang stobs chen po'i drag shul gyis lag pa gnyis sa chen po la brdabs te/ rab tu bskyod par 'dod na/ reg par yang ma nus te ma dmig so// 'di lta ste/ dper na/ la la zhig na mkha' la
42a1(rgyud): rdob par 'dod na/ mi dmigs pa de bzhin du/ bdud sdig can gyis mthong yang reg par mi rung zhing mi dmigs nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ ci nas sems can 'dus pa rnams
42a2(rgyud): btags te/ sems rnam par 'khrug par bya'o snyam na/ sems can de dag mthong yang mi dmigs shing reg par ma rung ngo // de nas bdud sdig can rab tu ngu zhing / sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lus shing ljon
42a3(rgyud): ba bzhin du 'dar te/ gdong mchi ma can phyogs bzhir blta zhing 'di skad ces smras so// dge sbyong gi ni 'gro kun bsdu phyir de ring sgra 'di byas// 'di ltar bdag ni 'dun 'dir slad bzhin skad gcig myos par
42a4(rgyud): song / yul dang rang gi stobs las nyams shing bdag gi srog kyang zla dra// der bskrad brlag par ma gyur par du bdag gnas myur du 'gro// bdag gi gnas su 'gro bar 'dod na der yang 'gro bar ma
42a5(rgyud): nus te/ de rab tu skrag cing ngus nas 'di snyam du sems so// bad / ga gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs zad de/ bdag dge sbyong go'utu ma 'di'i dbang du song du 'ong / dgra 'di'i mdun du bdag gi
42a6(rgyud): srog zad par 'gyur du 'ong gis 'dir mi snang bar byas te/ ci nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni gnas pa'i sems can gcig gi sa kyang bdag 'chi ba'i dus byed pa mi mthong bar sangs rgyas
42a7(rgyud): kyi zhing mi mjed kyi phyi rol tu 'chi ba'i dus bya'o snyam nas/ 'on kyang mi snang bar bya ba 'am/ phyogs dang phyogs 'tsham su 'bros kyang ma nus te/ de nyid du mgul pa bcing ba lngas bcings par bdag gis
42a8(rgyud): mthong bar rab tu khros shing skrag ste/ skad chen por ngu zhing 'di skad ces smras so// kyi hud bu dang gnyen bshes sdug pa khyed rnams phyis mi mthong ngo zhes zer ro// de nas bdud dbyangs dang ldan pa zhes bya
42b1(rgyud): ba 'khor los bsgyur ba'i cha byad du 'dug par gyur te/ des bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// ci'i phyir khyod deng mya ngan yid kyis ngu gdong sgra cher 'bod// 'gro ba kun gtso thub mchog skyabs su ma 'dzin
42b2(rgyud): myur du song // 'jig rten rnams kyi mgon skyabs dpung gnyen sdug bsngal gsum sel ba// 'di la bsnyen bkur zhi 'gro bde ba thob par 'gyur yang dag/ de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du bdag nyid
42b3(rgyud): tshig snyan pas/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i skyabasu song la/ bcings pa 'di las bdag grol bar bya'o snyam du bsams te/ de nas bdud sdig can gyis phyogs gang na/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa de logs
42b4(rgyud): su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to// gang za// ga gi mchog skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba/ las rab tu thar bar mdzad pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs
42b5(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la dag skyabs su mchi'o// 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// thub mgon myur ru 'jigs chen mi bza da bcings pa 'di las khrol// de ring slan chad bde gshegs
42b6(rgyud): gtso mchog skyabs su bdag mchi ste// gti mug gis ni bdag ljongs khyod la khros shing nongs chen bgyis// mngon sum khyod bzhag spyan sngar de dag so sor bshags par bgyi// gang gi tshe bdud
42b7(rgyud): sdig can tshig snyan pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la skyangs su dong ba de'i tshe na/ bdag grol ba snyam du shes so// gang gi tshe 'khor 'di nas bdag 'gro'o snyam du bsams pa de'i tshe yang mgul
42b8(rgyud): pa bcings pa lngas bcings par bdag gis shes te/ gang gi tshe gang du yang 'gro ma nus pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das la mgon dang skyabasu sems bskyed nas/ yang bdag nyid grol bar shes so// lan bdun
43a1(rgyud): gyi bar du bdag bcings pa dang grol bar shes te de nyid na 'dug go/ 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las bdud btul ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// 
43a2(rgyud): gong du smos pa'i bar du ste/ nyan thos chen po bzhi po de dag rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir song ba/ bdud gzhon nu de dag gis dge sbyong glu long shig/ dge sbyong gar byos
43a3(rgyud): shig ces spyod pa ma yin pa byed du bcug nas/ nyan thos chen po de dag kyang srang gi dbus na rgyug cing mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam gyi tshig dang ldan pa'i glu dbyangs kyis gang gi tshe/ tshigs su bcad
43a4(rgyud): pa smras pa de'i tshe/ sa chen po 'di rab tu g.yos so// skad ci ngag de nyid la lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'bye
43a5(rgyud): chen po brgya stong mang po bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa/ rnams gdong mchi ma can gyis 'di skad ces smras so// chos kyi kha lo sgyur mchog mya ngan med bzhugs kyang // rgyal
43a6(rgyud): ba'i bstan pa 'di lta bu yi gnas gyur te// nyan thos de dag la ni rkyalo ka deng byas pa// 'gro ba rnams kyis mthong na dad par ga la 'gyur// de nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma
43a7(rgyud): yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po bye ba khrag khrig mang po gdong mchi ma can gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas/ 
43a8(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol te// de ltar bstan pa 'di yi gnas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kun gzigs te/ bstan pa'i cho ga srung slad du// kun mkhyen btang snyoms ma mdzad cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
43b1(rgyud): pa/ 'di ltar nga nyid der song ste// gzhon dpung bcas pa'i bdud btul la// skye bo mang po thams cad kyang // mya ngan 'das grong 'gro bar bya// de nas de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol/ 
43b2(rgyud): te bcom ldan 'das ma gshegs shig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul bas gyis mi khyab// bdud kyi yul bsam gyi mi khyab/ klu'i yul lasar gyis mi khyab/ las rnams kyi
43b3(rgyud): las kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ma stsal tam/ yul thams cad kyi nang na ni sangs rgyas kyi yul khyad par du 'phags pa'i mchog lags te/ bcom ldan
43b4(rgyud): 'das kyis gdan 'di la bzhugs bzhin du/ bdud bye ba khrag khrig rab tu dam par mdzad pa dang / chos kyi phung po dbye ba khrag khrig rab tu bstan pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho
43b5(rgyud): skam pa dang / lta ba'i rgya mtsho dral ba dang / sems can bye ba khra ga khrig ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la gzud par spyod mod kyi/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das deng gi dus la gshegs
43b6(rgyud): pa mi rig so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can gyi khams na sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bdud du gyur la/ de dag re re'i bdud kyi stobs dang / byin gyis brlabs kyang sa'i
43b7(rgyud): rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa de tsam du gyur te/ de dag thams cad nga la gsod par shom yang spu'i khung bu gcig tsam la yang gnod par mi nus so// ngas ni 'di na 'dug bzhin du bdud bye ba khrag khrig
43b8(rgyud): rnams rab tu pham par bya ba dang / gdul bar nus te/ bdud g.yog dang bcas pa 'di ni ma gtigs so// yang nga la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir bdud 'di dag gis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po
44a1(rgyud): thams cad bdud kyi stobs dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyis brlab kyis bkod pas rgyan pas/ de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ 'gro bar byas te/ yongs su spyad do// 
44a2(rgyud): de nas bdud de dag rab tu dga' zhing dad pa skyes nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon skyed par 'gyur ro// ji tsam na gdan las bzhengs par bzhes pa dang / 
44a3(rgyud): de nas 'od ma'i che la srung ba'i lha mo mdzes zhes bya ba de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gdong mchi ma can du 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan de ring gshegs pa'i dus ma lags/ 
44a4(rgyud): grong khyer 'di dag kun nas bdud kyis gdams// re re yang de ni shin tu mi rungs pa// byings smra ba'i seng ge bskor ni/ dmachis// zhe sdang rab 'a bar rno ba'i mtshon thogs te// khyod
44a5(rgyud): dgrongs slad du 'khrug pa'i sems kyis gnas// mgon du rnam pa kun tu deng ma gshegs// 'jig rten rtsa lag pa rlag par ma bzhud cig/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das gdan las
44a6(rgyud): bzhengs pa'i tshe gtsug lag khang gi lha mo snang ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba des/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// sdig can dag ni lnga stong po// mtsho/ 
44a7(rgyud): char bcas te mchis pa ni// bsam med de dag khyod la sngo// thub chen de ring ma gshegs shig/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang nas byung ba de'i tshe/ sman gyi lha mo grub pa'i blo gros
44a8(rgyud): zhes bya ba des/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// 'jig rten sgron ma brlag gyur na// kyi hud chos kyi lam stor cing // chos kyi tshul ni rab tu 'jig/ chos kyi gru
44b1(rgyud): yang 'jig par 'gyur// 'jig rten kun na rgyal chen chos kyi ro ni nyams par 'gyur// 'gro ba 'di dag nyon mongs g.yon can gdug pas shin tu gdams// sa 'dir bde gshegs thub pa'i mchog
44b2(rgyud): ni ma rung 'gyur ba lags// ji ltar shin tu dbyung ba'i mthu ni bdag la ci ma mchis// khyod brlag bgyi skad 'di na rab tu mi bzang mang po dag/ sdig pa'i chos can ral gri sta re mtshon rnon thogs shing
44b3(rgyud): mchis// bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten srung slad bdag tshig gson te/ stobs bcu grub par bzhud pa de ring grong khyer ma gshegs shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang gi dang ra nas
44b4(rgyud): bzhud pa dang / den shing gi lha mo 'od 'chang zhes bya ba de snying rje dab snying rje bar ngu zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag/ 'tshal nas// 'di skad ces gsol to// thams cad don grub thub
44b5(rgyud): pa ying bzhin rdzogs khyod ma rung gyur na ni// mgon po khams gsum 'di dag thams cad de'i re mig ni stor bar 'gyur// na mkha' 'di la sbrul gyis rked bcings rno ba'i mnga' dang mtshon
44b6(rgyud): thogs shing // khyod dgrongs slad du kha nas me 'bar rgyu yis da ni der ma gshegs// de nas sgo gang gi tshe lha mo 'od zer chu'i lha zhes bya ba de sgra cher ngu zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'chel
44b7(rgyud): nas 'di skad ces gsol to// grong khyer bzang po 'od na bram zer ming btags stong phrag nyi shu po// mda' dang spu gri mtshon cha 'bar ba thogs te snying rje med par lta// gcig pas gcig mi bzad pa snying
44b8(rgyud): rje med pa stong phrag nyi shu rnams// khyod dgrongs slad du 'di na mchis kyis gtsang ma'i zhal ni ma gshegs shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das sgo gang du byon pa dang / der rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer
45a1(rgyud): bsrung ba'i lha mo ta la'i snying po zhes bya ba de na mkha' las sgra cher ngu zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rings par song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
45a2(rgyud): nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan shul 'di seng+ge rnga mo glang chen smon pas bskor// dge sbyong rnams la brtse slad bdud kyis rnam mang gnod par bgyid// sa 'dir ston pa khyod dgrongs slad du mu
45a3(rgyud): stegs gzhan yang brtson// sprin dbyangs 'od 'bar lha klu thugs brtse slad du ma gshegs shig/ bcom ldan bdud thul khyod kyi bstan pa rnam zhig dang // sgyu ma bgyid pa mi 'thun gdong can bdud
45a4(rgyud): du thong nas// lha mi klu dang mi 'am ci yi dbang po rnams// kun 'dus mi dga' skrag nas shin tu rnam par 'khrugs// dam chos cher zhig pra dang 'jig rten 'khrugs 'gyur dang // nam
45a5(rgyud): mkha' skar ma 'od stor nyi zla gyur mthong nas// 'gro mchog kyi ma mi bzad klad pa deng drag rdzob// bde gshegs ma rung 'gyur bar kun dogs kyi hud mchi// mthong ba'i nyi ma 'di nyam
45a6(rgyud): shing / chos kyi sgron ma zad par 'gyur// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grongs par brlag/ chos kyi chu yang bskams par 'gyur// dam chos spyod pa 'jig rten du// ma rung 'gyur bar nye gnas tsha// mi dge
45a7(rgyud): ba yi bdud rnams kyang // 'di dag kun ni 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas lha mo des bcom ldan 'das phyir ldog par ma mthong nas/ gdong mchi ma can gyis yang 'di skad ces gsol to// thub pa 'jig
45a8(rgyud): rten kun la gzigs su gsol// sgra mchog de ring brlag par ma bzhud cig/ bdag gi grong du ma rung khyod 'gyur na// 'jig rten gsum gyis rtag smad 'gyur du mchi// 'dren pa bdag gi tshig
45b1(rgyud): gson sems can mchog/ bdag gi grong du brlag par deng ma bzhud // sems can thugs brtse'i slang du 'dir bzhes te// sems can skye bas gces pas 'jigs thar mdzod// dam pa brnyes nas sgrol ba
45b2(rgyud): rab 'gyur bar// sngon gyi dam bcas de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs// sems can mang po sdug bsngal du mas gdungs// srog chags rnams kyi gtso bo dbugs phyung shig/ sku mchog bskal pa bye ba
45b3(rgyud): mang por bzhugs// skye ma 'dod la chags shing byis pa'i sde// de rnam ni bgyi slad du chos lam shod // skye mched dbang po don ni rang bzhin stong // de nas bcom ldan 'das sgo gang du gshegs pa dang / 
45b4(rgyud): de nas sa'i lha mo gzi brjid che ba'i lha mo khri dang lhan cig sa ba zhig cing gdong mchi ma can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te 'dug nas/ 'di skad ces gsol teto/ 
45b5(rgyud): rab tu sbyin la dgongs shing khyod kyi ni// rgya mtsho bzhi bltam pa yi khrag stsal cing // dbu dang rus pa khor yug ri rab tu/ ma// spyan yang gang+gA'i bye ma snyed stsal to// sngon ni rin chen rnam
45b6(rgyud): pa sna tshogs dang // sras dang btsun mo glang chen de bzhin rta// gnas dang gos dang mal cha zas skom dang // de bzhin nad pa dag la 'dod sman stsal// rang byung mchog rab la ni mchod pa mdzad// khyed kyis
45b7(rgyud): bag yod par yang tshul khrims bsrungs// bzod pa dang ni thos pa rtag tu bstan// par 'dzin mar 'dzin pa yang de bzhin no// bya bar dka' ba dag kyang mtha' yas spyad// sems cad du ma nyon mongs thar
45b8(rgyud): bar mdzad// gang sngon khyod kyis smon lam btab pa ni// lam mchog ston pa sangs rgyas nyid gyur cig/ chu bo chen po las ni 'gro ba bsgral// 'jig rten la yang shin tu chos bstan te// sdug bsngal ma
46a1(rgyud): lus par ni bskam par bya// sems can mang po grangs med grong khyer gzung // sems can de dag dgongs pa yongs rdzogs shing // byang chub dam pa la ni shin tu 'khod// 'di ni lam bor/ 
46a2(rgyud): sdig pa spyod pa rnams// tshul khrims thos bshig mgon pos bzod par mdzod// 'di dag sgrol cig dam bcas dgongs su gsol// bskal pa bye ba mang por chos ston to// mgon po chu bo dag las 'jig
46a3(rgyud): rten sgrol// 'di dag yan lag brgyad kyi chu yi khrus// mgon po mchog rab khyod dang 'dra ba ni// 'jig rten gsum po 'di na 'ga' ma mchis// bdag dgrol 'jig rten 'di dag grol bar mdzod// srid
46a4(rgyud): gsum rgya mtsho las kyang 'gro ba sgrol// khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i rtsa lag gcig/ rtag tu bzhugs shing chos ni bshad du ga sol// de nas bcom ldan 'das sgo gang du gshegs pa dang / 
46a5(rgyud): skad gcig de nyid la lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po na mkha' la rgyu zhing ga/ dong mchi ma can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag/ 
46a6(rgyud): rnams kyi bde gshegs sngon mthong ba// zhi ba'i dus la shin tu slob ma dul// chos rnams rgya cher ston par mdzad pa na// de la 'ang lta bu yi bgegs ma byung // ston pa 'di ni shin tu dus ngan la/ 
46a7(rgyud): rgya chen blo yis rang byung nyid brnyed te// thub dbang 'gro ba yongs smin mdzad slad du// 'jig rten nyon mongs bsgribs la chos ston cing // smra ba'i seng+ge 'di na bzhugs bzhin du// sdig can dag ni bye ba stong ma
46a8(rgyud): po// 'di ltar chos rnams rab tu 'jig par byed// sangs rgyas dpa' bo grong du deng ma gshegs// de nas lha mo gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces gsol to// sngon gyi rgyal ba 'jig rten phan brtson pa// de
46b1(rgyud): dag yul gcig 'khor lo bskor gyur pa// 'di ni gang du gshegs pa der yang bskor// de ring ma rung bar ni gyur ta re// de nas yang lha mo gzhan zhig gis 'di skad gsol to// ded dpon 'dir ni thug/ 
46b2(rgyud): rje'i slad// shin tu sems can den mdzad spyang // de ni de ring grong khyer 'dir// brlag par 'gyur snyam bdag rtog go// yang de'i tshe lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am/ 
46b3(rgyud): ci dang / lto 'phye chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gdong mchi ma zag cing ngo 'dzum gnag pa dag na mkha'i ngos kyi lam las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas/ bdag nyid la rnam pa mang
46b4(rgyud): po byed de/ la la ni skra 'bal/ la la ni rgyan 'grol/ la la ni gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan stsol/ la la ni ba drag gi lus sa la rdob/  la la ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
46b5(rgyud): la 'dzin/ la la ni shin tu nyon mongs par du/ la la ni la ga pas brang rdung / la la ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhab sa drung na 'dug cing so bya bzhin du 'gre ldeg/ la la ni bcom
46b6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te/ bstod cing phyag 'tshal ba byed/ la la ni bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / gos dang / phyang 'phrul dang / gser
46b7(rgyud): gyi skud pa dang / mu tig gis phreng ba dang / ras btsos bu dag mngon par 'thor ro// de nas lha gzhan bye ba mang pos mgrin gcig tu skad mthon por 'di skad ces gsol to// 'jig rten don slad
46b8(rgyud): 'di bas mang ba yi// bya bar dka' ba khyod kyis rab tu spyad// zad pa'i dus deng 'dir ni khyod skyes kyis// btang snyoms mdzod la mi gshegs bzhugs su gsol// sdig med khyod kyi sangs rgyas
47a1(rgyud): mdzad pa nyung ngu mdzad// lha dang mi rnams dbang du mdzad pa shin tu nyung // shin tu yun ring chos rnams ston cing khyod bzhugs la// srid pa gsum gyi rgya mtsho 'di la 'gro ba sgrol// dge
47a2(rgyud): ba'i las rnams bgyid cing sa bon yongs smin te// bdud rtsi'i snod du gyur pa'i sems can du ma la// khyod kyis thugs rje bskyed de so sor rab ston la// chu bo las ni 'jig rten nyam thag bsgral
47a3(rgyud): bar mdzod// 'gro ba'i dgon pa'i dbus son 'khyam gyur cing // 'khor ba'i dgon par shin tu lam stor ba// de dag la ni lam mchog so sor ston// 'phags pa'i chos mchog chog gis thar
47a4(rgyud): bar mdzod// chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa gang bskor ba// de da ni khyod kyi thugs rje ngo mtshar rmad// rlangs chen thugs dmanga' ring du gzug su gsol// 'gro ba rnams ni mgon med ma
47a5(rgyud): gyur cig/ de nas yang lha mo gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces gsol to// rnam 'dren brgya lam ma rung gyur na ni// 'ja garten 'di ni ma lus ldongs par 'gyur// yan lag brgyad
47a6(rgyud): ldan rnam thar gsum gyi rgyu// 'dir ni yongs ye thams cad ma mchis 'gyur// ngag lus sems las skyes dge sa bon dag/ bdag cag bag yod gyur pas 'dir btab ste/ de slad bdag cag
47a7(rgyud): bde ba kun dang ldan// bsod nams 'byung gnas 'di brlag ma gyur cig/ yang de'i tshe gnas gtsang ma'i lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ de dag la 'di skad ces smras
47a8(rgyud): so// sa 'dir bye ba'i bdud rnams nyer lhags kyang // thub pa rlabs chen thugs mnga' nam yang ni// ma rung mi 'gyur khyed cag ma 'jigs shig/ dge ba 'di la bdag cag mngon sum gyur// dpag tshad
47b1(rgyud): sum cu drug tu mgyogs shing drag shul ldan pas rab tu bskor// rna spang ral gri mtshon rnon rtsa ba'i sgra mang 'jigs pa bdud kyi sde// byang chub snying por lhags pa de'i tshe de dag 'jigs shing brlag 'gru
47b2(rgyud): na// de ltar don brnyes grags pas khyab pa de la ga la ge Da shig byed// de nas lha mo gzhan zhig ngu zhing 'di skad ces smras so// sngon byung ba ni bdud kyi sde gcig yin te de dag dpung mi che// 'di ni bye ba khrag
47b3(rgyud): khrig bdud kyi sde shin tu dpung che bas// 'jig rten rnam par 'dren pas 'dir ni bslag par 'gyur du rab tu dogos// de brlag na ni 'jig rten 'di dag shin tu snang med 'khyam par 'ong // de nas brgya
47b4(rgyud): byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag gis ba bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la 'jus nas 'di skad ces gsol to// blo zhan bdag cag gi ni tshig gson te// dag
47b5(rgyud): ba bzhugs shig gtso bo thugs rje can// lha mang bye ba mya ngan chen pos gdungs// de la chos kyi bcud kyis nga garte/ ra cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i
47b6(rgyud): 'khor de la byams pa yangs pa'i spyan gyis gzigs nas/ de dag shin tu dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// deng khyed ma 'jigs khyed ni ma skrag shig
47b7(rgyud): bdud rnams sring bzhon bcas gcig char du// tshegs kyang spu gcig skrag par mi nus na// nga yis lus kun la ni smos ci dgos// deng ni 'jig rten thams cad dbugs phyung ste// nga yis rtag tu sa 'dir
47b8(rgyud): ches bshad de// las rnams stor ba la ni nyid kyis// dri ma med pa yang dag lam bstan bya// ngan sngon bya ba dga' ba mang po byas// zas dang skom yang shin tu rgya chen byin// gnas dang sman yang mi
48a1(rgyud): nyung sbyin byin pas// nga la deng su gnod pa byed pa nus// ngas ni rta dang glang chen shing rta dang / lhab lhub phyang 'phrul dag gi rgyan rnams dang // bram po bran mo grong rdal yul 'khor btang // ngal
48a2(rgyud): su zhig gnod pa byed par nus// chung ma bu po bu mo bran mang dang // yi 'ong dbang phyug sa steng rgyal srid dang // sems can rnams la phan phyir ngas byin gyis// nga lus de ring ci phyir 'jig par 'gyur// mgo dang
48a3(rgyud): sna dang rna ba mig gnyis dang // lus dang spags pa khrag dang rkang lag bcas// nga yi srog kyang lus can rnams la btang // su zhig nga la 'tshe bar byed par nus// ngas ni sangs rgyas bya ba rab mang la// gus
48a4(rgyud): ldan bdag gi lag nas shin tu mchod// rtag tu tshul khrims zo// sa dang bzod la dga'// nga la su zhig brlag par byed pa/ ra nus// ngas sngon shin tu bya dga' mang po rnams// mnyam par
48a5(rgyud): gzhag pas rab tu nga yis byas// lus kun bcad kyang nga la 'a khrug med na// nga la rnam par 'tshe bar su zhig nus// nyon mongs ngas btul nges parang sangs rgyas// sems can
48a6(rgyud): thams cad la ni byams sems ldan// khro med phrag dog tha ba nga la med// nga yi mdun na de rings su zhig nus// ngas ni bdud kyi dpung rnams tshogs pa btul// ngas ni bdud pham byed pa pham par byas// 
48a7(rgyud): khyed kun rnam par thar par nges par bya// grongs du ci phyir mi 'gro ma 'jig shig/ sems can don phyir phyogs bcu 'di dag na// sangs rgyas la la gang dag bzhugs pa rnams// sangs rgyas kun dang byang
48a8(rgyud): chub sems dpa' yang // rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams ni kun nas bsogs// zhing rnams mtha' dag rab tu gang bar bya// bsod nams ye shes dag gis gnas par bya// sangs rgyas de dag tshul bcas kun
48b1(rgyud): gnas pas// sangs rgyas dag gis dgongs pa'i mdzad pa bya// yang de'i tshe lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / 
48b2(rgyud): mi dang mi ma yin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la leg so zhes bya ba gsol nas/ 'di skad ces smras so// ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba grangs med
48b3(rgyud): pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// ngo mcher chen po rmad du byung ba grangs med pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshalo// 
48b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dbugs phyung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud kyi phyogs pa/ dam par mdzad do// sems can rnams kyi mchems sbyor ba'i nyon
48b5(rgyud): mongs pa'i rnyog pa bsal to// sems can rnams kyi nga rgyal gyi ri rab tu bsnyil lo// skye ba'i shing ljon pa bcad do// 'chi bdag gi nyi ma phye mar blags so// ma rig po'i mun pa
48b6(rgyud): bsal to// gzhan mu stegs can rab tu dad par bsgyur to// chu bo bzhi bskams so// chos kyi sgron ma rab tu 'bar bar mdzad do// byang chub kyi lam bstan to// bzod pa dang nges pa la btsud de// bas
48b7(rgyud): gtan gyi bde ba la rtser stsal to// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi khong du chud par mdzad do// ston pa bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po mnga' bas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten skye ba'i rgya mtsho lnga
48b8(rgyud): bsgral to// sems can rnams 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'i grong khyer du rab tu gzung ngo // de nas lha dang mi de dag gi bdug pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / lngab lcung
49a1(rgyud): dang rargyan sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par mchod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lam de phyag dar byas so// lha'i gos dang / me tog dang / lha'i ras bcos bus
49a2(rgyud): kun tu g.yogs so// lha'i me tog man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po dang / pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang / many+dzu sha ka dang / many+dzu kaka chen po dang / mdog mdzes dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / 
49a3(rgyud): u pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+mas kun tu g.yog so// gang du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis 'dor ba'i lam de'i ngos gnyi su lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa mngon par sprul te/ lha'i/ 
49a4(rgyud): ras bcos bu dang / mu tig gi phreng ba dang / lag rgya nad dang / rna rgyan dang / mgo'i rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan to// shing de dag gi bar bar du lha'i rdzing bukra shing zhim pa'i chu dang
49a5(rgyud): zhing rnyog pa med la yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus ku na tu gang ba/ khor yug tu rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyan gyis brgya na pa dag sprul te/ bar snang la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi gdug
49a6(rgyud): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gser gyi skud pa dang / mu tig gi phreng ba bzang zhing gser gyi bye ma dag gi char yang phab bo// dngul dang / bai DU'i phye ma dang / a ga ru dang / rgya spos dang / 
49a7(rgyud): dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / ta ma la'i mdab ma'i char yang rab tu phab bo// gor shi sha dang / tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i char yang lam der phab bo// lha'i rgyan sna tshogs gser gyi skud pa dang / 
49a8(rgyud): mu tig gi phreng ba dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dag gis kyang namakha'i dkyil thams cad rgyan to// grong khyer gyi phyi rol na yang lha dang mi rnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lam mdzes
49b1(rgyud): par byed do// grong khyer nang na bdud dang bdud kyi 'khor rnams kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir bkod pa dag bkod pa byas so// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dpa' bar 'gro
49b2(rgyud): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs bzhin du lam nas gshegs so// yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das sku gzugs dang / rtags dang spyod lam rnam
49b3(rgyud): pa sna tshogs kyis lam der zhugs te/ de nas sems can gang dag tshangs pa la dad cing tshangs pas 'dul ba de dag gis ni bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i gzugs su lam nas gshegs pa mthong
49b4(rgyud): banas/ gang dag brgya byin gyis 'dul ba'i bar dang / gang dag sred med kyi bus 'dul ba dang / gang dag dbang phyug che dan pos 'dul ba dang / gang dag rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyis
49b5(rgyud): 'dul ba dang / gang dag 'khor los sgyur bas 'dul ba da 8/ gang dag khams kyi rgyal phran gyis 'dul ba dang gang dag rdzu 'phrul chen pos 'dul ba dang / gang dag dge
49b6(rgyud): sbyong gis 'dul ba dang / gang dag gzhon nus 'dul ba dang / gang dag bud med kyis 'dul ba dang / gang dag seng+ges 'dul ba dang / gang dag glang po ches 'dul ba dang / gang dag klus 'dul ba dang / 
49b7(rgyud): gang dag lha ma yin gyis 'dul ba dang / gang dag ri bong dang cing ri bong lag gis 'dul ba'i bar de dag gis bcom ldan 'das ri bong gi gzugs dang / rtags dang / spyod la gyis lam nas ga
49b8(rgyud): pab mthong ngo // sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba de dag gi ni bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / rtags dang / spyod lam gyis lam nas gshegs par mthong ste/ sems
50a1(rgyud): can de dag thams cad kyang thal mo sbyar nas mngon par bstod cing phyag 'tshal te zham ring du 'brang zhing dong ngo // yang de'i tshe gangs kyi ri dang nye ba na gnas pa'i drang srong skar ma la dga' ba zhes
50a2(rgyud): bya bdud sdig can gyis btang nas de g.yog lnga brgya dang / rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i drung na sngon bcom ldan 'das drang srong gi gzugs dang / rtags dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / spyod lam
50a3(rgyud): dang / bkod pa de lta bus lam de nas gshegs shing / lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po mchod pa byed par brtson par mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems so// bden par 'di ni drang srong
50a4(rgyud): chen po mthu che zhing mchod par 'os pa ste/ lha dang mis mtsho dad par snang ngo // 'di ni lus thams cad kyang bsod nam/ nas kyi mtshan gyi rgyan te/ mkhas shing slob dpon yin par sheso// 
50a5(rgyud): bdag cag gnyis gang zhan gang ma khas pa de la ngas ji ltar brtag snyam ste/ de na de ltar bdag gis bsu la rigs dang / rus dang / gnas dang / brtul zhugs kun tu dri'o snyam du sems so// de na
50a6(rgyud): drang srong skar ma la dga' bas bdag gi 'khor la bltas nas 'di skad ces smras so// thos ldan yid 'thad brtul zhugs che 'dzin mchod pa'i rigs par snang // ye shes chos don ldan zhing thub mchog bzod
50a7(rgyud): 'di lam rab mkhyen// khyed cag thams cad 'di la gus par mchod chen yang dag sbyor// 'di las 'khor mthar 'gro ba'i legs bshad mnyan// de nas bram ze'i khye'u de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu
50a8(rgyud): mkhan po de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes smras so// de nas drang sreng skar ma la dga' ba g.yog dang bcas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te 'dug nas 'di/ 
50b1(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// khyod su zhig/ bcom ldan gyis bka' stsal pa/ nga ni bram ze'o// gsol pa/ khyod kyis gdung rus ci/ bka' stsal pa/ nga'i rus ni go'u ta ma'o// gsol pa/ khyod kyis brtul zhug ci
50b2(rgyud): pa/ nga'i brtul zhugs ni rnam par thar pa gsum mo gsol pa khyod kyi spyod pa ci// bka' stsal pa/ nga ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i de bzhin nyid la spyad do// gsol pa/ khyod kyis rab tu byung nas ji srid lon// 
50b3(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ ngan yang dag pa'i mtha' da bzhin nyid la spyad de// gsal pa/ khyad kyis rab tu byung nas dza srad lan// bka' stsal pa/ mi rig pa byung nas ji srid lon pa/ nga rab tu byung nas kyang de
50b4(rgyud): srid lon no// gsol pa/ drang srong chen po skar ma bshad pa lung bstan pa'i rigs pa gsung ngam/ bcom ldan/ 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgro btags pa med pa mnyam nyid
50b5(rgyud): du'o// 'di ni 'jig rten gyi shes pa ste/ de la snying po ci zhig yod// drang srong gis gsol pa/ mkhas pa rnams dga' bar ba gyid pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skar ma'i gan
50b6(rgyud): gang yin/ drang srong gis gsol pa/ gang zla ba dang nyi ma la rten cing rjes su rgyu ba'i rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad brjod pa 'di dag go/ de la mdzub ni sor brgyad kyi tshad de/ mdzub de'i tshad kyis lus la srid du mdzub
50b7(rgyud): bcu gnyis mchis par rigs par bgyi'o// klang pa'i spyi bo la mdzub gang dang / rkang pa'i mthil la mdzub gang dang mdzub bcu bzhi ste/ skar ma rnams kyi gnas so// gang de dag na gda' ba ni rnam pa bzhan du mi/ 
50b8(rgyud): 'gyur te/ skar ma gang dang gang la bcas pa de dang de na gda'o// de yang gang zhe na/ de bshad par bgyis/ thub pa chen po gson gcig/ smin drug la ni su btsas pa// de yi gdong gi sor bzhin// g.yas
51a1(rgyud): phyogs na ni sme ba mchis// spu can gnag la mdog kyang dmar// longs spyod bdog cing grags dang ldan// mkhas shing rab tu dpal 'bar te// smin drug la ni skyes pa yi// 
51a2(rgyud): mtshan ma nyid ni de lagaso// gang zhig la ni sor bzhin// sme ba 'di nyid gda' ba de// snar ma la ni skyes pa ste// shes shing rtag tu chos la dga'// mkhas shing longs spyod phun sum tshogs// 
51a3(rgyud): rnam pa kun tu mdzes dang ldan// dpa' zhing rgyal ba phun sum tshogs// dgra rnams rtag par rab tu 'joms// mgul pa yi ni mdzub phyed na// gang la tshig pa 'dra gda' ba// de ni mgo la skyes pa ste// 
51a4(rgyud): dpa' zhing longs spyod ldan pa'o// mdzub kyi phyed po gnyis pa/ la// g.yon la sme ba gang mchis pa// lag la skyes pa khro ba ste// de ni blun zhing longs spyod bdog/ mtshan khung
51a5(rgyud): g.yon na rme nag mchis// nab so la ni skyes pa ste// nor da nga 'bru yang 'byor par 'gyur// de ni shes pa'i rgya ya nga chung // ji ltar khyod ni rgyal la skyes// mtshan mchog
51a6(rgyud): dag ni rab tu gda'// phyag gi zil na 'khor lo ni// nyi ma lta bur rab tu mdzes// dbu skra dag ni thams cad kyang // gyen du g.yas 'khyil legs par mchis// sku ni chu zheng gab pa ste// 'dren pa
51a7(rgyud): khyod kyis nyon mongs thul// tshig 'dra gang gi snying ka mchis// skag la skyes te thab me sred// tshul khrims 'chal cing 'grogs mi bde// de ni g.yem la dga' bo'o// 'og gam brang ngam rgyub
51a8(rgyud): gcig na// gang la byi sran 'dra gda' ba// mchu la skyes te nor dang ldan// btsun zhing chos dang ldan pa'i mi// lte ba'i g.yas g.yon gnyi ga na// gang la rma 'dra gda' ba ni// de ni gre la skyes pa ste// ser
51b1(rgyud): sna che zhing tshe yang thung // lte ba man chad sor bzhin// gang la sme ba rab gda' ba// dbo la de skyes longs spyod can// khrims ldan 'chi 'phos mtho ris mchi// me bzhi la ni skyes pa dag/ sme ba dmar
51b2(rgyud): po chu so gda'// rku zhing g.yo ngan sgyu ma ste// bsod nams chung zhing shes pa zhan// gang gi mtshan na sme ba ni// gda' bar gyur pa nges par yang // nag pa la ni skyes pa ste// 'dod chags rtag tu glu gar
51b3(rgyud): dga'// mtshan gyi 'og gam steng na ni// sme ba ser po rab tu gda'// sa ri la ni de skyes te// mi mkhas brkam zhing mang po sdang // brla gnyis kyis ni mdzub gang na// sme ba dmar po de bzhin to// sa
51b4(rgyud): ga la ste shor ba mchog/ skyes pa bud med rnams kyis bskor/ mkhas shing dpa' la dgra yang thul// rtag tu bde la ga/ nas pa ste// ngo tsha shes shing brtan dang ldan// shi 'phos
51b5(rgyud): nas ni mtho ris mchi// brla gnyis kyi ni mdzub do na// gang la byi srin 'dra gda' ba// lha mtshams la ste tshul khrims can// chos dang longs spyod ldan pa'o// gang gi brla 'og gnyis
51b6(rgyud): na ni/ sme ba gda' ba snron la skyes// mi sdug tshe thung tshul khrims 'chal// dbul zhing snying rje ma mchis so// dbus mo gnyis ka'i gong na ni// gang la rma chung gda' ba de// sbubs las skyes te dbang thang
51b7(rgyud): can / dmyur du bdag khyim zhig par bgyid// chu stod la ni skyes pa dag/ sme ba dbus mo'i lha nga na// sbyin pa bgyid cing chos lam 'tshal// 'chi 'phos na ni mthe ris mchi// chu smad la ni su skyes pa// dku
51b8(rgyud): 'do la ni sleb mchis// de ltar gda' ba shes dang ldan// longs spyod ldan zhing sems can byams// sla ba gnyis po gda' ba ni// glo zhun la ste longs spyod rtag/ de bzhin nad me sems can byams// 
52a1(rgyud): 'bos nas ni mtho sa mchi// sle ba nag po rje nga la// gda' ba mon grwa skyes pa ste// de ni khri zhing 'dod chags chung // longs spyod ma mchis shes rab ldan// rje pa la ni mdzub
52a2(rgyud): don/ sme ba nag po rab tu gda'// mon gre la skyes blun pa ste// de ni chu yis 'chi bar 'gyur// rje ngar 'og gi mdzub gang na// rma 'dra mchis pa khrums spyod la// blun zhing gzhan la gnod pa bgyid// da ni/ 
52a3(rgyud): dbul zhing kun po bgyid// gang la sme ba mdzub gang na// khrums smad la ni skyes pa ste// sbyin dang tshul khrims ldan pa dang // shes rab 'jig med snying rjer ldan// gang gi rkang pa gnyis ka la// sme ba
52a4(rgyud): phra mo gda' ba ni// nam gru skyes pa ma rabs te// 'dreg mkhadan du yang 'gyur ba lags// gang gi mthe bo'i phrag pa yang // sme ba sngon po gda' ba ni// rtag tu stobs ldan nad ma
52a5(rgyud): mchis// tha skar la ni de skyes te// rkang mthil sme ba mchis pa ni// bra nye la ste snying brtse med// gsod ma'i gshed ma'i ngang tshul can// shi 'phos nas ni dmyal bar mchi// gang
52a6(rgyud): gis spyod pa 'tshal ba ni// skar ma'i gnas ni 'di dag lags// 'jig rten na ni rnam shes 'dis// sems can rnams ni pha rol 'dren// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun tu rtog pa'i spyod
52a7(rgyud): yul can// byis pa gang la chags 'dus pa// de ni byis pa'i rmongs pa ste// sems la gnas shing rims nas bcas// khyi dang sbrul dang rus sbal dang // srog chags gzhan yang rnam mang po// skar ma
52a8(rgyud): rgyal la gang skyes pa// de dag bde la sten ma yin// ji ltar bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul dang // thar pa khyod kyis rnyed pa bzhin// nga yang thams cad gzigs pa na// ci phyir nga la khyod mi 'dri// de nas drang srong
52b1(rgyud): skur ma la dga' bas// bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor nas/ yi rab tu dga' ste/ 'di skad ces gsol to// drang srong mi yi gzugs su ni// mtshan mchog rnams kyang shin tu gangal/ 
52b2(rgyud): khyod kyi gdung rus ma 'tshal na// lha 'am 'on te khyod mi lags// gsungs dang dbyangs dag 'byin pa ni// tshangs pa chen po bzhin du ganga'// spyod pa'i gnas dang tshul gyis ni// sngon gyi drang srong rnam
52b3(rgyud): dang 'dra// thub pa ci 'dra phun sum tshogs// 'di sngon ma mthong ma thos na// khyod kyi ston gang de ci smra// khyod kyi gdung rus ci lags gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// pha rol tshu rol mi
52b4(rgyud): shes shing // mtshan ma la ni gang gnas pa// de dag sdug pa sngal kun gyis bcings// de ni thar pa'i sdod ma yin// pha rol phyin drug nga yi rus// bram ze mngon shes drug dang ldan// 
52b5(rgyud): yang dag dga' bya drug smra zhing // dbang po drug ni rnam par gzhig/ chos gsum rtogs pa'i shes dang ldan// nga yi spyod pa rna mthar gsum// byang chub sems ni nam skyes pa// de ni nga ni
52b6(rgyud): rab tu byung // mtshan ma rnams ni ngas ma dmigs// mtshan ma med par rab tu bsgoms// sems can med cing sreg med pa// bdag med stong par mngon sangs rgyas// tshor ba gsum dang 'du byed gsum// 
52b7(rgyud): stong pa nyid du rnam par bsgoms// nga yi ye shes pha rol song // nga yi tshig 'di mtshungs pa med// gang dag mkhas bzhin ma chags par// byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed pa// de dag bzod stobs phun su
52b8(rgyud): tshegs// ye shes 'di 'dra 'thob par 'gyur// chos rnams la ni mi 'jug cing // rnam par smin pa 'dod med la// de bzhin nyid las 'gal mi byed// de dag byang chub rnyed mi dka'// chos rnams la
53a1(rgyud): ni mi gnas shing // pha rol tshu rol mi brten par// yang dag mtha' ni 'dir bsgoms na// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur// mtshan nyid med cing mtshan ma'ang med// dmig
53a2(rgyud): pa dag ni rnam par spangs// chos rnams kun dang ma 'dres na// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur// rang gi mtshan nyid 'dir 'ong la// rang gi sems la the tshom spongs// nam mkha' 'dra bar shes nas su// 
53a3(rgyud): nga 'dra sangs rgyas khyod 'gyur byos// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasu bcad pa de dag gsungs ma thag tu// de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas g.yog dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das sangs
