53a4(rgyud): rgyas kyi gzugs dang / rtags dang / spyod lam du zhugs par/ mthong nas// sngon gyi dge pa'i rtsa ba rnams mngon du gyur/ to// de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas ting nge 'dzin gang thob
53a5(rgyud): na byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo bzhin du 'a dug nas/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la blta shing gzhan la rag las pa med de/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis mi 'phrog
53a6(rgyud): par 'gyur ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rin po che tog ces bya ba thob bo// de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas lag pa gnyis na me tog
53a7(rgyud): thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// yon tan mtha' yas 'jig rten mgon po bden pa gsung ba legs bzhugs pa// khyod kyi ye shes spyan
53a8(rgyud): gyi 'od zer gyis ni 'jig rten kun snang mdzad// rtag tu sems can kun gyi slad du dpa' bo byams pas mngon 'phags pa// sems can snying po chags pas zad pa 'dren pa khyod la deng phyag
53b1(rgyud): 'tshal// gser gyi kha dog gser dang 'dra ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis bsil gyur pa'i// yon tan dag gis sems can thams cad byang chub rgyur 'gyur rab tu bskul// khyod kyis chos kyi 'khor
53b2(rgyud): 'khor lo rab bskor nyon mongs ri rnams bcom par gyur// tha ma'i spyod pa byang chub shes pa'i rgyu de ri mthar phyin to// sman pa chen pos sems can snying po mtshan rnams kyis ni rab brgyan pa// son
53b3(rgyud): snying po sangs rgyas 'gyur ba'i 'dren pa de ring bshad du gsol// bdag gis lta ba'i rgya mo bcad cing grol nas 'gro ba bsgral bar bgyi// ji srid kyis ni sangs rgyas 'gyur ba'i mi'i dam pra lung bstan
53b4(rgyud): gsol// sdug bsngal chu bos bdas pa'i sems can srid pa'i mtshe las bsgral par bgyi// mya ngan 'das pa'i bde ba dezag pa med pa'i lam la dgod par bgyi// phyogs bcu dag na
53b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas gang rnams yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu dag/ de dag pa dag gis dbang du gsol te byang chub tu ni sems gzhol bgyi// drag cing mi bzang rtsub pa'i sdug bsngal dag gis reg pa'i
53b6(rgyud): sems can kun// dus gsum gyi ni bdag gis lus dang ngag dang yid kyi bsod nams des// sems can thams cad sdug bsngal de ring zhi bar gyur cig sems can kun// sangs rgyas kyis ni bde dang
53b7(rgyud): ldan zhing rtag tu mya ngan 'da' bar shog/ sems can thams cad nad zhir gyur cig nyon mongs chu yang bskams par shog/ ngo bo 'od kyis ye shes dbang po snying po ldan pa thob gyur cig/ sems can gang
53b8(rgyud): dag gas dpar chad cing sdug bsngal dag gis gtses pa rnams// de dag bdag gi bsod nams gzi nga dag gi myur du bar bar shog/ sems can des kyang ni yon tan rgya mchi thams pad pong cu tshig/ 
54a1(rgyud): shes rab bsod nams tshad med pa dang bde ba kun gyis tshim par shog/ de dag sdig pa rnams spangs lta ba mnyam pa nyid du sten gyur cig/ sems can thams cad skye ba dran zhing chos la
54a2(rgyud): spyod pa nyid du shog/ sems can de kun chos grub srid pa'i rgya mtsho pha rol rgal gyur cig/ thams cad chos kyis pha rol phyin pa sangs rgyas su yang grub par shog/ bskal pa dpag tu med par chos
54a3(rgyud): kyi char yang 'bebs shing 'dug gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi sprin gyi char chus legs par 'khru bar shog/ bdag gis lus dang ngag dang yid kyis nongs pa cung zad ci bgyis pa// sangs
54a4(rgyud): rgyas thams cad dbang du gsol te gus par bgyis nas so so// dar bshags// bdag kyang phyin chad sdig la lta ba'i la/ sa rnams spyod par ma gyur cig/ rtag tu mdun na bsam
54a5(rgyud): gyis mi khyab gang zag mchog bzhugs mthong bal shog/ bdag gi bsod nams cung zad ci mchis deng nas byang chub bsngo bar bgyi// sems can tshad du spyod pa kun dang sdug
54a6(rgyud): bsngal thams cad spro bar bgyi// sems can thams cad byang chub mchog gi lam du rab tu gzungs par bgyi// bskal par zhing dang ye shes sems can rgya mtsho rnam par sbyang bar bgyi// gang du
54a7(rgyud): byang chub reg 'gyur zhing yang rnam par dag pa thob par bgyi// 'khor kun rnam par dag cing bzod pa'i sa la rab tu gnas par shog/ smra ba'i seng+ge nges par mngon par shes pa lnga rnams thob par
54a8(rgyud): shog/ 'dren pa chags med ye shes ldan zhing thams cad gzigs pas lung bstan gsol// 'jig rten du yang sangs rgyas chos kun kha lo bsgyur bar 'gyur zhe na/ me tog sil ma gtor ba
54b1(rgyud): nam mkha' la ni gdug su gnas par shog/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin mi rnams lhags pa kun kyang dbang gyis shig/ sa rnams g.yo bar byed cing khyod kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal shog/ de nas drang
54b2(rgyud): srong skar ma la dga' bas me tog de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de'i steng log su gtor ba dang // me tog de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng gdugs gcig tu gyur nas 'dug ste/ drang srong
54b3(rgyud): skar ma la dga' bas de mthong nas rab tu zang zing med cing mchog tu dga' ba dang / yid bde bas tshim pa skyes par gyur te/ de nas dbus mo'i lha nga gnyis ka sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
54b4(rgyud): la gtug so// drang srong chen po skar ma la dga' bas bcom ldan da 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs ma thag tu/ de nas tha/ dmas cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
54b5(rgyud): khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa gang dag der lha gas pa de dag thams cad kyang / yid mi skyo zhing ltad mor gyur to// 
54b6(rgyud): gang dag glang po ches 'dul ba'i sems can de dag gis ni// bde bar gshegs pa glang po che'i gzugs su mthong nas yid dga' bar gyur cing / drang srong chen po skar ma la dga' ba me tog gtor
54b7(rgyud): pa de dag steng gi bar snang las gdug su gyur te/ gnas dang / sa g.yos pa de yang mthong nas rab tu ngo mtshar du gyur te// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs so// gang dag yang sangs
54b8(rgyud): rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis ni// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin las
55a1(rgyud): bzhengs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'dul ba'i sems can de dag gis ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs par mthong nas/ zang zing med cing mchog tu dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'dra/ 
55a2(rgyud): la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug pa dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / na bza' dang / byang 'phrul dang / rgyan ji snyed pa de dag gis gtor to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di
55a3(rgyud): dag bka' stsal to// drang srong chen po myur du longs la nyon// byang chub lung bstan zhes ni 'dran pa gsungs// mnyam pa med pa'i mthus ni sa g.yos shing // nam mkha' la yang me tog gdugs cig/ 
55a4(rgyud): 'dug/ khyed ni 'jig rten phan phyir ston dbang po// rkang dganyis dag gi gtso bo sangs rgyas su// bsod nams mtha' yas na mkha' tshad mnyam pa// khams gsum snying
55a5(rgyud): por 'gro ba'i sgron mar 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dang / 'a sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' bas// bcom/ ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang du bdag chos kyi
55a6(rgyud): 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ci 'dra bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod ni bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med pa na/ byang phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing me tog rgyas
55a7(rgyud): pa'i dri zhes bya ba 'byung te// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni ji ltar da ltar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can bzhin du bkod pa de lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes bu dam pa khyod bla na med pa yang
55a8(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ 
55b1(rgyud): bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdul med spos snang skar ma'i dpal zhes bya bar gyur
55b2(rgyud): te/ khyod kyi tshe tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa bcu thub par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas med cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ba' shig gi gnas su gyur/ 
55b3(rgyud): te/ khyod kyang de na theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' shig ston par 'gyur ro// 'khor ji snyed lhags pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' ba'i lung bstan pa de mthong
55b4(rgyud): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed pa la btso na par gyur to// bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyis/ 
55b5(rgyud): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bsgre/  par gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sem sa dpa'i ting 'dzin byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa zhes bya ba
55b6(rgyud): thob bo// 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las drang srong skar ma la dga' ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas bdud bye ba dag 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar grong khyer
55b7(rgyud): 'di'i phyi rol lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dag gis brgyan pa de bzhin du/ bdag cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das grong khyer 'di'i sgo gang nas gshegs pa'i sgo de'i sa phyogs bkod pa'i rgyan dam pa khyad
55b8(rgyud): par du 'phags pas rgyan to snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis bdud bye ba de dag gi sems kyi kun tu rtog pa mkhyen nas/ 'di 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad
56a1(rgyud): de ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ grong khyer gyi sgo bcu gnyis su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bcu gnyis grong khyer gyi sgo re re nas/ rgyal
56a2(rgyud): po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gsheg so// bdud bye ba de dag kyang nam mkha' la gnas bzhin du/ bdud kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul grangs med
56a3(rgyud): pa dang ldan pa/ bkod pa'i mchog rnams dang bkod pa mdzes pa rnams kyis grong khyer gyi sgo de dag dang / sa'i phyogs de dag dang / rtsig pa de dag dang / shing de dag dang / sa'i ngos de dag
56a4(rgyud): rgyan to// bdud bye ba de dag dang / bdud kyi 'khor de dag la la/ dag ni/ tshangs pa'i cha byad lta bu nas/ drang srong chen po'i// cha byad lta bu'i bar du bsgyur te/ nam mkha' la gnas bzhin du
56a5(rgyud): khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi skar khung dang / rta babs dang / be gam dang / skye shing gi nang na me tog dang / spos dang / bdug pa dang / phreng ba dang / gser dang / dngul dang / nor bu dang / 
56a6(rgyud): mu tig sna tshogs kyis spras pa dang / gos dang / ras dang / ras bcos bu sna tshogs dang / lhab lhub kyi rgyan rnams kyi char ni rab tu phab/ sil snyan dang / grol ba sna tshogs ni dkrol nas/ bstod pa dang / 
56a7(rgyud): yon tan bsngags pa sna tshogs kyi dbyangs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mched pa byed do// bcom ldan 'a de ltar ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba chen po sngon ma thos pa'i bkod pa mchog tu rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags
56a8(rgyud): pas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo na bzhugs te/ zhabs g.yas pa'i mthe bos ske'i them pa la reg par mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo'i them pa de la reg ma thag tu de nas de'i me
56b1(rgyud): yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu g.yos so// gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 
56b2(rgyud): nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dag dang / 
56b3(rgyud): sa dang / chu dang / rgya mtsho chen po dang / grong khyer dang / yul 'khor gyi lha dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / lha'i drang srong chen po'i 'khor dang / 'og min gyi bar nas bzung ste/ 
56b4(rgyud): sems can gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba de dag thadas g.yos par snang ba des bskul ma thag tu rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po kho ro khor yug tu bskor nas/ sa dang na mkha' la
56b5(rgyud): gnas shing / me tog dang / spos dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i phyi ma'i bar gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gtor to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis me tog dang / phye ma'i bar
56b6(rgyud): de dag phyogs bcu'i phyogs kyi cha re re na yang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / yongasu ma dag pa dang / stong pa dang / mi stong pa rnams su
56b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas la mchod cing bsti stang bya ba'i phyir na mkha' la gtor ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu me tog dang / phye ma dang / rgyan de dag las tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo // myur du sad par
56b8(rgyud): gyis la 'di dag bltos// byang chub phyir ni bag yod spyad pa spyod// khyod kyis 'khor ba'i gcong rong 'khyams pa yi// 'jig rten thams cad dag ni bsgral bar byos// yongs su smin dang ldan pa'i dus bab
57a1(rgyud): gyis// g.yeng bar gyur pa rab tu myur zed la// 'dir ni sngon gyis dum bcas yid la byos// byang chub lung bstan rab tu thob par 'gyur// thub dbang drang srong chen po mya ngan
57a2(rgyud): med// 'gro la phan phyir de ring grong khyer gshegs// bdud stong bye ba rang gis pham mdzad de// de ni chos kyi 'khor lo myur du bskor// grogs po zhi ba 'di la 'gro dga' mdzad// dpa' mchog dngos
57a3(rgyud): po yang dag ston pa mdzad// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal dag las thar mdzad nas// byang chub du ni de ring lung yang ston// rang byung mya ngan med pa'i grong khyer gshegs// de phyir zhing der rab tu myur gshegs
57a4(rgyud): la// de ltar mdzes pa de dag rab ltos te// rim gyis byung chub du yang 'gyur bar byos// yang de'i tshe 'od ma'i dal na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan
57a5(rgyud): thos dang / nyan thos chen po gang dag nang du yang dag 'jog la gnas pa de dag gis ston pa de la bltas pa dang / ba com ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo na
57a6(rgyud): 'dul ba la gzhes shing 'dug pa mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dang / nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su 'khod pa dang / 
57a7(rgyud): bkod pa chen po de dag kyang mthong ngo // de nas me tog dang / bye ma'i rgyan de dag las tshig su bcad pa'i sgra gang byung ba de dag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / yongasu ma
57a8(rgyud): dag pa dang / stong pa dang / mi stong pas sa kyi zhing gi rdul dral kyi rdul snyed thams cad du gang bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos chen po
57b1(rgyud): gang dag gnas pa de dag gis sgra de bos na 'di snyam du sems te/ yid du 'ong ba 'di lta bu/ ro myang bar 'os pa 'di lta bu/ dag bar bya bar 'os pa 'di lta bu/ tshim par byed pa 'di lta bu// spob byed pa
57b2(rgyud): 'di lta bu/ yed+han chen po brjod par 'os pa 'di lta bu'i sgra 'di dang / me tog dang / bye ma'i char 'di yang ga las 'ongs snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan
57b3(rgyud): thos chen po de dag rang gi dge ba'i phyogs btang ste/ ngo mtshar cher 'dzin par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rgyun dang / lhab lhub kyi rgyu 'thun
57b4(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi rgyan dang / lhab lhub kyi rgyu 'thu na pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ 
57b5(rgyud): de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi ma nga 'di dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bkod pa chen po 'di lta bu snang ste/ 'di lta ste/ ma 'ongs par
57b6(rgyud): dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag cing / rdul bsags pa med ces bya bar yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon+dan bkod pa 'di 'dra ba dang ldan par
57b7(rgyud): 'gyur/ rtsig pa med la legs par rgyan pa'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad du yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa
57b8(rgyud): de rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo nas shin tu lham ma/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs par snang ba ni ma gtogs so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan
58a1(rgyud): thos chen po de dag sgra thos pa des bskul ba dang / phyogs bzhir blta zhing 'khod de/ de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di ha cang yang mi ring ba na 'dug par mthong
58a2(rgyud): po/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi lha'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan de dag thams cad kyang mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ 
58a3(rgyud): bdag cag kyang 'dus pa chen po'i bkod pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de dag blta ba dang brtag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la yang blta ba dang / phyag bya ba
58a4(rgyud): dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir der 'dong ngo // der ni bdag cag bla dran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa yang thob par 'gyur gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas phyogs
58a5(rgyud): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi/ rdul snyed thams cad kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sem/ sa dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos chen po de dag de
58a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas mi snang bar gyur te/ skad cig thang cig yud tsame de nyid la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin to// de'i tshe
58a7(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed rnams kyang 'dir lhags nas/ sangs rgyas kyi
58a8(rgyud): zhing 'di thams cad sa dang na mkha'i bar ma lus par gang bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs kyis rgyu 'thun pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i
58b1(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la dag gis ni/ bcom ldan 'das la
58b2(rgyud): mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad me tog sna tshogs kyi char gyis khebs par byas so// la la dag gi ni mu tig gi char phab pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod
58b3(rgyud): pa bya ba'i phyir/ la la dag gis ni gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUr+ya dang / shel dang / rde'o snying po dang / sdug dang / gor shi sha dang / tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po dang / shing ta ma la'i lo ma'i char gyis na mkha'
58b4(rgyud): khebs par byas so// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ dal la ngag gis ni lhab lhub dang / phyang phrul dang / rgyan dang / ras dang / ras bcos ma sna tshogs kyi char rab tu phab bo// 
58b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ la la ngag gis ni/ rin po che'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshe/ gas sgreng ngo // bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ 
58b6(rgyud): la la dag gis ni spos sna tshogs kyis gdug so// la la dag gis ni rin po che'i phreng ba sna tshogs gtor to// la la dag gis ni sil snyan dang grol ba sna tshogs grol lo// la la dag gis ni glu dang gar
58b7(rgyud): dang rol mo'i sgra rab tu bstan to// la la dag gis ni sa phyogs der spos chu sna tshogs kyi char gyis chag chag btab bo// la la dag gis ni rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod rnams rin po che sna tshogs kyis bkang ste/ 
58b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thogs so// la la dag gis ni rin po che'i snod sna tshogs rnams spos chus bkang ste/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo mas rgyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thogs so// la
59a1(rgyud): la dag gis ni rin po che'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs lha'i gos dang / rgyan dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis brgyan nas/ 'phang stod de thogs so// la la dag gis ni bdag nyid tshangs
59a2(rgyud): pa chen po'i cha byad du mngon par sprul te/ thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te/ 'khod pa nas rgya cher ji ltar gong du smos pa bzhin no// la la dag gis ni sang+gang+ge'i cha byad du mngon par sprul te/ 
59a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'khod do// bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu dang / rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pas sems can de dag phan tshun mig gi dbang pos gzugs snang ba rnam
59a4(rgyud): la thag thogs med do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang de lta dbu'i bdud kyi yul chen po la rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis/ dbarlabs rnams dang / rang gi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / 
59a5(rgyud): yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po/ dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi yul gyi rnam
59a6(rgyud): par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs nas/ srang gi dbus na pad+ma yod pa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ phyag g.yas pa'i
59a7(rgyud): mthil gyis pad+ma'i snying po la reg par mdzad de drangs nas bzhugs so// pad+ma de drangs te g.yos pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i ri khor yug dang / ri'i khor yug chen po dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / rgya
59a8(rgyud): mtsho chen po dang / bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang g.yos so// bdud kyi gnas thams cad na gzhal med khang dang / gnas khang dang lam dang / stan rnams kyang rab tu g.yos so// de nas gang bdud kyi bu
59b1(rgyud): rnams dang / bdud kyi bu mo rnams dang / bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor gnas pa de dag kyang 'jigs skrag cing skyo ba skyes nas phan tshun 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rgyu med rkyen med par ni gzhal med khang 'di
59b2(rgyud): dag g.yo bar mi 'gyur na/ bdag cag gi rgyal po bdud de rang gi yul nas 'phos par ma gyur grang / bdag cag kyang khang pa 'di nas 'chi 'pho ba'i tshes 'byung bar mi 'gyur grang / bdag cag gis blta
59b3(rgyud): gor ma chag snyam ste/ de nas de dag gis mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ni snyigs ma lnga can du gyur na/ 'di sus legs par rgyan cing / shin tu nyams dga' bar byas snyam mo// 
59b4(rgyud): de nas rang gi yul na gnas pa'i bdud g.yog dang bcas pa de dag de na 'khor bzhin tu yang de bzhin gshegs pa shwa kya thub pa de skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi
59b5(rgyud): legs par rgyan cing shin tu lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhug sa pa mthong ngo // thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi ste dra chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / sangs rgyas kyi
59b6(rgyud): zhing 'di thams cad kyang sems can gzugs dang / kha dog dang / rtag dang / dbyibs sna tshogs su gnas pa sha stag gis yong su gang nas/ sems can gcig kyang ngo mi shes te/ sems can de dag
59b7(rgyud): thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir mngon par brtson par mthong ngo // de nas de dag yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / 
59b8(rgyud): phyag bya ba dang / da ltar bdag cag jo bo dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gar dong ba yang dri ba'i phyir der 'dong gor ma chags snyam mo// de nas yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i bdud bye ba phrag brgya po de dag thams cad
60a1(rgyud): g.yog dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste/ lhags nas spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas bdud sdig can gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log
60a2(rgyud): su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to// rab tu rnam pa dang sems kyis// bcom ldan padag ni skyabasu mchi// bdag khrol 'di nas myur du mchi// chos ni yang dag spyang par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis
60a3(rgyud): bka' stsal pa// 'gro ba dang ni 'ong ba yang // ngas ni su yang bzlog pa med// gal te lam ni rab shes na// gang du dga' bar 'gro bar byos// bdud sdig can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// rang gi spyod yul gar
60a4(rgyud): dga' bar// gang tsha bdag ni mchi 'tshal tshe// bdag ni bcing ba lnga dag gis// bcings pa mthong ngo go'u ta ma// bcom ldan 'dras kyis bka' stsal pa// nga ni rtog pa kun spangs te// grol nas 'gro
60a5(rgyud): bgrol byed pa// ngas ni 'tshe ba rnam spangs nas// sems can/ bcings pa thar bar bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sa/ ngas rgyas kyi spyan gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad sa dang / 
60a6(rgyud): na mkha' la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyis yongasu gang ba la gzigs nas/ tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'dir lhags pa dag thams cad kyang // the tsom thams cad rab spongs la// 
60a7(rgyud): skad cig ci yang ma smra bar// khyed cag rnams ni de nyon cig/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten dkon// chos dang dge 'dun shin tu dkon// dad cing mos pa 'byor pa dang // byang chub spyod pa shin tu dkon// 'jig
60a8(rgyud): rten mngon po'i mngon sum du// chos nyan pa yang shin tu dkon// gang du bzod pa bstan byed pa// de'i dus ni snyed par dka'// gang du 'jig rten sdig pa yi// rtog pa thams cad rab spong ba// stong pa nyid ni sgom pa
60b1(rgyud): dang // sems ni dul bar byed pa dkon// ji ltar ngas sngon spyad pa yi// byang chub spyod pa snyed par dka'// de las me tog tsam mchod 'di// khyed cag rnams la bshad par bya// gang gis byang chub
60b2(rgyud): 'byor byed pa// sred pa'i bcings las rnam grol zhing // mun pa'i phung po sel ba yi// lam gyi mchog ni bstan par bya// dri ma ngan pa gsum spongs la// ston pas gsung 'dir nyon cig/ chu bo rnams ni
60b3(rgyud): pha rol rgol// rgya mo can gyi sred pa spongs// rnam thar gsum la rab gnas shing // sdom pa gsum la yang dag gnod// khams gsum gyis ni nyon mongs gang // de dag ma lus rnam par chom// 
60b4(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mchod dang // chos kyi don du khyed cag rnams// sangs rgyas lha dang bdud gsum gyi// dbyin rlabs sprul pas lhags pa rnams// dus gsum ma rig
60b5(rgyud): bsgribs pa'i sems// bye brag tu ni rab spongs la// kham sa gsum pa las grol ba yi// zhi byed bzod pa thob par/ byos// phyin ci log ni rnam bzhi yis// so so'i skye bo bslad pa
60b6(rgyud): rnams// dngos po med la rtog byed pa// de dag bzed de snod ma yin// mig ni gzugs la chags pa yis// lus dang ngag dang sems bsgrib nas// bsam gtan bzhi dang bral ba rnams// 'khor ba shin tu rten
60b7(rgyud): par gyur// 'jig rten na ni gang mkhas gsal// bsam gtan sgom par byed pa rnams// de dag phyin ci log bzhi las// de ring rnam par grol bar 'gyur// dbang phyug de dag sems can rnams// chu bo bzhi
60b8(rgyud): las thar bar byed// 'chi 'pho skye bar rab shes pa// nges pa rnams ni pha rol 'gro// byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pa// rkang pa bzhi dang ldan pa dag/ sems can srid pas bcings pa rnams// yang
61a1(rgyud): dag shes pas gcod par byed// phung po lnga rnams yongs shes pa// zhags pa las grol zug pa med// yang dang yang du mi skye ste/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan
61a2(rgyud): sngar khyed// sdig pa dag ni myur du shogs// sdig pa ma lus rab spongs la// 'jigs pa med par pha rol song // srid par yang dang yang skyes pa// sdig pa'i grogs kyi dbang song bas// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal/ 
61a3(rgyud): de dag ni// 'dus byas la yang myong bar 'gyur// sdig pa'i grogs po rab spangs te// sdig pa'i lta ba rnam bor nas// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dran byas te// dam pa'i chos la rab sbyor cig/ btung ba'i dam pa
61a4(rgyud): btung bar byos// stong pa nyid kyang rabs skem shig/ dam pa'i dadon la dngos po med// rdzas kyang med cing mtshan nyid med// 'di ltar dbang po drug stong ste// byed pa po ni 'di la med// de bzhin mtshan/ 
61a5(rgyud): mar rtogs pa yang // dngos po tsam ste g.yo ba med// tsher ba drug dang sred pa drug/ reg pa drug las byung ba yin// de bzhi na reg pa'i skye mched drug/ stong pa yin par shes par byos// rang
61a6(rgyud): bzhin gyis ni dngos med par// dngos po nyid la brtag par byos// skye ba med cing 'gag med pas// 'di na rdzas kyang med pa ltos// gang gis chos kun tshul gcig ste// dus gsum du yang dngos med par// shwe
61a7(rgyud): pa de dag nad med de// de ni bla na med pa'i lam// rnam pa bcu gsum nges grol la// sems can 'du shes rnam 'jig cing // tshu rol pha rol rnam grol ba// de ni bzod pa sgom pa yin// de nas gang gi tshe/ bcom
61a8(rgyud): 'das kyi bsod nams kyi stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa'i shugs dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu 'thun pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgra thogs pa med pas tshig su bcad pa de dag gsungs pa
61b1(rgyud): de'i mod la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams stong pa dang / mi stong pa sdigs ma lnga can gang+gA'i klung dpag tu med pa mi 'khrugs pa'i bye ma snyed rnams dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa 'di dag grags par
61b2(rgyud): gyur nas/ de'i mod la sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re nas kyang / sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya steng grangs med dpag tu med pa dag ni shin tu zang zing med pa'i dga' ba dang / dad pa rnyed de/ bla na med pa yang dag
61b3(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/ la la dag gis ni ting nge 'dzin dang / bzod pa dang / gzungs sna tshogs tho bo// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'dus pa'i sems can grangs med dpag tu
61b4(rgyud): med pa rnams kyis ni// don dang tshig dang yi ge 'di dag thos de nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par gyur to// sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag ni/ theg pa gsum po dag gis nges
61b5(rgyud): par byung ba thob par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' bas pad+ma'i khri la 'dze/ ga par bya ba'i phyir/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus rin po che sna bdun gyi
61b6(rgyud): them skas me tog gis kun tu g.yogs pa mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar bas btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to// thams cad mkhyen pa rga shi mya ngan gyi// 'dam du bying / 
61b7(rgyud): ba'i 'jig rten thams cad la// rab tu gzigs te mi rgyu rgyur bcas kyi// 'jig rten du ni chos kyi zam pa thogs// thal mo sbyar ba sems can rgya chen rgyas// rab tu bltams pa'i zhing la gzigs nas su// ches
61b8(rgyud): kyi mchod sbyin rab tu bgo bar gsol// rang gi mthu rtsal rnam par stan du gsol// mtshungs pa med pa pad+ma mngon 'dzegs te// mgon po shes rab can gyi thabs rnams kyis// spos chu sprin gyi char rab bob la// nyon
62a1(rgyud): mongs gzir ba'i mi la bstan du gsol// phyogs bcu dag gi sangs rgyas thams cad dang // drang srong chen po shes rab ldan pa gzhan// khyod kyi dbang du de dag kun bzhugs kyis// thub
62a2(rgyud): pa'i dbang po bdud rnam pham par mdzod// chos rnams stong pa na mkha' lta bu dang // ngo bo nyid kyis ya ma rlar mkhyen nas// sngon gyi dam bcas rnams ni dgongs mdzod la// bla med 'khor lo dam pa bskor
62a3(rgyud): du gsol// chu bo bzhi dbus 'khod pa'i sems can rnams// mi yi seng+ges de ring bsgral du gsol// khyod kyi chos rnams shin tu thugasu chud // srid gsum mtsho las 'jig rten bsgral du gsol// shin
62a4(rgyud): turlabs chen thugs mnga' bcom ldan 'das// bde bar gshegs kyi lam ni bde ba la// 'gro ba gzung mdzod mtshungs med chos kyang ston// 'jig rten nyes pa'i dri ma gsal du gsol/ 
62a5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bur sprul pa'i them skas de las pad+ma'i khri la mngon par 'dzegs te/ pad+ma'i snying po la ba zhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu thams
62a6(rgyud): cad du rnam par gzigs nas bdud sdig can la bka' stsal pa/ sdig can ji ltar khyod kyi rkyen gyis deng 'dir 'dus pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs bzhad pas// sems can grangs med dpag tu med
62a7(rgyud): pa dag mangs na gnas pa dang / rga shis gtse ba rnams las rnam grol bar 'gyur/ rnam par thar par 'gyur/ chu bo bzhi las yang dag par rgal bar 'gyur/ zhi ba'i lam la gnas par 'gyur/ na mkha'
62a8(rgyud): dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes khong du chud par 'gyur te/ 'di la sdig can khyod ni sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel ba'i thog mar 'gro ba yin gyi khyod dga' bar gyis shig/ sdig can khyod/ 
62b1(rgyud): kyis nga la chos bshad par gsol cig dang / ngas deng bdud kyi dkyil 'khor mthon po'i yul gyi chu bo'i pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyi chos bstan to// de nas bdud sdig can gyis de'i tshe tshigasu bcad
62b2(rgyud): pa 'di smras so// ji ste sdig med khyod la thab zhe sdang rgyags med na// ci phyir deng 'dir kun tu skrag par bya ba'i phyir chos kyang ston// de ste khyod la tha brgyags dang nga rgyal yod na ni// thub dbang khyod
62b3(rgyud): kyi thar pa ci 'dra bdag la 'dir shed cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga ni ma la mngal gyi gnas na rtswa bcu gnas pa// de na yang ni bdud khyod nga la bsad par rab tu sbyar// de tshe nga la kho na dang
62b4(rgyud): zab cung zad tsam yang med// nga ni bzod dang ldan te tha ba ma lus med pa yin// nga ni bcas ma thag 'di khyod kyis yang ga yo bar byas// nga bsad phyir ni rde ba'i char pa rab tu dbab
62b5(rgyud): par byas// de na khyod kyis nga yi ma'i nu zho myur bskams byas// khyod/ kyis nga la gnod pa du ma ci ma byas// nga ni bsam gtan zhugs na khyod kyis bud med khrid de 'ongs// nga ni bsod
62b6(rgyud): snyoms rnam par spyod tshe zad kyang bcad pa byas// khyod kyis de tshe nga la rgyal srid mngon par rab tu bstabs// nga ni byung ba'i nub mo 'dir yang mun pa byas par gyur// de tshe khyod dang skyes bu rnams kyis grong
62b7(rgyud): khyer kun tu bskoraro// rdzu 'phrul gyis ni song ste rdzi char drag po phab// sa ni 'dom do 'phang tsam rdo ba dag grig par byas// zhi ba'i gnas na gnas pa'i tshe yang sgra ni rab tu chung // nga ni shin tu dka
62b8(rgyud): ba spyod tshe grang ba'i rlung da // 'bab chu 'gram na gnas tshe khyod kyis chu bo rab tu btang // nga ni bsad par bya phyir khyod kyis seng ge rab tu btang // de tshe khyod kyis nga yi zas la drag po'i dug kyang btab// nga ni
63a1(rgyud): byang chub shing drung nye bar yang dag song ba na// rdo rje dang ni gnam lcags spu gri mang 'char khyod kyi phab// 'grol phan phyir rdo rje'i gdun la mngon par gnas pa na/ 
63a2(rgyud): khyod kyis ngur smig gos kyang 'jim lnga ba dag gis rab tu bskus// de na yang ni ngagan khyod kyis bu mo rnams bkye ste// nga bsang phyir ni khyod nyid mthu dang bcas te 'od mod kyi// 'on kyang khyod
63a3(rgyud): kyis nga yi yid la gnod byas cung zad med// ngas ni khyod btul nas ni byang chub mtshungs pa med pa thob// 'on kyang ngo tsha bor te 'dir 'ongs nas ni yang smra 'am// sdig pa'i tshul gyis 'od
63a4(rgyud): srung mchog la sogs po bzlog byas te// khyod kyis sem das can bye ba du ma ma rung byas nas kyang // snying rje bor da te 'dir 'ong ngu la rgol zhing rgyu byed dam// nga ni zan ma zos
63a5(rgyud): po'i tshe yang khyod kyis su// nga bsad phyir ni glang chen mo sa pa drag shul can yang btang // sa stang nga la lha byin gyis ni rdo ba 'phangs pa dang // kye ma ngas ni zla ba
63a6(rgyud): gsum du rta chas zos pa dang // phyar ka btang phyir bu mo mdzes ldan rab tu gang btang dang // me mdag 'bar ba mi bzad pas ni 'obs rnams bkang ba dang // kha zas dag ni myur du
63a7(rgyud): gdug pa'i dug dang sbyar ba yi// de la sdig pa'i las can khyod ni rtsa bar nges pa yin// khyod nyid dpung bcas bu dang lhan cig sngar bcas 'ongs nas su// nga bsad phyir ni mda' bo che
63a8(rgyud): dang ral gri mda' mdo thogs// 'on kyang 'dir ni khyod kyis nga yi spu gcig ma g.yos na// ci phyir khyod ni rgyags par gyur nas 'di na da dung 'dug/ ji ste bdud ni stong phrag bye ba rgol du
63b1(rgyud): yang bcud kyang // sems can khrag khrig dag ni 'di ru yang dag lhags nas su// zhing kun rab tu gang bar 'dug pa nga yi dbang yin te// nga ni khyod phyir mchog tu byan par yid kyis
63b2(rgyud): gnas par bya// nga ni snying rje gnas te 'gro ba rjes su 'dzin byed pa// khyod ni shin tu gtum po nga la rtag tu gegs byed de// thub pa'i dbang po khyu mchog 'di dag nga yi dbang yin gyis// 
63b3(rgyud): da ltar tha ma'i dus la nga ni sangs rgyas mdzad pa bya// rnam thar sems kyis sems can rnams kyi don kyang spyad par bya// smras par gyur pa'ang bzod pa yongs su btang bar mi bya'o// 
63b4(rgyud): la phrag dog tha ba rab tu khro ba'i yid med de// khyod ni rjes su gzung phyir nga nyid rtag tu mngon par brtson// nga/ la gsol dang khyod nyid zhi phyir 'jig rten gsum dag tu/ 
63b5(rgyud): mchog tu zhi bar byed pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi bshad par bya// de phyir khyod kyi sdig pa'i las rnams med par rab 'a gyur gyis// 'jig rten mgon po nga la yid ni myur du dang
63b6(rgyud): phyos khyod ni ga dung di na gnod par byab ba sems kyang/ khyed grol byir ni sdigag tu byams pas rab tu dang // sdig pa'i blo gros 'or la dang bcas yid la byos shig dang // ring por mi thogs khyod ni byang chub du yang lung bstan
63b7(rgyud): de nas bdud sdig can bcom ldan 'das la khros te/ 'khrugs shing rngams nas/ de nas slar 'gro bar 'dod pa dang / bdag gi mgul pa bachim pa ldas bcings pa snyam du shes te/ 'jigs skrag pa'i sgra
63b8(rgyud): dbyung ba 'dod kyang de ma nus na/ bcom ldan 'das dkrongs pa'i phyir/ rang khros pa'i mthus shin tu che ba'i dbugs btang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dbugs de shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i me tog du
64a1(rgyud): mngon par sprul te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes te chos kyang ston pa de dag thams cad kyi dbu'i
64a2(rgyud): gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i gdugs su byin gyis brlabs so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'khod
64a3(rgyud): pa de dag gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la gsol pa/ me tog gi gdugs 'di dag ga las mchis// su'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lags/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub
64a4(rgyud): sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ri dgas kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
64a5(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de rab tu nyon mong sa pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du/ sngon gyi smon lam gyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
64a6(rgyud): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos ston de/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ltar bdud kyi yul gyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa/ stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs
64a7(rgyud): rgyas kyi yul thams cad mthon por byed pa sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i rgyud thams cad dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi sgron ma ring du gnas par byed pa/ dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad rnam par 'phel
64a8(rgyud): ba'i brtson 'grus kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs byed pa dang / dgra dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar gcod par byed pa/ ngo ma mtsher ba dang / bkra mi shis pa dang / rtsod pa dang / rmi
64b1(rgyud): lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / mu ge dang / 'jigs pa'i tshegs dang / 'thab pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / 'ching ba dang / thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus ma yin par
64b2(rgyud): tsha zhing grang ba dang / rlung dang / tsha ba dang / nad dang / sgra mi snyan pa de thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad 'dun par byed pa
64b3(rgyud): rgyal rigs thams cad 'dun par byed cing 'gugs pa/ rigs bzhi thams cad chos kyi don la 'jud pa/ shes rab kyi sgron ma rab tu 'bar bar byed pa/ lam drang por rab tu ston pa/ khyim dang / grong
64b4(rgyud): dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul dang / pho brang 'khor dang / yul 'khor thams cad 'dun par byed pa/ gza' dang / rgyu skar dang nyin par dang / mtshan
64b5(rgyud): mo dang / zla ba gcig dang / zla ba byed dang / dus dang / lo// thams cad 'dun par byed pa/ lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bru dang / sman thams cad grub par
64b6(rgyud): byed pa/ bzo dang / las kyi mtha' dang / gnas dang / byin gyis brlabs dang / dgos pa thams cad grub par byed pa/ lus dang / ngag dang yid kyi nyes pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ rig
64b7(rgyud): pa dang dran pa dang / blo gros dang / mos pa dang / dpa' ba dang / brtan pa dang / bzod pa dang / spobs pa rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i smang bas rab tu sad par byed
64b8(rgyud): pa/ 'phags pa'i rigs bzhis chos kyi tshul gyis byin gyis rlob pa/ theg pa chen po ston par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ sems can chen po rnams dbug 'byin pa/ 
65a1(rgyud): phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rdo rje lta bu'i sems byin gyis rlob pa/ sa bcul yang dag par 'jug pa byed pa/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa khong du chud par byed pa dang / dbang bskur ba'i
65a2(rgyud): chos dang / byang chub la gzhol bar byed pa/ gdul ba'i sems can rnams rjes su 'dzin pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen pos khyab par byed pa dang / pha rol
65a3(rgyud): tu phyin pa la mdzud pa/ bla na med pa'i lam la yang dag par 'jog par byed pa/ chos kyi char rab tu 'bebs pa/ chos kyi ros sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bkod pa mtha' dag
65a4(rgyud): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa// bdud bzhi'i yul las rab tu thar par byed pa/ phung po'i lcags ma med pa'i mya ngan las nya dras pa'i dbyings su 'jog par byed pa/ chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta
65a5(rgyud): bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung ba/ snyan pa 'chad par bzhed de// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs
65a6(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu'i brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab
65a7(rgyud): tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gsung ngo// byin gyis brla'o// gcig la gcig rjes su dgyes so// gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ chos
65a8(rgyud): kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug
65b1(rgyud): pa lung bstan pa gsung so// byin gyis rlab bo// gcig la gcig rjes su dgyes pa mdzad do// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag tu/ de bzhin ga
65b2(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'byung ba de dag kyang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu
65b3(rgyud): dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gsung bar 'gyur ro// byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro// gcig la gcig rjes su dgyes pa mdzad par 'gyur ro// de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag ni/ byang chub sems
65b4(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag yod pa de dag gis so// so'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag la yongs su zhu sa pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sngon ma thos pa chos
65b5(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brtan pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'a/ joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu nga bye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gang 'di ltar yon tan mang po bgyid
65b6(rgyud): pa/ 'di ltar yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i snang ba bgyi ba nas zhi ba'i bar du bgyid pa de gang lags chos mnyam nyid rdo rje lta bu/ brten pa'i
65b7(rgyud): chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa bdud kyi stobs kyi yul thams cad rab tu 'joms pa bgyid pa nas phung po'i lhag ma ma mchis pa'i
65b8(rgyud): mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du bgyid pa de skye ba mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten 'bru ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i
66a1(rgyud): slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la 'di skad ces bka'
66a2(rgyud): stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag nged kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der 'dong ngo // da ltar
66a3(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskor/ 
66a4(rgyud): cing / nyan thos kyis dge 'dun dang bcas pas mdun du bdar/ de nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du/ de bzhin gshe dgas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya
66a5(rgyud): thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der gshegs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de dang lhan cig sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / ngan par spyod pa'i las las bzlog pa dang / 
66a6(rgyud): bzang ba spyod pa rab tu rdzogs par bya ba dang / bla na med pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brton pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya
66a7(rgyud): dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur/ byin gyis rlob par 'gyur/ gcig la gcig rjes su dgyes pa mdzad par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams
66a8(rgyud): cad 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du 'dus nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskor cing / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi mar mdun gyis bltas te/ chos mnyam nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos
66b1(rgyud): kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzung phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur gyis khyed cag las gang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i
66b2(rgyud): chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa mnyan pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung / 
66b3(rgyud): gi bye ma snyed dus gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig na bzhugs pa de dag la mched pa bya ba dang / chos de yang nyan pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang lha'i yul dang / 
66b4(rgyud): bdud kyi yul thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan bkadu ba de dag blta ba dang / sangs rgyas mang po 'dus pa sngon mthos mthong ba blta bar 'dod pa de dag dang nged kyang lhan cig tu 'jig
66b5(rgyud): rten gyi khams mi mjed du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btso/ ma pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de ga la ba bzhugs pa der 'dong ngo // de nas sangs rgyas
66b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de dag la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gzungs 'di 'chad pa na gal
66b7(rgyud): te bdag cag gis gnas rnyed cing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar tshogs de dag la yang phyag bgyi ba dang / snyen bkur bgyi ba dang / 
66b8(rgyud): mchod pa dang / chos mnyan par rngo thog pa lta na de bzhin du bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dang / thabs gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya
67a1(rgyud): thub pa ga la ba der chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa mnyan
67a2(rgyud): pa'i slad du mchis te/ der bdag cag gis dus gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med ched med pa zhig bzhugs shing 'tshe la gzhes pa rnams la mchod
67a3(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// de dag las chos kyang mnyan par 'gyur ro// der bdag cag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi yul bkod pa bzhis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed lags par brgyan pa de yang blta bar bgyi/ 'dus
67a4(rgyud): pa chen po bkod pa de dag kyang blta bar bgyi'o// de nas sa ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing so so rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag
67a5(rgyud): dang / nyan thos chen po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag khyed cag 'jig rten gyi khams der 'ju/ ga pa'i gnas dang / go skabs kyi phyir de ltar the tsom ma za shig/ 
67a6(rgyud): de ltar nem nur ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'jug pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin par
67a7(rgyud): mdzad pa ni mtha' yas so// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de thabs mkhas pa chen po dang ldan pas go skabs yangs so// rigs kyi bu dag yongasu brtag pa bzung ste/ sems
67a8(rgyud): can gang la la sems can gyi khams su bsdu bar bsdus pa khams dang skye mched la gnas pa'i sems can de dag gal te re re'i lus kyang ri rab tsam du gyur du zin kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa
67b1(rgyud): shAkya thub pa des sems can lus de lta bur gyur pa de dag thams cad yongs 'bru gcig gi nang du chud par nus so// sems can re re zhing yang yul gyi gnas go skabs yangs te/ sems can de dag phan
67b2(rgyud): tshun mig rgyang gis kyang me sleb so// yongs 'bru de gcig tu sems can thams cad kyi lus bcug kyang bri ba 'am gang bar yang mi mngon te/ rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni thabs
67b3(rgyud): mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan no// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang sra ba nyid ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni sa'i khams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des sa'i khams thams cad rdul gcig gi
67b4(rgyud): steng du 'jog nus la rdul de gcig gi steng du sa'i khams da thams cad bzhag kyang bri ba 'am gang bar mi mngon te/ de ba bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni thabs mkhas pa de lta bu
67b5(rgyud): dang ldan no// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang gang cung zad gshe ra bar snang ba de thams cad ni chu'i khams te/ de bzhin ga shegs pa shAkya thub pa des chu'i khams de thams cad skra'i rtse
67b6(rgyud): mo gcig tu chud par/ nus la skra'i rtse mo gcig tu chu'i khams de thams cad chud kyang bri ba 'am/ gang bar mi mngon no// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang ji tsam du dro bar snang ba de thams cad ni me'i
67b7(rgyud): khams te/ me'i khams gang sngon byung ba dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad rdul phra rab gcig tu chud par nus la/ me'i khams de thams cad rdul phra rab gcig tu
67b8(rgyud): bcug kyang gnas shin tu yangs te rang gi yul bzhin du rgyu'o// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang gang cung zad rlung gi khams su snang ba'i rlung gi khams de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub
68a1(rgyud): ba des spu'i khung bu de gcig tu 'jug nus la/ rlung gi khams de thams cad spu'i khung bu de gcig na gnas shin tu yangs te/ rang gi yul bzhin du rgyu'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan
68a2(rgyud): yang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des gang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi sems can thams cad 'byung ba chen po bzhi po de dag thams cad dang lhan cig du rdul gcig
68a3(rgyud): gi steng du 'jog par nus te/ rdul gcig la sems can de dag thams cad 'byung ba chen po de dag dang bcas par rang gi yul gyi las kyi mtha' rnams spyod pas kyang gnas shin tu yangs par rgyu ste phan
68a4(rgyud): tshun gnod pa yang med la/ rdul gcig gi rtse mo de yang bri ba 'am/ gung bar mi mngon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan no// rigs kyi bu dag
68a5(rgyud): gzhan yang dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams/ kyi skye mched drug dang spyod pa nye bar len pa dang / smon la/ ma dang / byin gyis brlabs dang / tshig gi lam gyi sgra dang / 
68a6(rgyud): yi ge dang / tshig brjod pa dang / 'du byed gsum gyi las kyi mtha'i bya ba dang / phung po dang / dpyod pa dang / bsags pa'i bya ba tha dad pa ji snyed pa dang / gang yang sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi mthi'
68a7(rgyud): mu nas bzung ste/ dus gsum du gtogs pa'i 'gro ba drug tu 'khor ba ni srid pa 'grub pa dang / 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba 'byung ba dang / sa'i khams kyi rdul phra rab ji snyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi
68a8(rgyud): dus gsum du gtogs pa'i skad cig thang gcig yud tsam 'das pa ji snyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum du gtogs pa'i spu'i khung bu ji snyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dus
68b1(rgyud): gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad longs spyod pa dang / kun spyod pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa
68b2(rgyud): des skad cig gcig la rab tu mkhyen te/ de bzhin gshogs pa shAkya thub pa de ni mtshan nyid kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / mngon par shes pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu dang ldan pas mi rtog rnam par mi/ 
68b3(rgyud): cing lhun gyis grub par dus gsum gyi mtha' yongasu mkhyen to// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de sangs rgyas kyi yul la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pas mnam pa nyid
68b4(rgyud): kyis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i thabs ched med dpa 'di lta bu dang ldan no// mtshan nyid bshad pa 'di lung bstan pa na phyogs tha dad pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa de da// 
68b5(rgyud): gi so so'i 'khor byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong grangs medapa/ ngag tu med pa dge smon lam gyi yul la 'jug pa'i ye/ shes kyi pha rol tu phyin par gyur te// 'dus pa chen po rin po
68b6(rgyud): tshe tog gi gzungs las mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// / yang de'i tshe shar phyogs logs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba na de bzhin gshegs pa mi
68b7(rgyud): 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams dang thabs gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs kyis
68b8(rgyud): gshegs par chad nas/ skad cig gcig tsam la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dbus kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su byon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
69a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der gshegs nas/ pad+ma'i gdan ji lta bu byung ba la bzhug so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang rang gi rdzu 'phrul
69a2(rgyud): gyi stobs bskyed pas pad+ma'i stan ji lta bu byung ba de dag la 'khod do// de la sogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tshe la gzhes pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med dpag tu med pa'i rdul phra
69a3(rgyud): rab kyi rdul snyed kyang skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dbus kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams byon to// de bzhin gshegs pa re re yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
69a4(rgyud): chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa dang / nyan thos bye ba khra/ ga khrig brgya stong dang thabs gcig tu de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub
69a5(rgyud): bdeg la bzhugs par byon to// byon nas kyang pad+ma'i gang na ji lta bu byung ba rnams la zhugs so// yang de'i tshe na lho phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog ces bya ba
69a6(rgyud): byon nas pad+ma'i snying po la bzhugs pa'i bar du rgyas par bya'o// de bzhin du byang phyogs logs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra zhes bya ba byon nas/ pad+ma'i snying po la bzhug so// yang de'i tshe nub phyogs
69a7(rgyud): logs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med ces bya ba byon nas/ pad+ma'i snying po la bzhugs pa'i bar du'o// 'og gi phyogs logs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ces pa byin nas
69a8(rgyud): pad+ma'i snying po la bzhugs pa'i bar du'o// steng gi phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi 'od zer ces bya ba// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs
69b1(rgyud): med dpag tum gang+ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul snyed dang thabs gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis de nas gshegs par chas pa dang / 
69b2(rgyud): sems kyi skad cig gcig la sang+yas kyi zhing 'dir dbus kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der gtse
69b3(rgyud): nas/ pad+ma'i gdan ji lta bu byung ba la bzhug so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang ji ltar rang rang gi bsod nams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi pad+ma'i stan sprul pa rnam
69b4(rgyud): la 'khod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa de dag/ sangs rgyas bcom lnga na 'das rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir la la dag gis ni 'dzim+bu'i
69b5(rgyud): chu bo'i gser gyi char phab bo// gong du smos pa bzhin du sbyar te/ la la dag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus par bskor ba byas so// la la dag ni chos nyan pas bskor nas/ 
69b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te 'khod // la la dag gis ni rang gi dge ba'i phyogs yid la byed cing gnas so// yang de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas thal mo sbyar te rang gi rdzu
69b7(rgyud): 'phrul gyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi stobs bskyed pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ma lus par dbyangs kyis bkang ste/ 'di skad ces smras so// the tsom thams cad gcod mdzad
69b8(rgyud): pa thub pa zla ba kun nas gshegs// sngon chad ma mthong ma thos pa'i// dge 'dun phun sum tshogs 'di snang // byang chub sems dpa' brtul zhugs mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rab gang ba// zhing ri
70a1(rgyud): mchod rten gyur pa ste// zhing rnams kun gyis phyag byas so// gang nas sems can spang ba yi// zhing ni snyigs ma lnga can 'dir// thub pa snang mdzad rgyu med par// rdzogs pa'i sangs
70a2(rgyud): rgyas deng mi gshegs// de ring bdud ngan cher bcad cing // nag po'i phyogs ni rab gzhom dang // spyod pa dge ba bsdu ba'i phyir// de yi don du kun nas gshegs// yid ni rab tu dang byos la// bdud sde rab tu
70a3(rgyud): 'joms pa yi// chos nyid zhi ba rab nyon la// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur bar byos// theg pa chen po spyod pa'i lam// bzod pa'i go bgos shes par byos// nyon mongs thams cad zad bya'i phyir// gzung
70a4(rgyud): 'di de ring mnyan par byos// gdan rnams la ni bzhugs nas su// dasrung ba 'di ni bshad gsol phyir// de phyir thams cad ma dgrin gcig tu// 'dran pa rnams ni spyan drangs shog/ dam
70a5(rgyud): chos yun ring gnas pa'i phyir// sgrib pa thams cad zhi byed pa// tshe/ sa rnams thams cad bsdus pa yi// gzungs 'di gzha na gyi mi thub bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
70a6(rgyud): dpa' chen po bzod pa thob pa grangs med dpag tu med pa de snyed kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams pad+ma'i gdan 'di dag la bzhugs te/ deng thugs rje
70a7(rgyud): chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis byams pa chen po'i mchog dang bzod pa yongasu bskos pa/ mi mthun pa'i rgyu 'thun pa bshad pa/ chos thams cad sdud pa/ 'jigs pa dang bral ba la 'jug pa/ bdud
70a8(rgyud): kyi las thams cad las yang dag par bgyid pa/ bdud kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu stsol// chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng bar bgyid pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms pa/ ngagra thams cad tshar gcod pa
70b1(rgyud): the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'dzud pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par thar par bgyid pa/ dgra thams cad srung ba/ bla na med pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
70b2(rgyud): thams cad kyi chos thams cad dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / mos pa mi brjed pa spyod pa thams cad kyi thabs dang ye shes la mkhas pa kun tu ston pa/ bde ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad
70b3(rgyud): kyi skye mched dang / byin gyis brlabs dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa la 'jug pa/ snang ba'i ye shes mkhas pa la 'jug pa nas/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi snying po
70b4(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i bar gyi gzungs 'di sems can rnams kyi gzi brjid dang / kha dog dang / longs spyod dang / stobs dang / grags pa dang / bde ba la reg par gnas pa dang / spobs pa dang / dran
70b5(rgyud): pa rnam par 'phel ba dang / thos pa 'dzin pa mi brjed pa dang / dgra tha mas cad pham par bgyi ba dang / lo tog mngon par 'a grub pa dang / bslab pa 'dzin pa dang / dran pa'i snod du gyur
70b6(rgyud): pa dang / spyod pa mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub yang dag par thob par bgyi ba'i slad du sangs bac+doMs rnams kyi gzungs 'di/ da 'dir bdag cag la bshad du gsol/ chos kyi tshul rjes su gzung
70b7(rgyud): ba dang / yun ring du gnas pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs chab mi 'tshal ba dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam mtha dag bstan pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / nam mkha' dang
70b8(rgyud): de bzhin nyid dbyer ma mchis pa dang / mun pa dang / snang ba dang / dmigs pa dang / mi dmigs pa dang / tshu rol dang / pha rol dang / rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / sems can dang
71a1(rgyud): srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag thams cad dbyer ma mchis pa dang / chos thams cad mi skye ba dang / mi 'byung ba dang / mi 'gags pa dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan
71a2(rgyud): nyid dngos po ma mchis shing / yang dag pa'i mtha' dbyer ma mchis pa dang / sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / na mkha' dang rnam par shes pa'i khams dbyer ma mchis pa'i slad du/ sangs rgyas
71a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis 'dir bdag cag la chos thams cad kyi tshul gyi dkyil 'khor dam pa'i gzungs bshad du gsol// gang 'dir thos ma thag tu sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu
71a4(rgyud): med pa dag la dkon mchog gsum mngon du gyur cig/ sems can rnams phan tshun du dge ba'i shes gnyen bgyid cing phan bu byed par gyur cig/ sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag/ 
71a5(rgyud): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed/ ba dang / phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / lung bstan pa tho/ ba par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams
71a6(rgyud): cad kyis kyang / chos bstan pa'i phyir cang mi gsungs par gyur pas/ gnang nas pad+ma'i snying po de dag la bzhugs so// ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi
71a7(rgyud): sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsngags pa'i phyir dran pa dang / dad pa dang / dang ba dang / mos pa snyed par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dra
71a8(rgyud): rnams mthong ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i seMn rnams kyi sems dang sems las byung ba rnams la 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / lta ba ngan pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgya
71b1(rgyud): dang / drags pa dang / 'jigs tshogs la lta ba dang / the tsom dang nye bar len pa dang / srid pa'i sred pa kun gzhi'i nyes pa dag rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can so so nas 'di snyam du bdag
71b2(rgyud): cag cig pu de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar na chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dug gi// 'di na gzhan ni su yang med do// bdag cag gcig pu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs thams cad kyis dgongs te/ 
71b3(rgyud): nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston par bzhed do// 'di na gzhan sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa tsho mnyan pa'i phyir gsol bas btab bo snyam du shes par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
71b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi smon la mo mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// yang de'i tshe gang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'dir gtogs pa'i sems
71b5(rgyud): can rnams dbang po thams cad brtan te/ thal mo sbyar nas de da ga gis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag cad la rdzo bshad gsos
71b6(rgyud): btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis bdag cog la bshad du gsol// bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nan tan gyis bsdu bar bgyi'o// de nas yang de'i tshe de
71b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan rnams la mchod pa'i phyir spos bkod pa las shin tu lhag pa'i spos gong du mchog tu khyad par du gyur pa
71b8(rgyud): rgya chen pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad khyab par byin gyis brlabs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lhag ma rnams la mchod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i
72a1(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi lag na rin po che dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa sna tshogs dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub
72a2(rgyud): sna tshogs dag gis gang bar byin gyis brlabs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// da ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag nas bdag
72a3(rgyud): gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dri ba'i phyir byon pa rnams dgongasu gsol// bdag sngon gyi smon lam gyis 'di 'dra bar rab tu nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten du/ bla na med pa yang dag
72a4(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyasate/ sems can bsam pa nyams pa lam rab tu stor ba/ ma rig pa'i mun pa dang / rab rib kyi ling tog gis nyon mongs
72a5(rgyud): pa'i mun par bcug pa/ ngan song gsum du zhugs pa/ mid go ba dang 'grogs pa/ dge ba thams cad dang bral ba/ thabs mkhas pa thams cad kyi yongs su spangs pa/ mtshams
72a6(rgyud): med pa byed pa/ dam pa'i chos spong ba/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ snying rje med pa'i bsam pa can gyi sems can rnams la snying rje ba'i slad du/ snying ba rtsa ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs
72a7(rgyud): kyi brtson pa chen pos grang ba dang / dro ba dang / rlung dang / tshe ba dang / ngal ba dang / chad pa dang du blangs par bgyi'o// grongs grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul dang / yul 'khor du rkang
72a8(rgyud): gis 'gro bar bgyi'o// sems can la phan par bgyi ba'i slad du/ rtsub pa dang / nyung ba dang / ro med pa shin tu smad pa mi mthun pa'i zas za bar bgyi'o// de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i
72b1(rgyud): slad du sdom pa/ thub pa/ reg na mi bde ba/ gan dang / shing bal dang / gso ma'i ras dang / phyag dar khrod kyi gos bgo bar bgyi'o// ri dang ri'i sul dang / nags stug po dang / grong stong pa dang / dur khrod du
72b2(rgyud): gnas par bgyi ba dang / rtswa'i mal cha dang / gso ma dang / shing gi 'dabu ma/ nub pa// dro ma zhim pa reg na mi bde ba'i mal cha spyad par bgyi'o// bdag gis thibs mkhas pa dang / snying rje chen po dang / 
72b3(rgyud): brtson 'grus kyi go cha bgos nas/ sems can rnams la gtam rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis te/ rgyal rigs rnams la ni rgyal srid dang / dbang phyug gi gtam bgyi'o// bram ze rnams la ni rig byed dang / 
72b4(rgyud): skar ma'i gtam bgya'// bram ze rnams lan rag byed dang / skar ma'i gtam dang / blon po rnams la ni yul dang la ngas kyi mtha'i gtam dang / sman pa rnams la ni khams dang / 
72b5(rgyud): sman dang / sgrub pa'i gtam dang / tshong pa rnams la ni nyo tsheng gi gtam dang / dmangs rnams la ni las kyi ma tha'i la mngon par zhen pa'i gtam dang / bud med rnams la
72b6(rgyud): ni kha dog dang / rgyan dang / bu dang / phyug pa dang / 'gran zla med pa'i gtam dang / dge sbyong rnams la bzod pa dang / nges pa dang / las gsum la brtson pa'i gtam bgyi'o// sems can
72b7(rgyud): yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ ma thob par thob par bgyi ba dang / mngon sum du ma bgyis pa mngon tu bgyi bar gzung ngo // ma thar pa rnams thar par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sdug bsngal rnam pa sna
72b8(rgyud): tshogs la spro bar bgyi'o// sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ yul rgyu bar bgyi'o// de lta mod kyi sems can 'di dag ni de na bdag lag she'o// mi snyan pa zer ro// pra dog gi
73a1(rgyud): chos kyi rgyus bdag la 'khrig pa'i chos kyis med pa la bskur pa 'deb so// kha gsag dang / tshul chos pa dang / sgyu dang / g.yo dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / zhes gcod pa dang / 
73a2(rgyud): bud med kyi tshig dag gis bskur pa 'deb so// bdag lasas 'thor ro// bdug bsad pa'i phyir mtshon dang dug dang / me dang / 'khor lo dang / mda' bo che dang / ral gri dang / mdung dang / dgra
73a3(rgyud): sta dang / rdo dang / mtshon tshwa'i char 'beb so// bdag bsad pa'i phyir glang po che dang / sbrul gdugs pa dang / sang+ga dang / stag dang / glang po che dang / ma he dang / spyang ki dang / phag rgod dang / 
73a4(rgyud): chen po che rnams kyang 'gyed do// bdag gi gnas dang / gan das khang dang / gtsug lag khang yang mi gtsang ba dang / da dri nga bas 'gangs so// bdag gi nyan thos grong khyer du zhugs
73a5(rgyud): pa rnams la/ 'phags pa ma yin pa'i sems can rnams kyi sa glu dang / gar tshul ma yin pa byed du btsud do// thabs brgya stong du mas bdag bsang ba'i phyir brtson no// 
73a6(rgyud): bdag gi bstan pa nub par bya ba dang / chos kyi tshul gyi sgron ma bsad pa dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan bskal ba dang / chos kyi gru gzhig pa dang / bdag gis chos kyi mchod sbyin rnam par gtor
73a7(rgyud): ba'i phyir brtson no// da sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi chos kyi tshul la gzigs te/ ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sangs
73a8(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang / ldan pa 'dir 'dus pa chen po mdzad nas/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang / bdud kyi stobs kyi yul thams cad rab tu
73b1(rgyud): gzhom pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs gnas pa rgyun mi 'chang bar bgyi ba dang / sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / dgra dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang
73b2(rgyud): 'thun pas tshar bcad pa dang / sems can rnams kyi 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ga dang / nad dang phas kyi dmag tshogs dang / 'ching ba dang / 'gyed pa dang / rgol ba dang / dus ma yin par
73b3(rgyud): grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / char dang / rlung dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi nyes pa dang / lta ba yang ba rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / mi dang / 
73b4(rgyud): mi ma yin pa thams cad 'dun par bgyi ba dang / khyim dang /  grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'kho nga ra thams cad srung ba dang / g.yo ba dang / dug dang / byang dang / 
73b5(rgyud): rmongs byed dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa thams/ cad gzhil ba dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / me tog/ dang / 'bras bu dang / bcud thams cad kyis sems can
73b6(rgyud): nye bar 'tshe bar bgyi ba dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / dmangs rigs dang / rje'u rigs rnams dge ba spyod pa la gzud ba dang / byang chub kyi sems rab tu bskyed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa
73b7(rgyud): rnams la gzud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs shes pa la mkhas dang / dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / mos pa dang / dpa' ba dang / brtan pa dang / 
73b8(rgyud): spobs pa rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / dbang bskur ba'i sar dbugs dbyung ba la 'dzud cing ye shes kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
74a1(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa
74a2(rgyud): lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam pa 'di bshad cing byin gyis brlab so// gcig la gcig dgyes pa des 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das da ltar phyogs bcu na bzhugs shing gzhes pa dag
74a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lngad ldan pa 'dir dri ba'i phyir gshegs te bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di srung ba'i slad du/ chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying po
74a4(rgyud): lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung brtan pa'i chos kyi rnamagras 'di das pa'i tshe kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang / bdud kyi yul gyi stobs thams cad rab tu
74a5(rgyud): gzhom pa dang / ji ltar gong du rgyas par brjod pa bzhin du/ sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ bdag gis gsol ba btab pa la thugs brtse bar
74a6(rgyud): mdzad de/ gang sang+yas kyi zhing 'dir dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas shing phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi
74a7(rgyud): rigs mi 'chad pa dang / chos kyi bcud kyis sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar bgyid pa'i slad du legs par bshad du gsol// byin gyis brlab tu gsol// bshad nas kyang phan tshun rjes su dgyes
74a8(rgyud): pa mdzad du gsol// de nas sang+yas bac+doMs de dag gis 'di skad ces gsung so// de bzhin du dag cag gis sang+yas kyi zhing 'dir sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la lag bskyong bgyi ste/ chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas pa dang / 
74b1(rgyud): bdud kyi yul gyi stobs thams cad rab tu gzhom pa nas sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ byin gyis brlab cing chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying po lus 'jom
74b2(rgyud): pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad kyis gang su dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad nyon
74b3(rgyud): cig/ 'di lta ste/ A ga raM/ e ga ra/ b+haM ga ra/ pra d+h+r-i ka ra/ b+ha sa mahA/ mi tA b+hA se/ A le/ a wa/ aM ba re/ do ma/ dro man+te/ ke bat+te/ ke yU ra/ sam bA ha ne/ sa man+ta b+ha d+he/ d+harmA/ d+harme/ d+ha maH
74b4(rgyud): dza pA la/ mi tA nu pa le/ pA la b+ha dre/ ga Ne ge Na/ wa ran+te/ hi li hi li/ hi li ti li ke/ dzaM b+ha ba te/ Ta ka se/ Ta ka Na Te/  Ta ka ba ran+te/ gaN ba ran+te/ hi rin+te/ shaM rin+te/ bin+d+ha pa te/ go ba ha/ 
74b5(rgyud): dzu re mi tra dzu re/ dzu she/ a gre/ a ba me/ sa s+ya ta thA dA na/ hu lu hi li/ tsan+ne/ sa ma d+ha me/ d+ha me/ ku tsu ru/ mu tsu ru/ a tsi tA/ tsi li tsi li/ li tsi bA ha/ tsu lu tsu lu/ mi tra bA ha/ ku lu
74b6(rgyud): ku lu/ sa ra sa ra/ ku t+ya ku t+ya/ ma hA sa ra sar/ tu Tu tu Tu/ ma hA sa t+ya/ hri da ya/ puSh+pa she su puSh+pa she/ dum pa ri hi re/ a b+ha ye/ ru tsa ni ka rak+Sha/ a ya ma sdu bi bA hA/ ti ti le/ ma ma le/ pA sha ka/ 
74b7(rgyud): shi shi ra shri shi ra/ lo ka bi nA ya ka/ badz+re badz+ra d+ha re/ badz+re bA te/ badz+ra ma de/ badz+ra daN+Da/ tsakra badz+ra ye/ tsakre tsa ba te/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ b+ha re b+ha re/ pu ra ta re/ hu hu ra/ b+ha ga bai ba ra/ shwa ra/ sha tsi li/ tsu ru/ 
74b8(rgyud): pu ra/ man+t+ra Ne/ man+ta Ne/ ga ga ra Ni/ mu dra Ne/ sa ra ba mo ha na/ d+hi d+hi ra ya ni/ mu khe shwa ra la ya ni/ ri shiny+dza ni d+ha ba ba tsi/ tsaN+DA la sa me/ sarba sat+ya/ a d+hiSh+ThA na/ a d+hiSh+ThA te sid d+hAn tu ma hA na ma mi ni/ 
75a1(rgyud): pA la ra ti/ o dze pre/ bi tsi ni/ b+ha na ha ra/ bu pu ru/ gu ru gu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ hi li hi li/ ha ra ha ra/ ka kanA da ba hA/ hi hi tA/ A yur ha na/ kAn+ta/ dz+wa lA ba sA ga ra dA ne/ a d+ha ha ni/ 
75a2(rgyud): mArga a b+hi ro ha ni/ pA la sa t+ye/ a ro Sha ba ti/ hi li hi li/ ya thA ba dza swA gra ya thA/ pa rany+dza hri da yA ba sa t+ya/ pa ri ba ra/ nArga a b+hi ro ha Ne/ a tsa la bud d+hi/ dA da pa tsa tsa pa ya/ bi d+yA hri da ya/ tsan+na tsa ra/ 
75a3(rgyud): a tsa le/ sho d+ha ni/ pra kri ti mA ra ge/ i li i li le/ pra ba sa ra pra de/ sarbat+ta ta thA tA satwA nu ga te/ a na ba ra ba te/ a la ta/ aM guM re/ sha mi ni bra hA yo hi/ a hi ta/ a b+ha hi/ ni ra ba ya ba/ i tsi
75a4(rgyud): ra mArga/ la na gu sA ra/ tri rat+na/ baM she/ d+harma kA ya/ dz+wa la tsa nAM/ sa mu dra pa ti/ ma hA b+hu ta b+hA ya/ sa mu dra be gA ba d+hA ra Ni mud+ha raN/ mu khi mu dra/ su ra pra ti saM bi d+ha/ su mu tra a bar+ha ni/ saM brta ni/ 
75a5(rgyud): sa ma mo ha skar/ bi d+yu ta ra se nak+Shi ti mu dri to sau/ ye ke tsi ta/ pra ti b+hi bA ha/ ba ha ba ha/ kr-i tA/ ka ba tA/ shI la muM dri tIdA/ ra ni na/ d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha/ dA ni dA la/ shU kra sarba hrings
75a6(rgyud): mu dri to sa dze du dza ba ta/ dza kha ba ta/ su ma ti pa ti/ ma hAd b+hU ta mu dri ta/ ye ke tsi ta sha da ta na ni shI ta pu ta/ i ni mi ne/ sa tsa ne/ go sha sa tsa ne/ bu dri tA/ tsUr+ya/ a d+hiSh+Tha na bAka pa/ thA nA n+ya thA maH
75a7(rgyud): buNA sa muts+tsha ya/ a ba tA ra/ ma hA ka ru Na ya mu dri ta sarba sam+baka pra ti pata tsi rA rA tAn dz+wa la du d+harma ne tri sarbe mu ni briSha b+ha/ ma hA ka ru Na sa ma d+hi/ dz+nyA na Sha b+hA ba le na mi tri t+ya ga/ a b+hi bIr+ya ba le na/ a
75a8(rgyud): d+hiSh+Tha te/ sarba b+hU to pa tsa yA ya swA hA// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis 'di skad ces sangs rgyas dang / byang
75b1(rgyud): chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes lan gsum smras nas/ 'di skad ces kyang smras so// kye ma thub pa 'dus pa ngo mtshar che'o// kye ma'o byang
75b2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams 'dus pa ngo mtshar che'o// kye ma'i chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
75b3(rgyud): phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs ston pa'i bstan pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs byin gyis brlangs ston pa/ bdud kyi yul gyi stobs rnam pa
75b4(rgyud): 'joms pa/ bdud kyi zhogs pa kun gcod pa/ dgra thams cad cher gcod pa/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng ba/ chos kyi/ phyogs srung ba 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba/ sngon ma thos pa
75b5(rgyud): ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yul mtha' dag yong su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi snying po dang phyag rgya dang 'byung ba chen po thams cad dang / 'du byed dang / skye mched drug yongs
75b6(rgyud): su sbyang bar bya ba nas/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par bya ba'i phyir da lta sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi/ phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung
75b7(rgyud): bstan pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad do// gzungs lung bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang+gA'i klung sum cu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed dag gzungs
75b8(rgyud): mngon par sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang bzod pa thob par gyur to// yang de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar te kun tu rnam par bltas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlab
76a1(rgyud): dang / rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di dbyangs kyi bkang ste/ 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal ba zla ba rnams kyi 'khor// 'di 'dra ba ni snyeng par dka'// byang
76a2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' brtul zhugs che// mkhas pa 'di ni rnyed par dka'// gang 'di thugs rje ldan pa yi// mgon pos chos tshul byin rlabs pas// phyag rgya 'di 'dra thos pa yang // mchog tu rnyed par bka'
76a3(rgyud): ba'o// bdud kyi phyogs rnams thams cad dang // dgra rnams kyang ni pham byed pa// dkon mchog gsum rgyun mi 'chad pa// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs// sgrib pa thams cad bsal ba'i
76a4(rgyud): phyir// bzed dang nges pa rab 'phel ba// sems can rnams kyang 'dun byed pa// rgyal po dang ni yul 'khor skyong // 'di na ngan byas bzlog byed pa// lta ba ngan pa rab 'gog pa// byang chub sems
76a5(rgyud): dpa' dbugs 'byin pa// byang chub lam yang rab ston pa// pha ro// la phyin pa 'phel byed pa// bzang po spyod pa rdzogs byed/ pa// thabs dang ye shes spobs pa rnams// 'phel bar bya/ 
76a6(rgyud): phyir byin gyis brlabs// dkar po'i phyogs ni sdud byed pa// gzungs ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa// byang chub lam las mi g.yo ba// chos kyi dbang rnam 'bar byed pa'i// gzungs la yid gnyis thams
76a7(rgyud): cad ni// bsal nas lhag par mos par byos// gang gis byang chub 'grub 'gyur ba// 'di ni rdzogs pa'i lam yin no// chos smra rnams ni srung ba dang // nyan pa mngon par 'phel bya'i phyir// gzha
76a8(rgyud): / gyis mi thub pa yi gzungs// bdag gis da yang bshad par bya// sgrib pa med pa 'grub pa dang // sems can rnams kyi phan 'phel phyir// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen po// su dag 'di la dang pa 'dun
76b1(rgyud): yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhon nur gyur pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so// bdag cag kyang gzungs 'di la dad pa 'bul lo// byin gyis brlab
76b2(rgyud): bo/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge snyan ma gang la la zhig gis khrus byas te/ gos gtsang ma bgos la/ me tog sna tshogs bkram pa spros
76b3(rgyud): sna tshogs kyi rab tu bdugs pa/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/ ras dang / rgyan dang / ras bcos bu sna tshogs bting ba/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sgreng bas shin tu rgyan pa'i 'khor
76b4(rgyud): gyi khyam su seng+ge'i khri reg na 'jam pa la 'dug ste/ gzungs 'di yang dag par bshad na/ su yang de'i sems 'khrug pa la ma/ khams 'khrug pa 'am/ lus 'khrug pa 'am/ yid
76b5(rgyud): 'khrug par mi byed do// de'i lus la yang dbugs mi gtong ngo // klad pa na bar byed mi nus so// mig na ba dang / lce na/ ba dang / so na ba dang / rus pa na ba dang / mgul pa na ba dang / 
76b6(rgyud): dpung pan pa dang / rgyab na ba dang rgyu ma na ba dang / lto na pa dang / chu so na ba dang / brlan pa dang / byin pa na bar byed sus kyang mi nus te/ de ni gnas med do// de'i skad 'gag par yang mi 'gyur ro// chos smra
76b7(rgyud): pa de sngon gyi mi dge ba'i las kyis khams 'khrug pa 'am/ skad 'gag par gyur na yang des gzungs 'di bklags na thams cad ma lus par zhi bar byed 'gyur te/ las yongs su byang nas bde bar 'gyur
76b8(rgyud): ro// chos nyan pa gang dag der 'du bar 'gyur ba de dag la yang su yang khams 'khrug pa 'am/ skad 'gag par byed pa mi 'gyur ro// gang dag de na gzung 'di nyan pa de dag kyang mi dge ba'i las kyi yun ring
77a1(rgyud): bor na ba dang / khams 'khrug pa dang / skad 'gags pa de thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i
77a2(rgyud): 'khor can gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed de dag ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btung na 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdag la dgongasu gsol// gzungs 'di la dad pa bskul
77a3(rgyud): du gsol// 'di lta ste/ shAn+te/ a sa ma ro pe/ mai tri sau ma pa te/ e hin rjeganag k+Sha ge mU la she d+ha ne/ ba ha kha ba ha kha/ mA ra ba ta tha tA/ pa rits+tshad/ ba ha sa/ ba ha sa/ a mU la/ a tsa le/ tse tsa le/ pra tsa la/ d+hi d+hi le/
