77a4(rgyud): i.a ka na ya pa rits+tshe da tsan+tI ni/ ba ra se/ ba ra sa tri ni/ kha ga su/ ra tri dane sta ba su ra tri ni b+hU ta ko Ti ba rits+tshe da dz+wa la kha dz+wa la kha ba ye ts+tshadal kha na mak+Sha khA/ ka ka kha/ ha hA ha hA/ hu hu hu/ s+phaR+sha be da na/ pa
77a5(rgyud): s+t+rai na/ a ma maH/ ma many+dzu/ sems su dra/ su drug pa sA rnam par de/  rjes ky-i n+da ma shig gyu/ wi AkA gi shes pa'i tsA nA hA// yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas
77a6(rgyud): kyi zhing de dag thams cad du gtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / 
77a7(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dag dang / sems can gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad kyis lags so zhes/ 
77a8(rgyud): bya ba byin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang 'di skad du/ kye ma gzungs 'di ni stobs che ba/ drag shul dang ldan pa ste/ dgra thams cad bzlog pa/ mi 'jigs pa dang / nad dang / 
77b1(rgyud): rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa thams cad yongasu thar par byed pa nas/ sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes chen po bsags pa bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu 'thun pa'i bar gyi gzungs/ 
77b2(rgyud): 'di bshad do zhes bka' stsal to// yang de'i tshe tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug ces bya ba kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa lha'i las 'das pa'i gos dang / sdud pa dang / rgyan dang / me
77b3(rgyud): tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa rgya chen po rnams kyis lus brgyan nas/ bud med kyi gzugasu bsgyur te/ tshangs pa chen po'i stobs kyi yul bkod pa byin gyi brlabs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das
77b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas tshangs pa chen po phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar te/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces
77b5(rgyud): gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam kyis gang bdag/ gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di dbyangs kyis go bar ba gyis la der bdag la bgegs cung zad kyang mi 'byung bar
77b6(rgyud): dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjed pa rnam par gdon mi 'tshal ba bstan par bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol to// bdag gis da ltar chos smra ba rnams dang / chos nyan pa rnams kyi slad du/ 'di 'dra ba'i
77b7(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi tshig srung ba bshad par bgyi ste/ ci nas slad ma'i dus na/ bdud kyi 'khor tam/ lnga 'am/ sha za mo 'am/ klu 'am/ klu mo 'am/ klu rgan po 'am/ klu rgan mo 'am/ klu'i 'khor tam/ klu'i
77b8(rgyud): 'khor mo 'am/ klu'i bu 'am/ klu'i bu mo 'am/ de bzhin du rgyas par bgyi ste/ sha za 'am/ sha za mo 'am/ sha za rgan po 'am/ sha zargan mo 'am/ sha za'i 'khor tam/ sha za'i 'khor mo 'am/ 
78a1(rgyud): sha ba'i bu 'am/ sha za'i bu mo 'am/ mi 'am mi ma lags pa'i bar gang la la chos smra ba dang / chos nyan pa rnams la glags lta ba 'am/ skabs tshol ba'i ngagra phyir rgol ba zhig mchis te/ 
78a2(rgyud): tha na chos smra ba 'am/ chos nyan pa rnams kyi spu'i khung bu gcig tsam la yang 'tsha 'am/ gnod par bgyi dam/ 'jig par bgyid dam/ mdangs 'phrog gam/ lus la dbugs chen po gtong ngam/ 
78a3(rgyud): tha na skad cig gcig tsam yang sdang ba'i sems kyis lta na/ bdag gis bdud nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar de dag bzlog pa dang / chad pas bcad pa dang / tshar bcad pa dang / rmugs pa dang / rengs
78a4(rgyud): pa dang / rmongs par bgyi/ bro 'tshal bar bgyi na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gang bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di dbyangs kyis gang bar bgyi ba'i dbyang
78a5(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa byin gyis brlab tu gsol// 'di la su zhig bdag gi grogasu 'gyur// de nas sang / sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis cang mi gsung bar
78a6(rgyud): gyur pas gnang bar mdzad do// de nas brgya byin gtsug pud 'dzin ces bya ba 'dzam+bu chu bo'i gsar gyi rgyan gyi 'od kyis lus brgyan nA ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu 'dug go/ de nas brgya byin gtsug
78a7(rgyud): bud 'dzin gyis tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smra so// cha zhe bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi sman sngar ma 'dug shig/ cha zhe mtshan 'dir bag med par ma byed cig/ 
78a8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la ma 'tsha shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byis pa rnams ni spros la dga'// de bzhin gshegs pa spros mi mnga'// de dag skye 'jig mtshan nyid kyi// 'dus byas dag kyang ston pa
78b1(rgyud): mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzungs dang yi ge dang tshig rab tu dbye ba thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshul bsnyed pa ste/ che zhe de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'di lta ste/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid mnyam pa/ 
78b2(rgyud): nyid du cig pas/ de bzhin nyid la 'gal bar mi mdzad de/ na mkha' la ni 'du byed gsum gyi 'jig lta'i mtshan nyid sgro btags pa med do// ji ltar 'du byed rnams la na mkha' mi rtog cing rnam par
78b3(rgyud): mi rtog pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang 'dod pa'i ston la spros par mi mjed/ mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mi gnas mngon par mi zhen te/ de bzhin du srog la ma yin/ skye ba po la ma yin/ gso
78b4(rgyud): ba po la ma yin/ skyes bu la ma yin/ gang zag la ma yin/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams la yang spro bar mi mdzad/ mngon par mi zhen na/ che zho khyod kyis ji ltar na de
78b5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la spro bar byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa tsha dpag med kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po rta ga rtog ste smros shig/ khyod la des mi sdug pa'i 'bras bur
78b6(rgyud): gyur ta re/ skyes bu dam pa chen po 'di ni sangs rgyas mang po la lhag par bya ba byas shing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o// skyes bu dam pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa
78b7(rgyud): la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir legs par rgyan nas bud med kyi lus su mngon par sprul pa yin gyis/ 'di la bud med ces tshig tu ma brjod cig/ de nas brgya byin gtsug pud 'dzin gyis tshangs pa phun sum
78b8(rgyud): tshogs pa'i dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu bdag la thugs rje bar dgongs te bzod par gsol// 'di skad ces smras pas bdag la 'bras bu mi sdug pa thos par ma gyur cig/ de nas byang chub
79a1(rgyud): sems dpa' ltad mo can gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te brgya byin gyis tshig de sbyar ma bshags na/ de'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ji tsam zhig tu 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs
79a2(rgyud): pa tshe dpag med kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gal te des slar ma bshag su zin na/ tshe rabs brgyad khri bzhi stong du 'dod pa'i mngal smad pa bud med kyi dngos po yongasu blangs par 'gyur ro// de bas na
79a3(rgyud): rigs kyi bu ci nas kyang ngag gi las bsrung bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis khyod kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa byin gyis brlabs kyi khyod kyis spobs par gyis shig/ 
79a4(rgyud): de nas tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi thal mo sbyar te phyogs bcur rnam pa dar bltas nas 'di skad ces smras so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
79a5(rgyud): 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang nyan thos chen po rnams dang / lha dang // / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
79a6(rgyud): mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag gi bsam pa la chos kyi tshul 'di ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang / chos smra ba rnams dang / chos nyan
79a7(rgyud): ba rnams dang / nan tan dang ldan pa rnams la 'tshe bar mi 'gyur bar 'dir dad pa stsal du gsol// gang skad ma'i dus na bdud nas mi dang mi ma lags pa'i bar gyis de dag la 'tshe bar mi bgyid par
79a8(rgyud): dad pa stsal du gsol// de nas tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug gis de dag gi sdang ba'i sam bzlog pa dang / mna' bsgag pa'i phyir dbyangs kyi sgra phyung nas sgra des 'jig rten gyi khams
79b1(rgyud): 'di thams cad gang bas byas so// yang de'i tshe tshangs pa'i dbang po de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so// bdag cag kyang gzungs 'di la dad pa 'bul lo// bdag cag nyid kyis
79b2(rgyud): kyang phyi ma'i dus na/ gzungs 'di gzungs par bgyi'o// rab tu bstan par bgyi'o// dam pa'i chos kyang srung bar bgyi'o// chos smra ba dang / nyan pa de dag dang / nan tan dang ldan pa de dag kyang srung bar
79b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams kyi spyan sngar gzungs 'di la dad pa 'bul
79b4(rgyud): gyis skyes bu dam pa gzungs gsungs shig/ de nas tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces smras so// / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems
79b5(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnam/ sa kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol// 'di lta/ ste/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ ga Na shAn+te/ hA re/ tsan+ne/ ma hA tsan+d+ra/ 
79b6(rgyud): tsan+ne ha/ tsa me ha/ sau me s+thA me a ba ha/ bi ba ha/ aM ga dza ne tra/ kha ga mU la pa ri ts+tshe da/ yak+Sha tsan+ne/ bi shA tsa tsan+ne/ a brta ni/ si brta ni/ saM kA ra Ni/ dze b+ha ni/ staM b+hi na mo ha ni/ ud tsA ta ni/ ha ma hA/ ha/ 
79b7(rgyud): mahA ma hA saM ku tsa ne/ kha khe sha ba/ a ma la/ a mU la/ pa ri brti/ a sA ra kha ba swA hA/ gsang sngags 'di las gang 'da' zhing // mang po tshogs par mi spyod na// mig mi mi mthong zhing 'gol ba sa// yan lag tha
79b8(rgyud): dad 'jig par 'gyur// 'di lta ste/ A tse tsa/ a ba ha/ tsa tse/ tsak+ShuHtsak+ShuHta tA/ kha tse tsA/ na kha ga/ tsatsA/ tse tsA/ tsa tsA/ na tsa ha/ mU la tsatsI/ tsa mU la/ tsa tsaha/ ma mU la tsa tsA/ ha mU ha mU/ ba U ba UsaH/ 
80a1(rgyud): de nas tshangs pa'i dbang po thams cad nas/ sha za'i dbang po'i bar gyis leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'di skad ces smras so// stong chen po'i stobs kyi shugs shin tu 'joms pa'i gsang sdug
80a2(rgyud): kyi tshig 'di bshad de phan pa ma yin par sems pa'i 'byung po thams cad la zhags pa 'di btab na de dag 'tshe bar ga la 'gyur/ tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces smras so// 
80a3(rgyud): 'byung po gang dag sdang ba'i bsam pa can snying rje med pa byas pa mi bzo ba/ sems can la 'tshe ba rnams sam/ bdud dam/ bdud kyi 'khor glags lta zhing skabs tshol ba rnams/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa
80a4(rgyud): la mngon par dad pa'i rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang ba skur pa rnams la skabs tshol du nye bar 'ong ba dang / ba tsun mo dam pa dang / bu dang bu mo dang / btsun me'i 'khor rnams
80a5(rgyud): dang blon po dang / shor ba dang / dpung dam pa dang / 'phe ra rnams dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dad pa skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams
80a6(rgyud): dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma chos smra ba dang / chos nyan pa rnams dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / bsam gtan dang / kha ton la 'grus pa rnams dang / zhal ta byed pa la brtson
80a7(rgyud): pa rnams la skabs tshol du 'ong zhing tha na sems kyi skad cig gcig la spu'i khung bu gcig tsam la 'tshe'am/ gnod par byed dam/ 'jigs par byed dam/ mdangs 'phrog gi/ lus la dbugs
80a8(rgyud): gtong ngam// sdang ba'i sems kyis blta na/ bdud nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar lus dri nga ba de dag gi mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas so// de dag gi mig kyang long bar 'gyur// snying yang skams
80b1(rgyud): par 'gyur/ sha bkra can du 'gyur/ lus rul cing dri nga ba dang / rdzu 'phrul yang yongasu bri bar 'gyur/ de dag sags par ltung bar 'gyur/ rlung gis kyang de dag phyogs bzhir gtor bar 'gyur/ 
80b2(rgyud): rdul gyis kyang de dag g.yogs nas de nyid du sems 'khrugs te 'joms par 'gyur ro// gang dag sa la rgyu ba de dag gis si'i khung du 'jug par 'gyur te/ sa'i 'og tu dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi
80b3(rgyud): steng du de dag tshe yongasu zad par 'gyur ro// gang dag chu na rgyu ba'i 'byung po sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par ma dad par gyur pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon
80b4(rgyud): par dad pa'i rgyal po rgyal rigs nas/ zhal ta byed par brtson pa'i dge slong gi bar la 'tshe 'am/ gang dag sdugadas kyi tshig 'di dag las 'da' nad dag kyang de bzhin du mgo tshal
80b5(rgyud): pa bdun du 'gas pa nas de nyid du de dag gi tshe yongasu zad pa'i bar du 'gyur ro// yang yul du bdud kyi tshogs kyi sa mi thub pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'byung
80b6(rgyud): ba der bdag cag gis srung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / sba ba'i slad du spro bar bgyi'o// der chos 'dod pa'i sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi'o// sdang ba'i gnod sbyin nas/ sdang ba'i lus
80b7(rgyud): srul po'i bar thams cad de nas bskrad par bgyi'o// yul de na 'thab pa dang rtsod pa dang / mu ge dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dus ma lags pa'i char pa dang / rlung dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / 
80b8(rgyud): nad thams cad slar bzlog par bgyi'o// bde ba dang / 'dum pa dang / lo legs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba 'thun pa rnams sgrub par bgyi'o// chos smra ba rnams dang / chos nyan pa rnams la nad ma mchis/ 
81a1(rgyud): pa dang grags pa dang / rnyed pa dang / sti stang chen po nye bar sgrub par bgyi'o// yang de'i tshe tshangs pa chen po'i dbyangs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
81a2(rgyud): sa bcu la gnas pa/ tshangs pa'i nang du ni tshangs pa kun gyis bkur/ bdud kyi nang du ni bdud kyis bkur/ brgya byin gyi nang du ni brgya byin kun gyis bkur ba nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam thos kyi bu dang / 'pha
81a3(rgyud): skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / yul 'khor srung drang / dbang phyug chen po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / lha ma yin dang / lha'i dbang po'i nang du ni de dag kun gyis bkur ba kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang / 
81a4(rgyud): ldan pa rgyan dam pas legs par brgyan pa/ bud med kyi ga zugs dang / rtags dang / spyod lam gyis de bzhin ga/ shegs pa shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/ sangs rgyas bcom
81a5(rgyud): ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ lag pa gnyi sa na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che thogs so// de na/ sa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbyangs dang ldan
81a6(rgyud): pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la mig mi 'dzums par bltas te/ gzhan ma yin pa'i dngos po brjod du med pa cir yang ma yin par bltas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa
81a7(rgyud): des tshangs par dbyangs dang ldan pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye khyod kyi mig mi 'dzums par ci'ang ma yin pa'i bar du nga la ci zhig blta/ ci 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang / ci yang ma yin pa zhes
81a8(rgyud): bya ba'i chos gang yod dam/ de bzhin du 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nyon mongs pa rnams yod do zhes bya ba'i ming gi dngos po ni rkyen gyi mtshan nyid do// mtshan nyid kyi rkyen ni ma rigs pa'o// 
81b1(rgyud): ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams nas/ 'gog pa'i bar du rgyas par bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mchis pas na/ de'i slad du ma rig pa zhes gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das gal te
81b2(rgyud): ma rig pa ma mchis na/ srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis pa de dag gang las skye bar 'gyur/ ci na mkha' las skyes zhes bgyi na nam mkha' nyid kyang ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
81b3(rgyud): rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni nam mkha' lta bu'o// ji ltar na mkha' rdzas ma yin/ mtshan nyid ma yin/ mun pa ma yin/ snang ba ma yin/ rtog pa ma yin/ rnam par rtog/ 
81b4(rgyud): pa ma yin/ rnam par rig pa ma yin/ grub pa ma yin/ ba dad pa ma yin/ mtshan nyid ma yan/ mun pa ma yan/ sna pa ma yin/ rnam par rtag pa ma yin/ rnam par rag pa ma yin/ 
81b5(rgyud): grub pa ma yan/ brjod pa ma yan/ ci yang ma yin pa cha shas med pa/ dngos po thams cad spangs pa/ de bzhin du rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams de bzhin nyid kyi phyir// 
81b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni yang dag pa'i mthas yongasu bcad pa'o// bri ba med pa 'am gang ba med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni pha rol dang tshu rol la reg pa med pa'o// cha shas med pa'i phyir
81b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni brjod du med pa'o// mi g.yo zhing rnam par gzhag pa med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni rdzas dang / dngos po dang / mtshan nyid thams cad med pa'o// tshig gi lam dang bral
81b8(rgyud): ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni sgro btags pa med pa ste/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pa las srid pa'i yan lag rnams skyes so// bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i phyir/ sreg
82a1(rgyud): chags brgyad khri bzhi stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas bdud sdig can gyis gsol pa/ gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos na mkha' lta
82a2(rgyud): bur dngos po ma mchis shing brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ de ci'i slad du ye shes dang / brtson 'grus dang / thabs dang pha rol gnon pas khyod ji ltar bdag la 'tshe/ bdag gi bdud kyi yul
82a3(rgyud): 'joms/ bdag gi bdud kyi yul nas sems can kha 'dren/ 'gro ba med pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / ci yang ma yin pa'i sgyu ma la slob du mdzud/ gang gi tshe sems can 'di dag khyod kyi bslab pa la
82a4(rgyud): slob pa na/ de dag nyon mongs pa skye ba spyod pa yang dag par rje su ma mthong ngo // gang gi slad du khyod kyis bdag gi slang du grangs med dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / 
82a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang nyan thos chen po rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / brgya byin dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang / dbang phyug chen po
82a6(rgyud): rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mo 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams bsdus nas/ sangs rgyas kyi
82a7(rgyud): zhing ma lus pa 'di gang bar bgyis/ snying rje med pa 'dis kyang gang dag thos ma thag tu bdag klad pa nad mi bzad pas btab ste/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong zhing lus kyang rul la dri nga bar gyur
82a8(rgyud): pa de 'dra ba'i gsang sngags kyis tshig rnams bshad/ yang de'i tshe bdud drug khri brgyad stong dang bdud kyi 'khor grangs med dpag tu med pa dang / de bzhin du sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 
82b1(rgyud): grul bum dang / sha za de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'grin gcig tu 'di skad ces smraso// bdag cag kyang thos ma thag tu klad pa na bar gyur te/ lus kyang rul cing dri nga bar gyur nas/ shin tu sdug
82b2(rgyud): bsngal ba'i tshor ba myong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sdig can khyod kyis 'das pa de dran par byos shig dang / nga byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i tshe// 
82b3(rgyud): khyod kyis nga bsad pa'i phyir dpag tshad brgyad cu tshun cad kyi sa dang na mkha' bdud kyi sdes bkang ste 'ongs pa nas/ da ltar bdud bye ba 'khor dang bcas te/ nga bsad pa'i bar du bkye bas de bas na khyod
82b4(rgyud): yongs su gdul ba dang / zhi bar bya ba dang / yongs su mya ngan la sa 'da' ba dang / de bzhin du bdud gzhan rnams nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar du gdul ba dang zhi bar bya ba dang / sdug
82b5(rgyud): bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang / 'ong ba dang / 2/ gro ba med pa ci yang ma yin pa'i sgyu ma la bslab par/ bya ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad du 'chi 'pho dang skye ba'i 'khor ba'i
82b6(rgyud): chu kun bskam pa dang / phung po lhag ma med pa'i bar du mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngani las 'da' ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' grangs med
82b7(rgyud): dpag tu med pa nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar rnams bsogs kyi sdig can khyod nga bla na med pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cig/ de ltar na khyod klad pa na ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzang
82b8(rgyud): pa tshor ba 'di las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ mthar gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos nam mkha' rang bzhin lta bu mngon du 'gyur/ bdud kyi yul las ches khyad par du 'bags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul
83a1(rgyud): rnams kyang 'thob pa 'gyur/ yang de'i tshe bdud drug khri brgyad stong dang / bdud kyi 'khor grangs med dpag tu med pa dang / sdang ba'i gnod sbyin nas lus srul po sdang ba'i bar gyis mgrin
83a2(rgyud): gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chutu sems bskyed par bgyi na/ ji ltar bdag cag sangs rgyas kyi chos na mkha'i rang bzhin lta bu de
83a3(rgyud): dag mngon du 'gyur/ thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul 'di yang thob par 'gyur/ de nas bdud sdig can gyis 'di skad ces smras so// gal te bdag phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bar
83a4(rgyud): du klad pa na bar gyur kyang bdag 'di 'dra ba'i g.yo sgyus byang chu rab tu sems mi bskyed do// de nas tshangs pa chen po dpyad sa dang ldan pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag kyang sangs
83a5(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sku na sngar bstan pa'i chos kun gzung bar spro'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga can 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya
83a6(rgyud): thub pa 'di'i bstan pa la gtso bos gtad pa gzud par bgyi ste/ da yang shAkya thub pa nyi ma nub kyi bar du bdag gis bstan pa 'di la chos kyi tshul 'bar bar bgyi'o// yul gang na bdud kyi tshogs kyis
83a7(rgyud): mi thub pa'i gzungs kyi tshogs kyi rnam grangs 'di ma byung ba dar bdag gis 'byung bar bgyi'o// gang du byung ba der ni shin tu lhag bzung ba bgyi'o// grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul
83a8(rgyud): de dag na rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang dag mchis pa de dag kyang srung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ gnod pa las bzlog par bgyi/ don dang dge ba la gzud par bgyi'o// gang
83b1(rgyud): dag bdud kyi tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i gzungs kyi rnams grangs 'di tha na bris nas 'chang ba rnams dang / gang na chos smra ba se ng+ge'i khri la mchis te/ chos kyi rnams grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu 'chad
83b2(rgyud): par 'tshal ba de dag gis der thog mar gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag brjod par bya'o// gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gis bdag dgug par 'gyur te/ bdag nyid 'khor dang bcas par phyogs der mchis
83b3(rgyud): nas/ chos smra ba de dag dang nyan pa de dag srung ba dang sba bar bgyi'o// 'di lta ste/ a ba me/ a ba me/ aM ba re/ e ba re/ pa ri kuny+dzi/ nA da nA da/ puSh+ka rA ba ha/ dza lu ka/ ma kha ya/ i li/ mi li/ 
83b4(rgyud): ki li/ ma li kArti cer mu dre mu dra mu kha swA hA// bcom ldan 'das gang dang gang na chos smra ba de dag gis thog mar gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dran par bgyis la/ bdag cag gis
83b5(rgyud): kyang lha'i rna ba'i khams shin tu yong su dag pas thos te/ der ma mchis na 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung / ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bslus par 'gyur zhing // 
83b6(rgyud): bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi 'gyur bas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag der mchis la/ chos smra ba'i rkang pa'i drung du spyi bas blang
83b7(rgyud): par bgyi'o// chos smra ba de'i spobs pa rigs pas nye bar sgrub par bgyi/ chos smra ba dang / chos nyan pa de dag gis nad thams cad bsal bar bgyi/ lta ba ngan pa dang / bya ba ngan pa dang / the
83b8(rgyud): tsom thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa der bdag 'khor dang bcas te
84a1(rgyud): mchis nas 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ge dang / nad dang / 'jigs pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus ma lags pa'i rlung dang / tsha ba
84a2(rgyud): dang / lta ba ngan pa dang / bya ba ngan pa de dag thams cad dang / mi dang mi ma lags pa dang / dud 'gro rnams kyi 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar bgyi'o// de na bkra mi shis pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / 
84a3(rgyud): ltas ngan pa dang / sdang ba dang / brlang ba dang / zhe gcod pa dang / ro bro ba ma mchis pa dang / kha ba dang / che ba dang / dri nga ba dang / reg na mi bde ba'i dug de thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o// der tsha ba
84a4(rgyud): dang / mu ge'i gnod pa rnams bsal bar bgyi'o// glang po/ che dang / seng+ge dang / stag dang / ma he dang / spyang ki dang / sbrul gdug pa dang / rkun po dang / g.yon can dang / mi dang
84a5(rgyud): mi ma lags pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar bgyi'o// dar sems can thams cad kyi longs spyod dang / kun tu spyod pa'i slad du/ nor dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / me tog
84a6(rgyud): dang / 'bras bu dang / ro dang / zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / gos mal cha sna tshogs nye bar sgrub par bgyi'o// yul gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa
84a7(rgyud): dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / 'chang ba der bdag gis sems can rnams kyi gnod pa thams cad so sor bsal bar bgyi'o// sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang / kun spyod pa'i
84a8(rgyud): slad du phan pa dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad sgrub par bgyi'o// sems can de dag kyang chos 'dod pa dang / dge ba spyod pa la gzud par bgyi ste/ 'di ni bdag gis sangs rgyas
84b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar smon lam btab pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad bdag la thugs brtse bar mdzad du gsol/ skyes bu'i mthu 'di nyams 'og tu chud par
84b2(rgyud): bgyi ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag la yid bzhin du bsam pa yongasu rdzogs pa'i las kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol/ de nas de'i maud la shAkya thub pa la sogs
84b3(rgyud): pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis tshangs pa dbyangs dang ldan pa de la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa dbyangs dang ldan pa 'dir gang gi phyir
84b4(rgyud): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos la mngon par dga' ba'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin
84b5(rgyud): rnams bkug ste/ skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'di lta bu byed par 'a gyur gyis/ nged kyis gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag tshang sa pa dbyangs dang ldan pa 'di la sbyin par bya'o// de nas sangs
84b6(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// tshangs pa dbyangs dang ldan pa la grub par gyur cig/ 'di lta ste/ tsa mur+Na/ muN+Da/ pa ri ts+tshi da/ ha mu ha/ ha mU ha/ saM ra ska ba la
84b7(rgyud): kri/ sha mi kha/ pa ri bA ha/ tsa mA ra ya thA tse/ su bi kha/ a mA la/ ba ri ts+tsha da sarba bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Tha te swA hA// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu bdud dang / brgya
84b8(rgyud): byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin na ma dang / gari brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba'i mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams 'gug cing 'dun par byed pa'i/ 
85a1(rgyud): gzungs 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongasu bzung zhing byin gyi brlabs kyis khyod 'dis skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'di lta bu byed nus par 'gyur ro// dbyangs dang ldan pas
85a2(rgyud): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bud med kyi cha byad 'di lta bus chos kyi tshul srung bar bgyi'o// bud med rnams kyang yongasu bskyang bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bud med la la zhig pu
85a3(rgyud): 'tshal te/ chos kyi rnams grangs 'di 'dzin tam/ klog gam kun chub par bgyid dam/ bris te 'chang na bdag gis bud med de'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// yang bud med gang 'di lta
85a4(rgyud): bus sems yongasu skyo bar gyur te// chos kyi rnams grang ngas 'di 'chang zhing klog pa nas nyan pa'i bar du bgyid na// de 'dod pa la spyod kyang mngal du mi 'chags so// yang bud med gang
85a5(rgyud): brnyas shing smad par gyur pa longs spyod dang kun spyod pa dang bral ba des chos kyi rnam grangs de bklags na/ ba sam pa thams cad 'grub cing bde ba thams cad kyang phun sum
85a6(rgyud): tshigs par 'gyur ro// chos kyi rnams grangs 'di srung ba dang / sems can gyi bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gis nor bu rin po che 'di gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
85a7(rgyud): thams cad la 'bul lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin te/ srung ba dang / yongasu rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs lnga/ 
85a8(rgyud): gzungs kyi le'u ste drug pa'o// / yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu rnam par phye ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
85b1(rgyud): pa shAkya thub pa dang / ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu 'bar ba'i dpal gyi spyan sngar 'dug nas de yud tsam gyis tshangs pa'i cha byad dang / skad cig gis
85b2(rgyud): bdud kyi gzugasu snang ngo // de bzhin du sbyar te/ brgya byin gyi gzugs dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i dbang po'i gzugs dang / 'phrul dga' dang / dga' ldan dang / 'thab bral dang / 
85b3(rgyud): rgyal chen bzhi dang / dbang phyugs chen po dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin pa dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / 
85b4(rgyud): rgyal rigs dang / bram ze'i rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / da/ mangs rigs dang / seng ge dang / glang po che dang / ma he nas dud 'gre'i skye gnas kyi bar gyi gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs
85b5(rgyud): su snang ngo // skad cig gis bya dang / shing dang / ri dang / 'bru sa bu dang / gos dang / mal cha dang / snam bu dang / snod dang / phyung phrul dang / rgyan dang / sman rnam pa sna tshogs dang / 
85b6(rgyud): rin po che'i gzugs dang / yud tsam gyis dge slong dang / dge slong ma'i gzugs dang / skad cig gis sangs rgyas kyi gzugasu snang ngo // skad cig gis kha dog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs dang / 
85b7(rgyud): gzugs brgyad cu rtsa bzhir snang ngo // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la/ tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bu 'di kha dog dang
85b8(rgyud): rtags dang / dbyibs dang / gzugs brgyad cu rtsa bzhir gda' ba'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po rigs kyi bu 'di mthu rab tu che ste/ 
86a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' shin tu rnam par phye ba'i blo gros dam bcas pa'i stobs kyi yul gang la gnas nas sems can rnams yongasu smin par byed cing / shes rab kyi mi sgrib pa med
86a2(rgyud): pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / yongasu ma dag pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na bsam pa dang / sems ji lta bu dang / spyod pa ji lta bu dang / ci 'dra ba'i nad kyis
86a3(rgyud): btab pa dang / gang la skyabasu song ba'i sems can ci 'dra ba dag mthong ba de 'dra ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi bar
86a4(rgyud): gyi gzugs dang kha dog dang / rtags dang / spyod lam dang / dbyibs dang / gzugs de lta bu dag gis sems ca dan rnams theg pa gsum las phyir mi ldog pa la 'god pa dang / 
86a5(rgyud): sems can gang dag 'dod pa'i zil gyis non te/ yo byad dang / longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs 'dod pa de dag gi chag sa pa spangs pa'i phyir yo byad rnams byin nas phyir mi ldog pa la
86a6(rgyud): 'god pa dang nad kyis btab nas sman 'dod pa rnams la sman byin te phyir mi ldog pa la 'god pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' shin tu rnam par phye ba'i blo gros 'dis nyin gcig la gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
86a7(rgyud): snyed kyi sems can rnams sdug bsngal las yongasu thar bar byas te/ theg pa gsum la phyir mi ldog par 'god pa'i dam bcas pa'i stobs kyi yul 'di nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad
86a8(rgyud): kyis ma yin bgrod pa ma yin no// gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'di sems yong su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ skyes bu chen po'i mthu chen po brtsams nas ji srid cig lag
86b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'dis bskal pa gang dag gi pha rol tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chutu sems bskyed pa'i bskal pa ni grangs med de/ sangs rgyas kyi
86b2(rgyud): zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed do// byang chub sems dpa' shin tu rnam par phye ba'i blo gros 'dis bskal pa gang dag la ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus skyes bu'i mthu 'di lta bu brtsam nA bskal pa grangs med
86b3(rgyud): pa drug cu rtsa bzhi 'das so// gang pos gsol ba/ 'di ji srid cig na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan
86b4(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bskal pa chen po brgya phrag nyi shu rtsa drug 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa chen po sbrel ba zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas kyi zhing nor bu'i snying po zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur
86b5(rgyud): te/ skye dgu'i tshe le stong phrag bzhi bcu thub pa na mtshams ma da pa byed pa nas/ mi dge ba bcu'i chos kyi bar dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi nang du bla na med pa yang dag par rje/ 
86b6(rgyud): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog rgyas pa mtha' yas pa'i 'od zer ces bya bar
86b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// des lo bzhi khrir sangs rgyas kyi bya ba ma lus par byed par 'gyur ro// yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir theg pa gsum po dag la sems can rnams yongasu smin par byed par 'gyur
86b8(rgyud): ro// di'i 'og tu phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'dis sngon sems can
87a1(rgyud): yongs su smin par bgyis pa de dag gang du 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu chen po de'i smon lam ris su chad pa med de/ des smon lam 'di skad du/ 
87a2(rgyud): nam phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rar yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnamasu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag par chad med par mthong bar ma gyur tam/ bdag
87a3(rgyud): gis sngon byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na/ sems can gang dag thog mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la btsud pa dang / yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug
87a4(rgyud): la bkod pa de dag phyogaso bcur so sor sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bla dan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sa ngas rgyas par ma mthong ba de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang
87a5(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ra mi bya'o// ting nge 'dzin bkod pa'i mthu 'di 'dra bas phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab
87a6(rgyud): kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag dang / gzhan dag na yang sems can gang dag mtshams med pa byed pa dang / the tsom can nas mi bde ba'i chos kyi bar dang ldan par
87a7(rgyud): 'gyur ba de rnams de dag nas shi 'phos nas/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes la/ bdag byang chub sems dpar gyur bzhin du de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par byas te/ phyir
87a8(rgyud): mi ldog pa la so sor bkod nas/ de nas gdod bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'di lta bu rgyun tu bya'o zhes smon lam
87b1(rgyud): btab bo// de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas 'dus pa'i byang sems dpa' rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// gang dag da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir lhags pa rnams ston pa 'di
87b2(rgyud): lta bu dag kyang mnyes par bgyis byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'dus pa chen po 'di lta bu yang mthong / 'das pa dang / ma khyen pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom
87b3(rgyud): ldan 'das rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying po lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi tshul gyi byin
87b4(rgyud): gyis brlabs sngon ma thos pa 'di yang chos mnyan pa'i slad du rnyed pa ni bdag cag gi rnyed pa legs par snyed do// 2dbus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las dam pa'i
87b5(rgyud): chos yongasu gzung ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / yang de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la bos te 'di skad ces
87b6(rgyud): bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye
87b7(rgyud): chen po'i dbang po nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar du gang dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la 'dir lhags pa khyad cag thams cad ngas spro bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dus pa 'di
87b8(rgyud): lta bu dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus pa 'di dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa 'dus pa 'di
88a1(rgyud): lta bu ni dkon no// de bas khyed kyis 'di mthong nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dam pa'i chos 'di dang / chos kyi tshul 'di yongasu bskyang ba dang / dkon mchog
88a2(rgyud): gsum gyi rigs 'di 'bar bar byed par spro ba dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyan sngar khyed so so nas rang rang gi smon lam thob shig/ yang de'i tshe bdud dge sbyong me tog ces byabs me tog dang / 'bras bu cu/ 
88a3(rgyud): gu sna tshogs kyi rin po che sna bdun gyi bre bo b+hur bur bkang ste/ bud med kyi gzugs kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan par bsgyur nas bud med kyi gos dang rgyan mchog gi brgyan te 'di skad ces
88a4(rgyud): gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang su dag sang / sa rgyas kyi zhing 'dir byon te bzhugs pa thams cad dang / ga/ degazhan yang su dag 'dir 'dus pa thams cad bdag la dgongasu
88a5(rgyud): gsol/ bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams de la me tog dang 'bras bu dang / lo tog dang / myu gu than sa cad kyis byur bur yongasu gtam zhing rgyas pa'i dra bo 'di 'bul
88a6(rgyud): na/ sems can thams cad la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis bdag gi bri bo me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog dang / myu gu thams cad kyis yongasu
88a7(rgyud): gtams pa 'di bzhe su gsol// 'di ltar bdag bskal pa bzang po mtha' dag la sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'dir bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams la zas dang / skom dang / 'bras bu dang / 
88a8(rgyud): me tog gi sbyin pa'i bdag por 'gyur bar bgyi/ de dag kyang yongasu smin par bgyi/ bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa des/ bdag pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par
88b1(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi/ sems can gang dag bdag gis 'dul ba de dag kyang yo byad kyis mi brel bar bdag gis rim gro bgyi na/ bdag gi bsam pa rnams
88b2(rgyud): yongasu rdzogs par dngos grub stsal du gsol// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod 'di ltar sems mngon par dad pas
88b3(rgyud): sbyin pa che zhing mtho ba byas pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad khyod kyis mchod pa byas pa leg so// lags so// khyed kyi bre bo me tog dang / 'bras bus yongasu gang ba 'dri yang bzhes so// khyod kyang
88b4(rgyud): me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bru dang / lo tog la sog ba ji ltar 'dod pa dang / ji tsam 'dod pa dang / gang gi phyir/ 'dod pa rnyed par gyur cig/ khyod kyi re ba yid kyi brnag pa yongasu
88b5(rgyud): rdzogs par gyur cig/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bru phu/ na sum tshogs pa grub par gyur cig/ 'byor pa yang phun su ma tshogs par gyur cig/ de nas bdud dge sbyong me tog gis yang
88b6(rgyud): gsol pa/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / ri brags gang dag na bdud kyi tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i gzungs 'di 'chang ngam/ stan tam/ 'chad dam/ tha na glegs
88b7(rgyud): bam la bris te/ sti stang bgyid pa'i grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / ri brag de dag tu bdag gnas par bgyi'o// de dang de dag tu shing ljon pa rnams kyi me tog dang / 'bras
88b8(rgyud): bu nas 'bru dang lo tog gi bar du sgrub par bgyi'o// de dag thams cad na me tog dang / 'bras bu 'tshal ba'i sems can rnam kyang tshim par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bas na tshebs pa
89a1(rgyud): ma gtogs par gal te de na sems can me tog dang / 'bras bu'i zas 'tshal ba 'ga' zhig me tog dang / 'bras bu'i zas ma 'tshal ba'i slad du 'gum pa'i dus bgyis par
89a2(rgyud): gyur na/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang / 'dus pa chen po ma lus pa 'di bdag gis bslus par gyur gyis/ bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag
89a3(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ gang yang sems can rnams me tog dang 'bras bu 'tshal ba de ni bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs pa'i
89a4(rgyud): rgyur 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de na me tog dang 'bras bu de dag 'tshal nas sems can de dag gcig la gcig pa ngan pa dang / mnyen pa dang / snying rje'i sems su gyur pa de ni
89a5(rgyud): bdag gi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i/ pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// gang me tog dang 'bras bu 'tshal nas brtson 'grus dang ldan
89a6(rgyud): par gyur pa de ni bdag gi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// gang sems dang / sems las byung ba dag la mi rtag pa'i 'du shes 'jug pa de ni/ bdag gis
89a7(rgyud): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// gang me tog dang / 'bras bu 'tshal nas tha na bya dang ri dgas kyang chos 'tshal bar gyur cing stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de ni
89a8(rgyud): bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// gzhan yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang du 'byung ba dar sems can gyi 'bras dang / gro dang / nas dang / til dang / 
89b1(rgyud): mon sran sde'u dang / mo sran gre'u dang / rgya sran dang / sran chung dang / sran ma dang / gang dag lo tog tu 'gyur ba de dag gi slad du bdag gis nan tan cher bgyi'o// 'bru dang lo tog mang po de dag gis kyang
89b2(rgyud): mdzod dang / bang ba rnams thams cad yongasu gtam par bgyi'o// de na sems can tha na bya dang ri dgas dag gis kyang 'tshal bar gyur na/ de ni bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs pa'i
89b3(rgyud): rgyur 'gyuraro// der bdag gis bu ram shing dang / dgun 'brum dang / bal po'i se'u gyi khu shugs shin tu mang po sgrub par bgyi'o// dar bdag gis sems can rnams kyi rdza ma dang / bum pa dang / 
89b4(rgyud): bya sgyogs rnams yongasu gtam par bgyi'o// gang de la tha na bya dang ri dgas la sogs pas 'tshal na yang de ni bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongasu rdzogs
89b5(rgyud): pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// de ltar bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa dru ga po de dag yongasu rdzogs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
89b6(rgyud): bar bgyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di lta bu 'di la rjes su dgyes pa
89b7(rgyud): mdzad du gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ba mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa ya shes rtog ces bya bas 'di skad ces bka
89b8(rgyud): stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod 'di lta bu'i mthu chen po byed nus kyi/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang spro ba brtul ba de lta bus sems can thams ca gnyer bar gyis
90a1(rgyud): shig/ de nas bdud dge sbyong me tog gis de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes tog de las dbugs 'byin pa de thos nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
90a2(rgyud): bdag la dgongasu gsol/ gang la la zhig ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi spyod pa der bdag mi gnas kyi/ gang la lar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa der bdag gnas te/ sa phyogs de na 'bru dang / sman
90a3(rgyud): dang / 'bras bu dang / me tog gang dag 'byung ba de dag sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang / kun spyod pa'i slad du/ rab tu snum bag can dang / shin tu che ba dang / shin tu mang ba dang / shin tu re
90a4(rgyud): gda' ba dang / shin tu kha dog dang ldan par sgrub par ba gyi/ sems can de dag kyang bza' ba dang btung bas tshim par bgyi/ sems can rnams kyi mdzod dang badra ba dang / 
90a5(rgyud): bum pa dang rdza ma dang / bya sgyogs rnams shin tu yongasu gang bar bgyi/ tha na grang bya dang ri dgas kyis de la 'tshal kyang de ni bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs
90a6(rgyud): pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba dang / bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir bskal stong thams cad du sems can rnams la zas dang skom gyi longs spyod 'di lta bu dag gis tshim par bgyi/ de bzhin du sangs
90a7(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnamasu bskal pa stong re re la yang skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'di lta
90a8(rgyud): bu bgyi zhing / de nas gdod bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi na/ bdag gi las yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur bar dngos grub stsal du gsol/ 
90b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'di dag ni rang gi smon lam gyis 'gug pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig lag so// 'di lta ste/ tsa me kha/ tsa me kha/ tsa me khA/ pri bri ta ha ste/ ba ha ba ha ba ha/ sma ra asma kan/ saR+She bi ba bab
90b2(rgyud): sa be na sa ra sa ren+te/ sa ra ma hen+de/ sa ra badz+ran+te/ ta ra pa ya asma ka na/ hu hu/ hu hu/ hu hu/ a saM ga dza ba/ ta kha tA kha ta kha/ bA yu bA he/ u pa nA ya/ san tar pA ya/ bi dz+ra pA/ pu shwA sha/ oM sha d+hi/ 
90b3(rgyud): d+ha na d+ha n+te na/ tsan+d+ra ak+Sha ye dza la b+ha ha ne/ sma ra asmA kan/ sa myaka pra ti pan na ba ya ma/ sa ta ta kA li/ ya ma me/ ma mi ma mI da dza ba ra swA hA// bcom ldan 'das bdag yongasu smin par bgyi ba dang / byang
90b4(rgyud): chub kyi spyod pa yongasu rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du gang dang gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bshad pa de dang de dag tu bdag gnas par bgyi'o// de nas
90b5(rgyud): yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis de la leg so zhes bya ba byin no// byang chub sems dang pa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / bdud 'khor dang bcwa
90b6(rgyud): ba de dag thams cad dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang / lho dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto
90b7(rgyud): 'phye chen po dang / grul bum dang / sha za dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ 
90b8(rgyud): skyes bu dam pa khyod bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can yongasu smin par byed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod pa lagaso leg so// kho bo khag gi bsod nams dang / brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang / 
91a1(rgyud): pha rol gnon pas skyes bu'i mthu de lta bu mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa 'di'i grogs byed par
91a2(rgyud): snying brtse ba can su spro/ de nas bdud dge sbyong me tog gi 'khor gang yin pa des mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag 'di'i slad bzhin du 'brang zhing mdza' dang / rje su 'thun
91a3(rgyud): ba'i grogs bgyi'o// skyes bu dam pa khyod nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe khyod kyi bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
91a4(rgyud): chub tu lung ston cig/ bdud dge sbyong me tog gis smras pa/ bzhi dan bzang dag de bzhin du gyur cig/ sems can ga dang dag gis sa las bon rnams btab te/ me tog dang / 
91a5(rgyud): 'bras bu dang / dri kun tu spyod par gyur pa de yang bdag cag la pha/ na pa dang bde bar gyur cig/ de nas de bzhin gsha gas pa shAkya thub pa de la bdud dge sbyong ma tog gis 'di
91a6(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// bdag ni khyod kyi bstan pa 'dzin pa chos kyi tshul 'bar bar bgyid pa lags te/ 'di nyid du thog mar mu ge'i dgon pa rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ nan tan char bgyis/ btso
91a7(rgyud): ldan 'das bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol// de nas bdud dag sbyong me tog gis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thus de la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal
91a8(rgyud): te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bdud dge sbyong me tog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bde gshegs sras po dpa' bo pad+ma'i gdong longs shig/ 
91b1(rgyud): khyod kyis de ring byang chub mchog tu smon lam snying po btab// rtsa lag gcig pu snying rje skyes te bkres pa'i sdug bsngal gyis// gzir ba'i 'gro ba 'di bkrol nas ni sangs rgyas 'grub par 'gyur/ 
91b2(rgyud): chos rnams rang bzhin dri med dag la na mkha' 'dra ba dang / stong zhing mtshan ma rnams dang smon pa'i yul las rab grol ba// rtogs nas zhing 'dir ring po mi thogs dpal ldan zhes bya ba'i// sangs
91b3(rgyud): dgra thul blo gros shin tu brtan pa nyid du 'gyur// de nas bdud dge sbyong me tog mchog tu dag bzhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ bac+doMs de dag la me tog snon kyis gtor to// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grub pa'i blo gros zhe
91b4(rgyud): bya stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir ga/ togs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dbyangs kyis go bar byas nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// 
91b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdag la dgongasu gsol// bskal pa bzang po byung nas bdag gis de bzhin ga/ shigs pa 'khor 'jig gi spyan sngar yongasu smin par bgyi
91b6(rgyud): ba'i slad du smon lam btab ste/ sen rnams kyi nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi rab tu zho bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ bud med kyi gzugs kyis sa'i bcud las byin blangs te/ rtswa dang rtsa ba sna tshogs kyi nang du stsal to// 
91b7(rgyud): sems can rnams kyi longs spyod du bgyi ba dang / nad rab tu zhi ba'i slad du sman bcud kyis lan brgya rtsa bzhir sbyar te/ rtsa ba'i sman brgya rtsa bzhi dang / 'bras bu'i sman brgya rtsa bzhi dang / mar las
91b8(rgyud): sbyar ba brgya rtsa bzhi dang / bkru sman brgya rtsa bzhi dang / sman nad med rgyargya bzhin ska ba'i phye ma dang / ril bu dang / snar stsal ba'i bar du stong rtsa bzhi bstan to// sems can yongasu smin par bgyi ba dang / nad zhi
92a1(rgyud): bar bgyi ba dang / sems can rnams la phan par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jigs na 'bring dang bcas pa la kun spyad pa sna tshogs kyis
92a2(rgyud): bsnyen bkur bgyis nas/ der bdag byang chub tu lung bstan par 'tshal ba dang / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gis bdag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// mo 'ongs pa'i dus na
92a3(rgyud): skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar dang ldan pa shAkya thub
92a4(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba 'byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po dang / bya/ ngang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa chen po 'byung ste/ der khyod
92a5(rgyud): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs kha gser thub kyis kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal po de'i 'og
92a6(rgyud): 'od srung gis kyang bdag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal nas de'i tshe bdag gis sems can nad pa rnams kyi slad du/ bskal pa chen po gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sman chen
92a7(rgyud): po bcud kyis lan gyi lhar gyur cig/ der yang bdag gis sems can kun gyi spyad pa dang nas rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ sa'i bcud rgya chen po blangs nas rtswa dang / rtsa ba dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma
92a8(rgyud): dang / lo tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi nang du stsal to// de na sems can gang dag gis yang dag par sbyar te 'tshal nas sems can de dag sems dang sems las byung ba dag la mi rtag pa dang / 
92b1(rgyud): sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med par so sor rtog pa gang 'jug pa de yang bdagi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir skyes
92b2(rgyud): bu'i mthu chen po bgyid pa bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyes kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bdag gis bud med kyi
92b3(rgyud): gzugs kyis spro ba chen po dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa 'di lta bu dang / sems can nad pa yongasu smin par bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba 'di lta bus bdag bla na
92b4(rgyud): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs dpar 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/ dad ltar yang bdag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
92b5(rgyud): spyan sngar smon lam 'phel bar bgyid de// skal ba chen po dang / ldan pa pha rol gnon pa brtan pa dge sbyong me tog 'di 'i grogasu yang gyur cig/ bdag cag gnyis kas kha dog
92b6(rgyud): gcig tu bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams yongasu smin par bgyi'o// bud med rnams rab tu yangasu smon par bgyi'o// bud med rnams rab tu yongasu smin par bgyi'o// bcom
92b7(rgyud): ldan 'das yang bdag cag gnyis kyis nad pa rnams dang / rgan po rnams kyi nad rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ sa'i bcud las byin blangs pa zas dang / skom dang / kha dog dang / dri dang / ro dang
92b8(rgyud): ldan pa sbyar bar bgyis te/ bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur gyur cig/ bdag blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
93a1(rgyud): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhes na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag la leg so zhes bgyi ba stsal du gsol// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdug
93a2(rgyud): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan tu gsol// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis skyes bu dam pa khyod lags leg so zhes bya ba byin no// de
93a3(rgyud): nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// khyod ni 'jig rten nad pa'i sman pa gcig/ de bzhin dbang po rnamal bde byed pa// pad+ma ldan pa zhing gtsang dam pa
93a4(rgyud): der/ rnam par snang mjed ces bya'i rgyal bar 'gyur// de ba bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen dpos 'dzin ces bya ba lung bstan par 'dod nas/ bud med kyi
93a5(rgyud): gzugs kyis smon lam btab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas de la yang 'di skad ces bka/ 'a stsal to// khyod ni ri dang sa 'dzin gcig pu ste/ khyod ni re
93a6(rgyud): ba myur du rdzogs par 'gyur// rgyal ldan zhing mchog phun sum tshogs par ni// ye shes dbang phyug ces bya'i rgyal bar 'gyur// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla ma zhes bya ba lung
93a7(rgyud): bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/ bud med kyi gzugs spyod pas smon lam btab pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyod kyis 'dir ni thabs dang shes rab
93a8(rgyud): kyis me tog 'bras bus sems can tshim byas nas// zhing mchog rnam par dag pa sgo ldan du// nyi ma mchog gi bde bar gshegs par 'gyur// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thal ba
93b1(rgyud): ston ces bya ba lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/ bud med kyi gzugs kyis me la yongasu spyod pas/ sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 
93b2(rgyud): de la yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'gro ba mi rtag 'du shes byas nas ni// skye bo byang chub yongasu smin byas nas// skye bo rdul can zhing mchog rab bsngags par// ma yi sgron ma bad bur
93b3(rgyud): gshegs par 'gyur// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la g.yo zhing rdul dang bral ba lud bston pa thob par 'dod nas bud med kyi gzugs kyis rlung la yongasu spyod pas
93b4(rgyud): sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa dang dri nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yang 'di skad ces pa dka' stsal to// g.yo bas sems can rnams la dga' sbyar te/ 
93b5(rgyud): khyod ni nyon mongs rab tu zhi byed cing // rnam dag zhing du mnyam nyid don mthong ba// zla ba'i 'od ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'a gyur// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa med pa'i
93b6(rgyud): sgron ma lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/ bud med kyi gzugs kyis na mkha' las yongasu spyod pas sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa dang / 
93b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ de la yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mi gnas ye shes ston pa mya ngan med// yang dag byang chub lam mchog don smra ba// sgrib pa bsal cing chags pa
93b8(rgyud): med bzhin du// ye shes mchog ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' spos mchog smra ba lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/ bud med kyi gzugs dang ldan pa me
94a1(rgyud): me tog la yongasu spyod pas/ sems can yongasu smin par smon lam btab pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas lam mchog
94a2(rgyud): ston pa rnams la ni// me tog spos mchog dag gis mched byas nas// me tog 'byung gnas zhing mchog rnam dag tu// kun nas spos kyi bde bar gshegs par 'gyur// de bzhin du byang chub sems
94a3(rgyud): dpa' kha dog ngur smrig lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/ bud med kyi gzugs dang ldan pa tshe na sna tshogs la yongasu spyod pas/ sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ smon lam btab pa dang / 
94a4(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jig rten ngur smrig gos la btsud nas su// da dkon mchog gsum rigs dga' bar ldan byas nas// sngon
94a5(rgyud): bor snang ba'i sangs rgyas zhing mchog du// rin chen snang ba'i/ bde bar gshegs par 'gyur// de bzhin du sa bon dang // / nags tshal dang 'bras bu'i lha du ma nas byang chub sems
94a6(rgyud): dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu rtsa bdun gyi bar dag lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/ bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / bud med yongasu smin par
94a7(rgyud): bya ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa dang / de dag tshigasu bcad pa re res lung bstan pa thob par gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ pho mtshan gyur te mo
94a8(rgyud): mtshan thob pa ni shin tu rnyed pa sla la/ mo mtshan gyur te pho mchen thob pa ni shin tu rnyed par dka' ba'i phyir ro// de nas klu dang klu chen po bye ba phrag brgya lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/ byang chu
94b1(rgyud): tu smon lam btab pa dang / tshig su bcad pa re res so sor lung bstan pa thob bo// de bzhin du lha ma yin dkrigs phrag stong drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / bye ba phrag brgyad nu dang / lha dang mi'i bu mo mi 'khrug/ 
94b2(rgyud): ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bdun cu dang / bdud dang bdud kyi 'khor krigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu nas mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u
94b3(rgyud): rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bar dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lung bstan pa thob par 'dod pa
94b4(rgyud): dang / tshig su bcad pu re res so sor lung bstan pa thob bo// / mi ma yin pa dang / de bzhin du lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi
94b5(rgyud): 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za/ bgrang ba las 'das pa sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo/ gas pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa dag ni bskyed par
94b6(rgyud): gyur to// sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur to// sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin dang bzod pa dang / 
94b7(rgyud): gzungs sna tshogs thob par gyur to// sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag ni 'bras bu thob nas/ 'dod chags dang bral te/ zag pa zad par gyur to// sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag
94b8(rgyud): ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sems skyed nas/ sangs rgyas nyid du phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyi 'grin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// 
95a1(rgyud): / bdag cag thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin du dam pa'i chos yongasu bzung bar bgyi'o// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / 
95a2(rgyud): yi ger 'dri ba nas/ 'chang bar bgyi ba'i bar gyi gang zag de dag kyang rig pas yongasu bskyang bar bgyi'o// 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las lung bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / 
95a3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag thugs brtse bas dri ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir
95a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad rigs kyi bu 'di dag gis gos dang za sa dang / skom dang / sman dang / yo byad kyis sems can rnam das shin tu tshim par bgyis te/ bud med kyi gzugs kyis
95a5(rgyud): sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu smin par bgyi ba dang / ci nas 'di dag sam/ sa can yongasu smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sems bskyed
95a6(rgyud): ma thag tu ci 'tshal ba dang / gang gi sla du 'tshal ba dang / ji lta bu 'tshal ba'i gos dang / sa dang / skom dang / sman dang / yo byad rnams sprul pa 'am/ bsham pa 'byor par 'gyur ba'i yid la ra ba yongasu rdzogs par
95a7(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / ci nas skyes bu dam pa 'di dag/ skyes bu chen po'i mthu 'di lta bu bgyid pa dang / sems can rnams la longs spyod dang / yongasu spyod pas rim gro bgyid nus par 'di dag la
95a8(rgyud): dgengasu gsol// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis thugs rje chen po dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes dang / bsam gtan gyis rgyan pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'i yid la mdzad pas
95b1(rgyud): skyes bu dam pa de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyed kyi bsam pa dang / yid la re ba yong su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad
95b2(rgyud): kyi byin gyis brlabs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi rgyu 'thun pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag sbyin no// 'di lta ste/ dz+yo ti ba ba/ d+hi ti ba sa ni ba ba/ sad t+ya ba ba/ put+ya a lang kA ra ba ba/ d+hA nA ra
95b3(rgyud): sa ba ba/ mahA kA ru Na ba ba/ ma hA pra ti ba ba/ sa mo pa/ re ta ba ga/ k+Shi ti ba ba/ sA la li ba ba/ kha ga ba ba/ bA yu ba ba/ ban+ta ba ba/ a d+hiSh+Tha na ba ba/ A ma ba ba/ a ha naM ba ba/ ta tha thA ba ba/ b+hu ti kai Ta/ 
95b4(rgyud): ba ba/ nir bri ti ba ba mu gang pa gardzi na dag/ tri d+hA tu ka ba ba/ tri bi moM k+Sha ba ba/ tri shu kla ba pa/ raSh+Ta a d+hiSh+ThA na ba ba/ ba bA ba ba ba sa mahA/ e n+ya sa ma hA/ ta ta ta Ta Ta TA sh+tsa/ sid+d+ha/ sarba/ 
95b5(rgyud): ku sha la mU la a d+hiSh+ThA na ya swA hA// skyes bu dam pa khyed kyis/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig pa sam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed pa 'di dag son
95b6(rgyud): rnams kyi longs spyod pa dang / kun spyod par bya ba dang / yengasu smin par bya ba dang / khyed kyi byang chub kyi spyod pa yongasasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir zu shig/ yang de'i tshe dge sbyong me tog dang / dpal
95b7(rgyud): gyi lha mo dang rtsi'i lha mo grub pa'i blo gros dang / lha mo sa 'dzin la sogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khri thams cad bud med kyi gzugs kyi sems can rnams kyi long spyod dang kun spyod pa dang / yongs
95b8(rgyud): su smin par bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur nas/ de thams cad kyi mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag gi yid la re ba yong su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas bcom
96a1(rgyud): ldan 'das 'di rnams kyis gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gsungs pas nas/ byin gyis brlabs 'dis bdag cag sems can thams cad la rim gro bgyid nus so// bdag cag
96a2(rgyud): bla na med pa'i ye shes sgrub par nus// bdag cag gis sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gzung bar bgyi zhing brtson 'grus drag pos spro bar
96a3(rgyud): bgyi'o// yang sems can thams cad la snying rje ba'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyan sngar rang rang gi dam bcas pa la gnas par bgyi'o// lha 'am/ klu nas mi'i bar gang la la zhig
96a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam pa'i tshe/ sa kyi tshul 'di ma mchis par bgyid dam zhig par bgyid dam/ rnam par ma rung bar bgyid la/ bdag cag gis dam
96a5(rgyud): pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ gal te ma zlog gam/ nan tan ma bgyis na bdag cag gis dus ga sum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thad
96a6(rgyud): bslus par gyur cig/ bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ kye grogs po dag lha nas mi'i bar gang la la zhig dge slong ngo // 
96a7(rgyud): dge slong ma 'am/ dag bstan nam/ dge bsnyen ma la 'tshal gal te bdag cag gis de dag ma bzlog gam/ bdag cag gis de dag gi 'khrug pa zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du mun ma bgyis na/ bdag cag gis
96a8(rgyud): dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad bslus par gyur cig/ bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyabar/ 
96b1(rgyud): ma gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub don tu gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig zhugs dang cha ba dang / dug dang mtshon dang byad dang / rims zhag gcig pa dang zhanas nyis
96b2(rgyud): dgazhan gsus pa dag zhag shi 'dil da klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lus srul po dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze'i rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / saing+ge dang / stag dang / nang dang / 
96b3(rgyud): bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / 'tshe ba gang yang rung ba'i bar dag gis 'jigs shing skrag par gyur pa las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs
96b4(rgyud): par bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dran na sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa ni ma gtogs te/ bdag ca dag gis de dag gnod pa rnams las yongasu thar bar ma
96b5(rgyud): bgyis na/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas tha/ mas cad bdag cag gis bslus par gyur cig/ bad ga cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
96b6(rgyud): mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ de'i tshe gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'drir gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis de phal legaso zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu
96b7(rgyud): dam pa khyed kyis legs par dam bcas pa legaso legaso// khyod kyis skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'di lta bu byed nus so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bdud sdig can la 'di
96b8(rgyud): skad ces bka' stsal to// thub pa gshegs pa 'di dag la ni dad cing dga' ba'i mchog bskyed de/ de ring gzhan gyi don phyir dga' bar myur du byang chub sems gzhol byos// sdig can khyod ni
97a1(rgyud): rang gi yul nas rab tu grogs med mthu med kyis// thub pa la ni khyod kyis sngo zhing brnyogs par byed pa btang bar byos// de nas bdud sdig can gyis gsol ba/ khyod kyis tshig gis
97a2(rgyud): byang chub dri med dad pa'i sems gcig bdag mi bskyed// thub pa ma gsungs bzhugs shig bdag la rjesu 'gro ba rnams kyang mchis// de dag lhan cig bdag gi yul nas dpung dang bzhon par
97a3(rgyud): bcas par gnas par gyi phun sum tshogs 'dzin bdag mthus ji srid 'tsho bar khyod kyi dbang mi mchis// 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las snying brtse ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// 
97a4(rgyud): yang de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa me tog man da ra ba'i dri mo ngas kyis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces dgasung so// ji ltar 'das pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
97a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag nas byon te/ nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dus/ nas dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di ni legs par byin gyis brlab/ 
97a6(rgyud): bdud bye ba ni pham par mdzad// byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i spyan gyis sems can rnams la ni gzigs/ sdig pa'i lta ba las ni rab tu thar par mdzod/ shes rab kyi sgron ma ni 'bar
97a7(rgyud): bar mdzad/ zhi ba'i lam la ni bkod de/ chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i
97a8(rgyud): chos kyi rnams grangs 'di ni bshad/ nag po'i phyogs ni pham par mdzad/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan ni btsugs pa de bzhin du da ltar phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs shing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
97b1(rgyud): ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis kyang sems can la thugs brtse ba'i slad du nyon mongs pa can sdigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'du chen po mdzad de/ chos kyi tshul 'di legs par
97b2(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa nas/ chos kyi rgyal mchen btsugs pa'i bar du ni mdzad na/ shAkya thub pa nyi ma khyod nub nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir su zhig mchog tu 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos 'di 'dzin
97b3(rgyud): par 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di 'dra bar bgyid par 'gyur/ sems can rnams yongasu smin par bgyid par 'gyur/ 'dus pa chen po 'dir yang bgrang bar chud par 'gyur/ bdag gi
97b4(rgyud): su'i lag tu chos kyi rnams grangs 'di yongasu gtad par bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa da shAkya thub pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa me tog man+dar ba'i
97b5(rgyud): dri mos la 'di skad ces gsung so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa thob/ pa rnams sam/ brgya byin nam/ tshangs pa 'am/ 'jig
97b6(rgyud): rten skyong ba 'am/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkho' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po 'am/ gang su yang rung ste/ chos kyi tshul 'di la
97b7(rgyud): mngon par brtson pa rnams dang / gang dag dbus kyi gling bzhi pa 'di na gnas pa chos kyi tshul 'di la mngon par dad pa'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba nas/ lto 'phye chen
97b8(rgyud): po'i dbang po'i bar de dag gi lag tu/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongasu gtad par mdzod cig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog man+da ra ba'i dri mos kyis dbyangs kyi
98a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa thogs pa med pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' dag khyab la das 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po dag gang su dag sangs rgyas
98a2(rgyud): kyi zhing 'di 'dus pa thams cad nyon cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ni shin tu dkon no// sangs rgyas
98a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das thams cad skad cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu 'dus pa 'di yang shin tu dkon te/ khyed la thugs brtse ba dang / sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba dang / 
98a4(rgyud): dam pa'i chos kyi tshul byin gyis brlabs pa dang / bla na ma dad pa'i lam la dgod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas 'di dag tha/ mas cad 'dus te/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du
98a5(rgyud): gnas par bya ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyu/ na mi 'chad par bya ba dang / sems can ma cad yongasu smin pa ra bya ba nas/ 'khor ba'i pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i bar gyi
98a6(rgyud): phyir dang ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sa'i khams thams cad byin gyis brlab so// chu'i khams thams cad dang / me'i khams thams cad
98a7(rgyud): dang / rlung gi khams thams cad dang / nam mkha'i khams thams cad byin gyis brlab so// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas
98a8(rgyud): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha'
98b1(rgyud): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dag dang / gang dag yang gzi brjid che ba'i sems can rnams dang / gang dag yang gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas na de dag
98b2(rgyud): thams cad la bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye grogs po dag sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi tshul 'di byin gyis brlabs te/ khyod kyi lag tu shin tu
98b3(rgyud): gtad kyis ci nas 'dir dam pa'i chos 'di myur du mi 'jig pa dang / nub par mi 'gyur ba de ltar khyod kyis dam pa'i chos 'di yid la gyis shig/ 'bar bar gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ 
98b4(rgyud): rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang dag 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas yi ger bris te 'chang / ba'i bar du byed pa dang / dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma
98b5(rgyud): 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dam pa'i tshe sa 'dzin pa'i gang zag de dag thams cad yongasu srung zhi nga yongasu bskyab pa'i phyir rigs par khyod kyi lag tu
98b6(rgyud): gtad kyis chos smra ba dang / chos la dga' ba dang / bsam gtan la mngon par dga' ba dang / chos mnyan pa dang / dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams khyed kyis bsrung bar
98b7(rgyud): bya ba'i phyir yongasu bskyang ba'i bar du gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag byung bar gyur pa'i de bzhin
98b8(rgyud): gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dus nas/ chos kyi tshul 'di srung ba dang / mi nub par bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i
99a1(rgyud): / gang zag kun tu srung ba nas/ sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba'i bar gyi phyir/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyi lag tu gtang ngo // de
99a2(rgyud): bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ phyogs bcur sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba de dag thams cad kyang nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skad cig gis 'dus
99a3(rgyud): te/ sems can la phan pa'i phyir gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kyang 'chad par 'gyur/ chos kyi tshul 'di yang byin gyis rlob par 'gyur zhing chos kyi tshul 'di srung ba dang / yongasu
99a4(rgyud): bskyang ba'i phyir/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rte/ na skyong ba thams cad kyi lag tu gtod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du nged kyis kyang da ltar kun tu srung ba dang / sems
99a5(rgyud): can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa rnams dang / gling bzhi pa na gnas pa'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha dang / 
99a6(rgyud): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po rnams kyi lag tu 'di shin tu gtad kyis ci nas myur du mi 'jig cing nub
99a7(rgyud): par mi 'gyur ba de ltar khyed kyi dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di yid la gyis shig/ rab tu 'bar bar gyis shig/ srung bar gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang dag dang dam bcwa
99a8(rgyud): pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams gang 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnams grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas/ za na glags bam la
99b1(rgyud): bris te 'chang bar byed pa'i bar dang / chos smra ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / bsam gtan la mngon par brtson pa dang / dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa de dag la khyed kyis bsrung bar bya'o// ri mor byed/ 
99b2(rgyud): mchod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sa ma/ ri brags ma/ pho brang 'tshor
99b3(rgyud): dang dgon pa'i gnas nas/ dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar du gang na ches kyi rnams grangs 'di rab tu spyod de/ 'chang ngam/ lung 'bog gam/ kun chub par bgyid ngam tha na glags bam la bris te 'cha
99b4(rgyud): na/ chos kyi bcud des sa'i bcud dang / sems can dmangs/ 'phel bar 'gyur te/ khyed des mdangs dang ldan zhing ga zi brjid dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol
99b5(rgyud): gnon pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ khyed kyi g.yogs 'khor dang gzhal med khang 'phel bar 'gyur/ mi'i rgyal po rnam sa kyang bsrungs par 'gyur te/ de dag gi rgyal srid dang / 
99b6(rgyud): dbang phyug kyang 'phel bar 'gyur/ de dag gi yul 'khor thams cad kyang bsrungs par 'gyur ro// 'dzam+bu'i gling gi rgyal po rnams kyang chos kyi bcud des tshims nas gcig la gcig phan pa'i
99b7(rgyud): sems dang ldan par 'gyur/ rgyal po de dag las kyi rnam par smin pa la yang mngon par yang ches par 'gyur/ dge ba'i semasu 'gyur/ ser sna med pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i dngos po'i
99b8(rgyud): sems dang / sems can thams cad la snying rje'i sems nas yang dag par lta ba'i bar du 'gyur ro// so so bdag bdag gi yul la yang mngon par dga' bar 'gyur/ 'dzam+bu'i gling 'di yang skye
100a1(rgyud): bo rags pas gang bar 'gyur/ shin tu lo legs pa dang / shin tu nyams dga' bar 'gyur/ skye bo mang pos gang zhing sa yang mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur/ 'bras bu shin tu mdog
100a2(rgyud): bzang ba dang / shin tu zhim pa dang / lo ma'i sman dang / me tog gi sman dang / nor dang / 'bru rnams shin tu 'byor pa dang / nad med pa dang / bde ba la reg par gnas pa bskyed par 'gyuraro// 
100a3(rgyud): 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ge dang / nad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dug dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / phye ma leb dang / sbrul gdug pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin bum
100a4(rgyud): rungs pa dang / ri dgas dang / bya dang / spyang ki dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / char pa rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ skar dam dang / nyin mo dang / mchen mo dang / zla ba dang / zla ba phyed
100a5(rgyud): dang / lo dang / dus rnams kyang legs par 'byung bar 'gyur/ 8/ sems can rnams kyang phal cher dge ba bcu'i la sa kyi lam la spyod par 'gyur/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas
100a6(rgyud): kyang bde 'gro mthe ris kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag kyang khyed kyi g.yog tu 'gyur ro// de ltar gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i yon tan mang
100a7(rgyud): zhing phan yon che ste/ sems can rnams 'khor ba'i pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'dus pa chen po'i byin gyis brlabs te/ grags pa 'phel zhing yongasu
100a8(rgyud): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bud med kyi dngos po skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba dang / lon grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba/ ma lus par yongasu zad par 'gyuraro// mdor na tshe 'di la bud med kyi
100b1(rgyud): dngos po myong bar 'phangs pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur te/ mtshams med pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa la skus 'deb pa ma gtogs par gang gzhan lus dang / 
100b2(rgyud): ngag dang yid kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'i gnas ngan len de thams cad yongasu byang bar 'gyur ro// gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di tha na glegs bam la bris te 'chang na yang 'dus pa chen po sang+yas
100b3(rgyud): thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'dri'i mthus de'i las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa ri rab tsam yang byang bar 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la dmigs pa 'phel
100b4(rgyud): zhing yong su rdzogs par 'gyur/ yan lag thams cad/ yong su rdzogs pa dang / bsam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi legs par
100b5(rgyud): spyod pa thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / lta ba ngan pa tha mas cad spong ba dang / dgra thams cad chos dang thun pa sa cher gcod pa dang / zhi zhing phra ba'i lam thams cad la
100b6(rgyud): 'jug par 'gyur ro// yul gang du gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod par 'gyur ba der sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa 'dus pa chen po'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs
100b7(rgyud): 'di'i mthus su phyogs 'di shin tu snum par 'gyur/ 'bras bu mdangs dang ldan pa dang / shin tu zhim pa dang / ro dang ldan par 'gyur/ kha ba dang / tsha ba dang / rtsub pa dang / ro med pa spong
100b8(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ me tog dang / 'bras bu shin tu 'byor pa dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / bang ba dang / mdzad dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / bya sgyogs rnams rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// gos dang / 
101a1(rgyud): za dang / skom dang / sman dang / yo byad rnams shin tu 'byor par 'gyur te/ de na sems can gang dag zas dang / skom gyis 'tshe ba de dag ni shin tu nad med pa dang / 
101a2(rgyud): nor dang ldan pa dang / kha dog dang ldan pa dang / stobs dang ldan pa dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang / chos 'dod pa dang / dge ba tshol ba la mngon par brtson pa dang / sdig pa'i lta ba yongasu spong bar
101a3(rgyud): 'gyur te/ de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas khyed dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis khyed kyi g.yog 'phel nas stobs dang ldan zhing thogs pa med pa'i tshogasu 'gyur gyis/ chos
101a4(rgyud): kyi stobs kyis rigs bzhi'i skye ba'i tshogs yongasu bskyang dbar gyis shig/ sems can rnams chos kyi don la tshud cig/ de ltar na khyad kyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i
101a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la mchod pa bya/ sa par 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rmi/ tog man+da ra ba'i dri mos kyis 'dus pa chen po'i mdo'i chos kyi
101a6(rgyud): tshul 'di gzung ba dang bshad pa dang / srung ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi ye shes kyi sgra dbyangs rnam par dag pas don dang / tshig brjod pa'i tshul gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di kun
101a7(rgyud): bkang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / brgya byin gyi dbang po nas tshangs pa'i dbang po/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po thams cad kyi bar du gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na
101a8(rgyud): gnas pa phal tshor gleng bzhi pa 'di na gnas pa rnams la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis bkas spro ba mdzad do// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa
101b1(rgyud): la sogs pa gang dag bsod pa thob pa bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa bdun sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom
101b2(rgyud): ldan 'das thams cad kyi bkras bdag cag gis kyang dus gsum du gabye ba'i de bzhinag bye bzad la mchod pa'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rigs pas ston pa rab bkur zhing gus pa chen pos
101b3(rgyud): gzungs par bgyi'o// snying rjes sems can yongasu smin par bgyi ba nas/ bla na med pa'i lam gyi bar la dgos pa'i slad du bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grong ngam/ grong khyer dang / 
101b4(rgyud): grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul dang / pho brang 'khor dang / dgon pa'i gnas su rgyas par bstan par bgyi'o// dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du
