101b5(rgyud): sems can rnams kyang yongasu smin par bgyi'o// yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sangasargyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi legaso zhes
101b6(rgyud): bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa dag leg so legs so// khyed kyis de bzhin gyis shig/ de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa nas lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i bar thams cad dang / gang dag
101b7(rgyud): gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'dus pa sems can gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba bya ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol
101b8(rgyud): to// bdag cag gis kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzungs par bgyi ba nas rgyas par rab tu bshad pa'i bar du bgyi'o// 
102a1(rgyud): yang dag par bstan par bgyi'o// sems can yongasu smin par bgyi'o// chos 'tshal ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i gang zag rnams kyang srung bar bgyi'o// yongasu bskyang bar bgyi'o// 
102a2(rgyud): gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod par 'gyur ba der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi bkas bdag cag gis kyang 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / mu ge dang / pha rol gyi dmag
102a3(rgyud): tshetshogs dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / char pa dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / gdug pa dang / rtsub pa dang / ro ma mchis pa dang / sra ba dang / kha ba dang / tsha ba'i dngos po rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// bde
102a4(rgyud): ba dang nyams dga' ba dang / lo legs pa dang / 'dum par sgrub par bgyi'o// chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bgyi dpa'i slad du nan+tan cher bgyi'o// chos nyan pa'i rgyal po de dag
102a5(rgyud): kyang shin tu yongasu bskyang bar bgyi'o// bsam gtan la ma don par dga' ba'i sems can rnams kyang srung bar ba/ gyi'o// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams
102a6(rgyud): cad kyi lagaso zhes bya ba byin te/ bzhin bzang dag lagaso legaso// khyed kyis de bzhin du gyis shig/ bdag dang gzhan dang / gnyi ga'i phyir nan+tan gyis shig/ de ltar na/ khyed kyis dus gsum
102a7(rgyud): dugashegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dra da la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar khyed kyis sems can yongasu smin par bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos kyi chu 'bar bar bya ba dang // dam pa'i
102a8(rgyud): chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir brtson na/ khyed ring por mi thogs par myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas
102b1(rgyud): dbus kyi gling bzhi pa 'di na gnas pa'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha'i dbang po nas lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i bar dang / gang dag yang sems can gzi brjid che ba/ 
102b2(rgyud): gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas 'dug ste 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi bkas bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi tshul
102b3(rgyud): 'di bstan par bgyi/ srung bar bgyi/ yongasu bskyang bar bgyi/ 'dus pa chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang rigs
102b4(rgyud): pabs blangs par bgyi ba nas/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul dang / pho brang 'khor dang / dgon pa'i gnas rnamasu rgyas par bshad par bgyi'o// 
102b5(rgyud): dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams kyang bsrung bar/ bgyi'o// yongasu bskyang bar bgyi'o// gang dag chos sgrub pas gnas pa'am/ chos smra ba 'am/ chos nyan
102b6(rgyud): pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / dad pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams chos kyi rnam grangs 'od 'dzin pa nas/ glags bam la bris te 'chang ba'i bar du
102b7(rgyud): bgyid pa dang / bsam gtan la brtson pa de dag bdag cag gis srung bar bgyi/ yongasu bskyang bar bgyi/ sti stang du bgyi/ bla mar bgyi/ ri mor bgyi/ mchod par bgyi/ gos dang / gdugs
102b8(rgyud): dang / ba dan dang / rgyal mtshan dang / byug pa nas sman dang / yo byad thams cad kyi bar gyis ste stang du bgyi'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa 'am/ ston pa'i drung du bdag cag
103a1(rgyud): nyid nyan pa'i slad du nye bar mchi bar bgyi'o// bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ston par shes nas/ gdugs dang / rgyan mtshan dang / ba dan gyis sti stang du bgyi/ bla
103a2(rgyud): mar bgyi/ ri mor bgyi/ mchod par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnams grangs 'di 'chad pa'i tshe/ chos
103a3(rgyud): kyi bcud kyis bdag cag mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur/ stobs dang ldan/ brtson 'grus dang ldan/ mthu dang ldan/ dran pa dang ldan/ ye shes dang ldan/ phyogs dang g.yog tu ldan zhing tshogs dang
103a4(rgyud): mthu thegs pa med par 'gyur ro// de ltar bdag cag gi sa yul thams cad du 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 2da thab mo dang / 'gyod pa dang / mu ge dang / nad dang / pha rol
103a5(rgyud): gyi dmag tshogs dang / dus ma lags pa'i rlung dang / char pa dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / sdang ba dang / rtsub pa
103a6(rgyud): dang / brlang ba dang / kha ba dang / tsha ba dang / re ma mchis pa dang / mi dge ba'i phyogs bgyid pa'i dngos po rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// shin tu bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / nyams dga' ba dang / 
103a7(rgyud): nang ma mchis pa dang / 'dum pa sgrub par bgyi'o// rlung dang / char pa dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba rnams dus dus su 'byung bar bgyi'o// mtshan mo dang / nyin mo dang / zla ba phyed dang / lo dang dus rnams
103a8(rgyud): kyang legs par 'byung bar bgyi'o// gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba rnams kyang legs par rgyu bar bgyi'o// 'bab chu dang / chu mig dang / rdzing dang / lteng ko yang shin tu gtam par bgyi'o// 
103b1(rgyud): gang du sems can rnams chu'i klung gis gnod par 'gyur ba de yang bdag cag gis gsal bar bgyi'o// grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs de dag tu yang sems can la sman par
103b2(rgyud): bgyi ba'i slad du bdag cag gis 'dab mu dang / yal ga dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / sdong bu dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / ro dang / lo tog rnams shin tu snum pa dang / bda' ba dang / kha
103b3(rgyud): dog dang ro che zhing mang ba sgrub par bgyi'o// sems can rnams la nor dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / gos dang / lhab lhub kyis mi brel bar sgrub par bgyi'o// sems can de dag kyang dge ba
103b4(rgyud): tshel ba'i sems dang // sdig pa yongasu spong ba dang / dpal dang bsod nams 'byung bas tshe ring po 'grub par bgyi de'o// grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / 
103b5(rgyud): yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor gang dag na sangs rgyas tha mas cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi phya ga rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ngam/ tha na glegs
103b6(rgyud): bam la bris te 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ mchod pa dang / sti stang bgyid cing 'chang ba de dag tu rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba 'byung ba de dag kyang bdag cag gis srung bar bgyi/ 
103b7(rgyud): yongasu bskyang bar bgyi/ de dag la gnod pa gsal bar bgyi/ phan pa sgrub par bgyi'o// ltang mo dang / bkra mi shis pa dang / lta ba ngan pa dang / byed pa ngan pa dang / byin gyis brlabs ngan pa dang / 
103b8(rgyud): smon lam ngan pa dang / skyabs ngan pa dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / kha bsag dang / g.yo dang / sgyu dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phrag dog dang / khro ba dang / ser sna thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// yang
104a1(rgyud): dag pa'i lta ba'i lam drang po dang / dang pa dang / dul ba dang / kun sdom bu dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa gzung bar bgyi'o// de bzhin du btsun mo ngam pa rnams dang / 
104a2(rgyud): btsun mo'i 'khor rnams dang / blon po dang / rtsis pa chen po dang / grong rdal dang / zho shas 'tshe ba dang / ljongs kyi mi rnams dang / rigs bzhi rnams dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang
104a3(rgyud): bu mo rnams kyang srung zhing yongasu sbyang bar bgyi ba nas/ ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa'i bar la gzud par bgyi'o// tha na yul de dag tu rkang bzhi pa rnams kyang srung bar bgyi'o// gang na chos
104a4(rgyud): kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba nas/ glegs bam dal bris te bzhag pa'i bar bgyid na/ sems can de da dag la bdag cag gis de 'dra ba'i nan tan chen po dang / rtul
104a5(rgyud): ba chen pos yongasu bskyang bar bgyi'o// chos kyi tshul yang dag par bstan pa'i slad du/ bskal pa mtha' yas paranan tan cher bgyi'o// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dra
104a6(rgyud): de dag thams cad kyis skyes bu nga la de dag thams cad kyis skyes bu dam pa de dag la legs zhes bya ba byin te/ bzhin bzang dag legaso legaso// khyed kyis de bzhin du gyis shig/ khyed/ 
104a7(rgyud): kyis chos kyi tshul dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi nub par nan tan byas na/ de ltar khyed kyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan thams cad la mchod pa byas par
104a8(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ kun tu srung ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas brgya byin ngapa/ 
104b1(rgyud): tshangs pa dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / yul 'khor srung dang / lus ngan po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ bzhin bzung dag nga sems can la snying rje ba'i smon lam gyis nyon mongs/ 
104b2(rgyud): pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mu ge byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ sems can ma rig pa'i
104b3(rgyud): mun par zhugs pa/ nyon mongs pa'i chom kun dang / g.yon can gyis gtses pa rnams kyi nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ngas bdud kyi phyogs ni 'pham par byas/ dam pa'i chos kyi
104b4(rgyud): rgyal mtshan ni bsgrengs/ sems can tshad med pa dag ni snga dag bsngal rnams las yongasu thar par byas/ dam pa'i tshe das kyi char ni phab/ ngas bdud bye ba ni pham par byas so// 
104b5(rgyud): bzhin bzang dag gang gi phyir de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi kha mas nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
104b6(rgyud): chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa dpag tu med pa rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sa'i bcud dang / seMn gyi gnas kyi nyes pa rnams rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can yongasu smin par bya ba dang / 
104b7(rgyud): mi dge ba'i las thams cad ma lus par zad par bya ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs yun ring du gnas par bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa mtha' dag yongasu grub par bya ba'i bar gyi phyir/ 
104b8(rgyud): chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos thams cad kyi lus 'joms pa'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis bcwa
105a1(rgyud): kyi de bzhin du khyed kyis kyang byin gyis rlobs la/ srungs shig/ gang nga'i dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag par srung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bas bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa
105a2(rgyud): tshogs dang / gang lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / dran pa dang / brjod pa dang / bshad pa dang / gsum la skyabasu 'gro ba dang / dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa dang / tshangs par spyod pa la gnas
105a3(rgyud): pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa'i tshogs dang / gang bsam gtan dang po sgom pa nas 'du shes dang / tsher ba 'gog pa sgom pa'i bar dang / gang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i// 
105a4(rgyud): 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon du bya ba'i bAr+ya gyi tshogs dang / gang yang 'dra ba de'i bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du
105a5(rgyud): bya ba de lta na byed pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byed par 'gyur pa nas/ nga'i dam pa'i chos kyi sgron ma 'di 'bar bar 'gyur ba'i bar du bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba'i
105a6(rgyud): tshetshogs de thams cad khyed kyi lag tu gtad do// gang de bzhin gshegs pas thugasu chud pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag par 'bar bar byed par brtson pa de dag gi bsod nams kyi tshogs kyang
105a7(rgyud): khyed kyi lag tu gtad do// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'dzin pa nas tha na glegs bam la bris te 'chang ba'i bar du byed pa de dag kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis las
105a8(rgyud): thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// grogs po dag grong ngam dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar du gang dang gang na chos smra ba shin tu khrus byas te/ gos sar pa bgos nas me tog bkram pa'i 'khor gyi khyam su spos
105b1(rgyud): sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa dang / ras bcos bu dang / ras sna tshogs bting ba'i seng+ge'i khri la 'dug ste/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lce'i rtse mos 'chang ngam tha na glegs bam la byis te klog pa
105b2(rgyud): de dag byed chos mnyan pa 'am/ tshe smra ba srung ba'am/ chos nyan pa rnams yongasu bskyang ba 'am/ bdag dang gzhan dang gnyi ga'i mi dge ba'i las yong su zad par bya ba'i phyir ma deng na/ ngo'i phyir khyed kyi
105b3(rgyud): bslus pa dang / lam bskyed pa la rmongs pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma
105b4(rgyud): mchis pa'i dus na dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di rab tu nub pa/ gyur pa na/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ deljongs sam/ ri brag sam/ pho brang 'khor tam/ gtsug
105b5(rgyud): lag khang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ rgyal po'i pho bra nga ngam/ bram ze'i khyim mam/ tshong dpon gyi khyim ga/ dam ngas kyi khyim gang dang gang du dge slong ngas/ dge slong ma 'am/ 
105b6(rgyud): dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma chos smra ba 'am/ gzhan yang dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shin tu khrus bgyis te/ yan lag shin tu byugs nas gos sar pa 'tshal te/ 
105b7(rgyud): me tog bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyamasu spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa/ ras bcos bu dang / ras sna tshogs bting pa/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis bskor ba'i sang+ge'i khri la 'dug ste/ 
105b8(rgyud): lce'i rtse mos gzungs kyi phyag rgya 'di gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad dam/ bris te klog pa der chos nyan pa 'am/ chos smra ba de srung ba 'am/ chos nyan pa de dag dang / 
106a1(rgyud): bdag dang gzhan dang gnyi ga'i nyon mongs pa'i las yongasu byang ba 'am/ dge ba'i chos yongasu smin par bgyi ba 'am/ chos kyi tshul chen po yang dag par 'bar bar
106a2(rgyud): bgyi ba 'am/ ye shes kyi snang ba chen po mchog gi lam la 'jug pa'i slad du/ bdag 'khor brgya stong du mas bskor te/ der ma mchis sam/ grong nas dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar de dag
106a3(rgyud): yongasu bskyang ba dang / sems can de dag gi nor dang / 'bru dang mdzod dang / bang ba mang po rab tu gang ba'i slad du/ der ma mchis na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dra zad kyi spyan sngar bdag gri
106a4(rgyud): sngon ma thos pa'i bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal ba dar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ a~M gu ha/ aM gu ha/ aM gu ha/ d+haM ga pu ra ha/ na yA mi kha/ kha kho kha ba/ kha ba/ 
106a5(rgyud): klin na kha ba swA hA// bcom ldan 'das 'di dag ni gal te bdag chos nyan pa 'am/ chos smra ba srung ba nas/ ner dang / 'bru dang / mjed dang / bang ba mang po rnam par 'phel/ 
106a6(rgyud): bas tshim par bgyi ba'i slad du der ma mchis na/ yi dam las 'gal bar 'gyur ba lagaso// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
106a7(rgyud): dpa' chen po thams cad dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin thams cad kyis mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa de dag la leg so zhes bya ba rab tu byin no// de nas ko'u shi kas 'di skad ce
106a8(rgyud): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mchis pa'i dus na/ grong dang / grong khyer gang dang gang du zhes bya ba nas/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar
106b1(rgyud): bdag gis sngon ma thos pa'i bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang / 'gal bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// 'di lta ste/ kha ba mr-i kha/ a ba mr-i kha/ na la g+ha/ a mung dz+nyA/ a mU ba ha/ a khat+ta/ 
106b2(rgyud): a kha a sha kha/ dzi na pra kha swA hA// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gris dam bcas pa bzhin du ma bgyis na/ 'di ni bdag gi bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba
106b3(rgyud): nas/ mi dang mi ma yin pa dag gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la leg so zhes bya ba byin pa'i bar du'o// de nas 'phags skyes pos kyang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mchi/ 
106b4(rgyud): pa'i dus na grong gi bar du gang dang gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di srung ba ma bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gis bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar
106b5(rgyud): 'gyur ba lags// 'di lta ste/ u kha na ba nA ba sa ba na/ sa mU dra saM bo dz+nyA ta thA ts+tsha ta/ ba ru Na ba ba rA dza swA hA/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar gyis/ rgyal po chen po 'ang/ 
106b6(rgyud): skyes po la lag so zhes bya ba rab tu byin no// de nas mig mi bzang gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mchis pa'i dus na grong gi bar du gang dang gang du
106b7(rgyud): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di srung ba ma bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba lags/ 
106b8(rgyud): so/ 'di lta ste/ dza lo g+ha/ a to ga/ a ma ma/ mo g+ha/ a ma sA rA dzA na tsa ya mu dza swA hA// de nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar gyis rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang la lagaso
107a1(rgyud): zhes bya ba rab tu byin no// de nas yang yul 'khor srung gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mchis pa'i dus na gzhagang du chos kyi rnam
107a2(rgyud): grangs 'di ni srung ba ma bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gis bre bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyus lags// 'di lta ste/ bin+du dza kha/ kha ba dza ba ra mu kha kA sA ra/ pu ka ba ha/ 
107a3(rgyud): A mArga pa Ta swA hA/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar gyi sa rgyal po napo yul 'khor srung la leg so zhes bya ba rab tu byin no// de nas lus ngan pos kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nga ltar dang
107a4(rgyud): ma mchis pa'i dus na/ grong gi bar du gang dang gang du chos kyi da rnam grangs 'di srung ba ma bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gis/ 
107a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bro bor ba'i bar gyi sa dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur lag so// 'di lta ste/ kU dre/ k+Shu kU kU dre/ khak+Shu dre/ sU k+Shu dre/ a nA ya na k+Shu dre/ hr-ing
107a6(rgyud): k+ShA dre/ sA ga ra hr-i dak+Sha dre/ saM gu su k+Shu dra/ d+haR+Ya k+Sha ya mu dre swA hA// mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar gyis rgyal po chen po lus ngan po la leg so zhes bya ba'i bar du byin no// yang de'i tshe gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten
107a7(rgyud): gyi khams 'di na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po stong nyis brgya dang gzhan yang gling bzhi pa gzhan na gnas pa bzhi khri dang / gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / 
107a8(rgyud): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba/ gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang
107b1(rgyud): ma mchis pa'i dus na/ dam pa'i chos kyi sgron ma'i bar du nub par gyur pa de'i tshe/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ rjes pa/  bragasas/ pho brang 'khor tam/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ 
107b2(rgyud): bram ze'i khyim mam/ tshong dpon gyi khyim mam/ bdag nyid chen po'i khyim mam/ dmangs kyi khyim gang dang gang du dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma chos smra ba 'am/ 
107b3(rgyud): gzhan yang ngang pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shin tu khrus bgyis te/ yan lag shin tu byugs nas/ gos sar pa bgos te/ me tog bkram pa'i 'khor gyi khyamasu ras bcos bu sna tshogs
107b4(rgyud): bting ba/ spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa/ re bre ba sna tshogs kyis gtam pa rgyan pa'i sang+ge'i khri la mchis te/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lha'i rtse mos gzhan la rgyu
107b5(rgyud): cher yang dag par rab tu bshad dam/ glegs bam la bris/ ti klog par gal te bdag cag re re zhing yang 'khor ba/ rgya steng du mas skor nas ma mchis sam/ der chos nyan pa dang /  tshwa
107b6(rgyud): smra ba srung ba dang / rang gi 'khor srung ba dang / sems can gzhan yang srung ba dang / sems can yongasu smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ grong ngam/ grong rdal nas dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar de dag tu ma mchis
107b7(rgyud): sam/ 'khor dang bcas pas bka' ma mnos sam/ yongasu ma bskyang sam/ der sems can rnams kyi nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzad dang / bang ba mang po rab tu gtam mam/ der ma mchis sam/ der
107b8(rgyud): sems can rnams kyi 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ge dang / nad dang / pha rol gyi dmigs tshogs dang / dus ma lags pa'i char dang / rlung dang / shin tu grang ba dang / tsha ba rnams ma
108a1(rgyud): bzlog na bdag cag gis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la bslus pa dang / 'khus pa dang / ma mnyes par
108a2(rgyud): bgyis par 'gyur te/ lus la sha bkras btab pa dang / lta ba yong su nyams pa dang / lus rul bar 'gyur ro// bdag cag g.yog dang bcas pas de ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang gling ngani
108a3(rgyud): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bcom 'dra de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di 'bar bar bgyi'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
108a4(rgyud): bstan par bgyi'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dad pa'i// gang zag rnams srung bar bgyi/ yongasu bskyang bar/ bgyi/ yongasu smin par bgyi'o// dran par bgyis pa'i las
108a5(rgyud): yongasu sbyang ba'i slad du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan par chos smra ba'i gang zag de la bskul bar bgyi'o// chos nyan pa dang / chos smra ba kun spyod pa rnam par 'phel
108a6(rgyud): ba sgrub par bgyi'o// rgyal ba'i bstan pa mi 'jig pa'i chos su gzung bar bgyi'o// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad la
108a7(rgyud): legaso zhes bya ba byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ltad mo can gyis zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ci lags/ gang
108a8(rgyud): bdud bye ba phrag brgya po 'dir 'dus pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'
108b1(rgyud): ltas mo can gyis gsol pa/ ci 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyis dkon mchog gsum la dad pa thob lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin
108b2(rgyud): no// bdud sdig can g.yogs stong yod pa 'di dad pa ma thob ste/ 'khrug cing yid mi dga' nas da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang dam pa'i chos kyi tshul ji srid 'bar ba de srid du 'di
108b3(rgyud): klags lta zhing skabs tshol te/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul gzhig pa drang nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed do// de bzhin du g.yog khri sum stong yod pa'i bdud bco brgyad dang / g.yog nyi shu rtsa
108b4(rgyud): gcig yod pa nyis brgya po de dag kyang g.yog dang bcas par dkon mchog gsumo la dad pa ma tho bo ste/ 'khrugs shing yid mi dga' nas 'di dag da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na
108b5(rgyud): yang ji srid du dam pa'i chos kyi tshul rab tu rgyas pa de sri/ du/ 'di dag nga'i bstan pa la klags lta zhing skabs tshil te/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul gzhig pa dang / nub par bya/ 
108b6(rgyud): ba'i phyir brtson par byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon chad khon du bzung ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dang / mi dge ba'i grogs pos yongasu zin pa dang / dge pas skyo zhing mya ngan las 'dra/ 
108b7(rgyud): pa'i bod pa mi 'dod pa dang / smon lam ma btab pa'i phyir sems dang sems mtshams mi sbyor/ dad par mi byed gnas par mi byed/ rab tu gtong bar mi byed do// sangs rgyas 'dus pa
108b8(rgyud): chen po 'di lta bu mthong ba dang / gzungs zab mo 'di lta bu thos pas rgyu de nyid kyis phyin cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dad pa rab tu rnyed par 'gyur ro// byang chub
109a1(rgyud): ltad mo can gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gal te sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba sbran pa rnams kyi rna lam du grag par gyur na yang
109a2(rgyud): de nyid de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das shin tu ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs po ngo mtshar to// yang de'i tshe bdud ri bya zhes bya ba
109a3(rgyud): sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ dkon mchog gsum la dad pa mi nyams pa rnyed par gyur pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob
109a4(rgyud): pab de drang srong chen po'i cha byad du de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thu ba pa'i spyan sngar 'dug par gyur nas/ de stan las la dngas nas kun tu bltas nas thal mo sbyar te/ sangs rgyas
109a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi stobs bskyed pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di dbyangs kyis bkang ste/ 'di skad ces smras// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub
109a6(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad bdag la dgongasu gsol// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen// 
109a7(rgyud): po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / bdud g.yog dang bcas pa rnams kyang bdag gi tshig gson cig/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa thugs rje chen po mnga' ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma can
109a8(rgyud): thams cad rnam par gcod pa/ yon tan bkod pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par mdzad pa'i ston pa 'di sngon gyi smon lam gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma
109b1(rgyud): lnga dang ldan pa 'di lta bur bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa/ dam pa'i chos spong ba/ 'phags pa la skur pa
109b2(rgyud): 'debs pa/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa/ ngan par spyod pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi rgyud yongasu smin par mdzad pa dang / ngan song gsum las shin tu bzla ba dang / theg pa gsul yong su smin
109b3(rgyud): par mdzad pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa la dgod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa bgyi ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par mdzad pa'i slang du
109b4(rgyud): zhugs kyis de la khyed kyis kyang ci nas sten pa'i bstan pa yu dan ring du gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul 'di ya/ dang rnam par mi 'jigs pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang / 
109b5(rgyud): sgrub pa dang mi ldan pa ma gtogs par da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa/ 'i dus na yang bdud dam/ bdud kyi 'khor sus kyangade bzhin gshegs pas rab tu gsungs pa rgyal ba'i
109b6(rgyud): bstan pa 'di la sems can 'ga' la yang 'tshe ba 'am/ rnam par 'jig pa 'am/ nub par bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / gang dag yang dam pa'i chos 'di 'dzin pa dang / chos la nan tan
109b7(rgyud): bgyid pa dang / chos smra ba dang / chos nyan pa'i dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gzhan yang dad pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo las gsuMl mngon par
109b8(rgyud): brtson pa/ bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po la dga'/ dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i wa la mngon par brtson pa/ khams gsum na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa spong ba la mngon par
110a1(rgyud): brtson pa/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las yong su thar par bgyid par gyur pa de dag la yang bdud dam/ bdud kyi bu 'am/ bdud kyi bu mo 'am/ bdud kyi 'khor tam
110a2(rgyud): bdud kyi 'khor mo 'am/ bdud kyi pho nyas gtses pa'i bsam pas glags lta ba 'am/ skabs tshol du mchi zhing g.yeng ba dang / dge ba'i bar chad kyi las bgyid par mi 'gyur ba de ltar mdzod
110a3(rgyud): cig/ da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la gsol lo// bdag la las kyi dngos grub stsal du stsol/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang
110a4(rgyud): bdud kyi 'khor thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma
110a5(rgyud): yin pa thams cad kyang bdag la thugs brtse bar mdzod cig/ gang su da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sa la gnas pa de dag kyang zhong 'dar gtags pa'i sa la
110a6(rgyud): gnas pa de dag kyang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bdag la thugs brtse bar mdzad cig
110a7(rgyud): bdag la gsang sngags kyi dngos grub stsol cig dang / bdag gis bdud dam/ bdud kyi 'khor de nan thur gyis tshar bcas pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / lus la gnod pa dang / lus
110a8(rgyud): dpa' bkong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul nyams par bgyi ba'i bsngags bshad par bgyi ste/ de nas bdud dang bdud kyi bu dang / bdud kyi bu mo dang / bdud kyi 'khor mo dang / bdud kyi pho nyas gang bcom ldan
110b1(rgyud): 'das kyi bstan pa la sems ma dang bu gcig cum bskyed dam/ dge slong la 'tshe'am/ tha na skad cig gcig tsam yang sems 'khrugs par bgyid pa nas/ dge ba'i phyogs yeng su 'bri bar brgya/ 
110b2(rgyud): ba'i bar du nan tan bgyid pa dang / grong dang / gleng khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / be brang 'khor dang / ri brag de rnams ma chu badzin pa sems bskyed pa dang / gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
110b3(rgyud): 'chang bar 'gyur pa de dag tu tha na skad cig gcig tsam yang 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ge dang / nang dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dus ma legs pa'i rlung dang / char dang / grang ba dang
110b4(rgyud): chab dang / chu be dang / sa g.yo ba dang / sa 'gas pa dang / skar ma ra' ltung bar bgyid pa dang / lo ma dang me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / re skye bar mi bgyid dam/ ma ru
110b5(rgyud): bar bgyid pa 'tshal na/ bdud des de ltar sems bskyed ma/ thag tu bdud nas bdud kyi pho nya'i bar de dag rims nad kyis tsha bar 'gyur/ lus lci ba dang / rdul pa dang / 
110b6(rgyud): rul ba dang / dri mi zhim pa dang / las su mi rung ba dang / ldang mi nus par 'gyur/ bcing ba lngas bdag bcings par mthong ba dang / de'i yan lag thams cad 'khums pa'i bar du 'gyur
110b7(rgyud): zhing / slar brkyang mi nus pa dang / de'i phyogs thams cad mun par gyur nas nyi ma snang ba'i gzugs kyang mi mthong ba dang / de'i rdzu 'phrul bri nas sems 'khrug par 'gyur/ de'i dbang po drug
110b8(rgyud): kyang spyod yul du 'jug mi nus par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ a ma la/ a ha ma ma le/ a dza ba ba/ a dza ba ba/ mU ra sa la bya kha sa le/ dza ma sa le/ ha ha ha ha ha ha/ g+ho ra sat+ta/ dza na kha ga/ dzA
111a1(rgyud): ma khrag/ bi dI bas pa ge/ a m+b+ha rba R+Sha/ k+Sha/ k+Shak+Sha k+Shak+Sha/ mU la baha/ lags// kharnyas/ bA rig// myur/ adz+nyA/ bA su&d+ha/ sas rkyo d+ha/ ba nad+hu/ 
111a2(rgyud): khA nya dz+nyA/ ba ba nyad nya/ b+hU ta ke Ti ta tha tAnya dz+nyA/ sarba dz+nyA b+hi/ a d+hiSh+Ti/ twe nya dz+nyA/ pa rA kra ma tri ga Na ta k+Sha ba/ kA ma ma/ k+Sha ma dz+nye/ k+Shi pre ta mA ra bi shA ya swA hA// thams cad mkhyen pa rnams kyi byin gyis
111a3(rgyud): brlabs kyis skad cig tu bdud kyi yul thams cad med par byas te/ 'bras bu med par gyur to// gang su yang rung ginod par 'dod pa de dag kyang de bzhin no// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom
111a4(rgyud): ldan 'das rnams kyis legaso zhes bya ba byin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / lha thams cad kyis kyang legaso zhes bya ba rab
111a5(rgyud): tu byin no// de nas de'i tshe sa ni g.yos/ sprin ni 'khrugs/ ri 'i rgyal po rnams ni rab tu g.yos te/ gang sangs rgya/ sa kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa dang / byang chub sems
111a6(rgyud): dpa' bzod pa thob pa rnams ma gtogs par bdud 'khor dang bcas pa dang / de bzhin du 'byung po ma rungs pa rnams kyang 'khrug so// de nas bdud sdig can gyis byang chub sems dpa' sra
111a7(rgyud): ba'i blo gros la smra ba/ rigs kyi bu bdud ri byi 'di stobs ga las 'ongs/ mthu ga las 'ongs na gang snying rje med pa 'dis/ rang gi phyogs thams cad dang / nga'i stobs kyi yul dang / pha rol
111a8(rgyud): gnon pa thams cad ma lus par bcom ste/ nag po'i rtsa lag ni pham par byas/ mi mthun par chad par smra ba dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i phyogs ni mtho bar byas/ bdag kyang gzungs 'di thos
111b1(rgyud): ma thag tu lus dri mi zhim pa dang / rul ba dang / las su mi rung bar gyur/ bdag gi phyogs thams cad kyang mun par gyur te/ snang zhing mthong ba med par byas/ yongasu gdung ba chen pos bdag
111b2(rgyud): gdungs so// byang chub sems dpa' sra ba'i blo gros kyis smras pa/ sdig can sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs dang mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyi stobs bskyed
111b3(rgyud): bas/ bdud ri byis bdud kyi stobs kyi yul dang / pha rol gnon pa 'di thams cad rnam par 'joms shing de gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kyang bshad kyis sdig can
111b4(rgyud): khyod de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la drad par gyis shig/ ci nas khyod lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sdug bsngal la// de dag las yongasu grol bar 'gyur bar/ bla na med pa yang
111b5(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang sems bskyed gcig/ bdud sdig can gyis smras pa/ bdag ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu grangs med par 'di bas kyang ches sdig pa'i lus dang ngag
111b6(rgyud): dang yid kyi sdug bsngal rnams la spre'i/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mi bskyed do// 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul srub
111b7(rgyud): ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas ni/ gnod sbyin 'jigs 'jigs lta'i gzugs su/ yang dag shes ni ri
111b8(rgyud): dgas kyi gzugasu/ shes pa'i sgron ma ni spre'u'i gzugasu/ sred spong ni ro'i gzugasu/ rgyun bcad ni glang po che'i gzugs/ sems can chen po lnga po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
112a1(rgyud): shAkya thub pa'i drung nas ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na de bzhin gshegs pa ko'u de n+ya 'od 'dre'i spyan sngar 'khod nas// de dag gi lus thams cad las rnam par dag cing dri zhing / 
112a2(rgyud): pA'i 'od phyung ngo // de nas sems can chen po lnga po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ nor bu rin po che chen po me'i 'od ces bya ba lag pa gnyis na thog so// de nas byang chub
112a3(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ltad mo can gyis de dag gis bsam pa tshul bzhin rnam par dag pa la bltas te/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snyam nas/ 
112a4(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas de la bos te'adi skad ces smras so// skyes bu dam pa khyed kyi dbang gang mthong na khyed 'di lta bu'i spyod lam gyis/ sangs rgya bcom
112a5(rgyud): ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed// 'brog gnas kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sngon byungab 'das pa'i dus bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig na/ sangs
112a6(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba byung ngo // de'i tshe bdag cag gis bla na med pa yang dag par
112a7(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed nas/ sems can yongasu smin par bya bI phyir nan tan byaso// de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / bskal
112a8(rgyud): pa chen po bzang po 'di byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig 'jig rten du byung gi bar du de na yang bdag cag sngon smon lam gyis spun drung du gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs
112b1(rgyud): ba de la bdag cag gis mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur rnam pa mang po byas so// de nas yang der sems can chen po dge bsnyen yang dag shes bsam gtan la mngon par dga' bas der 'di 'dra/ 
112b2(rgyud): ba'i smon lam btab ste/ bdag bskal pa chen po bzang po 'di la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen por gyur la/ de na 'brog dgon pa na gnas pa ma rungs pa sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / 
112b3(rgyud): snying brtse ba med par zhugs pa byad gzugs tha dad pa'i gnod sbyin dag nas lus srul po'i bar du de dag la bdag gis 'di 'dra ba'i chos bshad par bgyi ste/ 'di ltar ngang pa thob par
112b4(rgyud): byas nas brlab pa 'dzin du btsud la/ zhi ba'i lam la dge dad pa nas/ de na dud 'gro'i skye gnasu song ba'i ri dwags dang / spyang ki dang / sgo ba dang / phag la sogs pa la yang
112b5(rgyud): chos bshad pa nas gnod sbyin ma rung ba gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma ste/ dkyi bar dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba dge/ ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa'i bar la chos bshad pas yongasu
112b6(rgyud): smin par byas nas/ theg pa gsum pa dag la so sor bkod de/ de nas gdod bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par shog shig ces byas so// de
112b7(rgyud): bzhin du gnod sbyin shes pa'i sgron ma spre'u'i gzugs kyis spre'u yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab bo// sred spong ra'i gzugs kyis mi khom pas nyam nga bar gyur pa'i sems can
112b8(rgyud): rnams yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab bo// rgyun bcad glang po che'i gzugs kyis glang po che yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab ste/ de bzhin du gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen
113a1(rgyud): de gling bzhi pa na gnas pa khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tshol zhing sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs btab pa
113a2(rgyud): gyur nas/ bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig de'i spyan sngar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tshol zhing bskal pa bzang po 'di thams cad du gnod sbyin ma rungs
113a3(rgyud): pa yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab bo// 'di na gnod sbyin mo rungs pa snying rje med pa/ byas pa mi gzo ba/ yang ba spyod pa/ sdig pa 'dod pa/ snying rje dang mi ldan pa nas/ lus srul po
113a4(rgyud): sems can la 'tsho ba/ mdongs 'phrog pa sems 'khrug par/ byed pa/ mi dge ba'i semasu byed pa/ srog gcod pa/ denas log par lta ba'i bar dag dang ldan pa/ rgyal rigs
113a5(rgyud): dang / bram ze'i rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs gang dag sems 'khrugs par byed pa/ yul 'khor da nga/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs
113a6(rgyud): 'khrug par byed pa/ gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / nyin par dang / mtshon mo dang / zla ba dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / dus dang / lo 'khrug par byed pa/ 'thab pa
113a7(rgyud): dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ge dang / nad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshegs dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / char pa dang / rab tu grang ba dang / tsha bar byed pa sa bon dang / sman dang lo ma dang / me tog
113a8(rgyud): dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog ma rungs par byed pa/ sems can gyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba dang / nad med pa dang / 'dus pa dang / dge ba'i chos la mos pa dang / sa'i bcud dang / mdangs dang / don
113b1(rgyud): dang / chos kyi ro dang / rnam par grol ba'i ro nub par byed pa rnams brlab pa 'dzin du btsud de phyir mi ldog pa la bkod nas/ gang tshun chad bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
113b2(rgyud): lung bstan pa thob pa de tshun chad bdag rtag tu gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon gyi nang du skyes te/ gnod sbyin sdig can nas lus srul po'i bar theg pa gsum po dag la yongasu smin par byas nas/ 
113b3(rgyud): phyir mi ldog pa la bkod cing de tshun chad sems can rab dang / 'bring dang / tha ma mthong yang bsnyes par mi dran gyi sems can ci 'dra ba mthong ba de nyid kyi tshul gyis de dag la smras/ yang dag par
113b4(rgyud): gzengs bstod / yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas/ sdig pa las bzlog/ byams pa dang / snying rje'i sems la bzhag ste/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa gsum po dag la phyir mi ldog
113b5(rgyud): par so sor bkod to// bdag gnod sbyin gyi 'khor gang dang gang / du phyin pa der de dag gnod sbyin 'brog gnas bde bar/ 'ongs sam zhes tshig tu 'bod do// de bas na bdag ming 'brog
113b6(rgyud): gnas shes bya bar gyur to// gang dag da ltar chos snying pa dang / bral zhing sdom pa la mi gnas te/ gcig tu las nag po spyod pa'i mi do dag ni shi ba'i dus byas nas ngan song gsum du skyes te/ mi'i nang
113b7(rgyud): du ni nyung zad cig skye'o// gang dag las 'dren mar spyod cing dkon mchog gsum la dad pa ma thob pa de dag ni shi ba'i dus byas nas phal cher gnod sbyin sdig can dang / gnod sbyin lus srul pa'i
113b8(rgyud): nang du skye'o// de bas na da ltar 'jig rten na gnod sbyin sdig can nas/ gnod sbyin lus srul po'i bar du shin tu phal tsho bar rnam par 'phel te/ de dag thams cad kyang dkar po'i phyogs
114a1(rgyud): nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa sha stag go/ de bas na da ltar shin tu dus ngan pa la bab pas bdag gis 'jam pos ni dus thams cad du gnod sbyin ma rungs pa nas lus srul
114a2(rgyud): po ma rungs pa'i bar dag chos dkar po la dged par mi nus/ bdag gi rgyal rigs dang / bram ze'i rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / dge sbyong dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / 
114a3(rgyud): khye'u dang / bu mo 'khrug pa rnams kyang slar zhi bar bya mi nus/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor 'khrugs pa yong zhi bar bya mi nus
114a4(rgyud): bdag gis 'byung po rnams kyi sems dang sems las byung ba yang phyir zhing rnam par thar pa'i ro la dgod par yang mi nus te/ rigs kyi bu gnod sbyin dang / lus srul po thams
114a5(rgyud): cad kyi snying la g.yo sbyor ba mi drang ba'i shes pa yang brda/ ga gis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyis she/ so// rigs kyi bu 'byung po rnams kyi snying po rdo rje na mkha' rtog/ 
114a6(rgyud): 'jug ces bya ba rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzungs kyi tshig drag pa mi bzad pa chen po yod de/ gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag gis btab na/ gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo 'am/ gnod sbyin
114a7(rgyud): rgan po 'am/ gnod sbyin rgan mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor pho 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor mo 'am/ srin po dang / srin mo nas/ klu dang / 
114a8(rgyud): klu mo dang / grul bum dang / grul bum mo dang / brjed byed dang / brjed byed mo'i bar dang / nyin gcig pa 'am/ nyin bzhi pa nas/ lus srul po 'am/ lus srul mo 'am/ lus srul rgan
114b1(rgyud): po 'am lus srul rgan mo 'am/ lus srul gyi bu 'am/ lus srul gyi bu mo 'am/ lus srul gyi 'khor po 'am/ lus srul gyi 'khor me'i bar dag gis phyi phyir zhing rgyal rigs
114b2(rgyud): dkrugs pa nas/ ljongs kyi bar du dkrug par byed mi nus so// rigs kyi bu gleng ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal nas dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar du gang na rdo rje na mkha' rtogs 'jug ces bya ba 'byung po
114b3(rgyud): thams cad kyi snying po drag pa mi zad pa chen po rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bshad par gyur pa der gnod sbyin dang / lus srul po ma rungs pa de dag gis sngon khon du bzung shing mi dge ba'i/ 
114b4(rgyud): las byed pa de dag thams cad btang nas/ byams pa dang / snying rje dang / sems 'jam pa dang / 'byung po thams cad la snying rje dang ldan pa dang / phan pa'i sems su 'gyur
114b5(rgyud): ro// yul 'khor dang / dmyangs dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lus srul po'i 'khrugs pa thams/ cang dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / 
114b6(rgyud): char pa dang / dug dang / mtshon dang / byad dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / lus kyi rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / 'dus pa dang / nyin gcig pa 'am/ nyin gnyis pa drang / nyin gtsu
114b7(rgyud): pa dang / bzhi pa'i rims dang / mdze dang / skem po dang / g.yan pa dang / lud pa dang / 'brum bu dang / lton pa dang / yan lag dang / nyin lag gi nad dang / 'khrug pa dag zhi bar byed do// de na mi dang mi/ 
114b8(rgyud): ma yin pa dang / ri dgas dang / bya la sogs pa las dkar ba'i mtha' la mnga' la mngon par brtson pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad spangs pa/ bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad dang ldan pas
115a1(rgyud): nyin mtshan 'das par byed pa dang / dge ba dang / sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / lus dang / sems mi ngal bar byang chub kyi lam
115a2(rgyud): tshol ba la brtson par byed do// yang 'di skad ces kyang smras te/ rigs kyi bu ji ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi bdag gi las kyi dngos grub 'di stsal cing byin gyis brlabs par mdzad
115a3(rgyud): de rje su yi rang bar mdzad na/ bdag gis 'khrug pa thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa/ ma rungs pa thams cad dad par bgyid pa/ mi dge ba'i phyogs thams
115a4(rgyud): cad bzlog par bgyi la/ dge ba'i phyogs thams cad 'phe dal bar bgyid pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyi snying po rdo rje na mkha' rtogs 'jug ces bgyi ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig
115a5(rgyud): bshad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bdag gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa byin gyis pa rlab tu gsol/ 'di ltar bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di
115a6(rgyud): ma lus par dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa'i yi ge dang sgras gang bar bgyis la/ de bzhin du ci nas kyang 'dir lhags pa'i 'khor rnams dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig
115a7(rgyud): brjod pa'i don dang tshig dang / yi ges tshim par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas la bos te/ 'di skad ces/ 
115a8(rgyud): bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu nag po'i phyogs skrag par bya ba dang / dkar po'i phyogs 'bar bar bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di dag gis khyod kyi rdo rje na mkha' rtogs 'jug ces bya ba
115b1(rgyud): 'byung po thams cad kyi snying po'i gsang sngags kyi gzungs 'di'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa byin gyis brlabs kyis skyes bu dam pa khyod spro bar gyis la 'khrug pa thams cad rab tu zhi
115b2(rgyud): bar byed pa 'byung po thams cad kyi snying po'i gsang sngags kyi gzungs ma rus pa thams cad bzlog par byed pa rdo rje na mkha' rtogs 'jug ces bya ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag smras shig/ 
115b3(rgyud): de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas stan las langs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ma lus par
115b4(rgyud): dbyangs kyis go bar byed cing gsang sngags kyi tshig 'dir gu smras so// 'di lta ste/ d+hu ma d+hA ma/ d+ha ma d+h+ya ma/ d+hu ma d+hu ma/ ni la ni la/ ni la ni la/ ku Ta No ku Ta Ne/ ma hA ku Ta Ne/ ta ta
115b5(rgyud): to/ ma hA ta ta/ a ba b+ha sa/ a b+hi a b+hi/ ri Ni ri Ni/ ma hA ri/ na ro Ni/ mi ri mi ri mi r-i/ dA ri me/ ri she ma hA ri she/ shu lu shu lu/ mahA shu le/ shu lu shu lu d+ha/ mahA shu lu/ 
115b6(rgyud): shu lu/ u gu ma/ gu ma gu mA na/ rI mi ri mi/ hi ri hi ri/ hi ri hi ri/ hi ri/ hi ri/ hi ri/ hi ri/ hi ri hi ri/ hi ri hi ri/ mi ni ma na/ hi ni hai nai/ mu ni mu ni/ bud+d+ha li pra ba ra/ sr-i shU lo ka tsIr+ye/ 
115b7(rgyud): dzi nai dzi ne/ dzi na ri Sha b+he/ dzi na dzi na/ dzi na ri Sha b+ha swA hA// bcom ldan 'das grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ glong rdal lam/ ljongs nas/ dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar du
115b8(rgyud): gang dang gang na 'byung po thams cad kyi snying po rdo rje na mkha' rtogs 'jug ces bya ba gsang sngags kyi tshig rig pa chen mo 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ de na gnod sbyin ma rungs pa nas/ lus srul po ma
116a1(rgyud): rungs pa'i bar du gang dag sems ma dad pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis brlabs pa'i sdom pa yongs su mi len pa dang / sems can de dag la byams pa'i sems/ 
116a2(rgyud): nye bar mi 'jog pa de dag gi don du bdag gis yang shin tu mi zad pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di bshad do// 'di lta ste/ ats+tsha an+na/ mu na mu ne/ ag+ni/ hU hU mu ne mu nai/ ma hA ri Sha b+ha
116a3(rgyud): hu hu/ a gra dA na te/ a ta/ a ta/ a b+hi ru ta/ hi ni hi ni/ hi ni hi ni/ hi ri/ hi ri/ hi ri/ hi ri/ hi ri/ hi ri hI ri/ tri ku ma/ gu ma gu ma/ gu ma/ hri li hi li/ ni li ni li/ ma hA ni li/ su mu dra me
116a4(rgyud): Sha/ ha ta/ ha tA ha ta/ d+hu ra nA ma/ kha khA pa kha khA ba kha pro thi bi ap+te dzI bA yu/ A kA sha/ tha tha tha/ g+hum+b+he b+hu g+hum+b+ha/ adak+Shi g+hum+b+he/ dzi hwA gum+b+he/ sar+b+bA ga s+yai/  g+hu/ sa maM ta g+hum+b+he swA hA/ 
116a5(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas kyis gsang sngag sa kyi tshig 'di dag smras ma thag tu de nas de'i med la/ lha dang ka klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lus srul po thams
116a6(rgyud): cad 'khrugs te/ skrag nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sa dang na mkha' la gnas pa mtha' dag 'dar ro// de nas skad cig de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar thal mo/ 
116a7(rgyud): sbyar te/ lan gsum 'di skad ces sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas kyis
116a8(rgyud): shin tu mi bzad pa 'byung po thams cad kyi snying po gnon pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams smras so// zhes brjod do// 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las 'breg gnas kyi le'u ste
116b1(rgyud): bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad bzhengs pa'i brda' dang / rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs pa'i brda' bstan to// de nas/ 
116b2(rgyud): de'i ming la thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / sa dang na mkha' la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang rab tu 'dar/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i sa 'di yang g.yos/ na mkha' la yang me tog gi
116b3(rgyud): char dang / bar snang las kyang sil snyan bye ba'i sgra byung / spos dang / bdug pa thams cad kyang shin tu byung / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad kyang snang bas khyab par gyur nas/ 'khor thams cad
116b4(rgyud): thal mo sbyar te 'khod do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa can dun gyi dri chen po la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas ga/ sol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma mchis pa'i dus na/ gang
116b5(rgyud): dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog/ pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / yi ger
116b6(rgyud): 'bri ba dang / bris nas 'chang bar bgyid pa'i sems can de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam dang ldan par 'gyur/ sems can de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos du zhig gis byin
116b7(rgyud): gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan gyi dri chen pos mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshang
116b8(rgyud): pa ci nas bdud kyi phyogs tshar bcad pa dang / 'thab pa'i snyog pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas
117a1(rgyud): par bya ba dang / lam rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis khams drug byin gyis brlab so// de bzhin du gang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
117a2(rgyud): 'dzin pa nas bris te/ 'chang ba'i bar gyi sems can de dag sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos bcus byin gyis brlabs so// bcu gang zhe na/ tshangs pa 'di lta ste/ 
117a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkho'i lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / 
117a4(rgyud): grul bum de dag la khyed kyis sems can de dag rtag tu srung sa shig gnod pa las bzlog shig/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las dge ba la chud cig/ zas dang / skom
117a5(rgyud): dang / longs spyod dang / kun spyod pa dang / nad med pa la ma khas pas bdag gi srog dang yang brdos la/ sem sa can de dag gzung bar gyis shig ces rigs pas gtad
117a6(rgyud): nas de dag gi dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / spobs pa la mkhas paskyon med par 'gyur ro// de dag gi yid kyi brnag pa 'dod pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas gnas par mi 'gyur te/ 
117a7(rgyud): de dag stong pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro// de dag sems pa dang / mtshungs shing zab mo la bzed pa dang ldan la bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po la yang brtson par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i chos la gnas/ 
117a8(rgyud): nas sems can gyi 'khor gyi lus las snying po blangs te/ dngos po gsum yong su dag pa'i byang chub kyi spyod pa nyams 'og tu chud bar 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rin po che'i rgyal mtshan yang thob/ 
117b1(rgyud): par 'gyur te/ ting nge 'dzin des ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rnam par dpyod pa'i shes pa la yang mkhas par 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe yang sems can de dag gi mdun du sangs rgyas bcom ldan
117b2(rgyud): 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor cing / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun du bdar ba 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos ston cing bzhugs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag kyang mthong ba
117b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las tshig dang / don dang yi ger ldan pa'i chos bshad pa de lta bus thob par 'gyur ro// thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa zang zing med pa'i
117b4(rgyud): dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i bar du thob nas/ las kyi sgrib pa mi dge ba de dag thams cad rnam par shes paHdam la chos dang ldan pas mgo mnyan du 'gag par 'gyur ro// 
117b5(rgyud): ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing / gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag 'tsho zhing gzhes la bzhugs te/ theg
117b6(rgyud): pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' shig 'chad pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can de dag theg pa chen po la gnas shing sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas sems na mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i
117b7(rgyud): sems can de dag dang / mtshungs par 'grogs par 'gyur te/ ring por mi thogs par yon tan de dang / yang ldan par 'gyur ro// sems can de dag rang gi smon lam gtogs par phyin chad nyon
117b8(rgyud): mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
118a1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// tshangs pa da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di 'bar bar byed cing / gzungs kyi phyag brgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas
118a2(rgyud): glegs bam la bris te 'chang ba'i bar gyi sems can de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos bcu po dag gis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de dag ni sangs rgyas dang / byang
118a3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por 'gyur ro// de nas bcom
118a4(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la ba kra' stsal pa/ kye grogs po dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
118a5(rgyud): gang su dag phyogs bcu nas 'dir byon pa de dag thams ca/ da kyis khyed la thugs brtse ba dang / 'jig rten gyi la/ mas 'dir phyi rol gyi dngos po rnam par sbyang ba dang / sems can
118a6(rgyud): thams cad yong su smin par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi spyod pa rab tu bstan pa dang / bdud kyi phyogs pham par bya ba dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi bya ba ma lus par bstan pa
118a7(rgyud): dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad por bya ba dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / ma rungs pa thams cad bzlog pa dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las srung ba dang / lta ba
118a8(rgyud): ngan pa thams cad spangs pa dang byang chub kyi lam la gzod ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / las dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par bya ba'i phyir ro// 
118b1(rgyud): mtshar che zhing drad du zung ba sngon ma thos pa/ gzungs kyi tshig zab mo rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu bshad de/ des chags pa med pa'i gzungs la spobs pa dang / ye
118b2(rgyud): nam mkha' dang / mtshungs pa la gzud pa dang / tshul gcig pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir/ khyim dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / yul srung ba nas gling bzhi srung ba
118b3(rgyud): dang / lha dang / klu dang / mi dang / mi ma yin bsrung ba dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog rnams srung ba dang / chos smra ba dang / chos nyan pa'i bar dag srung
118b4(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// grogs po dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi rnam dgrangs 'di las dngos po re re yang snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i ye
118b5(rgyud): shes kyi rgyu 'thun pa rnam pa bcus byin gyis brlabs so// grogs po dag dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
118b6(rgyud): thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di yongasu spyad do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes pa thams cad kyi mchod rten du gyur pa bla ma'i gnas ston par kun gyi
118b7(rgyud): bkur ba/ phyag bya ba'i gnas su gyur pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshams med pa lnga byed pa/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa dag kyang las kyi sgrib pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu de dag ma lus par
118b8(rgyud): yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad la skyi sgrib pa spangs nas/ dge ba'i chos rnams la gnas par 'gyur te/ grogs pa dag de lta bu ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
119a1(rgyud): rnams kyi skyes bu'i mthu chen po'o// grogs po dag khyed kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sti stang du byas te/ dam pa'i chos 'di gzung bar bya/ bsrung bar bya'o// dum
119a2(rgyud): pa'i chos 'di 'dzin pa'i gang zag/ khyim na gnas pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / chos la nan tan byed pa rnams kyang srung bar bya'o// de ltar na/ khyed la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro// de nas
119a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog mtshan gyis de'i tshe/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yon tan dang / phan yon rab tu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gang
119a4(rgyud): gis zhing kun gser gyis rab tu bkang nas ni// skyob pa ma gron po dag la mchod par phul ba bas// gang dgang dam pa mchog gi mdo 'di 'dzin byed na// 'jigs med ngas ni
119a5(rgyud): bsod nams dpag tu med pa 'thob// de nas de bzhin ga shags pa rin chen gdugs kyi dpal gyis kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// brgya chad pa yi gser rnams las// 
119a6(rgyud): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed// khyu mchog thub la phul bas ni// mdo 'di'i bsod nams mtshungs mi 'thob// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ri bo brtsegs kyis kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
119a7(rgyud): me tog tshogs kyi gdugs mchog sprin rnams kyis ni nam mkha' khabs byas te// gang gis mchod phyir dga' mgu yid kyis sangs rgyas rnams la phul ba bas// gang zhig phyin chad zad 'gyur
119a8(rgyud): 'jigs ldan dus na mdo 'di 'dzin byed na// de yi bsod nams tshad dag sems can kun gyis brjod par mi nuso// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thu bas kyang 'di skad
119b1(rgyud): ces bka' stsal to// thub pa'i spyan sngar me'i snying po dri zhim til gyis byugs pa ri rab tsam// mar me bus pa 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis gus par bskal pa bye bar bzung ba bas// gang gzhan la
119b2(rgyud): la bsod nams 'dod pa sgrib po srab par smon pa de dag gis// zad pa'i dus tshe 'khor du mdo sde'i gtam byas de bas bsod nams khyad par 'phags// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs
119b3(rgyud): pas kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// blo gros 'chang ba gang gis bzod pa sgom zhing rtag tu brtson 'grus rtsom// rtag tu bsam gtan gzhol zhing mnyam gzhag lus kyis shes rab sprul
119b4(rgyud): pa bas// zad pa'i dus ngan tshe na gang zhig dam chos phyag rgya 'a dri 'dzin pa// de yi bzod dang brtson 'grus 'di ni mtshungs med shes rab gzhal du med// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ting
119b5(rgyud): nge 'dzin rdul dang bral ba'i stobs kyis rnam par gnon pa/ sa kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// gang gis me// de 'di bshad nas bzung dang mngon par bris pa dang // gzhan
119b6(rgyud): ngag 'dzin bcug gus par rtag tu klog pa dang / bdug pa me tog phreng ba gos mchog rnams kyi mchod// bsod nams gang thob de ni brjod par mi nus so// de nas sangs rgyas bcom
119b7(rgyud): ldan 'das tshad med grangs med pa de dag gis/ mdo'i bsngags pa dang / yon tan dang / phan yon dpag tu med par brjod nas/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag
119b8(rgyud): la bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye grogs po dag las kyi sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad byang bar byed pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i dus na gang thos pa tsam gyis kyang sems can
120a1(rgyud): rnams kyi las kyi sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 
120a2(rgyud): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'dus pa chen
120a3(rgyud): po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ mthar phyin pa'i le'u ste/ bcu gsum pa rdzogs so// / 'phags pa 'dus pa rin po che tog gi gzungs rdzogs s+ho// 
120a4(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan po shi len+d+ra be d+hi dang / dz+nyA na mi tra dang / su ren+ta te d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la
120a5(rgyud): phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma ri ts+yai nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma 'od zer can zhes bya ba'i gzungs
120a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas
120a7(rgyud): sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po brgya phrag phye dang bcu gsum dang / byang chub sems dpa' seMdang chen po mang po dag dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom
120a8(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag lha me 'od zer can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de nyi ma dang zla ba'i mdun dang mdun nas 'gro ste de ltar med// gzung du med/ 
120b1(rgyud): bcing du med/ dgag du med/ brgal du med/ rmongs par byar med/ chud pas bcad du med/ mgo breg du med/ gzhur med/ tshig par byar med/ dgra'i dbang du mi 'gro'o// dge slong dag gapa
120b2(rgyud): gis lha me 'od zer can de'i ming shes pa de yang bltar med/ gzung du med/ bcing du med/ dgag tu med/ brgal du med/ rmongs par byar med/ chad pas bcad du me mgo breg du med/ 
120b3(rgyud): gzhur med/ tshig par byar med/ de dgra'i dbang du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// da ltar bdag gis kyang lha mo 'od zer can gyis ming shes kyis/ bdag kyang bltar med par gyur cig/ gzungs du
120b4(rgyud): med par gyur cig/ gtsong du med par gyur cig/ dgag tu med par gyur cig/ brgal du med par gyur cig/  rmongs par byar med par gyur cig/ chad pas bcad du med
120b5(rgyud): par gyur cig/ mgo brag tu med par gyur cig/ gzhur me da par gyur cig/ tshig par byar med par gyur cig/ dgra'i dbang du mi 'gro bar gyur cig/ de la gsang sngags kyi
120b6(rgyud): tshig ni 'di rnams yin no// tad+ya thA/ oM pa dA kra ma si/ pa rA kra ma si/ u da ya ma si/ nai r-i ma si/ ar+k+ka ma si/ mar+k+ka ma si/ urma ma si/ ba na ma si/ gul+ma ma si/ tsI ba ra ma si/ ma hA tsI
120b7(rgyud): ba ra ma si/ e ta ra d+ha na ma si swA hA// oM lha mo 'od zer can bdag lam du skyobs shig/ bdag lam log pa las skyobs shig/ bdag skye bo'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig/ bdag rgyal
120b8(rgyud): po'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig/ bdag glang po che'i 'jigs pa las skyob shig/ bdag chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa la skyobs shig/ bdag klu'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig/ bdag
121a1(rgyud): seng+ge'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig/ bdag stag gi 'jig pa las skyobs shig/ bdag me'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig/ bdag chu'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig/ 
121a2(rgyud): bdag sbrul gyi 'jigs pa las skyobs shig/ bdag dug gi 'jigs pa las skyobs shig/ bdag phyir rgol ba dang / dgra thams cad las skyobs shig/ 'khrugs pa dang / ma 'khrugs pa dang / 
121a3(rgyud): nyams pa dang / ma nyams pa thams cad du yang bdag seng+ge las bsrungs shig/ bdag stag las bsrungs shig/ bdag klu las bsrungs shig/ bdag sbrul las bsrung shig/ swA hA/ bdag
121a4(rgyud): 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa dang / nang mgo ba dang / 'khrugs pa thams cad las bsrungs shig ba dasrungs shig/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ tad+ya thA/ i A lo// 
121a5(rgyud): tA lo/ kA lo/ sats+tsha lo swa ma ba mUn+ti rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM/ bdag dang / sems can thams cad la 'tshe ba dang / 'jigs pa dang nad thams cad las bsrungs shig swA hA/ dkon mchog
121a6(rgyud): gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// lha mo 'od zer can gyi snying po brjod par bya sta/ tad+ya thA/ oM bat+tA li/ ba dA li/ ba rA li/ ba rA ha mu khi/ sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+Ta nAM/ tsak+Shu ra mu khaM ban d+ha ban+d+ha ben d+ha mu khaM/ dzaM b+ha
121a7(rgyud): ya/ staM b+ha ya/ mo ha ya swA hA/ oM mA rI ts+yai swA hA/ oM ba rA li/ ba dA li/ bat+ta li ba rA ha mu khi/ sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+TA nAM/ tsak+Shu ra mu khaM b+haM d+ha bi d+ha swA hAM// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
121a8(rgyud): nas/ dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dge dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ 
121b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags ma 'od zer can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / paN+Di ta a mo g+ha badz+ra dang / lo snab dge
121b2(rgyud): slong ba ri rin chen grags pas bsgyur ba'o// / de nas lha mo 'od zer 'di'i gzungs kyi rtog pa yin te/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyal po chen po yongasu bzung ba'o// 
121b3(rgyud): zla ba'i gzugs brnyan nam/ nyi mi'i steng du 'od zer can rnam par bsam par bya'o// de'i 'od zer las yongasu grub pa'i khab dang skud pa dang bcas pas gdug pa can rnams kyi mig dang kha
121b4(rgyud): drungs bzhin par mdun du rnam par bsam par bya'o// byi ro ral mthong po'i spyod yul du mtshams bcing ba byas la zla ba dang nyi ma gnyis dag gi 'od zer las yongasu rdzogs
121b5(rgyud): bzhin pa'i lha mo 'od zer canu ma mnyan yod na bzhugs te/ zhes bya ba nas bzung ste/ lha mo 'od zer can zhes bya/ ba ni rgyal bas bka' stsal pa'o// de nyi ma dang zla ba'i
121b6(rgyud): mdun nas 'gro ba yang lha'i tshogs mang pos kyang mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// de'i tshe bdag kyang ltar med pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di dang / de yang
121b7(rgyud): dgu phrag gsum yin no// sngags kyi tshig ni 'di lta ste/ oM pa tA krA ma si/ pa rA kra ma si/ ut+tA ya ma si/ u da ma si/ nai ra ma si/ an+tar+d+ha na ma si/ ming nyid rab tu sbyar te/ lha mo 'od zer / 
121b8(rgyud): bdag la du skyobs shig/ bdag lam log pa las skyebs shig/ rgyal po dang / me dang / dgra dang / seng ge'i 'jigs pa las skyebs shig/ bdag dus thams cad du phum sum tshogs par
122a1(rgyud): grub par gyis shig/ ma so Atra stsa sa/ oM A 'o// kA lo// tra'o// san+d+ha'o// sarba sar+b+ba/ rASh+Ta gA mAM/ sarbab+hA yeSh+ThamA hA/ dkon mchog gsum dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i/ 
122a2(rgyud): oM ba rA li/ bA tA li/ bat+tA li / kha rA li/ ba rA ha mu khi/ sarba duSh+TA nA mu khaM khan+d+ha ban+d+ha/ dus thams cad du lags par srung bar 'gyur ro// bskul tshig bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi ni/ rgya mtsho gsum ni mtshon
122a3(rgyud): brjod pa'i/ oM dang bcas pa'i snying po dang / nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa dang / yi ge drug pa'i na 'jigs pa thams cad las srung bar byed do// snying po'i sngags 'di 'dzin na blo rno bar byed do// gleng bzhi
122a4(rgyud): dang bcas pa sngags 'di bzlas pa byas na/ nor dang / 'bru dang nga/ g.yog 'khor 'phel bar byed pa'i mchog sbyin pa byed do// don de sgrub par 'dod pas thang ka 'am/ shing leb
122a5(rgyud): la bris sku bya ba ni mya ngan med pa'i shing gi sdong po'i rtsar pad+me/ la gnas pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa ljang ku/ dang / ang ga rag sngon po dang / stong g.yogs sngon po dang
122a6(rgyud): mgo bo na mchod rten yod pa/ gzhon nu ma/ g.yon pa'i phyogasu gzigs pa'i spyan can/ mya ngan med pa'i 'od zer can zhes bya ba bri bar bya'o// sngon du bstan pa'i cho gas thang sku 'di mdun du
122a7(rgyud): blta zhing mchog tu sgrub pa'i snying po bzlas pa stong bya'o// oM mA rA ts+yai swA hA/ zhes bya ba'o// mchog gi snying po 'di nges par mchog tu 'grub par 'gyur ro// rims thams cad med par
122a8(rgyud): byed do// nad thams cad med par byed do// bzlas pa dang / sbyin sreg gis kyang 'od zer can gyis nor 'phel ba bskyed par byed do// zho dang dur ba gnyis kyi sbyin sreg gis ni nges par nad med par
122b1(rgyud): byed do// sbrang rtsi dang mar gyi sbyin sreg gis ni rgyal po rnams dbang du byed do// zho dang 'bras sa lu dang / bu ram gyi sbyin sreg gis ni gnod sbyin mo 'grub par byed do// tsha ba'i mar dang nim pa'i
122b2(rgyud): yal ga steng gi sbyin sreg gis ni rims med par byed do// rang gi khrag dang / rus pa dang / dug dang / ske tsha stong phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas paso dgra'o 'ichi'o// 'o ma'i sbyin sreg gis ni zhi bar
122b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzlas na dug 'joms par byed cing 'bad pa med par mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'joms// nyi ma re re brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na 'dzin blo rno bar 'gyur ro// oM bA ra li/ ba dA li/ ba tA
122b4(rgyud): li/  ba rA ha mu khi sarba duSh+TA nAM/ ban d+ha ban d+ha mu khaM swA hA// 'o/ dad zer can gyi snying po'o// oM mA rI ts+yai swA hA// bcom lnga na 'das ma 'od zer can gyi gsang ba'i snying po yi ge drug
122b5(rgyud): pa'o// snying po'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/ lag pa gnyis mnyam par byas la thal mo sbyar bar byas pa 'am kha phye ba yang rung ste/ mtheb chen cung zad bkug ste gung mo gnyis
122b6(rgyud): phan tshun rag la zlum po'i rnam pa mtshan mar byas la/ skyil mo dkrung du gnas pas lte ba'i phyogs su gtug par bya'o// phyag rgya 'di mchog gtso bo ste// lus rnams kun la sbyar bar bya'i// 
122b7(rgyud): tha ma dang ni 'bring la yang // mchog rnams la yang 'di bstan no// myur du 'di yis don byed cing // kun tu grub cing mchod par 'gyur// dag byed bsod nams chen po ste// bkra shis sdig pa
122b8(rgyud): nyams byed cing // bsod nams sdig pa kun zad pa// dngos grub rgyun phyag rgya yin// bcom ldan 'das 'di zer can mi'i mtshan brgyad brjod na srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbeng par 'gyur
123a1(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ a rka ma si mas gi su sa / pa ra ma si/ sI bar ma si/ mahA nI bar ma si/ oM tar+d+ha na ma si/ na me rat+na tA ya yA/ tad+ya thA/ oM ba dA li/ bA ra li/ ba rA ha mu khi sar+b+ba drASh+Ta
123a2(rgyud): prA duSh+TA nAM/ mu kha ban d+ha ban d+ha swA hA// rig pa 'dzin pa'i sde snod las byung ba'i rtog pa ni 'dri yin no// de nas sbyor ba gzhan ni 'di yin te/ gser mdog can gyi phag pa bsgoms la/ de'i steng du 'ong
123a3(rgyud): zer can gos dkar po'i sham thabs can bsgom par bya'o// de'i spyi bor mchod rten dang / g.yon pa'i phyag gi mya ngan med pa'i yal ga me tog dang bcas pa'i phyag can no// 'jigs pa chen po'i
123a4(rgyud): dus su yang bdag nyid phag pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su ba skor bar bsgom par bya'o// snying khar chos gos kyi ste/ 'u bzung ste/ lan bdun du bsngags la mdud pa bdun byas na
123a5(rgyud): lam du kun ma la sogs pas choms par mi 'gyur ro// de nas mdud pa yongasu dkrol bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni ba com ldan 'das ma 'od zer can gyi rtog pa rdzogaso// 
123a6(rgyud): rang gi snying khar zla ba la lam rnam par bsams la/ de nyid yid kyis brjod pas chos thams cad bdag med pa'i ngo bo nyid du bsgom par bya'o// de nas yang na mkha'i phyogs su bsam pa ni bdag nyid
123a7(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs pad+ma'i lte bar sang ldeng gi khri la rdo rje'i skyil dkrung gis bzhugs pa/ gser gyi mdog can byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya can ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa/ ral
123a8(rgyud): pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang zhing zhi ba yi ge mAM nyid kyis brjod pa'i rnam par bsam par bya'o// de nas mdun du zla ba'i gzugs brnyan rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'od zer las byung ba'i 'od zer can ma// 
123b1(rgyud): oM mA rI ts+yai swA zhes bya bas gser gyi mdog can gyi skung pa dang bcas pa'i khab 'dzin pa'i phyag gris gdug pa can gyi kha dang mig yung dag par drubs pa bdun du rnam par bsam par bya'o// pra/ 
123b2(rgyud): mos bskal ba'i skud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig la rtsa ba'i sngags kyi rig pa lan cig yongasu bzlas pa ni de nas/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ mA rI ts+yai de ba tA ye/ hr-i da ya A ban+ta ye Sh+yA/ tad+ya thA/ oM ba ti/ 
123b3(rgyud): li/ pa ta ti li/ br-i ta ti li/ bA ra li/ ba rA ha mu khi sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+TA nAM/ tsak+Shur mu khe/ ban d+ha mi swA hA/ zhes bya ba dang / yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di bzlas te/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ mA rA ts+yai
123b4(rgyud): ba tA ye tad+ya thA/ oM bat+tA li/ ba dA li/ bA ra li/ ba rA ha mu khi/ sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+TA nAM/ gr-i tho ba d+hA mi swA hA// zhes bya ba brjod do// de skud pa la rang nyid srung ba'i cheng du mdud
123b5(rgyud): pa bdun bya'o// g.yog pa'i ched du bya ste/ ming yongasu ga zung ba'i sbyor bas mad pa gcig bya'o// 'gro dnga'o// nga bas skud pa de rked pa la bcings te gleng gzhi dang bcas
123b6(rgyud): pa'i 'od zer can gyi rig pa klag ste/ mdun du 'gro bar bya'o// de ltar byas na rang bzhin gyi srung bar 'gyur ro// nub mo mdun du zla ba la/ nyin mo ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la sngon du gsungs pa
123b7(rgyud): bzhin du rang gi gnas su bya'o// dra'i rjes su ji ltar gsungs pa'i rig pa lan bdun du brjod par bya ste/ na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twe b+h+yaHtad+ya thA/ oM A lo/ kA lo/ tA lo/ san+na lo/ sarba mUn+ti/ rak+Sha
123b8(rgyud): rak+Sha mAM sarba b+ha ye Shu swA hA// dkon mchog gsum dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'o// tad+ya thA/ oM mA rI ts+yai bat+tA li/ ba dA liM/ ba rA li/ ba rA ha mu khi sar+b+ba duSh+Ta pra duSh+TA nAM/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ mu khi swA hA/ 
124a1(rgyud): / sa sa Am+b+ha/  Sh+Ta/ yA smra / sa sa/  byu co na rgya ches sa / 
124a2(rgyud): yin no// oM mA rI n+ya ba d+ha kram sI/ pa n+d+ha kra ma sa~M/ sud ya mi si/ ner ma sa~M/ a da mos/ man mos// su dra ma si/ ban d+hamasaM/ gru lA mo si/ tsi bar ma si/ ma ste bar ma si/ a tan+ta na ma si/ na
124a3(rgyud): rat+na tA yA ya/ tud+ya thA/ oM bat+tA li/ ba dA la~M/ ba rA li/ ba rA ha mu khi/ sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+TA nAM/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha mu kha~M swA hA/ oM mA rI ts+yai swAr+tha// zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po'i mchog ni nges par
124a4(rgyud): 'di yin no// oM mA rI ts+yai pa dA kra ma si/ pA ra kra ma si/ u da ya ma si/ nai ri ma si/ arka ma si/ marka ma si/ um da ma si/ bai d+ha ma si/ gul+lA ma si/ tsI ba ra ma si/ mahA n+ni ba ra ma
124a5(rgyud): si/ e tan+t+ra na ma si/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM baSh+Nuli/ ba dA li/ ba rA li/ ba rA ha mu khi/ sar+b+ba duSh+Ta pra du/ Sh+TA nAM/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha swA hA/ oM bat+tA li/ ba dA li/ ba rA li/ ba rA ha
124a6(rgyud): mu khi/ sar+b+ba duSh+Ta pra duSh+TA n+taM/ tsaM k+Shu mu khaM ban d+hA me swA hA/ zhes bya'o// oM bat+tA li/ ba dA li/ ba rA li/ bA rA ha mu khe/ sar+b+ba duSh+Ta pra duSh+TA nI/ gaM d+hi bi d+hA mi swA hA zhes brjod par bya'o// rang nyid srung ba'i/ 
124a7(rgyud): don du sngags 'di bya ste/ oM arge ma si swA hA/ zhes bya ba dang / oM marka ma si swA hA zhes bya ba dang / oM aM tar+N+Na na ma siM swA hA zhes bya ba dang / oM te dzo ma si swA hA zhes bya ba dang / oM u da ya
124a8(rgyud): ma si swA hA zhes bya ba dang / oM gul+ma ya~M swA hA zhes bya ba dang / oM ba na ma si swAhA/ zhes bya ba dang / oM tsI ba ra me si swA hA zhes bya ba dang / oM pa dA kra ma si swA hA zhes bya ba dang / oM ba rA
124b1(rgyud): kra ma si swA hA zhes bya ba dang / oM urma ma si/ swA hA zhes bya'o// de nas las gzhan yin te/ mchog tu gyur pa'i sngags ni oM mA rI ts+yai swAhA zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di'i las ni zhi ba dang / rgyas pa
124b2(rgyud): dang / dbang dang / mngon spyod dang / dgug pa'o// bdag gi don du snying khar tri dang spel ba'i snying po// oM dang spel ba byas la/ mgal me'i 'khor lo la gnas pa lcags kyu dang zhags pas
124b3(rgyud): dgug par bya ba ni dpag tshod brgya yin du zin kyang lha rdzas kyi bud med 'gugs par byed do// de nas sbyor ba gzhan yin te/ nyi ma 'char ka'i tshe bya ste/ gzhon nu ma la sngags brgya bzlas te
124b4(rgyud): ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor byas la bzhag par bya ste/ tsan+dan dkar pos yan lag byugs la me tog dang legs pakhrus byas shing gos dkar po skon la gu gul gyi gdug pa sbyin
124b5(rgyud): te mthe bong la rgyu skyegs dang mar nag gis bskus la sngag/ sa brgyad brgya bzlas te/ dbang bskur ba bstan par bya/ 'o// lha la sogs pa thams cad sngags kyi rgyal po 'dis
124b6(rgyud): bskul te/ oM tsi ro tsi ri mu swA hA zhes bya ba ni sngag so// oM mAHsngags 'dis mar mye la brgyad brgya mngon par bsngags nas gzhon nu ma la bstan par byas na sngon bzhin du mngon par
124b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// ma me'i tshogs thams cad kyi dge ba dang / mi dge ba yang thos pa ni/ oM ba ta li yaM muHsngags 'di khri tsho gcig bzlas te bstan par bya'o// yang na dgra bo rims kyis bzug
124b8(rgyud): bar 'dod na mi'i rus pa'i phye ma dang / dur khrod kyi thal ba dang / chu bo'i ngogs gnyis kyi sa dang / rkang rjes kyi rdul dang bcas pa la/ gzugs rnyon byas te/ dug dang / me dang / ske tshe
125a1(rgyud): dang / nyi phyed dang / 'o ma dang ldan pa dur khrod kyi ras la sngags dang spel ba bris bzhin pa byas te/ oM mA rI ts+yai che ge mo rims kyis zung shig zung shig hUM phaT swA hA zhes
125a2(rgyud): brgyad brgya bzlas pas dgra bo'i khang par sbas na/ rims kyis 'dzin par 'gyur ro// yang na thod pa la sngon du bstan pa'i rdzas nyid kyi ming bris te yi ge a bzhi nang du bcug nas ma'i nang
125a3(rgyud): du yang mAM gis yongs su bskor la/ khros pas seng ldeng gi me la bdug par bya'o// stang nas skye ba bcings pa'i thod pa dgra bo'i khang par sbas na 'phral du rims kyis 'dzin par 'gyur ro// 
125a4(rgyud): yang na dur khrod du bya'o// de nas dgra bo bsad par 'dod na / dug dang / tsha dang / ske tshe dang / khrag gis mi'i rus pa'i smyu gus thod pa la ming mngon par bris te hUM dang phaT
125a5(rgyud): gnyis kyi nang du bcug na gsod par 'gyur ro// sngags kyis yongasu bskor ba bya ste/ oM mA rI ts+yai hUM che ge mo sod ce ga hUM zhes bya ba stong phrag brgyad bzlas na 'chi bar 'gyur
125a6(rgyud): ro// dur khrod du bris na ni zhag gsum gyis nyams par 'gyur ro// yang na skrod par 'dod na/ oM mA rI n+yai tsa la tsa la/ pra tsa la pra tsa la/ shI g+h+raM ga mi ni che ge mo skrod cig hUM phaT/ sngags 'di/ 
125a7(rgyud): byarog gi bshog pa blangs la stong phrag brgyad bzlas te/ dgra bo'i khyim du 'bad pas sba bar byas la/ rnga mo'i steng du zhon pa sgom par byas na de ma thag tu skrod par byed do// yang na dbye bar 'dod
125a8(rgyud): nin dur khrod kyi thal ba dang / chu klung gi ngogs gnyis kyi sa dang / rkang rjes kyi sa dang / yang dag par bstan pas so sor gzugs rnyan byas la rgyab sprad te/ ma ho'i sha dang rta'i mgo spus
125b1(rgyud): legs par bcings la/ drug dang / ske tshe dang / tsha ba gsum gyis lus blugs la/ de nyid dang ma he'i sha dang / rta'i khrag dang ldan pas/ dur khrod kyi ras la phaT bzhi'i dbus su hUM gis spel
125b2(rgyud): ba'i ming bris la mAM gyis yongasu bskor la de'i snying khar bcug ste sngags bzlas shing ma he dang rta gnyis la zhon pa gnyis ka yang 'thab bzhin rnam par bsams na dbye bar byed do// 'phrog byed dang / 
125b3(rgyud): dka' bzlog ma dang bcas pas dur khrod du sa brkos la sba'o// oM mA rI ts+yai che ge mo dang / che ge mo shig hUM swA hA zhes bya ba ni sngags so// de nas sbyor ba gzhan ni ma he'i rwa dang / rti'i rus pa la gzug/ 
125b4(rgyud): brnyan byas te/ dug dang gtum po'i sa bon dang / ma he'i sha de dang / rta'i khrag gis snying khar ming mngon par byis la ste/ gas bzla zhing / seng ldeng gi me la gdugs na de ma thag tu
125b5(rgyud): 'byed par byed do// yang na dgra 'o'i khyim du smras na yang 'byed/ par byed do// de yang dag par brjod par bya ba ni 'od zeracan chen po 'thung ba'i rgyud las byung ba ni dgra'i dpung
125b6(rgyud): por byed pa'i tshig ston te/ kha cig tu rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs g.yos par 'gyur zhing gzhan gyi yul khams phung bar byed par brtson na gang gi tshe de la rgyal po 'ongs nas slar byed cing mchod de sngags
125b7(rgyud): pa la gsol ba 'dabs na de'i tshe slob dpon gyis sems can thams cad la rjes su brtse bas byams pa'i sems kyis ting nge 'dzin bya'o// de la 'tshog chas dgos pa thams cad dang ldan zhing
125b8(rgyud): legs pa'i grogs pos chad du byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thang sku bkram la/ tsan dan dkar pos dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs la me tog dkar po bkram pa/ bdug spos dang / dri dang
126a1(rgyud): phreng ba dang / gtor ma yang byin la/ zho dang / s+yAng rtsi dang / bu ram dang ldan pas lan bdun du bsngags la dbul bar bya'o// sngags ni/ oM mA r-I mye mar+b+ba prA tIts+tsha swAH/ 
126a2(rgyud): oM mA rI ts+yai gan+d+he pra tits+tsha swA hA/ oM mA rI ts+yai puSh+pe pra tits+tsha swA hA/ oM mA rI ts+yai d+hu pe pra tits+tsha swA hA/ oM mA rI ts+yai dI paM pra tits+tsha swA hA// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma la mchod cing yongasu bsngo ste/ dgyes par/ 
126a3(rgyud): byas la bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das ma'i gzugasu dmigs shing rang nyid nga rgyal dang ldan pas khri phrag gsum bzlas pa bya'o// de'i sngon du song ba'i bsnan pa yin te/ mi dge ba'i mtshan ma
126a4(rgyud): mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas phyis ni sbyin sreg bya ste/ sngo dan du bstan pa'i cho gas las thams cad pa'i thab khung du rgya skegs kyi shing dang / byang chub kyi shing dang / u dum pa ri
126a5(rgyud): yum shing gis me sbar la/ zho dang / 'o ma dang / mar du smrag sa pa'i dur ba nyag ma re ra rnams stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro// 
126a6(rgyud): oM bat+tA li/ ba dA li/ ba rA li/ ba rA ha mu khi sar+b+ba ri pu s+yai b+h+yAM staM b+ha ya swA hA// 'di ni rengs par byed pa'i s+pha Ta te renges pa'i las thaMd sbyar bar bya'o//  Ta 'dis bzlas pa dang sbyin sreg kyang bya'o// byis ni rgyal po dang mdun
126a7(rgyud): namadon ni gro ga 'am/ ras la gur gum 'am/ gi wang dag gis bsgrub bya'i ming dang sngags spel te mAM gis dkris pa yang yi ge bzhis yongasu bskor te/ oM maM ba ma/ phyi rol tu ba'i yi ges yongs
126a8(rgyud): su bskor ba'i 'khor lo bris la gang gi spyi gtsug gam/ mgul pa 'am/ dpung pa la btags na las thams cad nyid la srung ba byed pa yin no// g.yul ngor zhugs na mtshon chas lus la mi
126b1(rgyud): chos par 'gyur ro// g.yul ngo las de ni rgyal bar 'gyur ro// de nas yang phyis ni mchog tu gyur pa'i glang po che'am/ mchog tu gyur pa'i shing rta la rdo rje slob dpon zhon te g.yul la mngon
126b2(rgyud): par phyogs pas bcom ldan 'das ma'i thang sku bkram la rgyal mtshan ser po btsugs te ras ser po'i sham thabs dang sar po'i thod cings te/ tshogs chas rdo rje dril bu bzung zhing bsnyen pa dang
