213a3(rgyud): b+hU phaT/ sarba u trA se b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pA ta ke b+h+yAMHphaT/ sarba b+ha d+hi b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba shwa ma Ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba gra he b+h+yaHphaT/ srarbA trIr+thi ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pA t+ya r+thi ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pA ta ke
213a4(rgyud): b+h+yaHphaT/ sarbon+na di b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ts+tsha ye b+h+yaHphaT/ sarbabid+yA d+ha re b+h+yaHphaT/ dza yA ka ra mu d+hu ka raM si/ d+hi ka ra sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ki b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba bid+yA tsAR+She b+h+yaHphaT/ 
213a5(rgyud): sarba bid+yA rA dze b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba sA d+ha ke b+h+yo ba d+hA tsaR+YaM b+h+yaHphaT/ tun+d+he b+ha gi ni b+h+yaHphaT/ badz+ra kau mA rI ye bid+d+ha rA dzI ye b+h+ya phaT/ sa big+h+na bi nA ya kA nAM na phaT/ ba ra dA ya phaT/ pa ra
213a6(rgyud): bidrA pa Ne ka rA ya phaT/ sarba a su re b+h+yAMHphaT/ sarba ga ru De b+h+yaHphaTaM/ sarba ma ho ra ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba mA nuSh+Ta b+h+yaHphaT/ mU ru te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pi shA tse b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kum+b+hAN+Da b+h+ya
213a7(rgyud): phaT/ badz+ri shrIng ga lA ya man+ta pra tang+gi r+yA b+h+yaHphaT/ sarbo pa sarge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba rAk+Sha sa b+hUHphaT/ ma hA pra t+yong+gi ri b+h+yaHphaT/ tsin+di tsan+da pheMT/ bin+da bin+da phaT/ hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ he ho/ phaT/ 
213a8(rgyud): phaT/ a mi g+ha sa baT/ a pra ti tsi ta ya phaT/ ba pra dzA maM phaT/ a su ra bi dA ba~M / ka rA ya phaT/ si de'i b+h+yaHphaT/ sarbanA ge b+h+ya baT/ sar+b+ba yaSh+Ta b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba
213b1(rgyud): baT sarba gan+d+har+Ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kin+te re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pre te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba b+hU te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kum+b+hat+te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pA ta ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ka Ta pU ta ne b+h+yaHpaT/ sarba swan+de b+h+yaHphaT/ ban+d+ha
213b2(rgyud): sAM ka lA ya mra hA pr-i taM gau rA dzA ya phaT/ kA lA ya phaT/ maN+Da kA lA ya phaT/ maM tI gra NA ya phaT/ biSh+Ta bI ye phaT/ ma hA mU tri ga Na maskr-i tri ye phaT/ ma he shwa rA ye baT/ brah+ma N+DI ye
213b3(rgyud): phaT/ ag+ni ye phaT/ ma hA kA ye phaT/ kA la dar+t+ti ye phaT/ in dwi ye phaT/ ri drI yaM phaT/ tsa mur+N+Na ye phaT/ bA rA hI ye phaT/ mahA bA rA hI ye phaT/ rA tI ye phaT/ kA la rA tri s+ye
213b4(rgyud): paT rnga ya mai la daHNI ye phaT/ ka pA lAM phaT/ mahA ka pU/ daMlpi ye phaT/ kau mA rI ye ba Tu/ ya mI ye phaT/ yA yai phaT/ ku be rA ye phaT/ nai re trI ye phaT/ ba ru NI ye
213b5(rgyud): baT mA ru tI ye phaT/ mahA mA ru tI ye phaT/ so mI ye phaT/ I shA nI ye phaT/ yok+ka sI ye phaT/ a war+tha NI ye phaT/ sa pa rI yai phaT/ kr-iSh+Na sa pa rI ye baT/ 
213b6(rgyud): ya ma drA tI yai phaT/ ni sa ti bA tsa re b+hAHphaT/ tri san+de pa re b+hU phaT/ d+ha ra NI ya phaT/ a ti muk+ti krasmai ra ma hA shwA shA nI ba sI nI ya phaT/ i ti b+h+yaHsarba b+ha ye b+haHsarba do She b+h+yaHphaT/ au
213b7(rgyud): Sh+To ban+d+ha ban+d+ha sarba duSh+TA na rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM sarba sitwA sh+tsa swA hA// gang su dag bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sems can thams cad la sdang ba sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / drag shul
213b8(rgyud): dreg shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdig pa sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams/ 'khrug pa 'khrug pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / mi mdzab mi mdza' ba'i sems dang / 
214a1(rgyud): ldan pa de rnams las bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sems can thams cad la srung ba mdzad du gsol// lo brgya mtsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar
214a2(rgyud): shog shig/ gang su dag gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang / mdangs 'phrog pa rnams dang / mngal za ba rnams dang / khrag 'thung ba rnams dang / zhag za ba rnams dang / sha za ba rnams
214a3(rgyud): dang tshil za ba rnams dang / rkang za ba rnams dang / bcas pa za ba rnams dang / srog 'phrog pa rnams dang / gtor ma za ba rnams dang / phreng ba za ba rnams dang / dri za ba rnams
214a4(rgyud): dang me tog za ba rnams dang / gdug pa za ba rnams dang / 'bras bu za ba rnams dang / lo tog za ba rna/ dmas dang / bsreg bya za ba rnams dang / nor 'phrog pa
214a5(rgyud): rnams dang / sems 'phrog pa rnams dang / rnag za ba rnam sa dang / bshang ba za rnams dang / gcin 'thung ba/ rnams dang / mchil ma 'thung ba rnams dang / snabs za
214a6(rgyud): ba rnams dang / ngar snabs za ba rnams dang / skyugs pa za ba rnams dang / nor bu za ba rnams dang / mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang / stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams dang / sdig
214a7(rgyud): pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / lha'i gdon rnams dang / klu'i gdon rnams dang / gnod
214a8(rgyud): sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang / srin po'i gdon rnams dang dri za'i gdon rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang / nam mkha' lding gi gdon rnams dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon rnams
214b1(rgyud): dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon rnams dang / mi'i gdon rnams dang / mi ma yin pa'i gdon rnams dang / rlung lha'i gdon rnams dang / yi dgas kyi gdon rnams dang / sha za'i
214b2(rgyud): gdon rnams dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / grul bum gyi gdon rnams dang / srul po'i gdon rnams dang / lus srul po'i gdon rnams dang / skem byed kyi gdon
214b3(rgyud): rnams dang / smyo byed kyi gdon rnams dang / grib gnon gyi gden rnams dang / rjed byed kyi gdon rnams dang / gnon po'i gdon rnams dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon rnams dang / nam
214b4(rgyud): gru'i gden rnams dang / kun tu bri ba'i gdon rnams dang / tsher ma gdon pa'i gdon rnams dang bya'i gdon rnams dang / ma mo dga' byed pa'i gdon
214b5(rgyud): rnams dang / bum pa lta bu'i gdon rnams dang / 'phyang ba/ 'i gdon rnams dang / lus mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon rnams dang / ka Tang ka Ta'i tshogs can gyi gdon rnams dang / 
214b6(rgyud): gdon thams cad gsal du gsol/ rims nyin cig pa rnams dang / nyin gnyis pa rnams dang / nyin gsum pa rnams dang / nyin bzhi pa rnams dang / nyin bdun pa rnams dang / zla ba
214b7(rgyud): phyed pa rnams dang / zla ba gcig pa rnams dang / nyin mo pa rnams dang / nyi ma phyed pa rnams dang / yud tsam pa rnams dang / rtag pa'i rims rnams dang / rims ldang dub pa rnams dang / 
214b8(rgyud): 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / yi dgas kyi rims rnams dang / sha za'i rims rnams dang / mi'i rims rnams dang / mi ma yin pa'i rims rnams dang / rgyun mi 'chad pa'i
215a1(rgyud): rims rnams dang / rlung las gyur pa rnams dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa rnams dang / bad kan las gyur pa rnams dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa rnams dang / rims thams
215a2(rgyud): cad dang / klad pa na ba bdag dang sems can thams cad la bsal du gsol// bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi gzhogs phyed na ba dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang / mig nad dang / snand dang / kha
215a3(rgyud): nad dang / mgul nad dang / snying nad dang / lkog ma'i lha gor na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / so na ba dang / brang na ba dang / snying na ba dang / gnang na ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / rgyab na ba/ 
215a4(rgyud): dang / lto na pa dang / rked pa na ba dang / mdoms na ba dang / gzhang na ba dang / skye gnas na ba dang / rab tu skye gnas dan pa dang / brlan pa dang / byin pa na ba dang / lag
215a5(rgyud): pa na ba dang / rkang pa na ba dang / yan lag na ba dang / nyi na lag na ba bsal du gsol/ bdag dang sems can thams cad la 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / 
215a6(rgyud): ro langs dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / rims dang / shu ba dang / mig ser dang / g.ya' ba dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / mdze dang / phol mig dang / bas bldags dang / mchin nad dang
215a7(rgyud): mtshan par rdol pa dang / g.yan pa dang / gzhang 'brum dang / me dpal dang / lhag pa dang / skem pa dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / skrag pa dang / lud pa dang / brgyal ba dang / dbyig
215a8(rgyud): dug dang du gyu ma dang gudang / byad dang / me dang / dmu chu dang / mi ngas dang / 'thab mo dang / 'khon dang / gnod pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / sbrang bu tu bu ga dang / trai la ta ka dang / 
215b1(rgyud): sdig pa dang / sbrul dang / sre mo dang / seng+ge dang / stag dang / dom dang / dred dang / gnag dang chu srin dang / spyang gi dang / chom po dang / de dag la sogs pa srog 'phrog par byed pa gzhan
215b2(rgyud): thams cad kyang gsal du gsol// gdugs dkar po can rdo rje gtsug tor phyir bzlog pa'i chen mo'i rig sngag kyi mthus dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi nang tshun chad dam/ dpag tshad lnga brgya'i
215b3(rgyud): nang tshun chad du rig sngags bcing bar bgyi'o// gzi brjid bcing bar bgyi'o// rig sngags thams cad bcing bar bgyi'o// gzhan gyis rig sngags thams cad bcing bar bgyi'o// mtshams
215b4(rgyud): bcad par bgyi'o// sa bcing bar bgyi'o// phyogs bcu pa/ cing bar bgyi'o// na mkha' bcing byar bgyi'o// gzhan ragyi snga rab tu rengs par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ oM a na la a
215b5(rgyud): na le/ a tsa le/ u tsa le/ kha kha me/ kha kha maM/ bi Sha traM/ bi Sha de/ bI re bI re/ be re be re/ sau me sau me/ shAn+teshAn+te/ dAn+te dAn+te/ badz+ra d+ha ra ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ni badz+ra pA Ni phaT/ 
215b6(rgyud): oM hUM Sh+To phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra pa Ni ban d+ha ban d+ha badz+ra pA sha na sarba duSh+Ta big+h+nA na ya kA na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ hUM druM ban d+ha phaT/ rak+Sha kA mA~M sarba satwA sh+tsa swA hA/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa
215b7(rgyud): thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir bzlog pa'i rag sngags kyi rgyal mo chen me'i dgre ga'am/ ras sam/ shing shun la bris
215b8(rgyud): ter lus sam/ mgul du thogs pa byas nas bcang bar bya'o// bklag pa bya ste/ de dag la ji srid 'tshe'i bar du dug gis mi tshugs/ mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ rims kyis mi tshugs
216a1(rgyud): nad kyis mi tshugs/ chad pas mi tshugs/ me dang chus mi tshugs/ bsgyur ba'i las thams cad kyis mi tshugs/ dbyig dug gis mi tshugs/ dug sbyar mas mi tshug/ 
216a2(rgyud): byad kyis mi tshugs/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad dang / bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyi yid du 'ang zhing dga' bar 'gyur ro// bskal
216a3(rgyud): po bye ba stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir skye ba dang / skye bar tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i rigs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i rig sngags kyi lhas kyang rtag tu rgyun mi
216a4(rgyud): 'chang par mnyam par gzhag nas de la rtag par srung ba dang bsgrub pa dang sbed par byed do// rdo rje pho nyi/ mo mngag gzhug brgyad cu rtsa bzhis kyang rtag par yod/ 
216a5(rgyud): su skyong bar byed de de rnams kyi yid du 'ong ba dang / dag bar 'gyur ro// nam du yang gnod sbyin nyid dang / sri na de nyid dang / 'byung ba nyid dang / yi dgas nyid dang / 
216a6(rgyud): zanyid dang / srul po nyid dang / lus srul po nyid dang / mi dbul por mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa gang+gA'i klung gi byed ma snyed kyi bsod nams kyi bu
216a7(rgyud): po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir bzlog pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo
216a8(rgyud): 'di 'chang nams kyim spyod pa yang mas pa spyod pa su 'a thub par ma byas pa yang thub pa byas par 'gyur ro// mi gtsang ba yang gtsang bar byas par 'gyur ro// bsnyen gnas byas pa can ma yin pa
216b1(rgyud): yang bsnyen gnas byas pa can du 'gyur ro// gang dag mtshams med pa lnga byas pa de yang sdig pa ma lus pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa yang ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro// 
216b2(rgyud): bud med gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir bzlog pa chen mo'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo
216b3(rgyud): chen mo 'di 'chang na bu 'dod pa des kyang bu brnyed de/ tshe dang bsod nams dang stobs kyang rab tu ldan no// 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye ste/ 'dod chags da
216b4(rgyud): gnod pa dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyag/ das pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// gang la la zhig gis mi ngas pa/ ba lang gi nad dang / byugs nad dang / 
216b5(rgyud): yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i na dang / 2khrug pa thams cad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong ba la bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
216b6(rgyud): rgyas mi 'bam pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir bzlog pa chen mo 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la
216b7(rgyud): btags te rim gro cher mchod pa chen po byas nas/ grong khyer thams cad kyi sgo 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ grong ngam/ grong khyer rlom/ ltengs sam/ grong rdal lam/ dur khrod ngam/ 
216b8(rgyud): 'amang dgon pa'i gnas su gzugaso// gzhan gyis mo thub ma phyir bzlog ma chen mo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di rim gro cher byos te/ btsugs pa tsam gyis g.yul zhi bar byas par
217a1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'gro ba'i nad dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// 
217a2(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas dang / klu'i rgyal po dung skyong dang dang / klu'i rgyal po nag po chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nyer dga' bo dang / de dag dang gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po/ 
217a3(rgyud): thams cad kyis kyang dus dus su char 'beb so// dus dus su gleg 'byin to// dus dus su 'brug sgregs so// nad dang gnod pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// oM hUM Sh+Ti ban d+ha ban+da
217a4(rgyud): d+ha sarba duSh+Ta na rak+Sha ma ma sa pi ri bA ra s+ya sarba satwAM shAM sAn+ti oM hU~MSh+To ban d+hi ban d+ha sarba duSh+TA na rakA ra ma ma sa pa rih+na dar s+ya sa twAM sh+tsa badz+ra pA Ni hUM phaT swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga tats+tsha
217a5(rgyud): las ba li ka te mUr+d+ha ni tedz+nyo rA shi/ oM dz+wA la dz+wA la/ dA Sha dI/ d+hakat+ma ka/ da rang ri/ bing ri bi dar/ ts+tshinats+tshany+dza/ b+hin da b+hi nad d+hu hUM phaTi baTe r-ik+Sha kA ma mas pa
217a6(rgyud): ras+ya sarba satwAM shwa swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA teSh+NI Sha si ta ta pa tre hU~M phaT swA hAM/ hUM hUM kA rak+Sha ma ma sa pa ri bA rA s+ya sarba satwAM shrad+d+he swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ oM a na le a ni le/ a tsa le a tsa le/ kha sa me
217a7(rgyud): kho sa me/ bI raM bI re/ bai ra bai ra/ saM me si me/ sarba bud d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA nA a d+hiSh+Thi ti sarba ta thA ga teSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre sarba duSh+Ta tsi ta tA na hUM phaT swA hA// sangs rgyas kyi rnal 'byor gyis shig pa
217a8(rgyud): thams cad la lan gsum bzlas par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma
217b1(rgyud): yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs
217b2(rgyud): pathams cad kyi gtsug ter nas byung ba gdugs po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir bzlog pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rdzog so// rgya gar skad du/ ar+yA ta/ 
217b3(rgyud): tiSh+NI Sha si tA ta pye tre e pa ra dzi ta ming+ga pra t+ya~M si sing d+hi nanA mo d+ha raNI/ bod skad du/ 'bogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gnan gyis me
217b4(rgyud): thub pa phyir bzlog pa chen mo mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba// 'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas tham/ 
217b5(rgyud): cad la phyog 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das gzhan gyis mi thub pa gtsug tor rgyal mo lo phyag 'tshal lo// 'dri skang bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan
217b6(rgyud): 'das sbos su rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i gnas chos bzang lha'i mdun sa na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin pa
217b7(rgyud): thabs gcig tu bzhugs// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gdan po shams pa nyid la bzhugs nas gtsug tu ro rnam par lta ba zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin la sems par zhugs so// snyoms
217b8(rgyud): par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor gyi dbus nas gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag byung ngo // sangs rgyas la phyog 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo//  sa dun/ 
218a1(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la
218a2(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyun tu zhugs pa la phyag
218a3(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten na yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag
218a4(rgyud): par zhug pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// lha'i drang song dmo dad pa 'dor ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rig sngags 'chang grub pa'i drang srong phan 'dogs nus pa rnams la
218a5(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// da bang po la phyag 'tshalo// legs ldan drag po dka'
218a6(rgyud): thub bzlog pa'i bdag po dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// legs ldan sred med kyi bu phyag rgya chen po lngas phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// legs ldan nag po chen po grong
218a7(rgyud): khyer sum brtsegs 'jig par byed pa dur khrod na gnas par mos pa ma me'i tshogs kyis phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung la phyag
218a8(rgyud): 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das nor bu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ 
218b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das glang po'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das gzhon nu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das klu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan
218b2(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i sde mtshon cha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
218b3(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od
218b4(rgyud): dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhi don gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa/ de'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la
218b5(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa la phyas
218b6(rgyud): 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
218b7(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
218b8(rgyud): kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan
219a1(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ut+pa la'i dri'i tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de rnams la phyag 'tshal
219a2(rgyud): nasabacom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyi mi thub pa phyir bzlog pa chen mo 'dis 'byung po'i gdon thams cad tshar
219a3(rgyud): gcod pa byed pa/ gzhan gyi rig sngags thams cad gcod par byed pa dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad bzlog pa/ gsod pa dang / bcings pa thams cad las grol bar byed pa/ 
219a4(rgyud): rmi lam ngan pa thams cad bzlog pa/ gnod sbyin dang srin po'i gdon thams cad 'jig par byed pa/ gdon stongad phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 'jig par byed pa/ rgyu skar nyi shurtsa
219a5(rgyud): brgyad dga' bar byed pa/ gza' chen po brgyad 'jig par byed pa/ dgra thams cad bzlog par byed pa/ ma rungs pa dang / snang ba dang / rmi lom ngan pa thams cad
219a6(rgyud): 'jig par byed pa/ dug dang / mtshon thams cad dang / me dang chu las bzlog pa/ ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa thams cad las sgrol ba ste gzhan gyi mi thub drag shul che// gtum pa chen
219a7(rgyud): me stobs tshon mo// 'bar ba chen mo gzi brjid che// dkar chen 'bring phreng gis dkar mo// 'phags ma sgrol ma khro gnyer can// rgyal ba'i rdo rje phreng zhes grags// pad+ma'i mngon
219a8(rgyud): mtshan rdo rjes mtshan// gzhan gyis mi thub phreng ba can// rdo rje'i mchu can rnam sgeg mo// zhi ba'i lha rnams kyis mchod ma// zhi ba gser gyi phreng ba can// dkar chen 'bar ba gos
219b1(rgyud): dkar mo// 'phags ma sgrol ma stobs chen mo// rdo rje lugu rgyud gzhan dang // rdo rje gzhon nu rigs 'dzin ma// lag na rdo rje'i rig gser phreng // leb rgan rtsi dang rin chen ma// rnam
219b2(rgyud): snang mdzad rigs gtsug tor grags// phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyis bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sems can thams cad srung du gsol/ oM sarba ta
219b3(rgyud): thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre hUM dAM hIHSh+To/ dza ma b+ha na ka rI hUM dr-I hI/ Sh+To/ sta ma b+ha na ka rI hU druM hrIHSh+To/ me ha na ka rI hUM dr-I hrIHSh+ToH/ saM b+hak+Sha ka rI hUM dAM hrIHSh+To/ ban d+ha na ka rI hUM drA hrIHSh+To/ 
219b4(rgyud): bA ra bi Sha b+hak+Sha Na ka rI hUM druMHSh+TaM/ sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+TA nAM stam b+ha na ka rI hUM druM hrIHSh+TaM/ sarba yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa gra hA NI bo d+haM sa da na ka rI hUM drI hrIHSh+To/ sarba pa ra bid+yA ts+tshe da na kai rI hUM drA hIH
219b5(rgyud): Sh+To&tsa du rI shi tI nAM gra ha sa ha sra NAM bi d+h+waM sa na kra r-i hU dAM hI \u0f7fSh+To/ aSh+Ta bai sha tI nAM nak+Sha tA NA pra sA da na ka ri hUM drA d+h+waMHSh+To/ aSh+TA nAM ma hA gra hA NAM d+h+waM sa na ka rI hUM drA hrIHShAM/ rak+Sha
219b6(rgyud): rakA maM sarba satwA sh+tsa// bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug ter nas byung ba gdugs dkar po tsa ni rdo rje gtsug tor phyir bzlog ma chen mo// phyag steng mnga' ba chen
219b7(rgyud): me// dbu stong mnga' ba chen mo// spyan bye ba brgya stong mnga' ba/ mi byed 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can/ rdo rje yangs pa chen mos sa gsum gyi dkyil 'khor du bdag dang sems can thams
219b8(rgyud): cad bde legasu gyur cig/ rnam par bsgyings pa'i rdo rje dang // gser 'od lta bu'i spyan mnga' ma// rdo rje spros dang dkar me dang // pad+ma'i spyan dang zla 'od dang // sangs rgyas dpa' dang de bzhin spyan/ 
220a1(rgyud): rdo rje nyi ma'i 'od dang ni// de bzhin rnab rje 'dzin// rig pa dang byug rgya dang gas sngags kyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyis bdag dang sems can thams cad kun
220a2(rgyud): nas srung bar mdzad du gsol// oM ri Shi gaN+Da pra shAs+t+ra sarba ta thA ga teSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre hUM dAM/ dzam+b+ha na ka rI hUM d+h+we/ stam b+ha na kA rI hUM d+h+waM/ ma hA bid+yA saM b+hak+Shar+Na ka ri hUM dAM/ pa ra bid+yA saM b+hak+ShaN+Daka/ 
220a3(rgyud): ri hU~M d+h+waM/ sarba duSh+TA nAM staM b+hA na ka rI hu~M d+h+waM/ sarba yak+Sha re k+Sha sa grahA NA bid+hA sa~M na ka ri hU~M druM/ tsitIT+Te sh+tsi shrI gr-i a ha srA d+d+hi bi d+h+waM sa na ka rI hU~M d+h+r-i/ aSh+Ta bi sha ti na~M nak+Shi tra trUM bAM sa~M da na ka rI hU~M dz+nyA/ a
220a4(rgyud): ma hA gr-i h+Na dz+nyA bi d+hi sa ka ra~M d+hu d+hA rA kA rak+Sha maM// bcom ldan langs ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug ter nas byung de'i gdugs dkar po can rdo rje gtsug ter byor bzlog
220a5(rgyud): mtshan mo// phyage slong sa pa rje chen mo// dbu stong mngalachen mo// spyan bye ba brgya stong mang ba/ mi byed ba'i mtshan rtags can/ rdo rje yangs pa chen mis sa sa
220a6(rgyud): gyi dkyil 'khor du bdag dang sems can thams cad rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang / rkun po'i 'jigs pa dang / mo'i 'jigs pa dang / chu'i 'jigs pa dang / drug gi 'jigs pa dang / 
220a7(rgyud): mtshan gyis 'jigs pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'jigs pa dang / mugs 'jigs pa dang / dgra yis 'jigs pa dang / lce 'bab pas 'jigs pa dang / dus ma yin/ 
220a8(rgyud): par 'chi bas 'jigs pa dang / sa g.ye bas 'jigs pa dang / skar mda' ltung bas 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po'i chad pas 'jigs pa dang / klu yis 'jigs pa dang / glog gis 'jigs
220b1(rgyud): pa dang ngan mkha' lding gis 'jigs pa dang / gcan zan khro bo'i 'jigs pa dang / lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / srin po'i
220b2(rgyud): gdon dang / yi dgas kyi gdon dang / sha za'i gden dang / 'byung po'i gdon dang / grul bum gyi gdon dang / srul po'i gdon dang / lus srul po'i gdon dang / skem byed kyi gdon dang /

220b4(rgyud): gden dang / ma mo dga' bar byed pa'i gdon dang / kun tu dang ba'i gdon dang / tsher ma 'den pa'i gdon las pa de dag bde legasu gyur cig/ zas su mdangs za ba dang / zas
220b5(rgyud): su mngal za ba dang / zas su khrag 'thung ba dang / zas su khrag 'thung ba dang / zas su zhag za ba dang / zas su sha za ba dang / zas su tshil za ba dang / zas su rkang za ba dang /

220b8(rgyud): dri za ba dang / zas su me tog za ba dang / zas su ma tag za ba dang / zas su 'bras bu za ba dang / zas su le tog za ba dang / zas su sbyin sreg za ba ste/ gdon de dag thams cad kyis rig sngags
221a1(rgyud): bcad do// bur bus gdab bo// kun tu rgyus byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do// bur bus gdab bo// mkha' 'gro mas byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do// bur bus gdab bo// 
221a2(rgyud): tshangs pas byas pa'i rig sngaDa bcad de// phur bus gdab bo// dbang phyug chen pos byas pa'i rig sngag bcad do// phur bus gang po// sred med kyi bus byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do// pur bus gdab be/

221b5(rgyud): da ra da ra biM da ra bi da ra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ bin+da bin+de/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ swAhA snying po'o// he he phaT/ he ho phaT/ a/ mo g+hA ya phaT/ a pra ti ha tA ya phaT/ ba ra dA ya phaT/ ba
221b6(rgyud): ra pra dA ya phaT/ a su ra bi drA ba Na ka rA ya phaT/ pa ra bi drA ba NA ka rA ya phaT/ sarba de be b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba nA ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba yak+She b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba rAk+Sha se b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba b+hU te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pre/

221b8(rgyud): pasmA re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarbestA ra ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba DA ki nI b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba re ba tI b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba yA ma ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba sha ku ni b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba mA tri nan+ti ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ke pU ki ma ne b+h+yaHphaT/

222a4(rgyud): rba ma pre t+ya gi b+h+yaHphaT/ badz+ra shaM ka lA ya pra t+yaM gi ra rA dzA ya paT/ mahAkA lA mA tri ga Nan ma skr-i tA ya phaT/ brah+ma NI ye phaT/ biSh+Ta bI yaM phaT/ ma he shwa rA ye phaT/ ru dI ye phaT/ ma hA

224a1(rgyud): thams cad dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i rigs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rnams dang / grub pa'i

224a4(rgyud): nam du yang yi dgas dang / sha za dang / srul po dang / lu das srul po nyid du mi 'gyur ro// mi dbul po rimi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu
224a5(rgyud): med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang / ldan par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nA/ mas dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed/ 
224a6(rgyud): kyis srung ba dang / bskyob pa dang / sbed par mdzad cing / de dag gi thugs su byon pa dang / dgyes par yang 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug ter nas byung ba gdugs
224a7(rgyud): dkar ba can zhes bya ba phyir bzlog pa'i rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di 'chang na tshangs par mi spyod pa yang tshangs par spyod par 'gyu'o// thub par ma byas pa yang thub par byas par 'gyur ro// mi gtsang ba yang
224a8(rgyud): gtsang bar 'gyur ro// bsnyung ba ma byas pa yang bsnyung ba byas par 'gyur ro// mtshams med pa lnga byas po yang byang bar 'gyur ro// sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro// 
224b1(rgyud): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo bu 'dod pa gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can phyir bzlog pa chen mo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di 'chang ma klog na du
224b2(rgyud): 'dod pa des bu rnyed de/ tshe dang bsod nams dang / stobs kyang rab tu rnyed do// 'di nas shrI 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// mi nad dang / phyugs nad dang /

224b4(rgyud): gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir bzlog pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te rim gro cher byas te/ mchod pa chen po byas la grong khyer thams cad
224b5(rgyud): kyi sgo 'am/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i gnas su gzug so// 'phags pa bzhin gyis mi thub pa phyir bzlog ma chen mo rig sngags

224b7(rgyud): tshegs thams cad kwi bar 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ eSh+NI ban d+ha bAn d+ho/ ma ma rak+Sha rik+Sha swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha a na le a wa le ki te tsur+NA te dze rA shi oM dz+wA la dz+wa la/ d+ha ka d+ha kad ra dar/ 
224b8(rgyud): bing rabing dag/ tsu hrIn+da/ hrI b+hin+da/ hU~M n+tu phaT phaT swA hA// me sarba thA ga ti/  tshu h+ma/ d+ya \u0f7f/ oM min le a na le// khas me kha sam/ be ber/ sa~M ma sa ma/ sarba bung bya ma
225a1(rgyud): na a d+hiSh+Ti te sarba ta thA ga teSh+NI Sha mi b+ha la hUM ma ma hA ni hUM swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas dang / klu'i rgyal po dung skyong dang / klu'i rgyal po nag po chen po rnams dus

225a3(rgyud): bya'o/ sa ng+yas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//

225a7(rgyud): ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// 
225a8(rgyud): dge 'dun la phyag 'tshalo// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'a
225b1(rgyud): sprin zugs pa rnams la phyag 'cha'o// khan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tsha'o// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal// 'jig rten na yang dag par seng ba rnams la phyag 'amago/ yang dag par zhug pa rnamal phyag 'ama'o// lnga dra srong
225b2(rgyud): dmed pa 'dir bdang / phan degs nus pa rnams la phyag 'tsha'o// rig smra 'chang grub shAm+ba la phyag 'tsha'o// tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal// dbang be la phyag 'chil// zhe ldan dag padaka/ gru rdeg pa'i bdag po dang lhan cig pa la phyag 'tsha'o// khe ldan sa dmed kyi bu
225b3(rgyud): phyag brgya chen po lngas phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// legs ldan nag po chen po grong khyer sum brtsegs 'jig par byed pa dur khrod na gnas par mos pa ma me'i tshogs kyis phyag byas

235a3(rgyud): za ba rnams dang / zas su dri rnams dang / zas su bdug pa za ba rnams dang / sems 'breg pa rnams dang / zas su me teg za ba rnams dang / zas su 'bras bu za ba rnams dang / zas su lo / 
235a4(rgyud): za ba rnams dang / zas su sbyin sreg za ba rnams dang / sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdang ba'i sems/ dang ldan pa rnams dang / drug shul gyi sems dang ldan pa
235a5(rgyud): rnams dang / lha'i gdon rnams dang / klu'i gdon rnams pa / lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang / rlung lha'i gdon rnam sa dang / na mkha' lding gi gdon rnams dang / dri za'i
235a6(rgyud): gdon rnams dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang / srin po'i gdon rnams dang / yi dgas kyi gdon rnams dang / sha za'i
235a7(rgyud): gdon rnams dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / gral bum gyi gdon rnams dang / sral po'i gdon rnams dang / lus sral po'i gdon rnams dang / skam byed kyi gdon rnams dang / smyo byed
235a8(rgyud): kyi gdon rnams dang / grib gnon gyi gdon rnams dang / brjed byed kyi gdon rnams dang / gnon po'i gdon rnams dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon rnams dang / nom gru'i gdon rnams dang / kau shin
235b1(rgyud): rje'i gdon rnams dang / bya'i gdon rnams dang / ma mo dga' bar byed pa'i gdon rnams dang / kun tu 'breng ba'i gdon rnams dang / tsher ma 'don pa'i gdon rnams dang / rims nyin gcig pa/ 
235b2(rgyud): rnams dang / nyin gnyis pa rnams dang / nyin gsum pa rnams dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / nyin bdun pa rnams dang / rtag pa'i rims rnams dang / rims mi zad pa rnams dang / rims ldang dub
235b3(rgyud): pa rnams dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / rlung las gyur pa rnams dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa rnams dang / bad kan las gyur pa rnams dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa rnams dang / rim
235b4(rgyud): nad thams cad dang / klad pa na ba gsal du gsol/ gzhidags byed na ba dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang / mig nad dang / sgra nad dang / kha nad dang / mgul nad dang / snying nad dang / 
235b5(rgyud): lkog ma'i lha gor na ba dang / rnan pa dang / son pa dang / snying na ba dang / klad pa na ba dang / rtsib log na ba dang / rgyang na kha dang / ljon pa dang / rked pa nu ba dang / chu sen pa dang / brla
235b6(rgyud): na ba dang / rje ngar na ba dang / lag pa na ba dang / rkang pa na ba dang / yan lag na ba dang / nying lag na ba dag bsal du gsol/ srang du gsol/ gdugs dkar po can rdo rje gtsug ter nad
235b7(rgyud): byung ba phyir bzlog pa chen mo 'dis dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi nang tshun chad du 'byung po dang / ro langs dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / rims dang / shu ba dang / ga yA ba dang / 'bram bu phra mo dang / 
235b8(rgyud): mdze dang // phel mig dang / bas bldags dang / me dpal dang / g.yin pa dang / lhag pa dang / snyoms pa dang / skrag pa dang / dbyigs dug dang / dug sbyar ma dang / byad dang / me dang / chu dang / 
236a1(rgyud): mi ngas dang / dgra dang / gnod pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / sbrang bu tre ma bu ka dang / trai la ta dang / sdig pa dang / sbrul dang / sre myong dang / seng+ge dang / stag dang / ngom pa
236a2(rgyud): dred dang / spyang ki dang / chu srin dang / bong ba lta bus gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa de dag thams cad kyi rig sngags bcing bar bgyi'o// gzi brjid bcing bar bgyi'o// gzhan gyi rig sngags bcing
236a3(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// gdon thams cad bcing bar bya'o// tad+ya thA/ ai a na le/ a na le bi Sha de/ bi Sha de/ be ra be ra/ badz+ra d+ha ri/ ban d+ha ban d+ha ni/ badz+ra pa Ni hUM phaT/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ hUM hUM phaT/ 
236a4(rgyud): ban d+ha phaT phaT swA hA/ sus de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsu dgator nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir bzlog mtshan mo 'di grag 'am/ sa
236a5(rgyud): sam shing shun la bris te/ lus sam mgul du btags na de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dug gis mi tshugs/ ma na gyis mi tshugs/ mes mi tshugs/ chus mi tshugs/ 
236a6(rgyud): dbyig dug gis mi tshugs/ dug sbyar mas mi tshugs/ byad kyis mi tshug so// dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad dang / bgegs dang / rnam par log
236a7(rgyud): 'dron thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba dang dga' bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i rigs bye ba khrag khrig steng phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis kyang de la srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed par byed de/ de rnams kyi
236a8(rgyud): yid du 'ong ba dang / dga' bar 'gyur ro// skal pa chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// nam du yang gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / srul po dang / lus
236b1(rgyud): srul po nyid du mi 'gyur ro// mi dbul po mi 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de
236b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir bzlog pa chen mo 'di'i chang na tshangs par mi skyed pa yang tshangs par skyed par 'gyur/ 
236b3(rgyud): par ma byas pa yang thub par byas par 'gyur/ ma gtsang ba yang gtsang bar 'gyur/ bsnyen gnas ma byas pa yang bsnyen gnas byas par 'gyur/ bsrung ba ma byas pa yang bsrung ba byas pa
236b4(rgyud): dang / mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'i sdig pa yang ma lus byang bar 'gyur ro// sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa ma lus par zad par 'o gyur ro// bud med bu 'ded po gang la la de bzhin gshe
236b5(rgyud): pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzho// na gyis mi thub ma phyir bzlog ma chen mo 'di 'chang na/ bu 'dod pa des bu rnyed de tshe dang bsod nams dang / stob
236b6(rgyud): kyang rab tu rnyed do// 'di nas shi 'phos na yang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du smra bar 'gyur ro// mi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / gnag nad dang / yams kyi nad dang / 'tshe ba dang / nad
236b7(rgyud): 'go ba dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrugs pa thams cad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong ba thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi
236b8(rgyud): thub ma phyir zlog ma chen mo 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/ rim gro cher mchod pa chen po byas la/ grong khyer chen po'i sgor zhugs la/ grong khyer ram/ grong ngam/ grong rdal lam/ ldong
237a1(rgyud): sam dgon rje gzugs// gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir bzlog ma chen mo 'di rim gro cher rabs te/ gzugs ma thag tu g.yul zhi bar 'gyuraro// sems kyi nang dang/ 
237a2(rgyud): bya dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrugs pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu zhi byar 'gyur ro// dang thA/ oM ts+tshi n+d+ha ban+d+ha/ bdagu la bsrungs shig bsrungs shig swA hA/ rAkA kA mA~M/ 
237a3(rgyud): oM hUM ts+tsha ban d+ha ban d+ha/ badz+ra bdag la bsrungs shig/ rAkAk+Sha kA mAM/ badz+ra bA Ni dzI phaT swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga teSh+NI a.a pa li ki ti mu rud+ya te dzo rA shiM/ oM dz+wa lA dz+wa l+r-i/ d+ha ka dA ka/ dA rang ri/ bid raH
237a4(rgyud): dAr tismin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+d+ha b+hin+da/ hU hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga/ toSh+Thi She hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ oM a~M na le/ an de le/ kha sa ma kha sa me/ bai ra be ra/ sa me so me/ sarba bud+d+ha A
237a5(rgyud): d+hiSh+Tha na a d+hiSh+Thi te/ oM sarba ta thA ga teSh+NI Sha sa tA ta pa tre hUM phaT swA hA/ hUM ma ma hUM ni swA hA/ sangs rgyas kyi rnal 'byor du bya'o// klu'i rgyal po rnams kyang dus dus su char 'babaso// 
237a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 
237a7(rgyud): 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogaso// / gtsug tor lha yul ma chung ba/ 
237a8(rgyud): che'i baN+Di ta ma hA dz+nyA nas rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ sa man+ta mu kha pra be sha ra shrI bi ma liSh+NI Sha pra b+hA sarba ta thA ga ta hri da yaM bi le ki twe nA ma d+hA ra ni/ 
237b1(rgyud): skad du/ kun nus sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dam tshig la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas
237b2(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi lha'i gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang // zham ring ba lha'i tshogs chen
237b3(rgyud): po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ 'khor mang po tshogs pa la bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang
237b4(rgyud): ldan pa'i chos ston par mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ ji ltar sbyin pa'i 'bras bu bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po bsags pas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dbang gis 'bras bu rnam par smin pa
237b5(rgyud): dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bab pa dang / lhun gyis grub/ pa'i gter chen po bskyed par 'gyur ba'i pha rol tu/ phyin pa dang / ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang / 
237b6(rgyud): mngon par shes pa lnga dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / tshangs pa dang / lhar skye ba'i 'bras bu rnams par smin par 'gyur ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ji ltar lha'i gzugs
237b7(rgyud): 'dod pa dang bltas pas chog mi shes pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ji ltar brtson
237b8(rgyud): 'grus rtsom pa lta ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / rga shi dang / skye ba las grol ba dang / brdzus te skye ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus
238a1(rgyud): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ji ltar dada' bar 'gro da'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bye ba phrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma 'thob pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par
238a2(rgyud): 'gyur ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ji ltar shes rab dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po dang / thos pa rgya mtsho bsags pa dang / mang du thos pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur
238a3(rgyud): ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi chos kyi sgo 'di nyid nyin mtshan de rje su sems shi sa spyad de dka' ba chen po'i phyir sgom par yang byed do// da na
238a4(rgyud): lha'i 'khor de nyid kyi nang nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi rigs dkyi lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa zhes bya ba g.yongag lha'i bu bye ba phrag stong dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo khri brgyad
238a5(rgyud): stong gis bskor ba/ lha'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzhan med khang rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa'i rtsig pa brtsigs pa'i khang bzang bskyed mos tshal sna tshogs dang / lha'i me
238a6(rgyud): tog gis mdzes par byas pa'i rdzing gis legs par rgyan pa dang ldan pa zhig yod de/ lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa de lha'i bu mo mchog gi me tog rgyas pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dang ldan
238a7(rgyud): cig dga' ba chen po dang ldan zhing lnga'i bde ba la ni chags/ rin po che sna bdun la byas pa'i sgo bzhi dang ldan pa'i khang bzang gi nang na 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor zhing rgyags pa dang / 
238a8(rgyud): rgyal gyis dregs te snyems shing nyal lo// de nas nam phyed tsam na lha'i bu de gnyid kyis log cing lha'i bu mo'i tshogs thams cad kyang sgra bskyangs te nyal bar gyur to// de nas gnas mchog
238b1(rgyud): den lha'i gnod sbyin gyi gtso bo skur gda' gdong zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa des lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa de la bskul ba/ kye nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa longs lengs/ khyod gnyid
238b2(rgyud): la dga' zhing chags pas ci zhig bya/ dga' ba la goms par byed cing chags par gnas pas ci zhig bya/ lha'i longs spyod dpag tu med pa la spyod pas ci zhig bya/ da ste zhag bdun
238b3(rgyud): na 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/ lce'i longs spyod dang bral zhing sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen po myong bar 'gyur na/ khyod kyi gnos gzhal meng khung dam pa rin po che sna bdun las byas
238b4(rgyud): ba ci dgod/ khyod kyi srog ni yongs med kyis/ thobs nimyur du rnam par soms zhes de skad ces smras nas lha'i/ gnod sbyin gyi gtso bo skar mnga' gdong mi snang bar gyur to// 
238b5(rgyud): de nas lha'i bu'i nor bu snying po dri ma med pas tshig mi snyan pa de thos nas/ brgyal te mal nas khas bub tu sa la lhung ngo // de nus lha'i bu mo'i tshogs de dag ni sgra ni ba shig
238b6(rgyud): rgyan rnams ni ltung / gis ni bsnyil/ kha nas khrag dang gsher bag ni chang nas mchu dang / dkan dang / mid pa dang / lce ni bskams la/ smre sngags stong phrag du ma ni smre ste ngu zhing cho nges 'deg
238b7(rgyud): lar gyi hud kyi hud ces 'dzer cing / lha'i rin po che'i snod nas spos chu dang / tsan+dan gyi chu grang mos 'thor zhing / kha cig ni mgul nas 'ju/ kha cig ni lag pa nas 'ju/ kha tsag ni de'i sbrul 'o byed/ 
238b8(rgyud): kha cig ni rkang pa nas 'ju/ kha cig ni mgo la 'ju/ kha cig ni brgyal te 'gyel// kha tsog ni sa'i ste ngan chu med pa'i rta bzhin du 'gre ldeg/ kha cig ni lus la mes tshig pa bzhin du 'gre
239a1(rgyud): ldog/ kha cig ni smre sngags du ma 'don cing kyi hud kyi hud ces zer cing ngu'o// de nas lha'i nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa de brgyal ba sangs te dran pa thob nas/ kha nas khrag
239a2(rgyud): skrag cing sdug bsngal chen po drag po nyams su myong nas shug ring du phyung ste lus 'dar zhing rlung gi shugs kyis btab pa bzhin du g.yo bar gyur la/ sgra bskyangs pa'i snying gis rings pa
239a3(rgyud): rings par lha'i dbang po brgya byin ga la ba der song ste byin nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi rkang pa la gdugs te rkang pa gnyis la 'jus nas 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag
239a4(rgyud): la bsgrub du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i rgyal po che ba'i bdag nyid can bskyab du gsol/ lha'i gnod sbyin gi gtso bo skar mnga' gdeng gis bsngo ba thos nas/ bdag
239a5(rgyud): dgung bdun na 'gum pa'i dus bgyi do rje mchis zhing // sem sa can dmyal ba'i tshor ba sems shig ces marmi/ na lha'i dbang po thabs gang gis bdag 'chi bdag gi
239a6(rgyud): dbang du mchi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / ngan 'gror mchi bar mi 'gyur bar 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'i gnyen po bka' stsal du gsol// lha'i dbang po ci nas kyang bdag 'chi bdag
239a7(rgyud): gi sgo nas thar pa'i cho gas bdag la bskyab tu gsol/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshig de thos nas snying rab tu sdug bsngal bas lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa la 'di skad
239a8(rgyud): ces smras so// lha'i bu ma 'jigs shig/ gang gis 'chi bdag pham par 'gyur zhing / sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal las thar bar 'gyur ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
239b1(rgyud): 'jig rten na lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan las rgal ba bla na med pa'i sman pa yod de/ de ni khyod kyi sbubs dang / rtsa lag bzung po dang / 
239b2(rgyud): dpung gnyen dang / pha ma lta bur gyur pa yin no// de ni du 'gro thams cad 'jig par mdzad pa yin gyis 'dren pa de gang na bzhugs pa der bdag cag myung du 'dong ngo // de nas de'i the rangs lha
239b3(rgyud): dbang po brgya byin dang / lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa dang / lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig dga' ldan ga la ba der dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der phyin
239b4(rgyud): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyagadabatsal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom de ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod de// de nas lha'i dbang po ba
239b5(rgyud): byin gyis dman pa'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'aM skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das lnga'i bu no bu'i snying po dri ma med pa 'di la lha'i gnod sbyin gyi gtso
239b6(rgyud): bau skar mda'i gdong gis bskul to// de dgung bdun gyi gdugs la nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa 'di 'chi bdag gi sgo'i dbang du 'gyu ro zhes mchi naM/ bcom ldan 'das da lo ji ltar sgrub
239b7(rgyud): par bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi tshig gsan nas 'dzum pa mdzad de/ 'dzum pa bstan pa des zhal nas kha dog du ma dang / 
239b8(rgyud): ldan pa'i 'od zer byung ste/ 'od zer byung ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byas te/ 'od zer gyi snang ba des lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / 
240a1(rgyud): lA ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mri 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad kyi gnas rnams snang bar byas nas bskul te/ bskul
240a2(rgyud): nas kyang 'od zer de slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgor zhugaso// zhugs ma thug tu lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad
240a3(rgyud): ces bka' stsal te// lha'i dbang po lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa 'dri zhag bdun gyi nyin par 'chi bdag gi sgo'i 'dzegs par 'gyur ba de nyon cig/ 'di gal te 'chi ba'i dus byas
240a4(rgyud): par gyur na sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzad pa chen po drag po'i tsher dab sems can dmyal ba'i tshor ba rnams myong bar 'gyur/ dero// thog mar ni grong khyer chen po bA ra na ser smig mo
240a5(rgyud): mkhan gyi phyis khung gi 'dam rdzab kyi nang du sha za mo phag mgo ca na du skye bar 'gyur te/ phyis khung de na bo shang gci za 'o// phyi sa khung de nyid kyi nang na srog chags bye ba brgya
240a6(rgyud): stong gnas te/ de dag dus gsum du phag mo de'i sha za zhing rkeng rus 'ba' zhog lus par byed do// de nas yang las kyi dbang gis lus kun rdzogs par 'gyur te/ lo bdun tshang bar
240a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/ de nas dkon par rus sbal gyi skye gnas su skye ba/ de na chu'i ming yang mi grag cing shing grib kyang med de/ nyi tshon gyis lus gdungs shing
240a8(rgyud): tshig la bye tshan za zhing bya reg dag gis lus btags nas lus dum bur 'gyur ro// de nas yang las kyi dbang gis lus byung nas zhig par 'gyur te/ lo lnga tshang bar de ltar 'gyur ro// de ltar/ 
240b1(rgyud): nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/ bA ra na se de nyid du chu 'bab chu chen po'i nya chen por skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas yang las kyi dbang gis gang na chu med pa der 'brangs nas lus chen po de la
240b2(rgyud): sbrul gdugs pa dang / bya rog dang / sre me dang / khyi dang / gzig dang / dred dang / lce spyang la sogs pas za'o// srog chags sna tshogs pa gzhan dag kyang za'o// de nas yang las kyi dbang gi
240b3(rgyud): lus byung zhing zad par 'gyur te/ lo gsum du de ltar 'gyur ro// de nas yang 'chi ba'i dus byas nas khyim bdun du skye zhing 'dzam+bu'i gling gi sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur te/ mdze can gyi khyim dang / 
240b4(rgyud): dbul po'i khyim dang / g.yung po'i khyim dang / shan pa'i khyim dang / rigs ngan gyi khyi mo dang / gdol pa'i khyim dang / dmus ro long gi khyim du skyes te le drug cu'i bar du sdug bsngal
240b5(rgyud): myong bar 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal de dag myong nas/ de nas shi 'pho sa te sems can dmyal ba chen po bcu drug tu bskal pa brgyad cu rtsa bzhir sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/ 
240b6(rgyud): lho'i dbang po de lta bu'i sdug bsngal chen po nyam su myong bar 'gyur ro// ci ste brgya la ma'i lus tho na yang dbul ba dang / yan lag ma tshang ba dang / shes rab chung ba dang / yi ge mi shes pa
240b7(rgyud): dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang bral ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyis smad pa dang / rtag tu skom pa dang / bkres pa sems pa dang / tshe thung shing nad mang bar 'gyur/ 
240b8(rgyud): ro// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa'i gtam ngan thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar shin tu 'jigs skrag ste yid mi dga' nas 'di skad ce
241a1(rgyud): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag re ba ma mchis par gyur to// bdag la skyabs bgyid ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po
241a2(rgyud): 'chi bdag gi chad pa chen po'i gnyen po yod kyis de bas na re ba med par ma byed cig/ de phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na sems can de dag 'di'i dus kyi tshe bde bar 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur
241a3(rgyud): ro// sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// dran pa tsam gyis sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// tshe ring por 'gyu ro// shin tu yongasu dag pa'i
241a4(rgyud): lus thob par 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang nga rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / tsha ba dang / khyeb jug dang / dbang phyug chen pos pa com ldan 'das ga la ba de leg su thal mo sbyar ba btud nA/ 
241a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom lda na 'das re ba 'phel bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom lda na 'das lha thams cad bskyab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das
241a6(rgyud): skye dgu'i 'jig rten thams cad bsgral du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa gsal
241a7(rgyud): du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje dgug tu gsol// bcom ldan 'das gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams dbugs dbyung du gsol/ bcom
241a8(rgyud): ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i gnas la gzigs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na phyogs bcu kun gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi
241b1(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po gdab tu gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du gnyen po ston pa chen po bshad du/ 
241b2(rgyud): gsol// bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga sh+yeb shAkya thub phreng ska ces gsol ba zugasu chud nas/ rnam pa kun tu rnam par gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
241b3(rgyud): la snyoms par zhug so// ting nge 'dzin del snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu rnam pa kun zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gtsug tor gyi dbus nas/ des phyogs kun tu snang bar byas te/ rin po che'i gdug
241b4(rgyud): lta bur na mkha' la 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'dzum pa mdzad de gzigs nas/ lha'i dbang po ba rgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsol to// lha'i dbang po kun
241b5(rgyud): nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang nga mchog la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags zung
241b6(rgyud): shig/ phyag rgya 'di ni gang+gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gabye ba rnams kyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rangs pa'o// gzungs sngags 'di mthong ba dang / 
241b7(rgyud): thos pa tsam gyis sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa thams
241b8(rgyud): cad kyang rnam par 'jig par 'gyur zhing / sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyang 'jig par 'gyur te/ dper na me yis rtswa bsregs pa// rlung gis thal ba myur du deng // de bzhin tshe rab
242a1(rgyud): snga ma la// bsags pa'i sdig pa thams cad sreg/ dper na char pa 'bab 'gyur te// ri la 'bab chu babs pa yis// sa yi steng gi phyag dar dang // nyal nyil thams cad 'ded
242a2(rgyud): par 'gyur// de bzhin gzungs 'di mthong ba dang // thos pa tsam gyis sdig pa 'dag/ dper na mi yis gser sbyangs pa// sos gcad rung bar snyi bar 'gyur// de bzhin bzlas brjod byas
242a3(rgyud): tsam gyis// lus sbyong 'gyur te the tshom med// dper na nyi ma shar gyur na// 'od zer kun tu rab tu 'byung // de bzhin su zhig gzungs 'chang ba// de yi lus kyang rnam par mdzes// dper na
242a4(rgyud): skam por nya 'gre ldog/ chu dang bral bas 'chi sgor 'gro/ la da las slar yang chur bor bas// de na gnas shing yang rtsa'ong // de bzhin dran pa tsam gyis kyang // mi rnams tsha ni bzlog
242a5(rgyud): par byed// lha'i dbang po gzungs sngags bstan gyis nyon cig/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga tA nAM/ oM mA hA tsin+ta ma Ni dz+wa la na/ sA ga ra gam+b+hI ra/ A kaR+Sha ya/ A kaR+Sha ya/ A yun+d+ha ra/ 
242a6(rgyud): A yon+na ra/ san+d+ha ra/ san+ta ra/ kA Na kA Na/ kI Ni kr-I Ni/ ku d+ha k+Shu Nu/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ma hA sa ma ye/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ma hA b+hA ba na/ sa ga ra/ saM sho d+ha ya/ mAM ser+b+ba satwA sh+tsa/ b+ha ga ba ti sar+b+ba pA po ba ma
242a7(rgyud): la dza ya dza ya/ dza yaM lab+h+yAM/ sU Ta sU Ta/ s+pho Ta yaM s+pho Ta ya/ bi ga ta A ba ra Ni/ b+ha ya ha ra Ni/ hU~M hUM hUM/ mr-i d+hu daN+Da d+ha re/ a b+ha ya pre de/ uSh+NI Sha byA ba le ka ta/ sa man+ta mu khe/ sa man+ta bya/ 
242a8(rgyud): ba lo ki te/ ma hA mA ye/ ma hA pA shA d+ha ra/ a mo g+ha bi ma le/ A ka rA ya/ A kaR+Sha ya/ A kaD+D+h+ya yaM/ A kan+d+hA ya/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/ in+d+ri ya/ bi sho d+ha ni/ b+hu Shi ta b+hu dze/ ma hA/ 
242b1(rgyud): mu drA bi lo kI te/ dza ya dza ya/ sid+d+hi sid+d+he/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ bo d+ha ni bo d+ha ni/ saM b+ho d+ha ni/ saM bo d+ha ni/ sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni/ saM sho d+ha ni saM sho d+ha ni/ bi sho d+ha ni bi sho d+ha ni/ hA ra ha ra/ ma ma sar+b+ba pA pe/ sarba ta thA
242b2(rgyud): ga ta ku la b+hu dze/ sa ma ya tiSh+Te/ pra saM ra tu ma ma puN+yai/ bi na sh+yan+d+ha pA paM/ sar+b+ba kilpi Sha ha re/ ma Ni bi shud+d+he/ sho d+ha ya bi ma la/ bi ka si ta pad+me/ ka pa tsi tra b+hu dze/ Sha T+TA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra Ni/ 
242b3(rgyud): sar+b+ba ta thA ga teSh+NI Sha bi lo ki te swA hA/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta gu h+Na d+haSh+TA nA d+hiSh+Thi te swAhA/ A ur+tha de swA hA/ puN+ya da de swA hA/ puN+ya bi lo ki te swA hA/ puN+ya a ba lo ki te swA hA/ mri t+yu daN+De swA hA/ ya ma dAN+Da/ 
242b4(rgyud): swA hA/ ye mA dU ti swA hA/ saM ha ra Ni swA hA/ saM b+ha ra Ni swA hA/ san+d+ha ra ni swA hA/ pra ti sa ra Ni swA hA/ oM dzaM ba ti swA hA/ te dze ba te swA hA/ dza ya ba ti swA hA/ sarba ta thA ga ta mu drA d+hiSh+Tha nA d+hiSh+Ti
242b5(rgyud): te swA hA// lha'i dbang po gzugs sngags 'di lha'i bu nor bu 'i snying po dri ma med pa la rje su ston cig/ des ni khyod kyi sa lha'i bu de la yun ring por phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro// 
242b6(rgyud): kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug ter dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gsheg pa thams cad kyi snying po dang dam tshig la rnam par lta ba'i gzungs sngags 'di bris la mchod rten gyi na
242b7(rgyud): du bzhug go/ mchod rten sar pa 'am/ snying pa bcos pa yang rung ste de'i nang du bzhug go/ spos dang / byug pa yang phul la gzungs kyi rig sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bsgom par byo'o/ nyin ga cig shi
242b8(rgyud): lan gsum mtshan lan gsum dran par bya'o// de nas nyi ma shar ba dang shar phyogasu bltas te/ spos kyi dkyil 'khor byas la/ nyi ma log su me tog gis gtor ro// a ga ru dang / du ru ka bdug
243a1(rgyud): pas bdugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o// mchod rten brgya rtsa brgyad btab pa la rig sngags kyi snying po
243a2(rgyud): 'di bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bcug nas dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag na gang+gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gdung dang / 
243a3(rgyud): ring bsrel mchod rten re re'i nang du bcug par 'gyur ro// ring bsrel gyi snying por yang 'gyur ro// snying po 'di brisi la bzhig/ oM na mo sta~M ya d+hi kA nAM/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ti hri da ya gar+b+ha dz+wA la dz+wA la/ d+harmA
243a4(rgyud): d+hu tu gar+b+he saM b+ha ra ma ma A yuHsi she d+ha ya saM she d+ha ya ma mr-i sar+b+ba pA paM/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+taSh+NI Sha bri ma le bi sh+tsapad+h+ye hUM hUM hUM/ aM br-i saM dzaHswA hA/ kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'odi
243a5(rgyud): bor gtsug ter dri ma med pa zhes bya ba dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di gus pa/ ri byas te/ mched rten gyi las byis na tshe zad pa las slar
243a6(rgyud): nur tshe ring por sbyong bar byed de// gal te shi 'phos na yang sbrul gyi lpags pa rjes pa bzhin du lus bor nas skal ba mnyam pas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba con du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 
243a7(rgyud): 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur ro// phyin chad nam yang 'chi ba'i tshor ba mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// byin chad sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / ngan
243a8(rgyud): 'gror 'gro zhing skye bar mi 'gyuraro// phyin chad sems can dmyal ba'i sgra rna lam du yang grags par mi 'gyur na/ 'bras bu rnam par smon par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te de ni gnas med do// de nas lha'i
243b1(rgyud): dbang po brgya byin gyis rig sngags 'di bcom ldan 'das las gzung nas/ lha'i bu'i nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa dang lhan cig tu nam langs dang / rang gi gnas su song ste/ de bzhin gshes
243b2(rgyud): pas bka' stsal pa'i lung bzhin du cho ga go rims bzhin du mchod rten gyi las byas nas/ bzlas brjod kyi cho ga yang byas pa dang / byas ma thag tu lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa sdug
243b3(rgyud): bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi ba na sdig pa thams cad dang bral te/ lus rnam par dag nas lpags pa'i mdog ni gser gyi kha dog lta bur gyur skra dang mig ni mthon 'thing lta bur gyur/ de bzhin gsheg
243b4(rgyud): ba thams cad ni mngon du mthong / nam mkha'i dbyings nas de/ bzhin gshegs pas leg so leg so zhes bya ba'i gsung ni byung ngo // de nas lha'i bu de sgrib pa dang bral ba'i lusu
243b5(rgyud): gyur par mthong nas ya mtshan cher bzung ste rab tu dga' nas/ a la la sangs rgyas/ a la la rig sngags/ a la la chos/ a la la 'bras bu 'phral du ston pa bcom
243b6(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa thugs rje mchog tu che ba yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu de la phyag 'tshalo zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// de nas lha'i bu de rang gi gnas song nas/ 
243b7(rgyud): lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa sna tshogs blangs te/ lha'i gos dang / spud pa dang / rgyan kyang blangs nas g.yog 'khor thams cad dang lha'i bu mo dang / lha'i
243b8(rgyud): tshogs dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa dang / dga' ldan gyi gnas su dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te lan
244a1(rgyud): brgya stong du skor ba byas nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir de nyid du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / 
244a2(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mi sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
244a3(rgyud): ldan 'das su ga las gang gis lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa la mind cing shin tu tsha ba'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
244a4(rgyud): skyes bu dam pa lagaso leg so// skyes bu dam pa dag la dgus par dris so// de'i phyir nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o// lag na rdo rje sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na lho phyogs
244a5(rgyud): kyi rgyud na yangs pa 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i grong khyer yod/ de/ de na bram ze dri ma med pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa bya// nga pa/ gsal ba yid gzhungs pa/ gzugs bzang zhing
244a6(rgyud): mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ mdog bzang po/ rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ dad pa dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bsam patson ra ga pa smra ba zhig gnas te de rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di rjes su
244a7(rgyud): sems shing sgrom la meng du byed de/ sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod do// de nas grong khyer de nyid na khyim bdag rab snang zhes bya ba/ phyug pa nor che ba/ longs spyod che ba// g.yog
244a8(rgyud): 'khor mang bzhig gnas te/ khyim bdag de ni dad pa dang mi ldan zhing gzhan mu stegs can la dang ngo // bram ze ni khyim bdag de la yong dang ying rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di snying po da/ 
244b1(rgyud): bcas pa sgrogs kyang khyim bdag de ni de la dad pa'i sems mi skyed kyi/ de 'di snyam du sems te ngas bram ze 'di dum bu dum bur btubs la nya dang rul sbal sreg pa bzhin du bor te khar ngan skyugs kyi
244b2(rgyud): dgang ngo snyam mo// de nas 'di snyam du bsam ma thag tu khyim bdag de la sha bkra dang / 'dze'i nad kyis btab bo// de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas nas 'chi kar sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen po myong ste/ 
244b3(rgyud): shi nas sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes te/ der bskal pa'i tshad du sdug bsngal gyi tshong ba myong ngo // de nas shi 'phos nas nya dang / phag dang / rus sbrul gyi nang du bskal par
244b4(rgyud): sdug bsngal myong ngo // de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas nas som/ ngas can dmyal ba thig nag tu skyes te/ der yang bskal dpa'i tshad du sdug bsngal chen po myong ngo // de nas shi 'phos na
244b5(rgyud): grong khyer de nyid du dmus long gi khyim du skyes te/ dmus long du gyur nas phan tshun du sring mo la song ba dang / tsug lag khang cig tu phyin pa dang / de na dge slong snying rje la
244b6(rgyud): gnas pa zhig 'dug ste/ des de mthong nas byams pas rgyas par byas te zan byin no// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di yang bsgrags dmus long nges gzungs sngags 'di thos pa dang tshe rabs
244b7(rgyud): dran par gyur nas bram ze de yang dran te/ rjes su sems shing kye ma'o mi bzang pa'i las byas so// snyam nas ngo tsha dang khrel yod par gyur te/ 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang
244b8(rgyud): gzungs sngags 'di'i mthus sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang du skyes te/ gzhal med khong chen po'i nang na lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis bskor cing lha'i longs spyod chen po myong bar gyur
245a1(rgyud): to// de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag dmus longs du gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod dogs shing the tsom za ba 'am/ yid gnyi su gyur na de ltar mi blta ste/ 
245a2(rgyud): lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa 'di nyid do// khyim bdag lag na rdo rje de lta bas na sdom pa gsum gyis bsdam par bya'o// lag na rdo rje las nges 'bras bu rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal
245a3(rgyud): gyi tshor ba 'di lta bu myong ngo // lha'i bu 'dis byang chub kyi snying por mthar thug gi bar du las kyi 'bras bu tha ma 'di myong ngo // lag na rdo rje de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze dri ma med par gyur pa de gzhan
245a4(rgyud): zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing the tshom mam/ yi dad gnyis su gyur pa de ltar mi blta ste/ lag na rdo rje khyod nga nyid do// dmus long la gzungs sngags 'di sgrogs pa'i dag
245a5(rgyud): slong de ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de 'di nyid yin te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong du gyur te// de nas lha'o/ 'khor mang po des sngon byung ba 'di thos nas rmad du byung bar
245a6(rgyud): gyur/ dga' ba thob par gyur te/ ca co dang ga zha'i sgra chen po byung nas a la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig rig sngag 'di'i mthu ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bu'o zhes ched du
245a7(rgyud): brjod pa ched du brjod do// de nas 'khor de las lha'i bu khri nyis stong ni phyir mi ldog par gyur to// lha'i bu mo bye ba 'bum phrag 'bum ni dri med kyi dbang po dang bral nas skyes pa'i dbang po byung ste/ 
245a8(rgyud): phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi tshog rig
245b1(rgyud): sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di ni mthu che ba phan yon che ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur zhing / gang
245b2(rgyud): gis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas yongasu grol bar mdzad pa'i cho ga bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje gzungs sngags
245b3(rgyud): 'di'i phan yon dang sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di nyon cig/ 'di ltar phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen mas
245b4(rgyud): rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di dus gcig tu dran par bya'o// daring bsrel gyi snying po 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can gyi mchod rten la bskor bar bya'o// 
245b5(rgyud): yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'di gnyis kyang dus gcig tu dran par bya'o// des ni gang+gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig ga 'bum gyi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la
245b6(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// bsod nams chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyi sgrib pa rnams kyang yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba
245b7(rgyud): dang dud 'gro'i ske gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi ngan seng rnams las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// tshe ring por 'gyur ro// sbrul gyi lpags pa rjes pa bzhin du lus bor nas
245b8(rgyud): skal ba mnyam po'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// phyin chad mngal gyi gnas kyi dri mas mi gas par 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der brdzus te/ 
246a1(rgyud): skye zhing pad+ma las skye bar 'gyuraro// tshe rabs thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lta 'dod par 'gyur ro// bsam pa thams
246a2(rgyud): cad yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gal te cho ga bya bar 'dod na des khrus byas la gos sar pa bgos te/ spos kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bya'o// snying po'i rig sngags
246a3(rgyud): gro ga la bri bar bya'o// mchod rten lnga gdab par bya'o// rig sngags 'di yang mchod rten gyi nang du gzhug par bya'o// mchod rten bzhi ni grwa bzhir bzhag go/ gcig ni dkyil 'khor gyi
246a4(rgyud): dbusu bzhag par bya'o// shing bu gtsugs te ba dan dmar po dbyang bar bya'o// me tog gis gtor ro// bu dam pa gang ba lnga bzhag go/ grwa bzhir pog por bzhi nas
246a5(rgyud): du ru ka dang / a ga ru dang / tsan+dan dang / gu gul gyi gdu gas pas gdugs par bya'o// yid bzhin gyi no bu rin po che 'di gnyis kyang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
246a6(rgyud): brjed bya'o// snying po'i sngags brjod cing dkyil 'khor la bskor ba brgyad rtsa brkyang bya'o// nad kyis
246a7(rgyud): btab pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad tshabs che ba dang / tshe zad pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis skrag pa dang / bu 'dod pa
246a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la mngon par phyogs par bzhag go// rma bya'i sgo lngas byab par bya'o// mchod rten gyi dkyil 'khor mchod par bya'o// cho ga 'di lan cig byas na bskal par bsags
246b1(rgyud): pa'i las kyi sgrib pa dang bral nas sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i
246b2(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi ngan song thams cad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sdug bsngal dang / sgrib pa dang / sdig pa
246b3(rgyud): dang / bdug pa thams cad tshe rabs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de/ byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// tshe zad pa yang phyir nur zhing tshe ring bar 'gyuraro// / 
246b4(rgyud): yun rings du nad kyis brnyengs te sha zad pa yang lus yong desu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// lus shin tu yong su rdzogs pa dar dag par 'gyuraro// bsam pa yang yid bzhin du yongs su
246b5(rgyud): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// byin chad 'chi bdag gi sgo'i sdug pa sngal mi 'thod par 'gyur ro// sbrul gyi lpags pa ba sa pa bzhin du lus bor nas skal ba mnyam pa'i phyir
246b6(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der pad+ma las rdzus te skyes par 'gyur ro// thams cad du rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par 'gyuraro// 
246b7(rgyud): skye ba thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// 'di'i bzlas brjod kyis cho ga bzhin du nyin cig bzhin du dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas na de'i sdig pa'i sgrib pa dang
246b8(rgyud): nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod cho ga bzhin du lo gcig tshang bar byas na 'jigs pa med pa'i lta ba kun nas sgo'i 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge
247a1(rgyud): 'dzin 'thob bo// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// dri ma med pa rnam par dag pa 'bar ba'i gzi brjid
247a2(rgyud): ces bya ba'i lus yongasu dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// tshe rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// gang+gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs
247a3(rgyud): pa rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// tshe rabs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rnamasu yang shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du 'gro 'dod
247a4(rgyud): pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sbrul gyi lpags pa rjes pa bzhi dan du lus bor nas bskal ba mnyam pa'i phyir 'jig rte/ na gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// 'chi bdag
247a5(rgyud): gi sgo mi mthong zhing rmi lam lta bur kun tu shes so// tshesabargyad dam/ bcu bzhi 'am/ bco lnga la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gzungs sngags 'di gnyis lan
247a6(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas shing rang bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la bskor ba byas na bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis 'bral du mchod rten la sgra 'byung ste/ legs zhes bya ba
247a7(rgyud): sbyin par 'gyur// 'bral du sdig pa'i sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi dri ma dang / ser sna dang / phrag dog dang bral bar 'gyur
247a8(rgyud): lus dri ma med cing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gang dang gtam byas pa de dag thams cad kyang sdig pa rnams las grol bar 'gyur ro// 
247b1(rgyud): dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba la smras na yang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// bya'i tshogs thams cad la smras na yang bya'i tshogs thams
247b2(rgyud): cad yongs su grol bar 'gyuraro// tha na khyi dang / rus sbal dang / sbrul dang / byi la dang / sre mo dang / srog chags sna tshogs la smras na yang thams cad yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// bye ma la
247b3(rgyud): lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjed byas te dur khyod du gter na/ gang gi rus pa la theg pa de dag sems can dmyal ba gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der yongs su thar te mtho risu skye 'gyur/ 
247b4(rgyud): gang dag mthe ris skyes pa de dag gi lus la me tog go char 'bab par 'gyur re// gcan zan dang / bya sna tshogs// gang dag dur khrod der 'gro ba de dag thams cad
247b5(rgyud): kyang bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ri la gtor na ri dgas dang / bya rgyu ba de dag thang bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/ ro// kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri
247b6(rgyud): ma med par snang ba dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po lan brgya stong bzlas brjod byas na/ gal te mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dag mnar med par lhung nas gdung bas bsre
247b7(rgyud): pa las 'phral du yongasu thar par 'gyur ro// lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas/ gal te 'gul nas thag pa btags te khrid pa yang gshin rje'i gnas nas 'brel du ldog par 'gyur// 
247b8(rgyud): de'i 'jigs pa chen po las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyang rnam par 'jig par 'gyur te the tshom med do// chos kyi gshin rje yang dran bzhin
248a1(rgyud): du sems shing 'jug/ lus bsam gtan gyi lam bzhin nam/ sbrul gyi lpags pa brjes pa bzhin du lus bor nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du mngon/ 
248a2(rgyud): par dga' zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 'chi bdag gis sdug bsngal mi mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'bum bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bcug na/ 'bum tshang nas mchod rten thad 'bar bar 'gyuraro// 
248a3(rgyud): bdag kyang 'bar bar 'gyur ro// nges par 'phral du phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// sa bcu la gnas par 'gyur ro// gang ga'i klung gi bya ma khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i
248a4(rgyud): bye ma snyed kyi bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing lung bstan pa thob/ bar 'gyur ro// de nas mchod rten chen po gcig gi nang du/ 
248a5(rgyud): bcug ste shing bu sgreng ba byas na dus gsum gyi de ba/ zhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po 'bum gyi mchod rten zhes bya'o// gang dag de la bya ba rnams byed
248a6(rgyud): pa de dag thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnasu gto/ 
248a7(rgyud): pa rnams dang / gzhan yang srog chags kyi rigs sna tshogs gang dag der 'dong ba de dag kyang phyi mo ldog par 'gyu ro// tha na grib mas phog na yang yongasu grol bar 'gyur na
248a8(rgyud): bya ba mang du byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ 'di'i ston dang phan yon ni brjod par mi nuso// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi
248b1(rgyud): dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyugs chen po dang / dga' ldan gyi gnas na gnas pa'i lha'i bu de dag dang / brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / 
248b2(rgyud): lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa dang / de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das ga la bya der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das
248b3(rgyud): ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs sngags mthu chen po 'di ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bur
248b4(rgyud): mthong ba dang / thos pa dka' ba lags te bcom ldan la dadas bdag cag lhan cig tshogs nas slad ma'i tshe sla da ma'i dus na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'di gzung bar
248b5(rgyud): bgyi'o// rgyas par bgyi'o// sems can thams cad la bsgrag par bgyi'o// 'di 'dzin pa'i sems can chen po de'i slad bzhin 'brang bar rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung
248b6(rgyud): ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// bu bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag legaso leg so// khyed kyis de ltar gyis shig/ 
248b7(rgyud): rig sngags kyi rgyal po yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'di ngas khyed la btang ngo // 'phags pa kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med pa snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi
248b8(rgyud): snying po dang dam tshig la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogaso// / rgya gar gyi mkhan pi dzi na mi tra dang / shrI len+da bi d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he yes sdes
249a1(rgyud): bsgyur cing nus te gtan la dbya pa// rgya gar skad du/ sarba ma na an+t+ra mi ta sid+d+hi stu pe nA ma d+ha ra NI// bod skad du/ shes pa thams cad mthar byin
249a2(rgyud): par grub pa'i mchod rteni zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
249a3(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi tshul dang / 'dul ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// phyag 'tshal dus gsum
249a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas la// phyag 'tshal dkon mchog gsum dge lang // mi 'khrugs pa dang 'od dpag med// spyan ras gzi dgas la bdag phyag 'tshal// rig gsum la yang phyag
249a5(rgyud): lo// 'di skad bdag gis thod pa dus gcig na/ bac+doMs rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po ri rab chen po sna lngas grub pa/ gzhi nyid mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du gnas pa'i steng na/ 
249a6(rgyud): rin po che sna tshogs pa'i khang pa dang / tshad med pa'i mchod rten bzhi dang / rang bzhin gyi mchod rten chen po gnas yin pa'i phyir rtse me'i dbyings kyang mtshon rten du gyur pa'i gan
249a7(rgyud): na/ lag na rdo rje dang / 'jam dpal dang / spyan ras gzigs dang / byams pa la sogs pas bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi
249a8(rgyud): la sogs pa gtsang ris kyi mgon po rnams dang / thabs gcig tu bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gtsug tor dang / thugs ka'i dpal be'u la sogs pa rnams nas 'od zer kha dog
249b1(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu snyed cig bkye ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab cing brjod kyi mi lang bzang pod
249b2(rgyud): zer gyi snang ba chen pos til gyi khang bu bzhin du gang zhing khyab par mdzad pas mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad long ba rnams kyis gzugs mthong ba dang / 'on pa rnams
249b3(rgyud): kyis sgra thos pa dang / rig pa rnams smra shes pa dang / zang po rnams dang / zha bo rnams 'gro zhing / yan lag rengs pa dang / nad pa rnams nad dang bral ba dang / dmyal ba rnams tshe/ 
249b4(rgyud): bri nas rims kyis sdug bsngal thar pa dang / gzhan yang 'gro ba sems can rnams rims kyis dran pa rnyed par byas nas/ na mkha'i khams thams cad yid kyi mchod rten
249b5(rgyud): gyi skus gang zhing rgyas par byas te 'od zer de dag slar/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu 'dus pa la sa chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan du gyur to// de nas lag
249b6(rgyud): na rdo rje legs pa'i 'khor rnams ngo mtshar du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la/ bla re dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 'phan dang / gdugs dang / rnga yab dang / dril bu dang / dar sbyangs dang / 
249b7(rgyud): spos dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mar me dang / bshes dang / rol mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
249b8(rgyud): to// bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba'i mgon po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas mchod rten byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga rig pa chen mo bi ma le uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs bshad du gsol/ 
250a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mchod rten byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga rig pa chen mo bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di ni rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
250a2(rgyud): gang la la zhig gis 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ bris sam klog gram/ ming nyan par byed na/ de mtshams med pa lnga dang / mi dge ba bcu dang / sdig pa'i las ci byas pa thams cad ma
250a3(rgyud): lus par byang bar 'gyur ro// bi ma le uSh+NI Sha'i rig pa chen mo'i mchod rten byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga 'di'o// oM t+yA d+ha sarba ta tha ga ta hri da ya gar+b+he/ dz+wA la d+harma d+ha tu gar+b+he/ saM ha ra Na/ 
250a4(rgyud): a yuHsau sho d+ha ya/ pa pAM sarba ta thA ga tA sa man+ta uSh+NI Sha bi ma le bi shud+d+he swA hA// rig pa chen mo 'di gsung ngas ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mchod
250a5(rgyud): rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyuraro// rig pa chen mo 'di gro ga 'am/ ras sam/ shing shun la bris te rgyal mchi/ na gyi rtse mo la btags na/ lha dang mi la sogs pa thad kyi
250a6(rgyud): mchod cing phyag bya ba dang / bkur sti bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ba dang / rig pa chen mo 'di lus sam mgul du thogs na/ de lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin la sogs pa rnams kyis sangs
250a7(rgyud): rgyas nyid du lta bar 'gyuraro// bdag nyid ri brag gam/ tshal lam dgon pa 'am/ sa phyogs gang du 'gro ba'i tshe rig pa chen mo 'di brjod na ri dang sa phyogs thams cad mchod rten
250a8(rgyud): dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// oM t+ya d+h+ye sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya gar+b+he dz+wa la d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he/ saM ha ra Na/ A yuHsi sho d+ha ya/ pA paM sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+ta uSh+NI Sha bi ma le bi shud d+he ma hA bir
250b1(rgyud): rag b+hai ra si/ d+harmAd tu gar+b+he/ baM bi sa ra a a laM swA hA/ zhes brjod na/ sa gzhi thams cad kyang mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// bdag nyi chu'am/ 'tsho 'am/ rgya mtsho/ 
250b2(rgyud): la sogs pa gang la rgal ba na yang rig pa chen me'i sngags 'dis btab na chu de thams cad kyang mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// aM s+t+rai ya d+ha sarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya gar+b+he/ 
250b3(rgyud): dz+wa la d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he/ saM ha ra Na A yuHsaM sho d+ha ya/ pA paM sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+ta bi ma la uSh+NI Sha bi shud d+he/ ma hA bi ra dze ra ga b+hi ra si d+harma d+h+we tu biM bri sa ra/ a ma ma ki swA hA we/ 
250b4(rgyud): brjod na/ chu thams cad kyang mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur re// gzhan yang bdag nyid kyis na mkha' ga nga nas gang khyab par rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di btab
250b5(rgyud): na/ na mkha' thams cad kyang mched rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// oM s+t+rai ya d+ha sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya// gar+b+he dz+wA la d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he/ saM ha ra Na A yuHsaM sho d+ha
