250b6(rgyud): ya/ pA paM sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+te/ bi ma le uSh+NI Sha bi shud+d+he/ ma hA ma bi ra tsa ra gaM b+hI ra si d+harma d+hA tu bi bi sa ra a a e khaM ya swA hA// zhes brjod ni/ na mkha'i khams thams cad mchod
250b7(rgyud): rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur te/ phyag bya ba dang / bskor ba bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i'os su 'gyur ro// bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs bzlas te/ 'byung ba chen po lnga po gang la yang mchod
250b8(rgyud): rten btab na nyon mongs pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad dag par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang sa dang / shing dang / rdo dang / 'jim pa dang / 'bi bi gang yang rung ba la rig pa'i sngags 'dis
251a1(rgyud): btab pa ste/ mchod rten btab na rin po chen+da tsho kyi mchod rten gyi rgyur 'gyur te/ oM rat+na tsi ti pa tse ye bi bi sa ra swA hA// zhes brjod nas pa'i lci ba la sogs pas byugs na thad
251a2(rgyud): rin po che'i mchod rten gyi rgyur 'gyuraro// rigs pa chen mo'i sngags 'di ma btab na/ gang zhig gser dang dngul dang bai DUR+Ya la sogs pa rin po che sna bdun las mchod rten bzhengs
251a3(rgyud): su gsol yang rdo dang / shing dang / kham pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di nyid rdzas kyi rang bzhin las snying po dang gsang sngags byin gyis brlabs ma
251a4(rgyud): bzhugs pa'i phyir rig pa chen mo 'dis byin gyis brlabs te ba trab na/ 'byung ba chen po gang la mchod rten btab kyang ba skal pa dpag tu med pa thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i dri ma
251a5(rgyud): dag nas/ khyim bdag gi rigs shing sa la chen po lta bur/ skyes nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par 'gyur ro// ri/ ga pa chen mo 'dis byin gyis brlabs te/ rdo dang / shing
251a6(rgyud): la ba la sogs pa la mchod rten btab na/ de gdon mi za bar bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bur skyes nas sa bcu rim gyis bgrod de/ bcu gcig kun tu 'od kyi sa thob par
251a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// rig pa chen mo 'dis byin gyis btab te/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUr+ya la sogs pa la mchod rten btab na de gdon mi zla bar rgyal rigs shing sa la chen po lta bur
251a8(rgyud): skyes nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa theb par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'dis btab na mchod rten gcig btab na yang bye ba btab par 'gyur ro// rig pa chen mo
251b1(rgyud): 'dis ma btab na bye ba btab kyang gcig dang dra bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gong ma bzhin no// rig pa chen me de'i sngags 'di yin te/ tad+yathA/ suk+Sh+me s+'u Sh+Te smye shAn+te/ ni dkul/ 5
251b2(rgyud): sho te dzas rba rba d+he/ a d+hiSh+Tha na/ a d+hiSh+Thi te/ a nu mi de swA hA// 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ 'jim pa'i gong bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/ mchod rten gcig btab na bye ba
251b3(rgyud): btab par 'gyur ro// brgya btab pa'i grangs dang phan yon ni 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dgra bcom pa rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi nus so// stong btab pa'i grangs dang phan yon ni
251b4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi nus so// khri btab pa'i grangs dang phan yon ni de bzhin gshe dgas pa rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi nus so// 'bum
251b5(rgyud): btab pa'i grangs dang phan yon ni phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi nus so// de bas na mche'i rten lnga man chad gdab pa'i
251b6(rgyud): mchod pa'i cho gar bya ba ni thog mar mchod rten brtsig pa'i gnas sam/ mchod rten gyi 'jim pa'i gnas sam/ mchod rten gyi 'jim pa'i gnas gang nas blangs pa'i gnas nges
251b7(rgyud): bdag byin gyis brlabs cing sa la gnas pa'i gdon bgrogs bsam sbyor ngan pa mchod rten dang / dge ba las bar chad byed pa rnams 'tshams bcad par bya ste/ thig skud la rig pa chen
251b8(rgyud): mo'i sngags 'dis gdab ste/ oM badz+ra sU tra hUM phaT/ ces brjod nas thig skud de nyid che rdo rje'i skud par dmigs nas mchod rten gyis khyon ji tsam ran pa dang / 'jim pa'i sa khyon ji
252a1(rgyud): ran pa thig gis sa bcad de bzhin dus bcang nas gzhi de nyid mchod rten gyi rgyu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// de nas de nyid la seng ldeng gi phuH
252a2(rgyud): pa sor brgyad pa la rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di gdab par bya ste/ oM badz+ra kI li kI li kI la ya sarba duSh+TAM hUM phaT/ ces bya ba 'di lan bdun bzlas te/ rdo rje phur bus dmig ste dbus dang
252a3(rgyud): grwa bzhir gangab bo// de bzhin du btab na mi dang mi ma yin pa las srung bar 'gyur ro// sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogaso// seng ldeng gi phur bu ni mchod rten gyi 'jim
252a4(rgyud): ba'i sa ji tsam dgos pa ma blangs kyi bar du mi dbyung bar bzhag gro// de nas til dang yungs kar las rig pa chen mo'i snga/ gas 'di brjod par bya'o// oM a mr-i te ha na ha na hUM phaT/ 
252a5(rgyud): ces lan bdun bzlas te/ sa'i phyogasu gtor bas/ sa/ phyogs de nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs gnas dpag tu med par 'gyur/ de ltar sa gzhi
252a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs gnas su byin gyis brlabs te/ bgegs kyi bsam sbyor ngan pa la mtshams bcad de/ spos dang / me tog dang / gtor ma la sogs pa rnams
252a7(rgyud): kyis kyang sa phyogs de na gnas pa'i lha dang / klu dang / lha ma yin la sogs pa rnams la mchod cing bsdus te/ bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di bklags nas phyogs de yang shin tu
252a8(rgyud): bkra shis shing byin chags par 'gyur ro// de nas mchod rten gyi 'jim pa'i sa brko ba'i tshe rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di bzlas te brko bar bya'o// oM badz+ra kha na kha na hUM phaT/ ces
252b1(rgyud): bzlas shing sa gni de nyid rin po che sna lngar gyur par dmigs te brkos na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam par dag pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// de nas sa gtsang ma blangs pa de dag gnas
252b2(rgyud): gtsang ma gcig tu gzhag nas sa brdung ba'i tshig ni tho ba la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag rgya rdo rje rtse gsum pas mnan te/ rig po chen mo'i sngags 'dis btab ste brdung / 'du su dag pa A ke Ta ya A
252b3(rgyud): ko Ta ya hU~M phaT/ ces lan bdun bzlas te/ rdo rje'i tho bar dmigs shing brdungs na nyon mongs pa dang bag chags thams cad ma lus par byang zhing bcom par 'gyur ro// de nas 'jim pa
252b4(rgyud): brdzi ba ni spos chub la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag byas gtu gas te/ spos chu de'i nang du yang chos nyid kyi yi ge a zhes bya ba dkar po las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od dang chas
252b5(rgyud): par dmigs te/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer chen po des spos chu de khyab par gyur nas/ spos chu nyid ba dud rtsi'i rang bzhin du gyur par dmigs nas rig pa chen
252b6(rgyud): mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// oM a mri te hUM phaT/ ces bya ba lan bdun zlos te byin gyis brlabs pas/ de nyid kyang bdud rtsi chen po'i chu rgyun dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// de nas
252b7(rgyud): 'jam pa brdzi ba'i sngags chen mo 'di brjod par bya'o// oM badz+ra pA marda nA ya hUM phaT/ ces lan bdun brjod de/ 'jim pa de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur 'gyur ro// de nas 'jim pa de
252b8(rgyud): nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab par byin gyis brlab pa ni 'jim pa de nyid la/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/ rig pa chen mo'i gzungs 'di brjod par
253a1(rgyud): bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ tad+ya thA/ sAk+Sh+me suk+She/ shAn+te shAn+te/ dAn+te dAn+te/ ni rA ku le/ ya she ya sho ba ti te dze shud+d+he bi shud+d+he/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ a d+hiSh+Tha na/ a d+hiSh+Ti te/ a/ 
253a2(rgyud): na mo ta hi ti swA hA// zhes bdag nyid kyi rig pa chen mo 'di lan bdun gsum du nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs na 'jim pa nyid las ye shes
253a3(rgyud): kyi 'od zer rnam lnga phyogs bcur 'phros par 'gyur ro// phyogs bcur 'phros nas kyang sems can thams cad kyi don ji ltar 'dul bar byas par 'gyur ro// 'od zer de dag slar 'dus
253a4(rgyud): bas kyang 'jim pa nyid rin po che sna lnga'i rang bzhin du gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis dmi khyab pa'i rgyu rkyen dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de ltar yad
253a5(rgyud): kyis kyang dmigs so// de nas 'bi 'bi byed pa'i tshe rig pa chen mo 'di brjod par bya ste/ oM badz+ra A yu She sA hA/ zhes lan bdun bzlas te byin gyis brlabs na/ 'bi
253a6(rgyud): 'bi nyid las ye shes kyi 'od zer gyi sprin gyis byo bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas par 'phros shing khyab ste/ 'gro ba mang po'i don byed par 'gyur ro// 'od zer gyi sprin phung
253a7(rgyud): de dag slar 'bi 'bi'i nang du 'dus pas kyang de nyid ye shes rin po che'i rang bzhin shel sgong ltar yongasu dag par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmig so// de nas 'bi 'bi'i
253a8(rgyud): nang bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i snying po mu dra'i phyag rgyar byas pa 'am/ gro ba 'am/ ras sam/ shog bu 'am/ shing shun la sngags bris pa dang / de'i nang du rig sngags so so'i snying po dang / 
253b1(rgyud): oM hUM d+hU dzI AHde rnams drugs sbyar te/ mu dA'i phyag rgyar byas pa'am/ yi ger bris pa 'am/ gang yang rung ste nang du rtsal na de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ye shes dang ldan pa
253b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// nang du stsol ba'i tshe rig sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// oM badz+ra gar+b+he swA hA zhes bya ba bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ye shes de'i nang du 'dus shing zhugs/ 
253b3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// yid kyis kyang dmig so// de nas tse ti'i phor bu'i nang du yungs kar ram/ til mar gyis bsku ba'i sngags rig pa chen mo 'di brjod par bya'o// oM a ra dza bi ra dze swA hA/ 
253b4(rgyud): zhes lan gsum bzlas shing byin gyis brlabs na de nyid da thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa las chos kyi dbyings nyid kyi mchod rten du 'gyur ro// de bzhin du yid kyis kyang
253b5(rgyud): dmigs so// de nas mchod rten 'debs pa'i tshe rigs pa chen mo 'di brjod par bya'o// oM badz+ra mu ga ra A/ ko Ta ya A ko Ta ya hUM phaT/ ces bzlas shing mchod rten
253b6(rgyud): btab na dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med par 'brel pa lnga tshwa kyi sku'i mchod rten du 'gyur ro// de nas bi ma la uSh+NI sha'i snying po gang nas byung bas kyang mchod rten btab na dbyings dang
253b7(rgyud): ya shas gnyisu med par 'brel pa las kyi sku'i mchod rta 'byam klas par 'gyur ro// de nas mchod rten phur bu'i nang nas 'byung ba'i rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod la dbyung ngo // / 
253b8(rgyud): oM d+harmad+ha tu ye swA hA/ d+harma d+ha tu gar+b+he swA hA/ zhes lan bdun bzlos te/ mchod rten byung na thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa 'brel pa las mchod rten chos kyi sku 'byam klas pa'i byung
254a1(rgyud): ste/ 'gro ba sems can thams cad kyi don 'khor ba ma stongs kyi bar du phun sum tshogs par mdzad par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmig so// de nas
254a2(rgyud): mchod rten snod nas phyung ba las 'khor lo gzugs pa'i rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// oM phra ma Na ye swA hA/ zhes bzlas nas 'khor lo
254a3(rgyud): btsugs na rin po che'i gdugs dang / ri ni'i tog dang / rin men rtsi mtshan dang / rin po che'i shar bu dang / dar gyi lhab lta ba la sogs pa rnams kyis brgyan te/ mya ngan 'das pa'i yon tan sna tshogs
254a4(rgyud): kyis rgyan te/ 'gro ba'i don yid bzhidu mdzad par 'gyuraro// / de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs// de nas mchodang rten na bza' gsol ba'i tshe rigs pa chen mo 'di bzlas
254a5(rgyud): la gsol to// oM d+harma d+hA tu sA b+ha ba bi shud+d+he d+harma te swA hA/ zhes lan mang du bzlas te btab na chos kyi dbying / sa rnam par dag pa'i don dang ldan par 'gyur re// de
254a6(rgyud): nas mchod rten btab pa'i dkyil 'khor mchod rten ltar btab na dkyil 'khor yang phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du mchod rten gyi grangs brgya 'am/ stong ngam
254a7(rgyud): gang btab pa de'i grangs dang / mchod rten gyi shong tshed kyi dkyil 'khor re'u mig rde'i stegs bu brtsigs pa ni sa 'am/ rdol ba 'am/ shing la sogs pa las dkyil 'khor gru bzhir
254a8(rgyud): gyis te/ reg gi khri yang sing+ga'i khri 'am/ rin po che'i khri 'am/ pad+ma'i khri stagasu byas la/ de'i steng du 'go ma yeng dang spos chus chag chag btab te/ dbus dang phyogs bzhir mchod
254b1(rgyud): rten bzhugs pa'i sa kun tu gur gum dang / tsan+dan gyi chus zlum por bskus la/ srang bus thig btab la dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor bri bar yang mchod rten lngar btab na dkyil
254b2(rgyud): 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du mchod rten gyi grangs brgya 'am/ stong gang btab pa de'i grangs kyi mchod rten shong tshad kyi dkyil 'khor re'u mig rdo rje dra
254b3(rgyud): ba'i thig gis sa bcad par bya'o// mchod rten bzhag pa'i sa gzhi thams cad pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad par bri bar bya'o// de nas mchod rten gyi dkyil 'khor du bzhugs pa'i tshe rig pa chen
254b4(rgyud): po'i sngags 'di brjod la bzhugasu gsol/ oM su pA tiSh+Tha stu pe swA hA/ zhes lan gsum bzlas te mchod rten bzha dag na bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs
254b5(rgyud): par spyod par 'gyur ro// de nas mchod rten dgod pa'i ri/ ma pa ni dang po dbus su dgod/ de nas shar du dgod/ de nas lhor dgod/ de nas nub du dgod/ de nas byang gi bar
254b6(rgyud): du rim pa bzhin du dgod par bya'o// dgod pa'i tshe rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// oM badz+ra pad+ma sa ma ye swA hA// zhes lan gsum du bzlas la rdo rje dang / pad+ma'i gdan la
254b7(rgyud): bzhugs su gsol zhes byas las gzhi dang na mkha'i khams dang / rgya mtsho'i 'dzings thams cad mchod rten gyis gang bar yid kyis kyang dmigs// gzhan yang mchod rten re re btab na/ 
254b8(rgyud): thal byung dkyil 'khor stang du bzhugs la/ spos dang / me tog la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod cing bzhugasu gsol/ mchod rten gyi kha dog la sogs pa bsku ba ni zhi ba'i/ 
255a1(rgyud): dkar po/ rgyas pa'i ser po dang / dbang dmar po srung ba ljang kur dmigs te na bza' yang de bzhin du gsol la yid kyis kyang de bzhin du dmig so// de nas mchod rten gyi
255a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge ram dmar ba gnas pa las rig pa chen me'i sngags 'di brjod par bya ste/ tsu raM swA hA// zhes lan gsum bzlas pa
255a3(rgyud): de nyid ye shes kyi me dpung chen por rab tu 'bar nas gnas de dag gi rtog pa rnam par sbyangs te/ dkyil 'khor gyi gzhi de nyid rin po che sna lnga las grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyuraro// 
255a4(rgyud): de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmig so// de nas dkyil 'khor lde'u tshe lnga 'am/ brgya'am/ stong ngam/ gang bris pa'i dbu sa rnams su yi ge a dkar po gnas pa las rig pa
255a5(rgyud): chen mo'i sngags 'di brjed par bya'o// oM a tsan+d+ra maN+Da la hUM phaT/ ces grangs ji tsam ran par bzlas na mchod rten gyi gdan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rer 'gyur ro// de bzhi
255a6(rgyud): du yid kyis kyang dmigs so// de nas mchod rten gyi cho ga mdzad pa'i tshe kha shar nub gang bder bltas la/ bdag nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku phyag rgya chen por ting nge 'dzin gyis bsgyur te/ snying
255a7(rgyud): khar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa ye shes kyi 'od dpung 'phro ba gnas par byas la/ sku dang ba spu'i gsab thams cad nas kyang ye shes kyi 'od zer dang / sangs rgyas kyi dkyil
255a8(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pa'i sprin phung bzhin du mthar 'byam klas par 'bros shing sems can gyi khams thad du byin gyis brlabs shing don mdzad nas slar sku'i nang du thim par 'gyur te/ de bzhin
255b1(rgyud): du yid kyis kyang dmig so// de nas mchod rten gyi gzhal yas khang bskyed pa ni mchod rten dkyil 'khor du bzhag pa la rdo rje dbyings ma'i phyag rgya bcings nas mchod rten gyi steng du reg
255b2(rgyud): par byas la/ rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// oM badz+ra d+hA tu oM d+hi tiSh+Tha hUM/ zhes bzlas te byin gyis brlabs pas rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang na rin po che'i sa gzhi
255b3(rgyud): dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi steng na zla ba'i gdan gyi dbus na mchod rten bzhugs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmig so// de ltar du mchod rten re re btab
255b4(rgyud): stebazhag nas de mchod pa'i rnam pas mchod nasad ni/ seng+ge'i rgyal mtshan dang / 'bras chan dang / spyan ga/ zigs sna tshogs dang 'dra shang / zhing dgos pa dang / 
255b5(rgyud): bla re dang / 'phan dang / gdugs dang / phreng ba dang / ba dug pa dang / mar me dang / spos dang / mchod pa'i rna ma pa rnams rnam par dag par rig pa chen mo 'di
255b6(rgyud): brjod par bya'o// oM sarba pU dza puSh+pe swA hA/ zhes bzlas te byin gyis brlabs pas kun tu bzang po'i mchod pa'i sprin phung phun sum tshogs pas rnam par 'khrigs shing char gyi
255b7(rgyud): rgyun bzhin du 'bab par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigaso// mchod rten mchod pa rnam pa lnga po che re res mchod cing yon du da ru chung dang 'phan la sogs pa'i bla re
255b8(rgyud): dang / gdugs dbu chung yang rung ste re re dbul le// de ltar cho ga bzhin du btab pa lags na/ dgongs pa rgyud kyi ting 'dzin gsal bar bya ba ni mchod rten gyi phyogs bzhi dbus
256a1(rgyud): dang sngar rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas sku mdog dang / rgyan dang / cha lugs dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs pa tshul bzhin du dgongs te dmigs par bya'o// ye shes lnga las
256a2(rgyud): grub pa'i mchod rten de yang rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag cing gsal ba de dag bum pa'i dbus su bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzud kyi snying po dang / rigs lnga se so'i snying po 'bru re ba kha dog
256a3(rgyud): gser btso ma bzhin du gdang zhing 'tsher ba gcig tu dmigs la/ de dag las ye shes kyi 'od zer sna tshogs 'byam klas par rigs la phyogs bcu 'phros pa las de bzhin gshegs
256a4(rgyud): pa'i sku'i sprin gyis na mkha'i mtha' klas shing chos kyi dbyings kyi mur thug par brgyan cing grub par gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad byin gyi brlabs te/ 
256a5(rgyud): 'gro ba thams cad kyi don mdzad cing reb bskangs nas sla ra 'dus nas de nyid kyi dbu'i gtsug dang / thugs kar phogs/ phrin las kyi sgrib pa la sogs pa rnam par/ 
256a6(rgyud): dag ste/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje nyid du gyur par dmigs la/ dung phar gyi nang du spros chub dang / dri sna tshogs sbyar ba'i argas gsol to// arga'i phyag rgya bcing la de'i
256a7(rgyud): steng du dung phor bzhag la spos chu'i nang du a dkar po las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'i 'od ma gyi spos chu nyid ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du gyur par dgongs shing dmigs te/ 
256a8(rgyud): mchod pa dbul ba'i rig pa chen po 'di brjod par bya'o// oM a mr-i te ar+g+ha me pre tIts+tsha swA hA/ zhes bzlas nas dbu'i spyi bor lan gsum du gdugs shing sbrengs te phul bas/ 
256b1(rgyud): 'phags pa thams cad mnyes par 'gyur ro// tshig tu yang 'phags pa thams cad mnyes par gyur cig ces kyang brjod do// de nas phyag rgya'i rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis dbu'i gtsug tu bkram/ 
256b2(rgyud): ste/ ye shes kyi sku'i nang du 'dus shing phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang thams cad bskur bar dmigaso// de nas bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di klag cing lan ci mang du brjod par byas nas
256b3(rgyud): bsngo ba dang smon lam rgyas par gdab par bya'o// cho ga 'di bzhin du rdzogs par bya ba mi de yang rang gi lha nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis skur bsgyur ba las dgongs pa ma nyams par bya ste/ 
256b4(rgyud): mchod rten dang / mchod pa'i yo byad la sogs pa tha/ mas cad rang bzhin gyis chos kyi dbyings rnam pa/ ra dag par dgongs te/ mchod rten btab na yang cho ga
256b5(rgyud): rgyas par bya ba dang / 'dra ste 'gal ba med do// de bzhin du ma gyur na yang bi ma le uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di klog pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / yi ger 'dri zhing 'chang bra
256b6(rgyud): mchod rten btab na cho ga rgyas par mdzad pa nyi 'di yin te/ mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur bsgyur nas bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par byed par 'gyur ro// 
256b7(rgyud): bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di ma brjod na mchod pa phul zhing mnga' gsol yang mnga' 'phrul bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhung lnga kyang 'di skad ces 'byung ngo // rog sngags gsang
256b8(rgyud): sngags thams cad kyi// sngags kyi rang bzhin mi gsal zhing // dgongs pa'i ting 'dzin mi gsal bas// mchod rten la sogs sku gzugs rnams// btab kyang rdzogs
257a1(rgyud): par yongs mi 'gyur// zhes 'byung ngo // gang zhig gsang sngags dang dgongs par ldan pas mchod rten dang / sku gzugs btab pa'i yon tan ni ji skad du/ 
257a2(rgyud): mchod rten cho ga dam pa 'di// bsod nams bgyis pa'i khyad par ni// gzungs 'di bzlas pa'i mchod rten gyis// gcig btab bye ba btab dang dra// yun rings dus nas 'khor ba yis// 
257a3(rgyud): mtshams med lnga dang sdig dpung rnams// ji snyed yod pa ma lus 'byung // tshe ring phun sum tshogs par 'gyur// tshe rabs gzhan du skyes nas kyang // rigs mchod dam par skyes pa na// 
257a4(rgyud): longs spyod mchog dang rab ldan zhing // 'khor los bsgyur ba/ de'i rgyal por skyes// tshe rabs snga phyi dran par 'gyur// / dus gsum 'jig rten thams cad du// dko ni mchog
257a5(rgyud): gsum dang mi 'bral zhing // bgegs dang gnod pas de mi bskyed// bsam pa yongs su 'grub par 'gyur// mthar ni mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// bi mi la uSh+NI Sha'i gzung
257a6(rgyud): rdzogs so// // mchod rten gcig yan chad// bye ba man chad gdab pa'i sngags dang bsam pa'i rgyud ni kun kyang 'dra'o// de la mchod rten gcig btab pa/ 
257a7(rgyud): bye ba btab par 'gyur ba'i sngags dang cho ga ni 'jim pa la sogs pa yo byad thams cad la sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bya'o// na ma s+t+waM ya d+hi kAn/ dzin nAn/ ban d+he rat+na tra yan
257a8(rgyud): shu b+han/ ak+She b+hU a mi tA ban can de/ a haM a lo ki taM/ na mastA d+hA nu ga tA nAn/ sarba ta thA ga tA nAn/ sud+d+he suk+Shau/ nA ga de/ shAn+te/ dAn+to/ shrI ba ni rI ku le/ ya she ya shaM pa ti/ terbe/ 
257b1(rgyud): te dze ba ti/ sarba bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Ti te swA hA/ mu dra 'debs pa'i 'ji ba 'am/ sngags 'bri ba'i tshe/ lan bdun gdab pa'i sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ a pra ti ha ta/ shA sa nA nAn/ oM
257b2(rgyud): badz+ra/ A yu She swA hA/ bi ba'i sngags la/ oM badz+red b+ha bA ya swA hA/ tsi ti'i phur bu'i nang dang / sa tsha'i nang du phye ma btab pa 'am/ sU gyis byugs pa'i sngags la/ oM badz+ra a ra dze/ 
257b3(rgyud): bi ra dze swA hA/ phyag rgya 'am/ sngags gzugs pa'i sngags la/ oM d+harmA d+hA tu gar+b+he swA hA/ tse ti'i phor bur 'bi 'bo'i gzhugs pa'i sngags la/ oM badz+ra d+hA tu gar+b+he swA hA/ tho brdeg cing
257b4(rgyud): gdab bya'i sngags la/ oM badz+ra mud gAr a ke Ta ya n+tu/ tse ti'i phur bu nas byer dbyung ba'i sngags la/ oM d+ha rmar ti swA hA/ 'khor lo dang / dbuzhu gsol ba'i sngags
257b5(rgyud): la/ oM b+h+ra ma ta nA ya swA hA/ tse ti'i dkyil 'khor la bzhag pa'i sngagaso la/ oM su pra tiSh+Tha badz+re swA hA/ cho ga de ltar byas na tse ti gcig btab pas/ bye ma snyed/ 
257b6(rgyud): btab par 'gyur ro// thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor byas pa'i lag pa 'job can gyis gang na bar bskus na/ nad 'dzi'i rnam pa bco brgyad la sogs pa
257b7(rgyud): thams cad ma lus par zhi bar 'gyur ro// rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya rasmai bi ma lo bi shud+d+he pra b+hA d+hA nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ byed skad du/ 'phag po 'od zer dri ma med pa rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces
257b8(rgyud): bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig ni/ bcom lnga 'das grong khyer chen po ser sgra'i gnas
258a1(rgyud): kyi pho brang gi 'khor gyi khyams chen po na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhun
258a2(rgyud): pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / lag na rdo rje dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / 'jam dpa
258a3(rgyud): dang / shes rab 'od dang / byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med pa rnams dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
258a4(rgyud): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pa grangs med pas dbacom ldan 'das la zhes sar byas/ ri mor byas/ bkur
258a5(rgyud): stir byas te/ yongasu bskor ba la chos ston cing bzhug so// de'i tshe sar skya'i grong khyer na gnas pa bram ze chen po ser skya'i zla ba zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan
258a6(rgyud): pa la yid mi ches shing log par lta ba zhig gnas pa de dus gzhan zhig tshe/ gzhan zhig gi rmi ltas su rmis te bstan pa/ bram ze chen po khyed nga ste zhog bdun na 'chi ba'i dus byed par
258a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro zhes zer ba thos nas bram ze de shin tu yang mi dga' ste/ 'jigs skrag nas yid la bsams pa/ da bdag gis srog gi skra yul btsal bar bya/ yang dge sbyong ge'u ta ma zad
258a8(rgyud): mkhyen pa rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa zhig yin no zhes grags na/ bdag de'i gnas su song ste/ de thams cad mkhyen pa yin yang dag na de 'jigs pas nyams thag par 'gyur ba'i skyabs
258b1(rgyud): mdzad pa'i chos phyir ston gor ma chag go snyam bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du song ba dang / rgyang ring po nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa
258b2(rgyud): mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu bar ma spongs te sems shing 'dug la/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dus gsum mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa/ sgrib
258b3(rgyud): pa mi mnga' bas bram ze'i bsam pa mkhyen nas byams pa'i thugs kyis brtsa bar dgongs pa/ bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po khyod da ste zhag bdun na 'chi ba'i dus byas nas ngan song ngan
258b4(rgyud): 'gro mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyuradaro// de nas yang rim gyis sems can dmyal ba chen dbo bcu drug tu kha brgyud de skye bar 'gyur/ de las pa nas kya la
258b5(rgyud): pa'i rig su skye bar 'gyur/ de na shi nA yang gi lum skye sa yu he rtog tu ngan skyugs mi gtsang ba za zhing 'dam rdzab kyi nang du yangayun ring du gnas te/ rgyun tu sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyuraro// 
258b6(rgyud): de nas gal te mi'i lus thob na yang shin tu dbul ba dang / mi gtsang ba dang / dri nga ba dang / mdog mi sdug cing gnag pa dang / lus rid cing nyam chung ba dang / mdze nad can du 'gyur
258b7(rgyud): te/ skye bo yongs la mi sdug cing rtag tu bkres pas nyam thag pa/ skye bo yongs kyis dmad pa/ rtag par brdeg brtseg bya zhing shin tu sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal ba de thos
258b8(rgyud): na/ bram ze de shin tu 'jigs skrag ste/ yid gdungs pas dus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshol te gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/ 
259a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi mgon dang skyabs mdzad pa lags na/ bdag ni sdig pa'i las thams cad 'chags te/ deng slan chad bcom ldan
259a2(rgyud): 'das kyi bka' bzhin du bgyid na bdag ngan song dran 'gro sems can dmyal bar skye ba'i sdug bsngal las skyabs mdzad par gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
259a3(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po khyod seng la grong khyer ser skya'i lom gyi sum med na mchod rten ring bsrel can snying pa ral pa zhig yod pa de slar brtsigs te/ mchod rten gyi rtsa
259a4(rgyud): mor srog shing btsugs la/ gsang sngags yi ger bros pa de'i nang du bcug ste mched pa byas nas gsang sngags lan bdun bton khyod kyi tshe yang phyir nur te 'bel
259a5(rgyud): bar 'gyur la/ 'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang bde 'gro ma/ tho ris kyi gnas longs spyod che ba rnamasu skye ste/ bska la pa stong phrag brgya'i bar du bde ba'i longs spyod kyang phyir
259a6(rgyud): 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur/ de nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par skye bar 'gyur te/ bskal pa brgya stong du mar bde ba chen po myong
259a7(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// de nas yang shi 'phos nas rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha rnams kyi gnas skye bar 'gyur te/ der yang bskal pa chen po stong phrag brgya'i bar du bde ba'i longs spyod mi zad pa
259a8(rgyud): myong bar 'gyur ro// tshe rab gang du skyes pa'i gnas kun tu yang yid gzhungs zhing tshe'i bar chad med pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad nas nam du yang sems can dmyal
259b1(rgyud): bar ltung bar mi 'gyur ro// rtag tu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnams dang phrad cing rje su dgongs par mdzad do// bram ze chen po gzhan yang dge slong ngam/ dge
259b2(rgyud): slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la tshe thung ba 'am/ nad mang ba zhig yod na des mchod rten snying pa bcos sam/ gsar du brtsigs kyang rung ste/ 
259b3(rgyud): gsang sngags 'di bris la nang du bzhugs nas dkyil 'khor byi dor byas te mchod na de dag gi skyon ni tshe zad pa yang tshe sla nur zhing ring ba dang / nad kyis btab cing sdug bsngal ba yang nad de cog
259b4(rgyud): las thar pa dang / nam du yang ngan song ngan 'gro sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye bar mi 'gyur te/ de dag gi
259b5(rgyud): sgra rna lam du yang grag par mi 'gyur na/ de dag tu skye ba lta ci smos/ de nas bram ze des de skad thos nas shin tu yi rangs te/ mchod rten zhig pa bcos par bsam
259b6(rgyud): nas dri 'khor de nas langs te song ngo // de'i tshe 'khor de nyid na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba zhig stan las langs nas thal mo
259b7(rgyud): sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di ji lta bur bgyis na/ yon tan dang / legs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par
259b8(rgyud): 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang sngags chen po rnams kyi mchog bdag nyid che ba dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa'i 'od ce bya ba 'di/ 
260a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga bzhin byas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis sen thaMd kyi phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro// la la zhig gis
260a2(rgyud): gsang sngags 'di thos na mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'i sdig pa yang ma lus par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ser sna dang / brnab sems dang / phrag dog la sogs pa mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
260a3(rgyud): cad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te/ tshe zad pa las kyang tshe ring du nur pa dang / bkra shis dang / legs pa phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 
260a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cang rnam par sel bas bsngos la gsol pa/ bac+doMs rjes kyis sems can zad kyi srog gi skyabs mdzad pa dang / lba
260a5(rgyud): kyo sgrib pa tham cad bsal ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyi sa gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di thams cad dang lda na pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal du gsol/ de skad ces gsol
260a6(rgyud): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor gyi steng nas 'od zer gyi snang ba chen po byung nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
260a7(rgyud): thams cad 'od kyis khyab par mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la yang mkhyen par mdzad nas 'od zer de dag slar 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor/ 
260a8(rgyud): tu nub bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing bya ka la bing ka'i gsung dbyangs kyis gsong sngags bka' stsal pa/ na maHsap+ta nAn/ samyaka saM bud d+ha ko TI nAn/ pa ri shud d+hi ma na
260b1(rgyud): si/ a b+huR+Shi ta duSh+Ti tA nAn/ na mo b+ha ga ba ti/ a mri ta A yuHs+ya/ ta thA ga ta s+ya/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta shud d+hi/ A yur bi sho d+ha ni/ saM ha ra saM ha ra Ne/ saM ha ra saM ha ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta'ir+ya
260b2(rgyud): ba le na pra ti sang ha ra/ A yuHsA ra sA ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya/ bo d+hi bo d+hau/ bud+d+ha bu d+hA/ be d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ ma ma sarba pA paM A ba ra Ni bi shud d+he/ bi ga ta ma lam/ tshar su bungad d+he bud
260b3(rgyud): d+he hu ru hu ru swA hA/ 'di ni rtsa ba'i sngags te/ gang la la 'di'i cho ga byed par 'dod na chos brgyad dang / bcu gsum dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga rnams gang yang rung ba la mchod rten ring
260b4(rgyud): bsrel can la lan bdun cu rtsa bdun bskor la/ gsang snga dogs 'di lan bdun cu rtsa bdun bzlas brjod byas te/ khrus byas la dkyil 'khor byas nas gsang sngags kyi yi ge
260b5(rgyud): bdun cu rtsa bdun bris te/ de'i tshe gsang sngags 'don pa dang yi ger 'dri ba yang khrus byas la gos gtsang ma gyo na te/ lus spos kyis byugs nas/ kha zas gtsang ma zos la/ 
260b6(rgyud): me tog dang gdug pas mchod de/ de la rin po che sna bdun yang yon du phul lam/ yang na bdag gi nyams kyis ci 'byor par phul yang rung ste/ sems mgu bar bya'o// chos btsun par
260b7(rgyud): bya ba'i phyir sti stang dang / ri mo cher bya'o// gsang sngags kyi yi ge la yang dkon zhing rin po cher 'du shes bzhag ste/ mchod rten che chung ji tsam nus pa bdun cu rtsa bdun gdab par bya zhing / 
260b8(rgyud): de re re'i nang du gsang sngags bcug ste/ sems rtse gcig tu mchod pa chen po byas na tshe zad pa las tshe slar nur te tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa tshe rabs grangs med pa
261a1(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad byang nas nam du yang sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas kyi ste gnas thams cad du skye bar mi 'gyur ro// gang du skyes pa'i gnas
261a2(rgyud): thams cad du yang sngon gyi tshe rabs rjesu dran par 'gyur/ yid la bsam pa thams cad kyang de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun snyed la
261a3(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/ nad dang sdug bsngal thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// gang la la zhig nad tshabs po ches btab ste/ 'chi ba'i dus byed pa la thug na dkyil 'khor
261a4(rgyud): gru bzhi par byas la/ de'i steng du tshon sna lngas ri mor bris te// dbus kyi char ni 'khor lo dang / rdo rje dang / dung da dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / g.yung drung ris dang / pad+mo
261a5(rgyud): rnams bri'o// grwa bzhir yang pad+ma re re bris te/ de'i steng du spos chus bkang ba'i bum pa re re grwa bzhir ban ga go// bdug spos kyi snod bkang ba spos sna tshogs 'thul
261a6(rgyud): ba yang bzhag go/ kha dog sna lnga'i snod du kha zas sna tshogs dang / zas dkar gsum dang 'bras chan du sbyar ba bzhag/ yang dri'i chu dang / me tog dang / 'bras sam 'bru'i snod bkang ba
261a7(rgyud): phor bu re re blugs pa dang / yang kha zas sna tshogs sbyar ba'i gter ma spos chu bum pa gang dang sbyar te dkyil 'khor gyi stang du bzhag go/ gtor ma de dang 'bras kyi drung du nye bar tshogs
261a8(rgyud): kyi bdag po'i gzugs bris la de'i spyi bo'i steng du mar me bzhag go/ de nas dkyil 'khor gyi nub phyogasu nad pa bzhag la/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang du kha bstan pa'i nad pa'i mdun du yang
261b1(rgyud): mchod pa'i bshes bzhag ste 'bul du bzhug go// de nas sngags mkhan gtsang sbra cher byas te/ nad pa de la gsang sngags bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis btab ste/ cho ga 'di ltar byas
261b2(rgyud): na nad pa tshe zad de 'chi ba'i dus byed du nye ba zhag bdun nas dran pa nyams shing 'khrul por 'gyur ba yang tshe skar nur zhing ring por 'gyur ro// rmi lam gyi sdug bsngal yang myong bar
261b3(rgyud): mi 'gyur ro// gang la la zhig gis gtsang sbra cher byas te/ nyin gcig bzhin rtag par gsang sngags lan re re ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bton na de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas long spyod dang / 
261b4(rgyud): bde ba ma zad pa gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro// rtag par dus thams cad du bzlas brjod byas na sangs rgyas pa zhugs pa'i zhing du skye bar 'gyur zhing / tshe rabs rje su dran pa
261b5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// dus ma yin pa'o 'chi ba dang / sgrib pa thams cad byung bar 'gyur ro// yang gang la la zhigs mi shi ba'i ched du phan par 'dod pas sems thag pa nas gsang
261b6(rgyud): sngags lan bdun cu rtsa bdun bzlas brjod byas na shi ba de ngan song gi gnasu lhung na yang de'i mod la las kyi sgrib pa rnams zad nas mtho ris kyi lha'i gnasu skye zhing bde ba myong bar 'gyur
261b7(rgyud): ro// yang gang la la zhig gis gsang sngags yi ger bris pa gzhan gyi ming nas smos te/ mchod rten gyi nang du bcug la nan tan du mchod pa byas na shi ba gang yin pa de ngan song
261b8(rgyud): gi gnas nas thar te mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro// yang dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skye bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis ngan song du ltung bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs
262a1(rgyud): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig mchod rten de la bskor ba byas sam/ phyag byas sam/ mchod pa phul yang rung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlab/ 
262a2(rgyud): kyis bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam las phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro// sngon gyi los kyi sgrib pa rnams kyang ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro// zan bya dang ri dgas la sogs te gang
262a3(rgyud): dag la mchod rten dro'i grib ma phog pa de dag kyang nam yang dud 'gro la sogs pa ngan song gi gnas su skye bar mi 'gyur ro// gong la la mtshams mang po lnga'i sdig pa chen po dang ldan
262a4(rgyud): pa yang mchod rten de la reg gam/ de'i grib mas phrog kyang rung ste/ de'i sdig pa thams cad byang zhing zad par 'gyur ro// mchod rten de'i gnas na 'byung po dang / gnod
262a5(rgyud): sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za la sogs pa lus la 'jug cing gnod pa dang / gcan za na khro bo dang / theg 'bab pa dang / sdig sbrul kha gdug pa
262a6(rgyud): dang / sbyar dug la sogs pa thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs shing med par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / mtshon dang / me dang / chu dang / sor ba dang / mu ge
262a7(rgyud): dang dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi gnod pa thams cad med par 'gyur ro// yul der ltas ngan zhig byung na yang mchod
262a8(rgyud): rten dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis 'od zer chen po byung bas/ ltas ngan dang / bkra mi shis thams cad bzlog par 'gyur ro// gang gzhan zhig bsam pa ngan pas dmag da
262b1(rgyud): chom rkun gyis gnod pa bya bar sems sam/ dgra rgol ba zhig byung na yang gnas der mchod rten de la 'od zer chen po 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis me lha
262b2(rgyud): kun tu 'bar bas bskor ba'i nang nas dmag gi dpung dang / mtshon cha'i char mngon par bstan pas pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad zhi zhing phyir bzlog par 'gyur ro// lha rnams
262b3(rgyud): kyis kyang srung ba dang bskyab par bya ste/ phyogs bzhir dpag tshad brgya tshun chad du mtshams bcad de bsrungs pas de'i nang du 'khrug pa dang / nad 'go ba dang // phyugs nad thams cad mi 'byung // 
262b4(rgyud): 'thab cing rtsod pa mi 'byung / chos ma yin par spyod pa med par 'gyur ro// 'di la gsang sngags gzhan gyis bcad pa dang / mnan par mi nus te/ gsang sngags thams
262b5(rgyud): cad kyi rtsa ba yin pa'i phyir ro// yang mchod rten de'i srog shing gi gsang sngags bshad pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA bi pu la yaSh+Ti/ ma Ni ka na rA dza ta/ bi bu shi ta yaSh+Tha
262b6(rgyud): d+hu ru d+hu ru/ sa man+te bi li te/ sa ra sa ra/ ma ma sarba pA pa bi sho d+ha Ni/ saM bo d+ha Ni/ pra ba ra yaSh+Ti/ pa ri ma Ni duSh+Ta hu ru tsi ra ma la bi shud d+he hUM hUM swA hA/ rigs kyi bu ci nas kyang gsang sngag/ 
262b7(rgyud): 'di nan tan du dgu bcu rtsa dgur yi ger bris te/ mchod rten gyi srog shing gi ngos bzhir gzhug go// de yang cho ga'i gzhung 'di nyid kyang bris te srog shing gi nang du bzhug go/ cho ga de ltar
262b8(rgyud): byas na mchod rten dgu khri dgu stong gi srog shing btsugs pa dang 'dra'o// de'i gong du yang mchod rten ring bsrel can dgu khri dgu stong bzhengs pa dang 'dra'o// de'i yang gong du de bzhin ga
263a1(rgyud): pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir chos bzang lha'i bdun sa dang 'dra ba'i gtsug lug khang gi mchod rten dgu khri dgu steng brtsigs pa dang 'dra'o// yang gang la la
263a2(rgyud): zhig gis 'jim pa las mtsho rje chung ngu zhig byas te/ de'i nang du gsang sngags 'di dag bcug na yang rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten lha dgu khri dgu steng brtsigs pa dang 'dra'o// yang gang la
263a3(rgyud): la zhig gis mchod rten 'di la bskor ba byas sam/ phyag byas sam/ thal mo sbyar ram/ me tog phul lam/ byug pa dang / bdug spos phul lam/ dril bu dang / ba dan dang / gdugs
263a4(rgyud): 'ga' zhig phul na sang de bzhin gshegs pa dgu khri dgu stong gi mchod rten la phul ba'i bsod nams dang mnyam pa yin no// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongasu
263a5(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i dpal dang / mthu stobs rgya chen po thob par 'gyur te/ tha na bya dang sbrang ma la sogs pa mchod / na de'i grib mas phog na yang de bzhin gsheg pa mkhyen
263a6(rgyud): cing rje su dgod par mdzad do/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob cing phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par yang 'gyur ro// yang gang la la zhig gis mchod rten 'di lta
263a7(rgyud): bu'i rmi lam du rmis sam/ rgyang nas mthong ngam/ dril bu'i sgra thos sam/ mchod rten bzhengs pa rna bar gtam thos pa de dag kyang mtshams med pa lnga la sogs te/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa
263a8(rgyud): thams cad byang ste/ rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis srung ba dang / rjes su dgongs pa mdzad de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam yong su dag pa 'thob
263b1(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags 'di ni mchod rten gyi srog shing gi gsang sngags zhes bya'o// yang rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten bya ba'i gsang sngags de dag gi snying po
263b2(rgyud): ni 'di yin no// oM sarba ta thA ga tA/ ma la bi sho d+ha ni/ rus d+ha ba le pra ti sang skA ra/ ta thA ga ta d+hA tu d+ha re/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ san d+ha ra san d+ha ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Tha na a d+hiSh+Ti te swA hA/ dge
263b3(rgyud): slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge snyen nam/ dge snyen ma 'am/ gang la la zhig gis mchod rten bdag nyid kyis byas sam/ gzhan byed du bcug gam/ mchod rten snying pa bcos
263b4(rgyud): legs byas kyang rung / sa 'jim las mchod rten chung / du byas sam / so phag gam/ rdo ba las byas kyang rung ste/ dang por gas
263b5(rgyud): sngags kyi snying po stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas brjod byas te/ de'i 'og tu mchod rten sen mo gang tsam gyi sa la byas sam/ khru gang gi tshad du byas sam/ dpag tshad
263b6(rgyud): gcig tsam gyi tshad du byas na yang rung ste/ gsang sngags kyi mthu dang / sems rtse gcig tu byas pa'i stobs kyis mchod rten de la yang spos kyi ngad ldang ste/ tsan+dan dang / ga bur
263b7(rgyud): dang / gla rtsi dang / gur gum la sogs pa'i dri bro 'am/ lha'i spos dri zhim po'i ngad ldang bar 'gyur ro// bdag dang gzhan mchod rten gyi las byed pa dang / bzlas brjod byed pa de
263b8(rgyud): bsam pa thams cad kyang yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po bsags par 'gyur te/ yon tan dang / legs pa phun sum tshogs tshogs pa yang 'thob pa
264a1(rgyud): 'gyur/ tshe thung ba'i las shig yod na yang tshe nur zhing ring bar 'gyur/ nam 'chi ba'i dus byed na yang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa
264a2(rgyud): dgu'i zhal mthong zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rjes su dgongs te/ skye gnas phyi mar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur zhing mngon sum du lung ston par
264a3(rgyud): 'gyur/ der yang tshe lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong thub par 'gyur te/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang / lha'i mig dang / lha'i rna ba rnam par dag pa 'thob cing pha rol gyi sems shes
264a4(rgyud): pa dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba shes pa 'thab bo// lus las tsan+dan gyi dri'i ngad 'byung zhing / kha nas u dang+ga la'i bsung ldang bar 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par
264a5(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub kyi lam thob nas phyir/ mi ldog pa'i sa yang 'thab par 'gyur ro// yang dri'i byug pa yungs 'bru tsam yang rung ste/ gsang sngags
264a6(rgyud): bzlas nas mchod rten bskus ni de dag gi yon+tan dang / legs pa sngar bshad pa bzhin du thob par 'gyur ro// yang dge slong dang dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig
264a7(rgyud): gis bdag nyid gtsang bar byas te/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dkon pa dang / rin po cher 'du shes pas gzung na de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar dad par bya ste/ gsang sngags
264a8(rgyud): rnams la gus pa bskyed nas/ yi gar bri bar bya ste/ gong du bshad pa bzhin gsang sngags dang phyag rgya cho ga bzhin du bris nas mchod rten gyi sreg shing gi rtsa bar snying po bcug ste/ 
264b1(rgyud): mchod rten byas na de dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po bsags par 'gyur te/ yonan dang legs pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags kyi phyag rgya'i/ 
264b2(rgyud): cho ga 'di dag bshad pa'i tshe phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rje su thugs rangs par mdzad nas gsungs pa/ yang dag par
264b3(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas sems can thams cad mnyam par dgongs shing // thams cad chos kyi dbyings la bkod nas gsang sngags chen po'i phyag rgya'i tshi ga byin
264b4(rgyud): gyis brlabs 'thob par bstan pa ni legase leg so// / shin tu yang legs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob cing
264b5(rgyud): phyir mi ldeg par yang 'gyur ro// de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid na lhud klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye
264b6(rgyud): chen po 'dus pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i mes po tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen
264b7(rgyud): po dang / brgya byin dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / ku ba ra dang / de dag la sogs pa rdzu 'phral tsha ba'i lha de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa de thos nas bdag cag rang rang
264b8(rgyud): gi spyod yul la skye zhing yid 'byung bar gyur te/ mthar gyi yen+tan chen po thob par 'dod pa'i phyir gcig la gcig bos te smras pa/ kye ma yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung
265a1(rgyud): ba ni shin tu yang rnyed par dka'o// de'i bstan pa dam pa'i chos thos pa yang shin tu brnyed par dka'/ gsang sngags dang phyag rgya'i tshogs yang dag par rdzogs
265a2(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa thos pa yang shin tu rnyed par dka' ste/ 'di ni shin tu ngo mtshar to zhes smras so// de nas de'i tshe bram ze ser skya'i zla ba zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das las de lta
265a3(rgyud): bu'i gsang sngags dang / cho ga'i yon+dan chen po de dag thos shing thob nas sems kyi sgrib pa'i rdul dang rnyog pa rnams dngas par gyur/ 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang / sdig pa dang / las
265a4(rgyud): kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang dag par gyur/ tshe yang phyir nur te ring bar gyur nas dga' mgu yi rangs te yid bde ba chen po thob par gyur to// de nas 'byung po'i tshogs thams
265a5(rgyud): cad kyang sems dang zhing rje su yi rang bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas de bzhin gshegs
265a6(rgyud): pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'khor der rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa zhig mngon par sprul nas/ chos la dga' ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la phul
265a7(rgyud): te/ lan gsum bskob byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / 
265a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga shin tu rnyed par dka' ba sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba rnams kyi mchog 'dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can sgrib pa che ba rnams kyi don du bshad de/ dge
265b1(rgyud): ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing tshe ring ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad las thar bar mdzad pa lags na/ de 'dir bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang sangs rgyas bcom
265b2(rgyud): ldan 'das thams cad la gsol te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar yang dag pa'i ye shes chub par bgyid pa'i phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig bshad par 'tshal to// na
265b3(rgyud): me b+ha ga b+ha ba te/ na ba na ba TI nAM/ samyakr-i bud+d+ha ko Ti yu ta sha ta sa ha srA NAM/ na maHsarba Ni ba ra Na bai skam bi ni be d+hi sa twa ya/ oM tu ru tu ru ma ma sarba A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha Ni/ sarba ta thA ga
265b4(rgyud): ta A yur ba lA nI bi pu la nirma la/ sarba sid+d+hi nA ma maskri tA/ ba ra ba ra/ sarba satwa a ba lo ki ni/ oM sarba nri da bA ra Na bi skam bi ni/ ma ma sarba pA pa bi sho d+ha ni ku ru swA hA/ 
265b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bdag gi gsang sngags 'di ni sangs rgya sa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus bshad pa lags te// gang la la zhig gis ma yengs pa'i sems kyis rtse
265b6(rgyud): gcig tu byas te/ skad cig gcig gton na yang sdigs pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// yang gang la la zhig gis gsang sngags 'di cho ga bzhin du dgu bcu rtsa dgu yi ger bris te
265b7(rgyud): mchod rten gyi nang du bcug na mchod rten de la/ la la zhig gis phyag byas sam/ tshig snyan pas bstod dam/ spos dang / me tog dang / byug pa dang / mar me 'bul ni rigs kyi bu de de'i
265b8(rgyud): tshe 'di nyid la sdig pa thams cad byang shing las kyi sgrib pa thams cad gsal te/ bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du grub par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgya stong grangs
266a1(rgyud): med pa'i gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la mchod cing bsnyen bkur byas pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du mchod rten ring bsrel gyi snying po can brgya stong bye ba khrag
266a2(rgyud): khrig gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po sogs par 'gyur ro// yang dge sbyong gang zhig gis tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga
266a3(rgyud): gang yang rung ba la khrus dang gtsang sbra byas te/ gos gtsang ma gyon la zhag gcig bsnyung ba 'am/ yang na zas dkar gsum zos te/ mchod rten la bskor zhing gsang sngags 'di lan
266a4(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na bskol pa brgya stong du bas dgas pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur
266a5(rgyud): gzhan yang las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rna ma par dag par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba bdag nyid kyi lus mngon
266a6(rgyud): par bstan te/ bsam pa thams cad dngos grub tu sbyin par mdzad cing / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhal yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gang la la zhig gis
266a7(rgyud): nyis brgya rtsa brgyad bton na ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro// gang gis sum brgya rtsa brgyad gton na sgrib pa thams cad byang ste phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur ro// yang gang gis
266a8(rgyud): bzhi brgya rtsa brgyad gton na rgyal chen ris bzhi'i rgyal po chen po dag kyang nye bar 'ongs nas lus mngon par bstan te/ bsrung ba dang / skyab byed cing shes rab kyi stobs kyang skyed nas bsod nam/ 
266b1(rgyud): thams cad nye bar sgrub bo// gang gis lnga brgya rtsa brgyad bton na dga' ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis 'dus ma byas kyi lam la gnas pa 'thob bo// yang gang gis drug brgya rtsa brgyang gton na rig
266b2(rgyud): sngags 'chang du 'gyur te/ na mkha' la rig 'dzin gyi gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// yang gang gis bdun brgya rtsa brgyad gton na legs pa'i yon+tan thams cad ldan par 'gyur// yang gang gri/ 
266b3(rgyud): brgyad brgya rtsa brgyad gton na gzhan gyis bsgo ba med pa'i rang dbang 'thob ste/ sems rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// yang gang gis dgu brgya rtsa brgyad du gton na phung po lnga rnam par dag
266b4(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// yang gang gis stong rtsa brgyad du gton na rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob bo// gang gis nyi das stong tshang bar bton na lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'theg
266b5(rgyud): gang gis sum steng tshang bar bton na phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras dbu 'thob bo// gang gis bzhi stong tshang bar bton na dag btsam pa'i 'bras bu 'thob bo// gang gis lnga stong tshang bar
266b6(rgyud): bton na rang sangs rgyas kyis 'thob par 'gyur ro// gang gis drug stong tshang bar gton na byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gnas 'thob par 'gyur ro// yang gang gis bdun steng tshang bar
266b7(rgyud): bton na byang chub sems dpa' sa dang po 'thob par 'gyur ro// yang gang gis gyad steng tshang bar gton na byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa gnan par 'gyur ro// yang gang gis dgu stong tshad
266b8(rgyud): bar gtan na rig sngags dang / gsang sngags rnams kyi bdag po gsang ba pa'i lus 'thob par 'gyur ro// yang gang gis khri tshang bar brten na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa mi
267a1(rgyud): g.yo ba gnon par 'gyur ro// yang gang gis nyi khri tshang bar bton na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 'thob par 'gyur te/ seng+ge'i sgra chen
267a2(rgyud): be sgrogs par 'gyur ro// yang gang la la zhig gis pha ma'i don gyi phyir bsod nams kyi las bya bar 'dod na/ mchod rten snying pa ring bsrel can zhig ral du gyur pa gsos la
267a3(rgyud): bcos legs byas te/ gang yang phyogs su bskor ba byed cing sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang gi bor du bsre byas na bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas
267a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sgrib dpa thams cad rnam par sel ba legaso zhes bya ba byin te/ lagaso leg so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nga'i grogs
267a5(rgyud): byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang sngags kyi chos tshul bzhin du bshad pa de kho na bzhin no// de nas gnod sbyin thams cad kyi rgyal po gsang ba pa'i bdag
267a6(rgyud): pos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags kyi rgyal po gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang 'dra ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa
267a7(rgyud): chos kyi sku las byung ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das snying po dam pa 'di dag 'jam gling na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi las kyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad bsal nas de kyi/ 
267a8(rgyud): tshad bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gas
267b1(rgyud): sngags kyi cho ga 'di dag ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten na zhugs pa dang 'dra ba yin no// ngas cho ga ji skad bstan pa bzhin du byas na las kyi sbyor ba chung ngus
267b2(rgyud): kyang 'bras bu chen po 'grub cing phan yon cher gnas par gyur na/ las kyi sbyor ba cher byas pa lta ci smos te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsags par 'gyur ro// de lta bas na de
267b3(rgyud): de dag gi yon tan ni de bzhin gshegs pa brgya stong bye ba khrag khrig gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis bshad kyang mi rdzogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis mkhyen cing gzigs par
267b4(rgyud): zad de/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pos gsol pa/ bcom/ da ldan 'das las tshigs chung ngu ji lta bu zhig bgyi ba pa bsod nams kyi 'bras bu chen po 'grub cing bsod nams chen
267b5(rgyud): be thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' spel pa/ de'i phyir legs par nyan gcig dang bshad par bya'o// dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen
267b6(rgyud): ma gang la la zhig gis bsod nams kyi 'bras bu chen po thob yon+dan thob par 'dod pas gsang sngags kyi rgyal po'i cho ga sngar bstan pa bzhin du byas te/ dgu bcu rtsang gu yi ger bris
267b7(rgyud): la sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten gyi mdun du dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas la ba'i lci bas byugs te/ grwa bzhir dri'i chu phor bu bkang ba re re bzhag/ bdug spos kyi snod 'thul ba yang bzhag nas
267b8(rgyud): snod chen po'i nang du me teg dang / dri'i chu dang / 'bras skam po rnams blugs te/ kyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag pa dang / yang til nag paM dang / srin ma ma' dang / 'bras rnam
268a1(rgyud): bsres te bcos pa'i 'bras thug kri sa ra zhes bya ba dang zas dkar gsum dang / 'di rnams bum pa'i nang du blugs pa dang / yang shing tog sna tshogs 'bras bu dgu
268a2(rgyud): bcu rtsa dgu dang / kha zas ming gis smos pa 'di rnams dang / spos dang / me tog la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bkram la/ gsang sngags kyi yi ge mchod rten gyi srog shing gi nang du
268a3(rgyud): rnamachod rten gyi phyogs bzhir phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon du dmigs te phyag byas la sems rtse gcig pas gsang sngags 'di dag gdon par bya'o// 'di lta ste/ oM
268a4(rgyud): bi pu la bi pu la bi ma le/ pra ba re dzi na ba re sa ra sa ra/ sarba ra ta thA ga ta d+hA tu gar+b+he/ a d+hiSh+Ti Ni swA hA/ oM ya to ni sag/  cad pa na/ dahA ya bi shud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Tha na sa ma ye swA hA/ bdug spos 'phrul
268a5(rgyud): brgyun mi 'chad par bya zhing / gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsab/ rgyad bton ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po
268a6(rgyud): brgyad dang / gsang ba po'i bdag po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / sred med kyi bu rnams de'i mod la mchod rten de la mchod pa dang / rim
268a7(rgyud): gro byed srog shing brtan par byed do// de bas gong du yang sangs rgyas bye ba 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang gnas der gshegs te/ mchod rten de la
268a8(rgyud): mchod pa dang / chos kyi skur byin gyis rlob cing ring bsrel dang ldan par mdzad do// de ltar sems thag pa nas cho ga tshul bzhin du byas na yon tan de dag/ gzhan yang mchod
268b1(rgyud): rten de yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che las byas pa'i bsod nams thob par 'gyur te/ rin po che'i rnam pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma las mchod rten byas pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
268b2(rgyud): brgya chen po dang ldan zhing lus rnam par dag la tshe ring zhing nad med pa dang / bgegs thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// gang gzhan la la zhig gis mched rten 'di mthong ngam/ mchod
268b3(rgyud): rten de'i dril bu'i sgra de thos na yang las kyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad byung bar 'gyur te/ mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang yongs su byang nas 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu bde ba
268b4(rgyud): can gyi 'jig rten du skye'o// gang la la zhig gis mchod rte/ na de'i ming tsam thos pa yang 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi la mo thob par 'gyur/ tha na
268b5(rgyud): bya dang / ri dgas la sogs pa sems can gang gis mthong ba de yang tshe 'phos nas dud 'gro'i skye spangs te/ bsod na/ mas dang ldan pa'i lus thob par 'gyur ro// gang la la zhig
268b6(rgyud): gos pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par spyod par 'dod pa des snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te/ sa dang lci bas byugs la de'i steng du spos kyi skyang nul gyis byugs te/ 
268b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor grwa bzhir dri'i chus bkang ba'i snod re re bzhag la/ sngar bstan pa'i gsang sngags bzhi po dag los rnam pa gcig kyang dgu bcu rtsa dgu bris te/ rang gi lag gis mchod rten
268b8(rgyud): chung ngu dgu bcu rtsa dgu gdab cing gsang sngags rnams gcig kyang re re'i nang du gzhug go// de nas yang gsang sngags 'di dgu bcu rtsa dgu yi ger bris te/ mchod rten gyi 'bang lo rnams kyi nang
269a1(rgyud): du bcug ste/ mchod rten rnam dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag ste/ me tog dang / byugs pas mchod la/ lan bdun bdun du bskor zhing gsang sngags 'di yang gdon
269a2(rgyud): pabar bya'o// na maHna ba nA TI nAM/ ta thA ga ta gaM ga NA nA Di bA lu kA/ ko Ti yuk+tA sha ta sa ha srA NAM/ oM bo po ri/ tsa ri Ni tsa ri/ mo ri go ri tsa la ba ri swA hA/ cho ga 'di ltar byas na pha rol tu phyin pa drug
269a3(rgyud): yongs su rdzogs par spyad par yang ma zad de/ des ni rin po che'i mchod rten bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed byas par 'gyur ro// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye
269a4(rgyud): ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu snyed la mchod ci nga bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur ro// nga'i gong du yang lha thams cad kyis mchod pa'i sprin sna tshogs bsdus te/ mchod
269a5(rgyud): rten de la yo byas sna tshogs sbyar nas de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa'i pho brang dang / yo byad sna tshogs sbyar nas ma/ chod par 'gyur te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag
269a6(rgyud): skad kyis mkhyen cing gzigs te byin gyis rlob par mdzad do// rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsab rgya chen po'i bsod nams dang / yon+tan thams cad thob par mdzad do// yang
269a7(rgyud): gang la la zhig gis gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di snying po 'di ma nor bar yi ger bris la rtag tu bton te/ mchod pa'i las byas la thogs na rig pa de nyid kyis srung ba dang / bskyab pa
269a8(rgyud): mdzad de/ phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra thams cad dang / shar gnyer ba rnams dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas la sog pa thams cad kyang / gnod par mi 'gyur te/ 'jigs
269b1(rgyud): shing skrag nas so sor 'byer bar 'gyur ro// gang la la zhig gis rig pa 'don pa de dang gtam byas pa yang mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyi sgrib pa yang yongs su 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
269b2(rgyud): gang la la zhig gis sngags pa de'i sgra thos sam/ grib mas phog gam/ lus la reg kyang rung ste/ de'i tshe rabs gzhan gyi las kyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad yongs su
269b3(rgyud): byang bar 'gyur ro// gang rig pa 'don pa de'i lus la dug gis mi tshugs/ mes mi tshugs/ chus khyer bar mi 'gyur/ gdon thams cad kyis kyang glags mi rnyed/ thog 'bab
269b4(rgyud): par mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyis srung ba dang / bskyab dpa mdzad cing spyan ras kyis 'tshe bar mdzad do// lha thams cad dang / dam tshig can thams cad kyis kyang de la
269b5(rgyud): stong grogs byed par 'gyur te/ gzhan gyi rig sngags dang / byad dang / sbyor ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// de lta bas na rig pa 'don pa gnas gang na
269b6(rgyud): 'dug kyang gsang sngags 'di'i cho ga don du gnyer bar bya ste/ gsang sngags yi ger bris la lam gyi bzhi mdo'ag du rdo ma log tshun 'gro ba'i gnas su mchod rten byas la/ de
269b7(rgyud): nang du bcug na/ 'gro ba thams cad dang / bya dang / sbrang mo dang / za na grog sbur yan chad kyis mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / reg pa dang / de la phog pa'i sa dang / rdul dang / rlung dang / 
269b8(rgyud): grib mis yig na yang byol song dang / yi dogs dang / ngan song log par ltung ba sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ba'i sdig pa thams cad dang bral zhing / 'chi ba'i dus byas na/ 
270a1(rgyud): bde 'gro mtho ris lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa yongasu byang bas tshe rabs rjes su dran pa 'thob par 'gyur zhing / phyir mi ltung ba'i tshe/ 
270a2(rgyud): can du 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen
270a3(rgyud): po bzhi dang / tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams la bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa dag ngas gsang sngags
270a4(rgyud): kyi rgyal po'i snying po 'di dag khyed rnams la yongasu gtad dkyis rtag tu rim gror bya zhing yongasu gzung bar bya daste/ rin po che'i za me tog gi nang du chug la gnas thang du
270a5(rgyud): bsgrags te/ nam du yang rgyun ma bcad par sems can la ston cing / mthong zhing thos par byas nas mtsham so ma da pa lnga'i sdig pa yang 'byang bar 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub
270a6(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dag dang / tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug tshon po
270a7(rgyud): dang / sred med kyi bu dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal
270a8(rgyud): nas tshigs thun par smras te/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te gsang sngags 'di'i cho ga dang / mchod rten bgyi ba'i cho ga ji skad gsungs
270b1(rgyud): pa rnams sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du bdag cag kun gyis srung zhing rim gror bgyi/ rtag par gzungs su bzung zhing mi bskrad par bgyi/ yi ger bri ba dang / klag pa dang / 
270b2(rgyud): mchod pa'i las rnams kyang bgyi ste/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can gang la las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos shing khong du chud nas/ ngan song ngan 'gro sems can dmyal ba
270b3(rgyud): la sogs pa dang / sdig pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pas na/ bdag cag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' drin spyi bos blangs
270b4(rgyud): ba'i slad du gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di dag rim gror ba dgyi/ btsun par bgyi/ gus par bgyi/ rin po che'i 'du shes bzhag par bgyi/ rgya cher 'phel bar bgyi/ 
270b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal dang 'dra bar blta bar bgyi ste/ nam du yang nub par mi 'gyur zhing ci nas kyang rgyas par bgyi ba'i slad du nan tan bgyi bar 'tshal lo// de
270b6(rgyud): skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa rnams dam tshig la gnas pas gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di dag srung ba dang / rim gror bya ba dang / yong
270b7(rgyud): su bzung bar khas blangs pa ni lags so lag so// shin tu yang leg so// bac+doMs kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis
270b8(rgyud): gsung ba la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa 'od zer dri ma med pa rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan pa 'id+ya ka re sa hi dang / 
271a1(rgyud): chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he dpal gyi lhun po'i sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ jo bo a ti sha dang / dge ba shes 'brom ston pas sngags rnams dag par
271a2(rgyud): bcos so// / rgya gar skad du/ kA ru Na a gra nA maM d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ snying rje'i mchog ces bya ba'i gzungs thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag na d+ma
271a3(rgyud): bsnams pa/ sems can sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshang tshing du nub pa rnams yang dag par bsgral ba'i phyir/ blo gros shar ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
271a4(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi mchog snying rje chen po'i rtse mo 'char ba/ thogs pa med pa'i don yod pa'i las kyi dngos grub de bzhin gshegs pI zhal nas byung ba/ sems can gyi
271a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ma lus pa'i las kyi sgrib pa dang / ngan so/ nga gi sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs zhi bar byed pa/ phan pa ma yin pa dang / bkra shes pa dang / rmi lam
271a6(rgyud): ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa thams cad dang / nad rnam pa du ma dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ stong chen mo rab tu 'joms par byed pa bshad par bya ste/ 
271a7(rgyud): thog mar bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi tshogs du ma bye ba phrag 'bum gyis brgyan pa'i sku mnga' ba la phyag 'tshal nas brtsam par bya'o// na mo b+ha ga ba te/ be ro tsa nA ya/ ta thA ga tA
271a8(rgyud): ya/ aR+tha te samyak+saM bud d+hA ya/ sarba adz+nyA na d+ha kA ra sha ma yi tre/ tad+ya thA/ sA d+ha ni sA d+ha ni/ sid+d+hi bid+d+ha ri/ b+ha ga ba ti pA raM pA ra/ kle sha d+ha ba ti/ a dz+nyA na sha mA ya/ sarba pA paM bi shud+d+had+d+had+harme/ 
271b1(rgyud): ni ra ma la d+hA na go tsa re/ a saM ga tsa ri Ni pra sha ma mUr+t+ti su kha pra te sarba kle sha d+ha ba ti/ sarba pA pa bi sho d+ha ni bi d+ha ma ni/ bi nA sha nI bi nA sha ni/ bi nA shwa ya bi nA shwa ya/ b+ha ga pa tI su ras
271b2(rgyud): bi ma la bud+d+ha/ sa ra sa ra/ bi sa ra b+hi sa ra/ su ru su ru/ sU ra sU ra pra sa ra pra sa ra biM su ra bi sa ra/ a dz+wa na ma ko Ti sa ha sra sa tsi ta na karma a ba ra ni k+Sha pa ya/ k+She ma bi ti bud d+hi ba shA
271b3(rgyud): ya/ ba sha brti ni pA ra mi tA dz+nyA na go tsa re/ bi shaM ShA ba ti/ a she Sha li ni/ ka ru Na go tsa re/ ba ma hA dz+nyA na a b+hi Sha ka ba ti/ su bi ni sh+tsi tad+harme/ he he b+ha ga ba ti/ ma hA ka ru Ne ku ru ku ruH
271b4(rgyud): bi sho d+ha ya mam/ sarba satAM sh+tsa/ mahA ka ru No ta se ke na sa/ na sin tsa ya/ sa ma ba d+ha ya/ sa ma b+ha lA ya/ pra re da hA ya me/ ma hA ka ru Na bi dza na pa ri shud d+ha/ a mau g+ha ma
271b5(rgyud): ku ru dzI ba ta na rak+Sha rak+Sha maM/ b+ha ga ba ti ma ma hA po d+ha tsit+ta ma saM mA h+yed ma san tu shud bi ti mi ka ru Ni/ bud+d+hi pra te/ na ra ka prA ta tir+yag+ma ti/ duHkhe na mu la ni/ da ba
271b6(rgyud): ma nu l+ya ga ti sam pa ha na bi gra to ba kle sha/ sarba bud+d+ha d+harmA pa ri pU ra ni swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snying rje chen po'i mchog ces bya ba'i gzungs/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor nas
271b7(rgyud): byung ba 'di ni gzungs grangs med pa phrag stong gi 'khor dang ldan pa'o// sdig pa dang / las dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms pa'o// bkra mi shis pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / 
271b8(rgyud): ltas ngan pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad zhi bar byed pa'o// tshe dang bsod nams dang / gzugs dang phyo dang / de ba dang / spobs pa dang / nad med pa byed pa'o// 'byung po dang
272a1(rgyud): brjed byed dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / na mkha' lding dang / lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon thams cad nges par 'joms pa'o// gzungs 'di'i
272a2(rgyud): ming bzung ba dang / thos pa dang / brjod pa tsam gyis kyang tshe rabs bye ba phrag 'bum gyi bar du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yang byang bar 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa thams cad
272a3(rgyud): bsrabs par 'gyur ro// de'i ngan song gi 'gro ba thams cad kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro// 
272a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur dar ro// snying rje las kyang nyams par mi 'gyur ro// seMn zad
272a5(rgyud): kyis kyang mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro// nyin dus gsu ma mtshan dus gsum du lan bdun bdun brjod na sdig pa thams cad las rnam par thar pa 'gyur ro// 
272a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i yon stong phrag dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag kyang thob par 'gyur ro// nam nangs pa'i dus su skyil mo krung bcas te bde bar 'dug la/ lag pa gru gsum
272a7(rgyud): gyi phyag rgya byas nas/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dmigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa sten bdag nyid chen po mngon sum du bsam nas/ de bzhin gash+ye
272a8(rgyud): pa la phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras te/ yid kyis phyag 'tshal nas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod na/ de la yid la ji ltar 'dod pa'i bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs
272b1(rgyud): par 'gyur te/ don ji lta ba bzhin du 'grub pa thob par 'gyur ro// tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga la bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas la/ bsnyen gnas blangs nas
272b2(rgyud): gos dkar po dgos te/ sbyin pa byas la byang chub kyi sems chen po blangs nas mi sdug pa med par lag pa brkyang ba des rang gi lag gis dkyil 'khor byas la me tog kha dog sna gsum
272b3(rgyud): gyi mchod nas tsan+dan dkar pos 'dugs la 'jig rten gyis khams stong phrag mtha' yas pa dag na mchod pa dang / bkur sti chen po rnam pa sna tshogs yod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa
272b4(rgyud): rnams la 'os pa rnams yid la bsam te/ sangs rgyas da dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phul nas/ de bzhin ga bye ba'i snying po stong chen po 'bar ba byung ba 'di na
272b5(rgyud): dga' ba chen po skyes kyis bar du brjod na bdag nyid de ba zhon gshegs pa rnams kyi drung na 'dug par shes shing // de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis zang zing med
272b6(rgyud): pa'i chos kyi longs spyod chen po'i dga' ba thob par 'gyur ro// de phyin chad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigasu phyir mi ldog par skyes pa yin no// tshe rabs gzhan du song na yang byang
272b7(rgyud): chub se m+ba dpa chen pos thob par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang chen po'i 'khor los bsgyur ba yang thob par 'gyur ro// gzungs kyang thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
272b8(rgyud): kyang mnyes par byed do// mngon par shes pa mi nyams pa yang thob par 'gyur ro// tshe 'di la yang sems can thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyis kyang sru
273a1(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// thob par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang mnyes par byed do// mngon par shes pa mi nyams pa yang thob par 'gyur ro// tshe 'di la yang sen thad
273a2(rgyud): dga' bar 'gyuraro// lha thams cad kyis kyang srung bar 'gyur ro// klu dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad kyis kyang srung bar 'gyur te/ 
273a3(rgyud): gang la smras pa de'i bya ba sgrub par 'gyuraro// des ci bsams pa dang / byed du bcug pa rnams kyang lha la sogs pa rnams byed par 'gyur ro// de'i 'dod pa thams cad kyang yongasu rdzogs
273a4(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// sus kyang ngag mi bcog par yang 'gyuraro// / lha rnams kyis kyang de'i stobs dang / gzugs dang / bsod nams dang / lang 'tshe dang / nad med pa dang rgyas pa
273a5(rgyud): 'phel bar byed do// bgegs thams cad kyis kyang mi chug sa par 'gyur ro// mdor na de bzhin gshegs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug par 'dod pa rnams dang / de bzhin
273a6(rgyud): gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku chen po mthong bar 'dod pa rnams dang / yon phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'dod pa rnams dang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i
273a7(rgyud): bslab pa'i gar thabs byed pa la 'jug par 'dod pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i chos nyid kyi dam tshig thob par 'dod pa rnams dang / rtag par rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / 
273a8(rgyud): bar chad med par rgyud chen po'i don rtog par 'dod pa rnams dang / de bzhinag rtse pa yin gyi rgyan gyis bdag gis bdag nyid brgyan par 'dod pa rnams kyis yon gyi tshogs chen po bsags pa'i phyir de bzhin
273b1(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams kyis bstod cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis yang dag par bsten pa 'di thog mar sgrim pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
273b2(rgyud): bsams pa'i cho ga ji skad bstan pa bzhin du blangs par bya'o// snying rje'i mchog ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so// rgya gar skad du/ kro d+hA bi dza ya kalpa gu d+ha tan+t+ra/ dod
273b3(rgyud): skad du/ khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rto pa gsang ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam po'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi ni// khro bo 'di ming gshin rje gshed// 
273b4(rgyud): mtshon cha me lce 'bar bas 'khrugs// dra ga la mthu rtsal drag ldan pa// de mthong nas ni khro bo gzhan// thams da kyi ni lag cha sher// de bzhin du ni 'jig rten pa'i// lha
273b5(rgyud): rnam lus kyis 'dus par byed// gzhan yang thal mo sbyar bya/ sa te// skrag nas bstod pa mang po byed// lha rnams ma po ji skad kun// 'jam dpal khro bo'i gzi brjid kyis// 
273b6(rgyud): gzir bzhin du ni rab smras pa// bcom ldan bdag cag sangs rgyas dang // chos dang dge 'dun skabs mchis kyis// rab tu mi zad 'jigs pa'i gzugs// gzi brjid 'bar bas phyogs khyab pa/ 
273b7(rgyud): khams gsum 'khrug par mdzad pa mthong // gang tshe lha dang lha min rnams// skrag nas skyabasu dong ba na// de tshe 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi ni// khro bo slar yang zhi bar 'gyur// gshin rje gshed ces
273b8(rgyud): bya ba yi// khro bo chen po zhi ba la// de nas skyabasu dong ba yi// lha rnams kun gyis zhus pa ni// khyed kyi brtson 'grus mchog 'tshal bas// ci lta bur na mnyes par bgyi// ji ltar yang ni dang bar 'gyur/ 
274a1(rgyud): bdag cag the tsom chen po mchis// khro bo lta rnams tshig gsan nas// gshin rje'i gshed kyis bka' stsal pa// gzi brjid chen po khyed rnams kun// gang tshe gsum
274a2(rgyud): la skyabs song ba// de tshe nga yi mi bzad pa// khro bo yid la gnas par gyis// dkon mchog gsum ni gnas pa dang // de yi bka' yang bskyang ba dang // sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir// nga yi
274a3(rgyud): yid ni zhi 'gyur gyis// khyed rnams skyabasu dong ba yi// byang chub sems dang ldan pa yi// thams cad don ni sgrub pa'i mchog/ yi ge 'bru ni bcu bdun po// nga yi snying po yid las byung // lha rnams
274a4(rgyud): kun gyis gzungs par gyis// gshin rje'i gshed po bdag nyid kyi// snying po rab tu gsungs pa na// de nas sa ni g.yos/ dpar 'gyur// rgya mtsho yang ni rab tu 'khrugs// gnod sbyin
274a5(rgyud): dang ni srin po dang // sha za la sogs phung bar 'gyur// lha rnams/ kun ni phyag 'tshal zhing // yan lag kun nas sprul/ ngas nas// gshin rje'i gshed po khro bo yi// khro bo snang
274a6(rgyud): po de gzung ngo // de nas dam chos srung ba'i phyir// khro bo rnam par rgyal ba yi// rtog pa 'di ni de dag la// gshin rje'i gshed kyis rgyas par gsungs// de nas khro bo rnams rgyal gyis// rtog
274a7(rgyud): pab khro bo nyid kyis gsungs// snying rje byang chub sems ldan pa'i// lha rnams kyis thos dga' gyur nas// dkon mchog gsum ni srung ba'i phyir// so so yi ni rtog pa bshad// de dag gi ni rtsa ba'i
274a8(rgyud): rgyud// khro bo nyid kyis rab gsungs pa// khro bo rnam rgyal zhes bya 'di// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pas// sngon nas phyag byas khro bo yo// zhal nas ji bzhin thos nas kyang // khro bo nyid kyis
274b1(rgyud): gsungs pa yi// rlud 'di byang chu sems rnams kyis// snying rjes de bzhin rgyas pa dang // rnam pa mang por byin gyis brlabs// 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa khro bo rnam par rgyal ba las rlung / 
274b2(rgyud): 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i skabs te deng po'o// de nas khro bo rnam par rgyal// 'jam dpal khro bos bshad pa yi// rtag pa rmad du byung ba'i mchog/ mdor ni rab tu bshing
274b3(rgyud): par bya// de la 'od yi dkyil 'khor ni// dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa'i// 'jig rten gsum po 'khrugs par mdzad// yi dgas mang po zhes bya'o// thams cad du ni dkyil 'khor 'di/ 
274b4(rgyud): gnas ni gang du 'grub par 'gyur// sdug pas theg ma nyid du ni// de yi gnas ni brtag pa bya// shing gcig pa 'am dur khrod dang // khyim stong dang ni bzhi mdo dang // mchod
274b5(rgyud): rten dang ni mu gnyis dang // thibs po stong pa lam srang rnying // bskyed mes tshal dang ri yi rtsi// chu yi 'gram dang na gas tshal dang // yang na mtshe yi 'gram dang ni// lha chen
274b6(rgyud): gyis ni gnas kyang rung // ba lang lhas sam g.yul gyis// khyad par du ni yul gtsang bar// gang du yid ni dga' bar yang // der ni dkyil 'khor rab tu bya// de nas rig 'dzin nan tan gyi// / 
274b7(rgyud): sa ni yang dag sbyang bya ste/ kha tsha med cing ma gas pa// mnyam zhing zug rngu med pa la// shar dang byang ni mtho ba dang // kha dog snum pa lhag par bzang // ba las byung ba rnam lnga dang // ldan pa
274b8(rgyud): yi ni lci bas byug/ ci rigs par ni byugs nas kyang // slob dpon gyis ni khrus byas nas// sprang po byas te mnyam gzhag nas// khro bo'i srung bas byin gyis brlab// yi dgas phal chen zhes
275a1(rgyud): bya ba'i// dkyil 'khor gsang mchog nub mo bri// zar ma'i ras sam ras bal las// thig skud gsum sgril mdzes pa yi// gru bzhi dang ni sgo bzhi par// mkhas pas dkyil/ 
275a2(rgyud): 'khor thig btab ste// thog mar shar dang byang nas ni// lce dang nub kyi bar du'o// thig skud de ni phyogs mtshams nas// de nas kyang ni drang bar bya// shar dang lho yi mtshams dang ni// nub
275a3(rgyud): dang byang gi mtshams ngag tu// thig gis rab tu tshad byas te// gru bzhi par ni thig gdab pa// rim pa gcig pa mdzes pa la// sgo bzhi dag gis mdzes par bya// lho phyogs kyi ni sgo phya la/ 
275a4(rgyud): lhag ma rnams ni bcad par bya// dkyil 'khor dang ni 'tsham pa da yi// dbus su pad+mo bri bar bya// pad+me dang ni phyogs bzhi s+ho// the tsom med par mnyam por bya// mdzes bying sgo yi
275a5(rgyud): byed du bya// 'bram pa mngab mo'i tshad dang mnyam// nye ba yi ni mdzes byed kyang // mdzes byed dang ni 'dra bar bya// rma ga bzhin du dkyil 'khor te// kun tu thig ni btab na
275a6(rgyud): kyang // phyi nas tshul bzhin rig 'dzin gyis// dur khrod thal bas bri ba ni// rtag tu byi shar la sogs po'i// gra yi nang ni de dag tu// mkhas pas be cen phyag rgya bri// phyogs kyi sgor ni yi dgas
275a7(rgyud): gzhag/ gzhan yang yi dgas lnga pa ni// pad+ma'i steng du bsam par bya// de bzhin phyi sgo'i nang dag dang // phyogs rnams de dag thams cad du// mi ro mgo med yi dgas rnams// dur khrod
275a8(rgyud): thal bas dang ra ta bri// de phyir yi dgas phal chen yin// khru gang la sogs rim pa nas// khru brgyad pa yi bar du ste// de las lhag par yong mi bri// rtag tu bdag nyid mchod pa ni// 
275b1(rgyud): khru gang pa ni bri bar bya// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // mi rgyal sgrub pa khru dor bstan// sems can kun ni skud pa dang // de bzhin gzhig la khru gsum pa// khru bzhi dbang dang dgug pa yi// 
275b2(rgyud): las rnams kyi ni mchog tu gsungs// khru lnga nad dang mi nad dang // dgra rnams med par brtsal ba'i mchog/ khru drug bgegs rnams thams cad dang // gdon rnams nges par bzlog par
275b3(rgyud): byed 'khru bdun pa ni lha yi rnams// dbang dang dgug pa'i las rnams byed// khru brgyad pa ni dngos grub kun// sbyin sreg mchog tu shes par bya// de ltar ci rigs bris nas ni// de nas
275b4(rgyud): gtsang mang nye rag bya// chu yi phyir ni chu yi snod// chus ni rab tu dgang bar bya// de bzhin me tog don du yang // me tog sdugu dri zhom dang // me tog phreng bas snod mchog gzhan// 
275b5(rgyud): legs pa dgang zhing mdzes par bya// dri yi don du bya ba ni// n+dan dkar po dmar mo glang // a ga ru dang sbyar ba yi/ gu gul bdug pa de bzhin no// mar me mar gyi mar ma
275b6(rgyud): dang // mkhas pas snying po 'jam pa'o// drag po yi ni las dag la// mi yi tshil gyis bya bar bshad// gtor ma nya dang sha la sogs// sbyar dug la sogs lhag par dbul// de ltar der ni
275b7(rgyud): tshogs bsags nas// de nas rig sngags 'chang ba yis// sangs rgyas kun la phyag byas te// byang chub sems la dmigs nas ni// ri mi yi ni las rnams dag/ gal te 'dri bar mi nus
275b8(rgyud): na// yi dgas phal chen dbus dag tu// pad+ma sngar bris gang yin pa// de yi steng du yi dgas ni// mkhas pas yid kyis bsam par / yi dgas kyi ni sngags mchog gis// bsam pa dag
276a1(rgyud): ni byas nas kyang // gra yi be con bzhi po yang // sngags nyid kyis ni bsam par bya// gal te 'dri bar nus na ni// sngags nyid steng du bzhag par bya// sgo yi yi dag bzhi po
276a2(rgyud): yang / gal te bri bar ma nus na// de bzhin yi dgas 'dzin sngags kyis// byin gyis rlob par gsungs pa yin// de yi nang du rang sngags kyis// byin gyis rlob por bya ba'i phyir// rkang lag
276a3(rgyud): mgo bo dpung pa dang // de bzhin gzhan yang dpung pa dang // gzhan yang de bzhin lag pa'i phreng // thod pa keng rus mi lpags rlon// re yi phreng ba bsam par bya// de yi nang du ring sngags kyis// 
276a4(rgyud): byin gyis rlob tu gzhug par bya// de ltar cho ga bzhin pa sam nas// 'jug tu khro bo gshin rje'i gshed// dasngags brjod pas ni spyan drangs nas// rang gi snying pos bzhun
276a5(rgyud): su gsol// khro bo 'khrugs pa 'jig mdzad pa// sku ni me lU 'bar ba 'dra// gzi brjid 'phags pa bsam pa ni/ sku mdog stang zil ba cag 'phro 'dra// zhab drug sgra yang 'bam dug sprinam
276a6(rgyud): kha mig kyang ser// spyan gsum mig ni zlum pa ste// phyag ni bcu gnyis pa yi gzugs// de bzhin yi dgas steng na bzhugs// zhabs drug gis ni mdzes par byas// tri shul ral gri dbyug
276a7(rgyud): dgra ste// sbyin pa'i phyir ni phyag kyang ga/ lcags kyu yi ni mtshon cha dag/ g.yas pa'i phyag na de bzhin bsnams// de bzhin g.yon pa'i drug po yang // thod pa mdung thung mda' bo che// mdzub mos
276a8(rgyud): bsdigs dang zhag pa bsnams// phyag na dbyug te bsam par bya// mi mgo rlon dang skam po dang // yi dgas phreng ba rnam par rgyan// stag gi lpags pa'i na bza' gsos// sku yang cha
276b1(rgyud): la gsus khyim che// zhal gyi dbyibs ni du ma ste// sgra ni rgya 'tsho 'khrugs pa 'dra// zhal gcig bzhud cing zhal gcig zhi// zhal gcig 'jigs par bgrang ba'i zhal// zhal gcig zhal
