346a6(rgyud): nyin gsum pas ma yin/ nyin bzhi pas ma yin/ mes ma yin/ gsang sngags kyis ma yin/ ro langs kyis ma yin/ dug gis ma yin/ nad kyis ma yin te/ chus 'chi// 
346a7(rgyud): ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// rig sngags dang / gsang sngags sbyor ba sgrub pa thams cad sbyor ba rnams kyis ma grub pa rnams grub par byed do// sbyar te grub pa rnams gzha/ 
346a8(rgyud): gyis mi tshugs par byed do// pha rol gyis bcings pa las grol bar byed do// gzhan gyis rig sngags gcod par byed do// bdag gi rig sngags 'phel bar byed// gdon thang phung
346b1(rgyud): bar byed do// gdon gang gis mi gtong na yang / de'i mgo a rdza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal ba bdun du 'ag so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// bcom ldan
346b2(rgyud): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la bstod// // 'phags pa thams cad la mi 'jigs pa skye
346b3(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad
346b4(rgyud): kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// // da rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya drA bau Da bid+ya rA dza/ bod skadang du/ 'phags pa 'gro lding ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po/ 
346b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa du sa gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na smyig ma'i
346b6(rgyud): myu gu'i 'khor gyi khyams na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis glog thams cad bzlog pa/ so sor 'brangs
346b7(rgyud): sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa nga yang da ltar 'chad kyis zung shig/ kun dga' bo shar phyogs na 'ong ba zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo
346b8(rgyud): lho phyogs na skad brgya zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo/ nub phyogs na 'od nyams pa zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo byang phyogs
347a1(rgyud): na rgyun gyi bdag po zhes bya ba'i glog yod de/ kun dga' bo gang la la glog 'di rnams kyi ming shes pa dang / phyogs rnam par gnas pa
347a2(rgyud): shes pa de la glog gi 'jigs pa thams cad du mi 'byung bar shes par bya'o// glog gi ming 'di dag yi ger bris te/ gnas gang dag tu bzhag pa'i gnas de dag tu
347a3(rgyud): glog thams cad mi 'bab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to// tad+ya thA/ ni mi ni ni mi ni ni mi ni ni
347a4(rgyud): min d+ha re/ 'jig rten gsum snang bar byed pa / lag na rtse gsum pas phyogs 'dir glog thams cad las bdag la bsrungs shig/ bsrungs shig
347a5(rgyud): swA hA/ yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des
347a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags gzhi 'di rnams brjod par bgyi'o// 
347a7(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ ha te bi ha te/ ni ha te/ pra t+yar+thi ke/ pra t+ya mi te/ shud+d+hemuk+te/ bi ma le/ pra b+ha sA re/ a tA re/ paN+Da re/ she te/ baN+Da/ ra bA si ni/ ha ri ka ra di/ bi ga/ 
347a8(rgyud): lA k+Shi da d+hi mu khi/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad las bdag la bsrungs shig/ bsrungs shig/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzi brjid kyis bdag dus
347b1(rgyud): ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad mthong bar ma gyur cig swA hA/ de nas gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das ga la bde log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom
347b2(rgyud): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ mu ni mu ni/ 
347b3(rgyud): mu ni mu ni/ re ri/ ma ti ma ti/ su ma ti/ ma hA ma ti/ hA hA hA hA/ khyod la sdig pa med kyis/ ma 'jigs shig ces lag na rdo rjes smras kyis/ dwi Da swA hA/ bcom ldan
347b4(rgyud): 'das bdag gi bsrungs pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di su'i sring la 'dzin tam/ yi ger bris na de la bdag gis rtag par rgyun tu 'jigs pa thams cad las srung bar
347b5(rgyud): bgyi'o// dus ma lags pa 'gum pa thams cad la/ sa thar par bgyi'o// de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
347b6(rgyud): to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can thams cad kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba bskyed pa'i slad du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags
347b7(rgyud): kyi gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li/ tsi li swA hA/ brah+ma sA re sA re sA hA/ brah+ma gan+d+ha pu shwa saM sta re swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi srung ba/ 
347b8(rgyud): tshangs pa'i chad pa zhes bgyi ba ste/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongasu skyob pa/ sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lagaso// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya
348a1(rgyud): byin gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la bde log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces bsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis
348a2(rgyud): kyang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ ni ba ri Ni/ ban d+ha ban d+ha mA dan d+he/ ma ti ma ti/ ti Ta/ gau ri/ gan d+ha
348a3(rgyud): tsaN+Da li/ ma taM gi/ ba ra la ni/ hi na mA ri Ni ma la naM/ da la mat+te/ tsakra pa kra/ sha ba ri sha ba ri swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gis rig sngags rdo rje
348a4(rgyud): 'bebs pa zhes bgyi ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par thar par bgyid pa/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongasu skyob pa lagaso
348a5(rgyud): de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / rgyal po che/ na po rnam thos kyi bus/ bcom ldan 'das ga la
348a6(rgyud): ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde
348a7(rgyud): ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ puSh+pe puSh+pe/ d+harma ba ri ha ri/ 
348a8(rgyud): Ar+ya pra sha ste/ shi ra muk+She/ ma ga le/ stu ste/ sta tsi te swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni rgyal po chen po gzhi po bdag cag gis srung ba 'jigs pa ma mchis bya
348b1(rgyud): ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad las mi 'jigs par bgyi ba tshe skyong ba dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongasu skyob pa lag so// de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang
348b2(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po glog 'od dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po glog lce dang / klu'i rgyal po 'od zer brgya pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ 
348b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis srung ba chen po yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bgyi ba glog thams cad bzlog pa/ dus ma lags
348b4(rgyud): par 'gum pa thams cad sel ba/ dug rnams mi gdug pa ra bgyid pa/ gshed byed dang / byad dang / ro la dngas dang / bkra mi shis pa 'jig par bgyi nga mchis
348b5(rgyud): na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag klu'i skye gnas 'di nas/ dbyung ba dang / ser sna spang ba'i slad du thugs brtse bar dgongs te bzhe su gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 
348b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag klu rnams ni sems ser sna can te/ sems ser snas kun nas dkris pa lags pa'i slad du'o// tad+ya thA/ a ra dze/ a ma re/ a mr-i te
348b7(rgyud): ak+Sha ye/ pu N+ya par+ya ba te/ sarba pA pa pra sha ma ni ye swA hA/ Ar+ya pu N+ya so pa ki ye swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag skyes pa 'am/ bud med
348b8(rgyud): gang la la'i lce 'don tam/ yi ger bris pa de la glog gi 'jigs pa thams cad ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// rtsa ba'i dug gam/ mche ba'i dug gam/ dbyigs dug gam/ 
349a1(rgyud): gang dag gzhan yang yan lag las byung ba'i dug de dag gis/ de 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// bdag 'jigs pa thams cad/ 
349a2(rgyud): dang / gnod pa thams cad las bde legasu gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / klu'i rgyal po de dag pa
349a3(rgyud): leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ bzhin bzang dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rje su gzung ba'i phyir 'gro lding ba'i
349a4(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams bshad pa leg so leg so// / phyogs rnams na gnyid log pa dang / myos pa dang 8/ rab tu mos pa rnams srung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
349a5(rgyud): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang / klu'i dbang po de dag dang / lha dang
349a6(rgyud): mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa 'gro lding ba'i rig sngags
349a7(rgyud): kyi rgyal po rdzog so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dza na mi tra dang / dAn shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcon
349a8(rgyud): nas gtan la phab pa// / rgya gar skad du/ ga thA di ye d+ha ra Ni/ bde skad du/ tshig su bcad pa gnyis pa'i gzungs/ 'jam dpal gzhun nur gyur pa la phyag
349b1(rgyud): 'tshalo// sangs rgyas dang ni chos la brnyas pa dang / le lo dang ni cung zad chog par 'dzin// 'dod chags dang ni nga rgyal spyod pa dang // 'gyod pa dang ni mnges spyod pa rnams/ 
349b2(rgyud): sems can rnams kyi sgrib par gyur pa ste// de'i gnyen por theg pa mchog bstan pa// de yis bar du gcod pa de dag gi/ nyes pa thams cad rab tu spong bar 'gyur// tad+ya thA/ 
349b3(rgyud): oM badz+ra pra kA ra badz+ra tsakra/ daSh+Ta b+ha yA na ke/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ nir ma le/ tsu lu ke/ tsu lu tsu lu sarba bud+d+he swA hA/ tshig su bcad pa gnyis pa'i gzungs la ni// tshig gam/ 
349b4(rgyud): don gyi sgo nas gang sbyor ba// sems can dam pa blo dang ldan pa des// phan yon rnam pa bcu dag thob par 'gyur// khams rnams mtha' dag rtas par
349b5(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang // 'chi ba'i tshe na mchog dga' dam pa 'thob// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du skye ba dang // thams cad du ni tshe rabs dran par 'gyur// sangs
349b6(rgyud): rgyas rnams dang phrad par 'gyur ba dang // de bzhin de dag la ni theg mchog thos// mos par 'gyur ba blo dang bcas pa dang // sgo gnyis dang ni byang chub myur du thob
349b7(rgyud): tshigasu bcad pa gnyis pa'i gzungs rdzog so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya d+h+wa dza a gra ke yu ra nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i
349b8(rgyud): dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
350a1(rgyud): sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang na la ba dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb la bzhugs te/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha ma yin rnams las pham/ rab tu pham nas
350a2(rgyud): de btab cing rings pa'i gzugs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
350a3(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'dir lha ma yin dang / g.yul bkye ba la/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris las pham/ rab tu pham ste/ sum cu
350a4(rgyud): rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyang pham/ rab tu pham na bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis de la ji ltar sgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
350a5(rgyud): pa/ lha'i dbang po khyod kyis rgyan mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs zungashig/ ngas kyang sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur
350a6(rgyud): pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan las 'di mnoso// mnos nas kyang gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par bshad do// mngon par dran te de tshun
350a7(rgyud): chad 'jigs pa 'am/ bag tsha ba 'am/ spu zing zhes byed pa 'am/ tha na skad cig yud tsam yang lus la gnod pa 'byung ma myong ngo // bcom ldan 'das rgyal mtshan gyi
350a8(rgyud): rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bgyi ba/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tad+ya thA/ oM dza ya dza ya/ bi dza ya bi dzaH
350b1(rgyud): dza ya bA hi ni/ shaM ka ri shaM ka ri/ pra b+h+re ka ri/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi/ sarba sha tAM/ dza b+ha ya dza b+ha ya/ staM b+ha ya staM b+ha ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ b+ha ga ba ti/ dza sa
350b2(rgyud): ba hi ni/ ma tha ma tha/ pra ma tha pra ma the gra sa gra sa/ ha sa ha sa/ hUM hU/ la hUM la hUM/ le bo da re/ tre ne tre Na/ tsa tur+Yak+te/ tsa tu ra ngaSh+Te/ tsa tur b+hu dze/ a si mu/ 
350b3(rgyud): sa la/ tsakra tri shu la/ badz+ra ka ba tsa d+hA ra Ni/ bdag gnod pa thams cad las bsrungs shig/ oM b+ha ga ba ti/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pi tsa/ ma tha ma tha/ pra ma tha
350b4(rgyud): pra ma tha/ d+hu na d+hu na/ bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/ hUM hUM/ phaT phaT// b+hUny+dza b+h+rany+dza/ pA ra s+yai n+ya ma bi d+hA na sa ya/ da sarba sha trun nA sha ya/ d+ha dza a gra ke yu re/ 
350b5(rgyud): tri Ta tri Ta ti Te/ b+hi Ta b+hi Ta/ u la kA mu kha~M/ u la kAR+Sha ra ni/ tAM maikya ma thA ni/ bi d+ha na sa ya pa ra se n+yan bdag gnod pa thams cad las bsrungs shig bsrungs
350b6(rgyud): shig/ tsa la tsa la/ tsi li tsi li/ tsu lu tsu lu/ kaM pa ka pa/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ aTu ha saM/ bi d+ha na sa ya pa ra sai n+yan/ tra sa ya tra sa ya/ 
350b7(rgyud): b+h+ra ma ya b+h+ra ma ya/ bud+d+ha sa t+ye na/ d+harma sa t+ye na/ saM g+ha sa t+ye na/ sa t+ye bA d+hi na na sa t+ye na/ bud+d+ha sa t+ye na ma ti kra ma/ d+harma sa t+ye ma ti kra ma so g+ha sa t+ya ma ti kra ma/ sa t+ye bA dI nAn/ sa t+ya
350b8(rgyud): ma ti kra ma/ la bo da ri/ laM bo da ri/ ku Ta ku Ta/ kuT+Ta kuT+Ta/ kun+na pa ya kuR+ShA pa ya/ ru tra ma nA ya biSh+Ta ma nA ya/ tsan+da sur+ya brah+ma ma nA ya trai lokya a d+hi pa ti ma nA ya/ sarba de ba
351a1(rgyud): a d+hi pa ti ma nA ya/ sarba yak+Sha rak+Sha sa/ gan d+ha tha/ ku b+hUr+dz+dza/ ma hor ga a d+hi pa ti ma nA ya/ bi d+ha na sa ya pa ra saM nAn/ re ga raM ga/ raM ga pa yA/ reg pa hA
351a2(rgyud): dz+wa la dzA la/ puSh+pa mA li ni/ run d+ha rune d+ha / ri ti ri titsi ti tsi ti/ d+hi ti d+hi ti/ b+h+r-i ku Ti mu kha pa ra/ se na ku lo ta sA da ni ka ri/ ha la ha la/ hi li hi li/ hu lu hu lu/ he ha/ 
351a3(rgyud): ri Na ri Ni/ ri Ni ma ti/ dza b+ha d+ha dze/ sarba bud+d+ha/ a ba lo ki ti/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrungs shig/ sarba ta thA ga te/ a ba lo ki ti sA hA/ gu Na rA dza pra b+ha
351a4(rgyud): sot+ta me swA hA/ sUr+ya arka bi ma le swA hA/ tsan+d+ra aH/ da bi ma le swA hA/ sarba gra ha na k+Sha tra d+he/ mI ka ra NidaswA hA/ bdag 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go
351a5(rgyud): ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las bsrungs shig/ bsrungs shig swA hA/ lha'i rgyal po rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i
351a6(rgyud): gzungs 'dis khyod g.yul sprod pa 'am/ 'thab pa 'am/ rtsod pa'am/ 'gyed pa 'am/ gang du 'gro yang rung ste/ thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro// rgyal mtshan gyi rtse
351a7(rgyud): mo 'am/ mgul du btags na/ mi'i rgyal po dang / skyes bu dpa' bo thams cad la srung ba byed do// bud med kyi gzugs lta bur bsgyur nas mdun du 'dug ste/ mi 'jigs
351a8(rgyud): pa sbyin zhing srung ba byed/ dpal skyed par byed/ pha rol gyi sde dpa' kong bar byed/ bkra shis pa dang / gtsang ba dang / grags pa dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa
351b1(rgyud): kun tu gnas par byed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig
351b2(rgyud): rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung ba la mngon par bstod do// // 'phags pa rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so// // rgya gar
351b3(rgyud): gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tA dang / dA na shi la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa dga'o// 
351b4(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ye tsun+de de bi nA ma d+ha ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lha mo bskul byed ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// 
351b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par sna/ nga mdzad la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das lha mo
351b6(rgyud): bskul byed ma mthu dang stobs dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang pha rol gnon pa grug pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags shing bstod pa la phyag
351b7(rgyud): 'tsha lo// bdag rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du dge bar mdzod cig/ na maHsap+ta nAM/ sa mya kr-i bud+d+ha ko Ti nA/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsa le tsu le tsu n+de swA hA// brtson
351b8(rgyud): 'grus chen po thogs pa med pa 'dul ba/ stobs che ba pha rol gnon pa che ba/ phyag na ral gri dang / dgra sta dang / lcags kyu dang / zhags pa bsnams pa/ khro bo chen mo/ 
352a1(rgyud): khro bo chen mo'i dbang phyug ma/ drag pa'i gzugs can ma/ zhal ras mtha' yas ma/ phyag stong mnga' ma/ ma pa ma ma/ gnan gyis mi thub ma/ don yong
352a2(rgyud): ma/ gdul bar dka' ma/ mig stong ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs ma/ lha thams cad kyis phyag byas shing mchod pa rab tu sgrub ma/ rdo rje sen mo can// rdo rje
352a3(rgyud): rje 'dren ma/ rdo rje'i mtshon cha can/ rdo rje'i sku can ma/ rdo rje'i khu tshur ma/ rdo rje'i spyan gdangs pa'i stang stabs can ma/ drag shul can ma lags kyang drag shul gyi gzugs
352a4(rgyud): can du bsgyur bar ston par mdzad ma/ sku rdo rje dang bai DUr+ya'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ oM b+ha ga ti tsun+de/ d+h+waMd+d+ha/ kr-i k+ku/ mu mU/ sru sr-i/ rU r-I/ a bai sha ya/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ 
352a5(rgyud): gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya/ ha ra ha ra/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ sa ra saram ra ma ra/ mar ya ma ra ya/ btsa ba da ha da ha/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+na/ sdang ba'i gdon dang / rims
352a6(rgyud): zhag gcig pa dang / zhag gnyis pa dang / zhag gsum pa dang / zhag bzhi pa dang / zhag bdun pa dang / rtag pa'i rims dang / yud tsam pa dang / 'byung po dang / ro langs dang /

352a8(rgyud): bgang dag la 'tshe ba dang / gdug pa de dag thams cad/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ maR+Sha ya maR+Sha ya/ sho Sha ye sho Sha ya/ tA pa ya tA pa ya/ uta sA da ya/ uta sA da ya/ ha na ha na badz+reN
352b1(rgyud): sa ra sa ra da t+ten/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ khagle na/ sU hU/ tsu rbu tsu/ d+hud+hAng+ku/ oM tsa le tsu le tsun+de sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ya swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa lha mo bskul byed
352b2(rgyud): ma'i mthu dang byin gyis brlabs kyis bdag gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig swA hA/ 'phags pa lha mo bskul byed ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so// // rgya gar
352b3(rgyud): skad du/ Ar+ya su mu kha na nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo// 
352b4(rgyud): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi shing drung na/ byang chub snying po'i mchod rten chen po na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i
352b5(rgyud): dge slong gi dge slong chen po 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dag la/ gyi bu chen po la sogs pa/ nyan thos chen po thams cad
352b6(rgyud): dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems
352b7(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams
352b8(rgyud): pa la sogs pa/ bskal pa bzangs po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang yang thabs gcig go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
353a1(rgyud): lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
353a2(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad du gsol/ gang gis sems can rnams la snang ba bgyis par 'gyur ba dang / phyir rgol
353a3(rgyud): ba dang / dgra thams cad kyis gnod par bgyi ba srung ba dang / bskyab par 'gyur ba dang / 'di lta ste/ lha'i dbang po rnams dang / klu'i dbang po rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi
353a4(rgyud): dbang po rnams dang / srin po'i dbang po rnams dang / 'byung po'i dbang po rnams kyis 'jigs par mi 'a/ gyur pa dang / sdig pa dang / mtshon dang / dug dang /

353a6(rgyud): cad du yang skyobs par 'gyur ba dang / de dag gi don du de lta bu'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams bshad du gsol// ji ltar bdag rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rim gro 'tshal
353a7(rgyud): ba dang / rtag tu srung ba dang / yongasu skyong ba 'tshal ba dang / de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi don dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
353a8(rgyud): kyi bu mo de dag 'thab pa dang / 'tshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / nad dang / dus ma lags pa'i 'gum pa las srung ba dang / yongasu sbyang ba bgyi ba'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs/ 
353b1(rgyud): pa la gsol ba 'tshal lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lags na rdo rje gsol ba btab pas thug su chud nas/ de la 'di skad
353b2(rgyud): ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje khyod sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa leg so// leg so// de'i phyir lag na rdo rje khyod
353b3(rgyud): legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bya'o// u gu mu gu ba li ni/ ban+d+ha ni/ ba la tsam na/ ba hu ba hu ba tu
353b4(rgyud): li brta ya swA hA// de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags gzhi rnams bka' stsal to// de bzhin gshegs pas kyang gsungs
353b5(rgyud): pabar 'gyuro/ byin gyis rlob par 'gyu ro// tad+ya thA/ badz+rI badz+ra badz+rI badz+rI d+ha ra ri/ badz+ra pA Ni/ badz+rI d+ha ri / tsakra badz+ri/ tsakra d+ha ri/ pa Tu d+hi d+hi ri/ b+hi ri/ mu ri/ 
353b6(rgyud): tsi ri/ a hu ri/ b+ha ga/ b+hi b+hi ri/ shi ri tra/ shi ri/ ru ru tse ru ru tse/ tsa raM tsa ri/ da ri tsa le/ tsu ru tsu ru/ paN+De re/ sdigs pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa/ nang thams ca

360a7(rgyud): bsngags te/ lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo gcig la bcings na/ de'i lus la dug dang / mtshon dang / nad dang / rims nad dang / rims drag pos mi tshugs so// 
360a8(rgyud): 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'bru ba dang / brtsod pa rnams las lan thebs par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ khyim bdag
360b1(rgyud): mgon med zas sbyin yirangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'bigs pa bu mang po rton pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so// 
360b2(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sap+ta be tA Da ka na ma d+hA raNI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa ro langs bdun pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
360b3(rgyud): cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong
360b4(rgyud): gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang yang thabs gcig go// de'i tshen mu steg
360b5(rgyud): can kun tu rgyu ba rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gnodapar bya ba'i phyir/ ro langs chen po bdun btang bar gyur to// de dag bcom ldan 'das
360b6(rgyud): kyi thad du song ba las de dag gis glags ma rnyed/ dmigs pa ma rnyed do// de dag gis glags ma rnyed/ dmigs pa ma rnyed nas/ de dag tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
360b7(rgyud): bog la ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i lus la reg go// reg ma thag tu kun dga' bo de sdug bsngal mi bzad pa drag pa/ tsha ba
360b8(rgyud): shi la thug pa'i tshor ba rnams dang ldan par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ drag pacha
361a1(rgyud): ba shi la thug pa'i tshor ba rnams dang ldan no// bcom ldan 'das des ma dgongaso// bdag 'di ltar nyam nga bar gyur na de bzhin gshegs
361a2(rgyud): pas ma dgongs so snyam mo// de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po che dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang thag mi ring ba zhig na
361a3(rgyud): 'dug par gyur to// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa de lta bu de tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos thos so// 
361a4(rgyud): de nas de gnyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der song ste byin nas 'di skad ces smraso// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ 
361a5(rgyud): drag pa tsha ba'i tshor ba myong nas bdag la de bzhin gshegs pas ma dgong so zhes ci de skad smra 'am/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan
361a6(rgyud): pa kun dga' bos de dag la/ 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag gis lus la tshor ba dang ldan pa ni dper na/ sog les mgo bo bshegs
361a7(rgyud): ba ltar kun dga' bo la reg pa yang de dang 'dra'o// kun dga' bo ma 'jigs shig/ bdag cag gis khyod khri'i steng du bzhag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
361a8(rgyud): drung du bkur ro// bcom ldan 'das de khyod la yongasu skyob pa mdzad par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen
361b1(rgyud): pos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nyal khri'i steng du bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du bzhag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das
361b2(rgyud): kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod ci sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ drag pa/ tsha ba'i tshor bas thebs sam/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de lta
361b3(rgyud): lags so// kun dga' ba khyod de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la zung shog dang bshad do// kun dga' bo khyod la reg pa'i ro langs chen po stobs che ba/ gdul dka'
361b4(rgyud): pa/ mthong na gnod pa bdun yod de/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phreng ba 'dzin ces dbya ba dang / nor bu 'dzin dang / gtum po dang / 
361b5(rgyud): gdol pa dang / rma bya'i snying dang / tshe zid dang / la ba can te/ ro langs chen po bdun de dag ni stobs che ba/ gdul dka' ba/ bsnyen
361b6(rgyud): par dka' ba/ rdzu 'phrul cheb/ mthu che ba'o// kun dga' bo ro langs re res kyang 'dod na rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bas ro'i rgyal por rab kyang 'phen to// 
361b7(rgyud): rgyal po ri rab yung sa 'bru tsam du rnam par 'jig go/ snying du bltas nas 'gas par byed do// phyog su bltas na 'chi bar 'gyur ro// grogs mtsham su bltas
361b8(rgyud): na mes sreg par byed do// de dag gis khyod la reg go/ da la mod kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang / chos thos pa'i gus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
362a1(rgyud): pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis dadung du khyod kyi lus 'tsho ba yin no// bcom ldan 'das legs par gsal du gsol/ phyir bzlog tu gsol
362a2(rgyud): phyag rgya bcing du gsol/ skud pas bcing du gsol/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir legs par rab tu zhon pa 'di la zung shig dang bstan par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ ha re/ ma hA ge re/ g+ha sa/ 
362a3(rgyud): ra pa ti/ d+ha ra d+ha ri/ d+ha raM Ni/ tshe ra tshe ra Ni/ ka ro ti ti/ ka to ta sa mA d+hi Ni/ sa ma ra sa ra ti/ sa ra na ko ta ma ti/ sa ma b+ha be/ b+hA ba na/ nA ga re/ b+ha da ni sa d+ha na
362a4(rgyud): ti swA hA// kun dga' bo gzungs sngags kyi tshigs 'di dag lan lnga bcu rtsa gnyis bzlas brjod byas te/ mdud pa lnga bcu rtsa gnyis bor na brjed byed thams cad
362a5(rgyud): dang / 'byung po thams cad kyi snying la gnod pa byasapar 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad kyis byas pa las thar bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das legs
362a6(rgyud): de ltar mdzod cig/ slar yang mi 'chi bar mdzad du gsol/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir nyon la legs par yang zung shig/ tad+ya thA/ bad tsa le ba le/ ma hA
362a7(rgyud): bad tsa le ba le/ b+hI li b+h+rU~M li/ ma hA b+hI ri Ni/ ni mar ni/ han tsa na ga tir/ ma tsAr+dz+dza/ ma bi tsa rathA/ sti swai ra mu le/ mthanar mthan/ tsa la ni/ mA/ 
362a8(rgyud): nAM/ dza b+ha na~M/ bIng+ka naM/ gams rba ti/ b+ha ga sa ti/ ta thA ga ta/ ba~Mta9/ ti bi g+he d+ha re/ pra re brad/  tiSh+Tha/ nI la ba sin swAhA/ ku dga' tsho
362b1(rgyud): langs 'di dag ni 'chog bsdang ba// / gtum por gyur pa/ gsod par gyur pa'o// de la rig sngags 'das ke mu ru ka'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/ mdung
362b2(rgyud): pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bor ro// de nas 'byung po chen po shin tu 'khrugs par 'gyur ro// 'dis thams cad kyang sdang bar 'gyur/ 'dzom par 'gyur/ zhi bar 'gyur zhing / 
362b3(rgyud): 'dis 'byung po thams cad kyang dbang du 'gyur/ 'dis 'byung po thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo nyon cig dang bstan par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ da ra da ra dar
362b4(rgyud): ka ra ka ra kar/ ma hA kak+ka ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsad tsad/ ma hA tsad tsa ra/ ha la ha la ha la/ hi li hi laM/ da hu lu hu lu/ hi re bi re/ hi ri ki ri/ bai raM bi tsi ni ka ran ka
362b5(rgyud): ri/ sarba b+hU tA nAn/ pra dze b+ha ni/ nI la ba ra sa ni/ tsats+tsha/ tsakra tsakra/ A yu d+he sA hA/ kun dag 'bo 'di dag ni gnod sbyin thams cad dang / srin po
362b6(rgyud): thams cad dang / gsang sngags thams cad dang / yi dgas dang / byang dang / sdig pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o// rgyal pos bkrabs pa dang / la gcan pa phyir bzlog
362b7(rgyud): par byed do// de la rig sngags 'di skud pa dmar po la lan sum cu rtsa bdun bzlas brjod byas te/ mdud pa sum cu rtsa bdun bor na thams cad rengs par 'gyur ro// kun
362b8(rgyud): dga' bo gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag zung shig/ chongs shig/ legs par rab tu yid la zung shig/ rjesu sbyor bar gyis shig/ de lta bas na kun dga' bo khyod kyis dran pa dang ldan
363a1(rgyud): pas gzung bar bya'o// tad+har+tha/ d+ha rad+ha/ d+had+har/ khar khar ma hA khar/ mahA pa le/ ba la n+d+ha sha na~M/ god can/ ku rban/ kun Ta nA~M// 
363a2(rgyud): / kA Ta daSh+Te/ ka khA kha re/ ma ku Ta/ d+ha re NI/ mu lu/ ka kA/ kA Na ka nI ke/ sa me sA shA ni/ ki ni/ ga ra Ni/ b+ho gi sa re/ sA sA bai ta DA/ ma ku mA ra ka
363a3(rgyud): kr-i ti swA sa~M/ kai na ni ba bud+d+ha si// ba bu dz+yaM/ bi bud+d+ha gri san d+ha/ kr-i ta b+he ra ba/ bi kr-i ta b+hai ra ba/ mi hA ba ya/ kr-i tA na/ har si/ kin nA mA ra ya si/ kin ni sarba da
363a4(rgyud): nA ga yak+Sha/ gan d+ha ra ba/ a su ra/ sarba a suM dar/ sarba b+ha ya sha ma na/ ma ta sa ra swA hA/ kun dga' bo rig sngags 'di sbyin sreg gam/ skud pas
363a5(rgyud): bcings na 'dod pa'i mthar gtogs pa thams cad 'dzi gas par byed/ ltung bar byed/ za bar byed do// kun dga' bo ro langs thams cad rengs par byed pa'i
363a6(rgyud): rig sngags zung shig/ tad+ya thA/ se me le/ ma hA ha ha le/ ha ra d+ha re/ g+hi ra d+ha re/ d+ha rit+ti/ r-it+ti/ bi rot+taM/ ku Nat+ti/ ku ta ni/ saM go tsa ni/ ka tsa ri/ kha tsa ri/ 
363a7(rgyud): ri/ ma ra Ne/ hu hu/ ma re Na/ ma hA mA la d+ha re/ na yo na ma ti swA hA/ kun dga' bo gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dmed pa drag po dang mtshungs shing 'dra ste/ 'byung po
363a8(rgyud): thams cad rnam par bshig pa'i phyir bal gtsang ma'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa bzhir bzlas brjod byas te/ mdud pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi bor na/ log 'dren thams cad kyis mi tshugs
363b1(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag zung shig/ legs par rab tu gzung bar gyis shig/ kun dga' bo gsang sngags 'di gang yang rung bas gzung
363b2(rgyud): bar mi nus so// kun dga' bo de lta bas na legs par gzung bar gyis shig/ tad+ya thA/ tsata tsa ra/ ma hA tsata tsar/ tsi ri tsi ri/ bu ru bu ru/ ma hA/ bu ru/ saM b+ha le/ 
363b3(rgyud): ma hA saM b+ha le/ ma hA ba le swA hA/ kun dga' bo lha dang bcas/ bdud dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas/ dge sbyong dang bram ze dang / skye dgur bcas pa'i 'jig rten
363b4(rgyud): na gang zhig gsang sngags 'di la mi spro ba ni ngas rje su ma mthong ste/ srung ba dang / rjesu 'brang ba yin no// gsang sngags 'di ni mi zad pa ste/ sreg par byed
363b5(rgyud): 'tshed par byed/ 'ching bar byed/ 'joms par byed/ 'bar bar byed pa yin te/ rig sngags/ lan drug cu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/ mdud pa
363b6(rgyud): drug cu rtsa gcig bor na sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed rig sngags gcod par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol
363b7(rgyud): to// bcom ldan 'das leg so// legs par gzung lag so// mdud pa bor du gsol// phyag rgya bzhag par mdzad du gsol// kun dga' bo de'i phyir/ tad+ya thA/ b+ha b+ha re/ 
363b8(rgyud): b+ha re/ b+ha ra Ni he re pra ha re/ ha ra Ni/ kurba ni ta Di/ led tshad dang ti/ tshangs pas byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do// dbang phyug chen pos byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do// 
364a1(rgyud): khyab 'jug gis byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do// brgya byin gyis byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do// rgyal po chen po bzhis byas pa'i rig sngags
364a2(rgyud): bcad do// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon gyis byas pa'i rig sngags bcad// zla ba dang nyi mas byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do// gza' dang nyi mas byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do// gza'
364a3(rgyud): dang rgyu skar gyis byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do// phyogs nas byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do// phyogs mtshams nas byas pa'i rig sngags bcad// steng nas byas pa dang 'og na/ 
364a4(rgyud): byas pa'i rig sngags bcang // lhas byas pa'i rig sdug das bcad // klus byas pa'i rig sngags bcad// gnod sbyin gyis byas pa dang / na mkha' lding gis byas pa
364a5(rgyud): rig sngags bcad do// grul bum gyis byas pa dang / tsher kha pos byas pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / 
364a6(rgyud): skyes pa dang / bud med dang / gdol pas byas pa dang / kla klo dang / ri khrod pas byas pa dang / seng ge dang / sbrul gyis byas pa dang / 'gro lding ba'i yid kyis byas pa dang / g.yung pos
364a7(rgyud): byas pa dang / tongs la bas byas pa dang / mu dag ri khrod pas byas pa dang / sems can thams cad rig sngags 'chang bas byis pa'i rig sngags bcang // tad+ya thA/ ga ga gA
364a8(rgyud): ra li phu/ ma hA ga ga gA ri la pu/ bi she pu/ sha pa ra sid+d+hi pu/ tsat+tA li phu/ ma hA tsat+tA li phu/ tse gi phu/ tsi mi ri phu/ tsi tsi mi re pu/ tsakra d+ha re pu/ kriSh+Te pu/ kr-iSh+Na ru pe phu/ tsaN+De
364b1(rgyud): so ge bu/ bcu pa lA~M pu/ pany+tsa le phu/ b+hi me bu/ b+hi bA ba le pu/ piM ga le pu/ bi ga la/ ak+She phu/ A nan+de phu/ sa man+te pu/ nA sha ni phu/ ts+tshed ni pu/ bi ts+tshed ni phu swA hA/ kri sa ni/ bak+Sha na/ 
364b2(rgyud): mA ra ni/ bin da ni/ bin d+ya nan/ bak+Sha Ni/ nA sha ni/ khAng d+ya ka nan/ gA la bi na sha ni/ dA hA ma si/ b+has+sa/ b+hasma ni/ ma sa ni/ ban+d+ha ni swA hA// kun dga' bo gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen
364b3(rgyud): po bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag ni mtshan mo gzi 'phrog par byed pa'o// kun dga' bo nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe ro langs chen po gnod byed ces bya ba zhig yod de/ de ston gyi dus kyi tshe/ 
364b4(rgyud): nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi rje su zhugs nas/ gang 'od zer de dag gis gang la reg pa 'od zer gyi dra bas reg nas da rim su 'gyur te de yang bcad do// kun dga' ba ra
364b5(rgyud): langs kha cig pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdu bar bya'o// klu'i rgyal po sa 'dzin ces bya ba yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdu bar bya'o// klu zang
364b6(rgyud): dang / grul bum thams cad dang / yi dgas dang / sha za thams cad kyang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus// nam mkha' lding yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus/ nor 'dzin yang 'di nyid kyi nang du
364b7(rgyud): bsdus/ rlung lha yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus/ sgyu ma len gyi bu pa ro pa Di she rung dro yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus// phung po 'dzin dang / mdung thung 'dzin kyang de bzhin du bsdus
364b8(rgyud): de bzhin du blon po dang bcas pa dang / 'khor dang bcas pa yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsduso// kun nas dpag tshad brgya dag tu// nga yis chad pa dag byas pas// nga la 'byung bas byar ci
365a1(rgyud): yod nga yis sdang ba thams cad bcom// gsod par gyur pa stobs po che// ro langs dag gis byar ci yod// de dag kyang ni nga'i zhags pas// kun na/ 
365a2(rgyud): yongasu bskur ba yin// zhags pa kun gyis de dag kyang // rmugs shing shin tu rmongs par byas// 'di yi bdag gis kun 'grub cing // gsang sngags tshig rnams grub gyur cig/ 
365a3(rgyud): namaHsidz+nyA nAn/ sid d+han tu man+ta pA dA sa stir me sarba sa tA nAn+t+ra swA hA// sangs rgyas kun gyis stobs gang dang // dgra bcom rnams kyi stobs gang dang // dam pa'i/ 
365a4(rgyud): chos kyi gzi brjid kyis// bde leg su ni rab gyur ci/ ga/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyis gzi yis// / rtag tu 'jigs pa thams cad la swA hA// cho ga
365a5(rgyud): ni lan drug cu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/ kai me ru dang bal gtsang ma la sogs pa'i skud pa dam ra po la mdud pa bor ro// de bzhin du bya ba yang byed// 
365a6(rgyud): 'byung po thams cad dang / brjed byed dang / sems rnam par g.yeng byed la sogs pa dang / dug byin pa dang / dug byas pa dang / rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi pa rnams
365a7(rgyud): la kun tu 'gro ba grub pa'i mchog yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang
365a8(rgyud): dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa ro langs bdun pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
365b1(rgyud): rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud+d+ha si ha dang / ban d+he ye shes snying po'i sdes bskur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA kar siha dang / nu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he ye
365b2(rgyud): sdes nus te gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya b+ha dra ka rA tra na ma sutrA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mtshan mo bzang po zhes bya ba'i mdo// sangs
365b3(rgyud): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ 'od ma'i tshal bya
365b4(rgyud): ka lan dka gnas pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe dge slongazhig rgyal po'i khab kyi chu ta la po ta'i 'gram na 'dug go/ de nas lha kha dog bzang po mchog dang
365b5(rgyud): ldan pa zhig/ nam sros nas dge slong de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ chu ta la po ta 'gram thamasacang snang bar byas te/ dge slong de la 'di skad ces
365b6(rgyud): smras so// dge slong khyod kyis mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde shes sam/ des 'di skad ces smras so// lha bdag gis ni mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde ma 'tshal na/ 
365b7(rgyud): lha khyod kyis mtshan me bzang po'i mdo sde mkhyen tam/ mi mkhyen/ des 'di skad ces smras so// dge slong bdag gis kyang mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde mi shes so// lha'o/ 
365b8(rgyud): na mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde 'tshal ba de lta bu su mchis/ des 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po'i khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das
366a1(rgyud): bzhugs kyis khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de khyod la lung bstan pa de bzhin du zung la/ brtson par gyis
366a2(rgyud): shig ces smras nas/ lha de de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas dge slong de nang par langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
366a3(rgyud): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ dge slong des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa mdang dgung
366a4(rgyud): rmongs nas bdag gis der lha kha dog dang ldan pa zhig bdag ngag la bder mchis te/ chab ta la po ta'i 'gram thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par bgyis nas/ 
366a5(rgyud): bdag la 'di skad ces mchi'o// dge slong khyod kyis/ mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde shes sam/ bdag gis de la 'di skad ces bgyis so// lha bdag gis
366a6(rgyud): ni mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde ma 'tshal na/ lha khyed kyis mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde mkhyen tam/ mi mkhyen de dag la 'di skad ces mchi'o// dge slong bdag gis kyang
366a7(rgyud): mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo mi shes so// lha 'o na mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo 'tshal ba dang lha su mchis/ de 'di skad ces mchi'o// dge slong rgyal po'i khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal
366a8(rgyud): bya ka lan da ka gnas pa 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de khyod la ji ltar lung bstan pa de bzhin du/ 'di bzung la brtson par
366b1(rgyud): gyis shig ces smras nas/ lha de de nyid du mi mnga' bar gyur to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du bdag 'di yongasu zhu'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
366b2(rgyud): dge slong khyod kyis lha de shes sam/ dge slong des gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag gis lha de ma mtshal to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu de ni sum
366b3(rgyud): cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi ded dpon de tsan dan zhes bya'o// dge slong des gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag kyang mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde thos par 'tshalo// bcom ldan
366b4(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong khyod de'i phyir le dgas par nyon la yid la gyis shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// dge slong chos gsum
366b5(rgyud): dang ldan na/ dge slong mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sdel gnas pa zhes bya'o// gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'das pa la rje su phrad par mi byed pa dang
366b6(rgyud): ma 'ongs pa la re ba med pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyis mi 'phrogs par gnas pa'i chos can te/ chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na/ dge slong mtshan mo bzang
366b7(rgyud): po'i mdo sde la gnas pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad ces gsungs nas/ ston pa gzhan yang 'di skad
366b8(rgyud): gsung ngo // 'das la rjesu phrad mi bya// ma 'ongs pa la re ba med// 'das pa gang yin de 'gag ste// ma 'ongs de ni ma phyin pa'o// gang dag da ltar byung ba'i chos// de dang
367a1(rgyud): la rab bltas na// rnam par rtog pas mi 'phrogs par// de dag mkhas pas khong du chud// sang tsam shi 'am su shes kyis// de ring zhing du brtun te bya/ 
367a2(rgyud): 'chi bdag sde chen de dang ni// bdag tu shes pa ma yin no// sems can kun dang srog chags kun// 'byung po kun dang thams cad kyang // bde ba 'ba' shig grub 'gyur te// 
367a3(rgyud): thams cad nyen mongs med par shog/ thams cad bzang po mthong 'gyur te// gang dag sdig par ma gyur cig/ de ltar gnas shing rab brtson la// nyin mtshan snyoms las/ 
367a4(rgyud): med pas na// de phyir mtshan mo bzang po yi// mdo sde thub pas rtag tu gsungs// de nas bcom da ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad rje su bzung
367a5(rgyud): ba'i phyir/ mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde 'di bshad nas/ 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dge gsung so// tad+ya thA/ bi nA bi ni/ bi ni pU ra ni/

367a8(rgyud): ni ma ni mig na~M/ ni mi d+hi ri/ b+hu ta ni sA hA/ tad+ya thA/ e Tu Tu Tu Ta/ na nu min+ti/ kin+ti~M/ e ku/ si te ta ri/ tsa la lu/ rni d+ha/ nirma l+lu/ gal+lu/ a ba tI na na/ shi ku/ 
367b1(rgyud): ni ra da sa le/ ta ra kle/ tare/ ta rong du/ nod du/ ti la la lu/ b+huta pa tI yA/ ba ti yaM/ ye swA s+dza/ tad+ya thA/ a ra gad+de/ b+h+r-i su ka/ pA yi ye/ ka po ta ka pA yi ye
367b2(rgyud): ta bo d+ha Ni swA hA// dge slong rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ sems can thams cad rjesu gzung ba'i phyir/ mtshan mo bzang po'i don dang / tshig da
367b3(rgyud): tshig su bcad pa dang / 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags gzhi 'chang ngam/ 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ yid la byed dam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya
367b4(rgyud): cher yang dag par ston na/ de'i lus la mes mi tshugs par 'gyur/ dug gis ma yin/ mtshon gyis mo yin/ chus ma yin/ rgyal po'i chad pas ma yin
367b5(rgyud): rkun po'i chad pas ma yin/ dus ma yin paraba'i dus byed par yang mi 'gyur zhing / nges par mya ngan las 'das par yang nye bar khro tsu'o/ gang dang
367b6(rgyud): gang du skyes par yang // mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo bklags na// skye ba dran dang dgra bcom dang // dbang phyug du yang nges par 'gyur// lan gcig gis ni gnas kun tu
367b7(rgyud): dus min 'chi dang bar ma dor// bdag gis bdag la mi sbyor ba// dus min 'chi dang chos ma yin// sems can thams cad srung zhing sel// nad dang mya ngan 'jigs skye dang // mi
367b8(rgyud): lam mi shes mya ngan du// brjod na dpal du byed par 'gyur// gang gis bris te skyes pa dang // bud med lus la btags na ni// skal pa bzang dang gzi brjid dang // de yi dpal/ 
368a1(rgyud): yang skye bar 'gyur// lus dang ngag dang yid kyi su// mi dge cung zad gang byas pa// de dag thams cad bzang po'i mdos// dus ma yin ltas 'chi las skyob//

369a1(rgyud): mdangs phyir mi 'phrogs shing / 'phrogs par mi 'gyur ro// phrogs na yang phyir yang dag par gnas par 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe gsang

369b8(rgyud): dge 'dun dang / sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam la nem nur med cing the tshom med la/ bden pa'i 'bras bu thob pa/ mngon par rdzogs par gyur pa/ mtshon dang / 
370a1(rgyud): dbyig pa bor ba zhig gnas pa de'i mig la snang ba dang / mi snang ba'i gzugs rnams mi snang bar gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dad pa skyes te/ yid/

372b8(rgyud): bad kan gyi 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig/ mi gtsang ba'i 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig/ khrag gi 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig/ 'dus pa'i 'brum bu bskams par gyur
373a1(rgyud): cig sna'i 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig/ 'phyang ba'i 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ sha me sha mA ne/ sha ma sha mA ne swA hA/ na bar ma gyur cig/ 
373a2(rgyud): rengs par ma gyur cig/ sgra 'byung bar ma gyur cig/ 'dzag par ma gyur cig/ sdug bsngal bar ma gyur cig/ rab tu sdug bsngal bar ma gyur cig/ zag par ma gyur cig/ rab tu
373a3(rgyud): zag par ma gyur cig/ 'di nyid du zad pa dang / yongasu zad pa dang / med par gyur cig/ 'og tu song shig/ na mo b+ha ga bai te/ bud+d+ha ya/ sa t+ya/ bA dI nAM/ sid d+hAn+tu/ man+ta/ pa dA ni swA hA// 
373a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod/ 
373a5(rgyud): do// // de la cho ga ni 'di yin te/ bklags pas 'grub pa 'di srad bu dmar po la lan bdu na bzlas pa byas la/ mdud pa bdun bor te mgul
373a6(rgyud): du gdag so// 'phags pa gzhang 'brum rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i mdo rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dAn shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban
373a7(rgyud): d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba ro ga pra sha ma ni nA ma dA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar
373a8(rgyud): byed pa ces bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
373b1(rgyud): mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal/ mgon med pas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge
373b2(rgyud): slong dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston cig/ tad+ya thA/ tsi le me/ 
373b3(rgyud): le med pa na ko ki li/ shri ma ti/ kuN+Da le/ dun+du b+he/ in+da ni/ mu khe swA hA// 'di dag ni zas ma zhu ba dang / lbos pa dang / khrag dang / mkhris pa 'dres pa dang / gzhang 'brum/ 
373b4(rgyud): gyis btab pa dang / gzhang nad can dang / za gu dang / da pa can dang / rims nad can dang / klad pa na ba/ dang / gzhogs phyed na ba dang / yi dgas kyis zin
373b5(rgyud): pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi yin te/ kun dga' bo gang gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag las 'gal bar byed pa de ni/ ngas lnga dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ma
373b6(rgyud): mthong ngo // tshe zad pa ni ma gtogs so// gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa
373b7(rgyud): ste 'di la sangs rgyas ni sems can thams cad kyi mchog go/ 'dod chags dang bral ba ni chos thams cad kyi mchog go/ dge 'dun ni tshogs thams cad kyi mcho/ 
373b8(rgyud): gau bden pa'i tshig dang / bden pa'i ngag 'dis/ bdag gis zos pa dang / 'thungs pa dang / 'chos pa dang / myangs pa rnams legs par bde bar zhu bar gyur
374a1(rgyud): cig swA hA// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
374a2(rgyud): bstod do// / 'phags pa nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog
374a3(rgyud): gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ ai li mi ti me li/ ha ne su ha ne/ che ge mo zhig dz+wa ra ban dA me/ e ka hi ka
374a4(rgyud): na tri hi ka tsa tu rtsa kan/ sI t+ya dz+wa ran swA hA// cho ga ni 'di bris te mgul tu btags na rims nad med par byed do// rims nad zhi ba'i gzungs rdzogs
374a5(rgyud): so// // rgya gar/ skad du/ Ar+ya dzA ra pra sha ma ni nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rims nad rab tu zhi
374a6(rgyud): par byed pa ces bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ 
374a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal na bzhugs te/ de nas dge slong zhig bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom
374a8(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ dge slong nges bcom ldan 'das la
374b1(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di na sems can rims nad kyis rnam par gtses pa rnams mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das de
374b2(rgyud): dag srung du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo phyogs 'di na me lce'i phreng ba zhes
374b3(rgyud): bya ba'i rims gnas te/ de sems can rnams la nyin cig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa'i tshul gyis/ 
374b4(rgyud): rnam par gtse bar byed de/ de srung ba'i gsang ste/ dgas kyi gzhi ni 'di dag yin no// tad+ya thA/ dz+wa la ni dz+wa la ni/ pra dz+wA la ni/ pra ti pa ni pra ma sha
374b5(rgyud): ma ni/ bdag gi rims nad song shig/ ma 'dug/ cig swA hA// bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig ga nga gis 'jig rten na sangs rgyas bla na med pa dang / 
374b6(rgyud): 'jig rten na chos dang / dge 'dun bla na med pa'i bden pa dang / dben pa'i tshig des bdag gi rims nad song shig ma 'dug cig swA hA// sid d+hi man+t+ra pa dang
374b7(rgyud): tu bi d+ya ta na bra ma a nu mot+te swA hA// skud pa nag po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig dor ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
374b8(rgyud): cis bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// /
